[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/khri brgyad ga pa bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]]@##/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab 
[\[1b.2\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bgyi/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par bgyi lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[1b.3\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gzugs zhi ba dang /_gzugs ya ma brla dang /_gzugs gsog dang /_gzugs snying po med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/_/tshor ba dang /_
[\[1b.4\]]'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa zhi ba dang /_rnam par shes pa ya ma brla dang /_rnam par shes pa gsog dang /_rnam par shes pa snying po med pas shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[1b.5\]]tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi zhes zer ba ni/_nam mkha' ltar stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub pas shes rab kyi pha 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par bgyi/_zhes zer ba ni nam mkha' ltar stong pa nyid sgom pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[2a.2\]]ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yun ring po ji srid cig tu spyad na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung 
[\[2a.3\]]ste/_byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/_/de ltar mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/de ltar bsgom par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci sems kyi rgyun ma chad cing /_ma bral bar rjes su 'brel bas 
[\[2a.4\]]spyad par bgyi lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor yid la byed pa gzhan dag gi go skabs mi dbye bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa mi dor bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya zhing /_
[\[2a.5\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par bya ste/_ci nas kyang sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams mi rgyu ba de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/_/de ltar mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/
[\[2a.6\]]de ltar bsgom par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas rnam 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na ma bsgoms pas lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na 
[\[2b.2\]]bsgoms kyang bsgoms la/_ma bsgoms kyang ma bsgoms pas lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na bsgoms pa yang ma lags/_ma bsgoms pa yang ma lags pas lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 
[\[2b.3\]]'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin nyid ji lta ba bzhin du'o/_/gsol pa/_de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/_bka' stsal pa/_yang dag pa'i 
[\[2b.4\]]mtha' ji lta ba bzhin no/_/gsol pa/_yang dag pa'i mtha' ji lta bu lags/_bka' stsal pa/_chos kyi dbyings ji lta ba bzhin no/_/gsol pa/_chos kyi dbyings ji lta bu lags/_bka' stsal pa/_bdag gi khams ji lta ba dang /_sems can gyi khams ji lta ba dang /_
[\[2b.5\]]srog gi khams ji lta ba dang /_gang zag gi khams ji lta ba bzhin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi khams dang /_gang zag gi khams kyi bar dag ji lta bu lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_bdag gam/_sems can dag dmigs 
[\[2b.6\]]su yod snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor ba dag gam/_sems can dmigs su med na/_ji ltar sems can gyi khams gdags par bya ste/_rab 'byor de ltar sems can du 'dogs 
[\[2b.7\]]par mi byed/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par yang 'dogs par mi byed/_chos thams cad du yang 'dogs par mi byed/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gdags su ma mchis pa 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]lags sam/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gdags su ma mchis pa lags sam/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gdags su ma mchis 
[\[3a.2\]]pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gdags su med pa yin no/_/'dus byas sam/_'dus ma byas sam/_nyan thos kyi chos sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/_chos thams cad kyi bar dag kyang gdags su 
[\[3a.3\]]med pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad gdags su ma mchis pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du sems can dmyal ba gdags su mchis par gyur/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas gdags su mchis par gyur/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gdags su 
[\[3a.4\]]mchis par gyur/_mi dang lha gdags su mchis par gyur/_rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdags su mchis par gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 
[\[3a.5\]]'di ji snyam du sems/_sems can du gdags pa dmigs su yod snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor sems can dmigs su med na/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_
[\[3a.6\]]lha dang /_mi dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /_dgra bcom pa'i bar dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar dag ji ltar gdags par bya ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_de ltar gdags 
[\[3a.7\]]su med pa'i chos rnams la bslab par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_gzugs la bslab par bgyi lags sam/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]shes pa la bslab par bgyi lags sam/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la bslab par bgyi lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gzugs la dor ba med pa dang /_bsnan pa med par bslab par bya'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la dor ba med pa dang /_bsnan pa med 
[\[3b.2\]]par bslab par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar dor ba ma mchis pa dang /_bsnan pa ma mchis par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la bslab par bgyi lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med par bslab par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_
[\[3b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gzugs la skye ba ma mchis pa dang /_'gag pa ma mchis par bslab par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la skye ba ma mchis pa dang /_'gag pa ma mchis par bslab par bgyi lags/_bka' stsal pa/_mngon par 'du bya ba 
[\[3b.4\]]med par te/_'du byed rnams bsgom par yang mi bya/_gzhig par yang mi bya bar bslab par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis par bslab par bgyi lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par 
[\[3b.5\]]mthong bas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la bslab par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par ji ltar bslab par bgyi lags/_bka' stsal pa/_gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong par blta'o/_/tshor ba ni tshor bas stong par blta'o/_/
[\[3b.6\]]'du shes ni 'du shes kyis stong par blta'o/_/'du byed rnams ni 'du byed rnams kyis stong par blta'o/_/rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong par blta'o/_/mig gi bar ni mig gis stong par blta'o/_/yid kyi bar ni yid kyis stong par blta'o/_/nang stong pa nyid ni nang 
[\[3b.7\]]stong pa nyid kyis stong par blta'o/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong par blta'o/_/bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams kyis stong par blta'o/_/'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar ni 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas stong 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]par blta'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong par blta'o/_/byang chub kyi bar ni byang chub kyi bar gyis stong par blta ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la 
[\[4a.2\]]bslab par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong /_byang chub kyi bar yang byang chub kyis stong lags na/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par ji ltar 'gyur lags/_bka' 
[\[4a.3\]]stsal pa/_rab 'byor spyod pa med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du spyod pa ma mchis pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di 
[\[4a.4\]]ltar des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/_byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/_spyod pa yang mi dmigs/_gang la spyod pa dang /_gang gis spyod pa dang /_gang du spyod pa de yang mi dmigs te/_rab 'byor de gang la spros pa de dag thams cad mi dmigs pa de ni byang chub sems 
[\[4a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te spyod pa ma mchis pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes 
[\[4a.6\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyad par bgyi/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_de ltar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad la bslab par bya zhing /_des sbyin pa sbyin pa 
[\[4a.7\]]na/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o/_/tshul khrims srung ba na/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshul khrims bsrung bar bya'o/_/bzod pa sgrub pa na/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa bsgrub par bya'o/_/brtson 'grus rtsom pa na mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]brtsam par bya'o/_/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa na mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o/_/shes rab sgom pa na mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab bsgom par bya ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang de bzhin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[4b.2\]]ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na mi dmigs par 'gyur/_ji tsam gyis na dmigs par 'gyur lags/_bka' stsal pa/_ji tsam du gnyis yod pa de tsam du dmigs pa ste/_gnyis su med pa ni mi dmigs pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gnyis zhes bgyi ba gang lags/_bka' stsal pa/_
[\[4b.3\]]mig dang gzugs kyi bar dang /_yid dang chos kyi bar dang /_byang chub dang /_sangs rgyas kyi bar du ste/_rab 'byor de ni gnyis so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gnyis su ma mchis pa gang lags/_bka' stsal pa/_mig dang gzugs kyi bar du med pa dang /_yid dang chos rnams kyi bar 
[\[4b.4\]]du med pa dang /_byang chub dang sangs rgyas kyi bar du med pa ste/_rab 'byor de ni gnyis su med pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dmigs su ma mchis pa mi dmigs lags sam/_'on te gnyis su mchis pa mi dmigs lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor dmigs su yod pas 
[\[4b.5\]]mi dmigs pa yang ma yin/_dmigs su med pas mi dmigs pa yang ma yin mod kyi/_rab 'byor 'on kyang dmigs su yod pa dang /_dmigs su med pa mnyam pa nyid ni dmigs su med pa yin te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar dmigs pa dang /_
[\[4b.6\]]dmigs pa med pa mnyam pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/_/de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha 
[\[4b.7\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_dmigs pa la mi chags shing /_mi dmigs pa la yang mi chags pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_ji ltar sa nas sa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/_sa nas sa yongs 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]su rdzogs par bgyis nas kyang ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bgyi lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni dmigs pa la gnas shing sa nas sa yongs su rdzogs par mi 
[\[5a.2\]]byed de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_dmigs pa la gnas nas/_sa nas sa yongs su rdzogs par byed mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dmigs su med la/_byang chub kyang 
[\[5a.3\]]dmigs su med cing /_gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de yang dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[5a.4\]]yang dmigs su ma mchis/_byang chub kyang dmigs su ma mchis/_gang byang chub kyi slad du spyod pa de yang dmigs su ma mchis lags na/_'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i chos thams cad la 
[\[5a.5\]]'di ni gzugs so//'di ni tshor ba'o/_/'di ni 'du shes so/_/'di ni 'du byed rnams so/_/'di ni rnam par shes pa'o/_/'di ni byang chub kyi bar ro zhes ji ltar rab tu rnam par dbye bar bgyi lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 
[\[5a.6\]]ji ltar byas pas gzugs dmigs pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i bar du dmigs pa dang /_byang chub kyi bar du dmigs par 'gyur ba de ltar chos rnams la rab tu rnam par 'byed par mi byed do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha 
[\[5a.7\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_gzugs kyang mi dmigs/_rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang mi dmigs/_byang chub kyi bar du yang mi dmigs lags na/_'o na ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis shing /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug par 'gyur/_
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par zhugs nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid par 'gyur lags/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyis nas kyang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur lags/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyis 
[\[5b.2\]]nas kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur lags/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob nas kyang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur lags/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas kyang /_sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur lags/_sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyis 
[\[5b.3\]]nas kyang sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar bgyid par 'gyur lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzugs kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/byang chub kyi bar gyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi 
[\[5b.4\]]spyod do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na gang gi ched du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gang gi ched du yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par mi byed 
[\[5b.5\]]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ma byas pa/_chos thams cad ni 'gyur ba med pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang ma byas pa dang 'gyur ba med pa yin la/_byang chub kyang ma byas pa dang /_'gyur ba med pa yin zhing /_byang chub sems 
[\[5b.6\]]dpa' yang ma byas pa dang /_'gyur ba med pa yin pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' chen pos ma byas pa dang /_'gyur ba med pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad ma bgyis 
[\[5b.7\]]pa dang /_'gyur ba ma mchis pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji ltar theg pa gsum po nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'di dag rnam par dgod par 'gyur lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor ma byas pa dang /_'gyur 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]ba med pa'i chos rnams la ni rnam par dgod pa gang yang dmigs su med de mngon par 'dus byas pa dang /_mngon par bsags pa'i chos rnams la ni rnam par dgod pa dmigs su yod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa ni phung po lnga la mngon 
[\[6a.2\]]par zhen te/_gzugs kyi phung po la mngon par zhen par byed/_rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i bar la mngon par zhen par byed/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mngon par zhen par byed/_gzugs la rlom sems su byed/_gzugs la dmigs par byed/_byang chub kyi bar 
[\[6a.3\]]la rlom sems su byed/_byang chub kyi bar du dmigs par byed pa'i phyir te/_de 'di snyam du bdag ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag gis sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar bya'o snyam du sems so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs 
[\[6a.4\]]dang /_byang chub kyi bar gang yin pa dag ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan lngas kyang ma dmigs na skyes bu blun po sangs rgyas la skur pa 'debs pa de dag ni sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 
[\[6a.5\]]gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis spyan lngas kyang sems can gang dag 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar bgyi ba dag ma dmigs lags na/_'o na da bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[6a.6\]]pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ji ltar sems can rnams yang dag pa nyid du nges pa dang /_log pa nyid du nges pa dang /_ma nges pa'i phung po gsum du lung bstan par mdzad lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor ngas ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 
[\[6a.7\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas yang dag pa nyid du nges pa 'am/_log pa nyid du nges pa 'am/_ma nges pa'i sems can 'ga' yang ma dmigs mod kyi/_rab 'byor 'on kyang sems can rdzas med pa la rdzas su 'du shes pa 'di dag ngas 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yang dag pa ma yin pa la 'dzin pa de 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]las bzlog gi don dam par ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas don dam pa la bzhugs te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol 
[\[6b.2\]]pa/_'o na rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam grangs la bzhugs te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te don dam pa la bzhugs te/_bla na med 
[\[6b.3\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa yang ma lags la/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam grangs la bzhugs te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa yang ma lags na/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na de 
[\[6b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'am/_gcig tu mi 'gyur lags grang /_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[6b.5\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa ma yin te/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[6b.6\]]chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas mod kyi/_de ni 'dus byas kyi khams sam/_'dus ma byas kyi khams gang la yang gnas pa ma yin no/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni 'dus byas kyi khams sam/_'dus ma byas kyi 
[\[6b.7\]]khams gang la yang mi gnas mod kyi/_'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa de 'gro ba dang /_'ong ba dang /_sdod pa dang /_'dug pa yang yod la/_de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_
[\[7a.2\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la bsgom pa dang /_stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_rnam par 
[\[7a.3\]]thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_snying rje chen po la sgom zhing /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur la/_sprul pa des kyang sems 
[\[7a.4\]]can dpag tu med pa dag sprul nas/_phung po gsum du lung bstan par gyur na/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_sprul pa des sems can 'ga' yang phung po gsum du lung bstan pa yod snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 
[\[7a.5\]]de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur mkhyen te/_sprul pa de lta bur mkhyen nas sems can gang yang btul ba med do/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[7a.6\]]bsgom par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_sprul pa la bye brag ni ci mchis/_tha dad du bgyi ba ni ci mchis/_dgongs pa ni gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[7a.7\]]ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni bye brag ci yang med de/_tha dad du bya ba ci yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]sprul pa ni bye brag med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa phrin las gang mdzad pa de ni sprul pa'ang byed pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mi bzhugs na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa sug las bgyid lags sam/_bka' 
[\[7b.2\]]stsal pa/_rab 'byor byed do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bzhugs na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa sug las ci ltar bgyid lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros zhi bas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[7b.3\]]ma dmigs nas/_sprul pa sprul nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/sprul pa des kyang phyi na bskal pa las lhag par sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas te/_des phyis byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/_/zhes skye bo rnams kyis kun tu shes kyang 
[\[7b.4\]]sprul pa la ni skye ba med/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang med de/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di lta ste/_chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur mos par bya zhing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[7b.5\]]'das gal te sprul pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la bye brag ma mchis na/_sbyin pa yongs su sbyang bar yang ji ltar 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la yon phul ba de dag ni phung po'i lhag ma ma mchis pa'i mya ngan las 'das 
[\[7b.6\]]pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur gyi bar du nam yang bas par mi 'gyur lags na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du sems can gang dag gis sprul pa la yon phul ba de dag kyang phung po'i lhag ma ma mchis pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[7b.7\]]'das par gyur gyi bar du nam yang bas par mi 'gyur ba lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos nyid gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i chos nyid de nyid kyis sprul pa yang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]rten gyi sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa yin no/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa la yon phul ba lta'ang zhog_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la yon phul ba lta'ang zhog gi/_rab 'byor rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis byams pa dang ldan pas 
[\[8a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byed na/_de dag thams cad ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mthar ma phyin par sdug bsngal gyi mthar phyin par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byams pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa lta'ang zhog gi_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[8a.3\]]yid la byas shing nam mkha' la me tog snyim pas gtor na/_de dag thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mthar ma phyin par sdug bsngal gyi mthar phyin par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byams pa dang ldan pas yid la byed pa lta'ang zhog_/nam mkha' la me tog snyim pas gtor ba lta'ang zhog gi/_rab 
[\[8a.4\]]'byor rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal bar byed na/_de dag thams cad kyang rim gyis sdug bsngal gyi mthar phyin par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la yon phul ba ni de ltar mthu che ba dang /_de ltar phan yon che ba yin te/_
[\[8a.5\]]rab 'byor rnam grangs des na 'di ltar chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid tshad mar byas na de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la bye brag [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang med par rig par bya ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[8a.6\]]pa la spyad par bya'o/_/chos rnams kyi chos nyid la zhugs nas/_chos nyid de yang rnam par dkrugs par mi bya ste/_'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid do zhes rnam par dkrugs par mi bya'o/_/chos thams cad kyi bar dag la yang de 
[\[8a.7\]]bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos rnams kyi chos nyid rnam par dkrugs par mi bgyi lags na/_bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ni gzugs so/_/'di ni rnam par shes pa'i bar ro zhes bgyi ba dang /_de bzhin du 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]nang dang phyi'i chos rnams kyang bka' stsal/_de bzhin du dge ba dang /_mi dge ba dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa ma mchis pa dang /_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_thun mong dang /_thun mong ma lags pa dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma 
[\[8b.2\]]byas kyi chos rnams kyang bka' stsal te/_rnam par dkrugs par mdzad na/_de'i slad du/_bcom ldan 'das kyis chos rnams kyi chos nyid rnam par dkrugs par ma gyur lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/_ngas ni ji ltar gzhan dag gis khong du chud 
[\[8b.3\]]par 'gyur zhes ming dang mtshan mas chos rnams kyi chos nyid bstan te/_chos rnams brjod par zad kyi/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid rnam par dkrugs pa ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te gzhan dag gis khong du chud par bgyi ba'i slad du/_bcom ldan 
[\[8b.4\]]'das kyis ming dang mtshan mas chos rnams kyi chos nyid bstan te/_chos rnams brjod pa mdzad na/_bcom ldan 'das ming ma mchis pa dang /_mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i chos rnams ji ltar ming dang mtshan mas brjod pa mdzad lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor brjod pa ni ming 
[\[8b.5\]]dang mtshan ma la mngon par zhen pa ma yin gyi/_rab 'byor gzhan du na sdug bsngal nyid brjod par zad de/_ming dang mtshan ma la mngon par zhen pa med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos ni ming dang mtshan ma la mngon par zhen pa med do/_/
[\[8b.6\]]rab 'byor gal te ming la ming mngon par zhen par 'gyur ram/_mtshan ma la mtshan ma mngon par zhen par 'gyur na ni/_stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen par 'gyur la/_mtshan ma med pa yang mtshan ma med pa la mngon par zhen par 'gyur/_smon pa med pa yang smon pa med pa 
[\[8b.7\]]la mngon par zhen par 'gyur/_de bzhin nyid kyang de bzhin nyid la mngon par zhen par 'gyur/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang yang dag pa'i mtha' la mngon par zhen par 'gyur/_chos kyi dbyings kyang chos kyi dbyings la mngon par zhen par 'gyur/_'dus ma byas kyang 'dus ma byas la 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba zhig na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ming tsam du zad pas/_de dag ming tsam la gnas par mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar ming dang mtshan ma tsam lags te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[9a.2\]]spyad par bya zhing /_de la yang mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad ming dang mtshan ma tsam du bas pa lags na/_'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi ched du byang chub tu sems skyed par bgyid cing /_byang chub tu sems 
[\[9a.3\]]bskyed nas kyang 'du byed sna tshogs rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing sbyin pa rtsol ba dang /_tshul khrims srung ba dang /_bzod pa sgrub pa dang /_brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_shes rab sgom pa 
[\[9a.4\]]dang /_stong pa nyid la sgom pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad ma mchis pa dang /_gzugs ma mchis pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams la gnas pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid 
[\[9a.5\]]dang /_mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_smon pa ma mchis pa la gnas pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas pa dang /_snying rje chen po'i bar dag yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor khyod gang 'di skad du gal te 
[\[9a.6\]]chos thams cad ming dang mtshan ma tsam du bas na/_'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi ched du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par bgyid ces zer ba ni/_rab 'byor 'di ltar 'dus byas 'di dag thams cad ming dang mtshan ma tsam du zad la/_ming dang mtshan ma de dag 
[\[9a.7\]]kyang ming dang mtshan mas stong ste/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang /_chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed la/_chos kyi 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]'khor lo bskor nas kyang /_sems can rnams theg pa gsum po dag gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed kyang /_ming dang mtshan ma de dag skye ba yang med/_'jig pa yang med/_gnas pa yang med/_gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba yang med cing mi dmigs so/_/gsol pa/_
[\[9b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces gsung lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces nga smra'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[9b.3\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad shes pa nyid kyang bka' stsal cing /_de bzhin gshegs pas lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces mdor yang bka' stsal la/_de bzhin gshegs pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bka' stsal lags na/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[9b.4\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum po 'di dag la bye brag ni ci mchis tha dad du bgyi ba ni ci mchis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor thams cad shes pa nyid ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi'o/_/rab 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa 
[\[9b.5\]]nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi'o/_/rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[9b.6\]]pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lags/_ci'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lags/_ci'i slad du thams cad shes pa nyid ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[9b.7\]]stsal pa/_rab 'byor phyi nang gi chos gang dag ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang shes la/_lam thams cad dang /_rnam pa thams cad ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gang yang khyod 'di skad du/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]slad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lags zhes zer ba ni/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni lam thams cad bskyed par bya zhing /_lam thams cad shes par bya dgos te/_nyan thos 
[\[10a.2\]]dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi lam gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lam gang yin pa'i lam de dag kyang yongs su rdzogs par bya dgos la/_lam de dag gis lam gyi bya ba byed kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' rtogs par ni mi byed do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci byang 
[\[10a.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur zhing /_des yang dag pa'i mtha' yang mngon sum du mi bgyid lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 
[\[10a.4\]]ma byas shing /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma byas par yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mi bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lam la gnas te/_yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du bgyid lags sam/_
[\[10a.5\]]bka' stsal pa/_de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na lam ma lags pa la gnas te lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na lam dang lam ma lags pa la gnas te lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[10a.6\]]bka' stsal pa/_de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na lam yang ma lags/_lam ma lags pa yang ma lags pa la gnas te lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji 
[\[10a.7\]]ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du bgyi lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_khyod lam la gnas te/_len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol snyam 'am/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'o na lam ma yin pa la gnas te'am/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_de ni ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'o na lam dang /_lam ma yin pa la gnas te'am/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma 
[\[10b.2\]]lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'o na khyod lam yang ma yin/_lam ma yin pa yang ma yin pa la gnas te/_len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lam/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gang 
[\[10b.3\]]la gnas te yang zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol ba ma lags kyi/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi sems ni ji ltar gang la yang mi gnas pas sems rnam par grol lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[10b.4\]]chen pos kyang ci la yang mi gnas par yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du bya'o/_/rab 'byor gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba ni rnam pa gcig gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ste 'di ltar zhi ba'i rnam pas so/_/rab 
[\[10b.5\]]'byor yang rnam pa gang dag dang /_rtags gang dag dang /_mtshan ma gang dag gis chos rnams stong zhes bya bar brjod pa'i rnam pa de dag dang /_rtags de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud pas/_de'i phyir rnam pa thams cad 
[\[10b.6\]]mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das thams cad shes pa nyid dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang lags pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum po 'di dag las 'di'i spang ba ni lhag ma dang bcas pa'o/_/'di'i 
[\[10b.7\]]spong ba ni lhag ma ma mchis pa'o zhes bgyi bar nyon mongs pa spang ba la tha dad du bgyi ba mchis lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor nyon mongs pa spang ba la ni tha dad pa med mod kyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa yin no/_/nyan 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par nyon mongs pa spangs pa 'dus ma bgyis lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 
[\[11a.2\]]de de bzhin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma bgyis la bye brag dmigs su mchis lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/_'dus ma byas la ni bye brag dmigs su med do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te 'dus 
[\[11a.3\]]ma bgyis la bye brag dmigs su ma mchis na/_ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du 'di ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba spangs pa yin no/_/'di ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba spangs pa ma yin no zhes bka' stsal lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor bag chags kyi 
[\[11a.4\]]mtshams sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa ma yin te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas de dag la 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang bral ba yang yod mod kyi/_lus kyi 'gyur ba yang 'byung ste/_de dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnam la yang gnod par mi 'gyur la/_nyan thos 
[\[11a.5\]]rnams la yang ma yin te/_de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te lam yang dngos po ma mchis la/_mya ngan las 'das pa yang dngos po ma mchis na/_
[\[11a.6\]]ci'i slad du 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o/_/'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o/_/'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o/_/'di ni dgra bcom pa'o/_/'di ni rang sangs rgyas so zhes bshad lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa gang yin pa dang /_de bzhin 
[\[11a.7\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji 'dus ma bgyis de/_'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'o/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar dag lags so zhes rab tu 'byed par bgyid lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'dus ma byas ni rab tu 'byed par mi byed mod kyi 'on kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad tshad mar byas te brjod par zad kyi/_don dam par ni rab tu dbye bar mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[11b.2\]]'di ltar de la tshig gi lam gyis gdags su med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das phyi ma'i mtha' ji ltar gdags lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'jig rten gyi tha snyad tshad mar byas te/_gang dang gang dag gis mtha' chad pa de dang de dag la phyi ma'i mtha' gdags kyi/_
[\[11b.3\]]don dam par ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs lags na/_phyi ma'i mtha' lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_chos 
[\[11b.4\]]thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs na/_phyi ma'i mtha' lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_de ni gnas med do/_/rab 'byor 'on kyang sems can gang dag gis chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par mi shes pa de dag la 'di ni sngon gyi 
[\[11b.5\]]mtha'o/_/'di ni phyi ma'i mtha'o/_/zhes bstan par zad kyi/_rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dmigs su med de/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i 
[\[11b.6\]]chos rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/_/rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la spyod pa ni nang ngam/_phyi'am/_'dus byas sam/_'dus ma byas sam/_nyan thos kyi chos rnams sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sam/_gang la yang 
[\[11b.7\]]mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi na/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du shes rab 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad kyi pha rol dam pa ste/_de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis nyan 
[\[12a.2\]]thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pas na/_de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 
[\[12a.3\]]'byor yang don dam par chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i don gang yin pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[12a.4\]]'dir de bzhin nyid kyang chud/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang chud/_chos kyi dbyings kyang chud pas/_de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang dang yang ldan pa yang ma yin/_mi ldan pa yang ma yin/_bstan 
[\[12a.5\]]du yod pa'am/_bstan du med pa'am/_thogs pa dang bcas pa'am/_thogs pa med pa yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzugs med pa/_bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa ste/_'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan 
[\[12a.6\]]nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad la spyod par byed cing /_spobs pa thams cad dang /_snang ba thams cad sbyin par byed pa ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[12a.7\]]'di ni bdud dam/_bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams kyis mi chod de/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzhan mu stegs can phyir rgol ba'i bar dag gis kyang chod par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]'di ltar gcod par byed pa gang yin pa dang /_gang gi gcad pa dang /_gcad pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad par bya'o/_/rab 
[\[12b.2\]]'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don la 'di ltar spyad par bya ste/_'di lta ste mi rtag pa'i don la spyad par bya'o/_/sdug bsngal gyi don la spyad par bya'o/_/bdag med pa'i don la spyad par bya'o/_/sdug bsngal shes pa'i 
[\[12b.3\]]don dang /_kun 'byung ba shes pa'i don dang /_'gog pa shes pa'i don dang /_lam shes pa'i don dang /_zad pa shes pa'i don dang /_mi skye ba shes pa'i don la spyad par bya'o/_/chos shes pa'i don dang /_rjes su rtogs pa shes pa'i don dang /_kun rdzob shes pa'i don dang /_
[\[12b.4\]]yongs su 'dris pa shes pa'i don dang /_sgra ji bzhin shes pa'i don dang /_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes pa'i don la spyad par bya ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don la don dang tshul gyis spyad par bya'o/_/de 
[\[12b.5\]]nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la don dang /_don ma lags pa dmigs su ma mchis pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[12b.6\]]chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don la spyad par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo'i don la spyod pas 'di ltar spyad par bya ste/_'dod chags bdag 
[\[12b.7\]]gi don ce'am/_bdag la gnod pa zhes bya bar spyad par mi bya'o/_/zhe sdang bdag gi don ce'am/_bdag la gnod pa zhes bya bar spyad par mi bya'o/_/gti mug bdag gi don ce'am/_bdag la gnod pa zhes bya bar spyad par mi bya'o/_/'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]gti mug bdag gi don ce'am/_bdag la gnod pa zhes bya bar spyad par mi bya'o/_/log par lta ba bdag gi don ce'am/_bdag la gnod pa zhes bya bar spyad par mi bya'o/_/lta bar gyur pa thams cad kyi bar du bdag gi don ce'am/_bdag la gnod pa zhes bya bar spyad 
[\[13a.2\]]par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi de bzhin nyid ni gang la yang don kyang mi byed la/_gnod pa yang mi byed pa dang /_lta ba'i rnam pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang gang la yang don kyang mi byed la/_gnod pa yang mi byed pa'i phyir ro/_/gzugs 
[\[13a.3\]]bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o/_/gzugs bdag la gnod pa zhes spyad par mi bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa'i bar du bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa bdag la gnod pa zhes spyad par mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_byang chub kyi bar du bdag gi don ces spyad par 
[\[13a.4\]]mi bya'o/_/byang chub bdag la gnod pa zhes spyad par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas gang don tam gnod pa 'ga' yang ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor 
[\[13a.5\]]gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang /_chos gnas pa nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings gnas pa 'di ni gang la yang don tam/_gnod pa ci yang mi byed de/_
[\[13a.6\]]rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar don dang /_gnod pa rnam par spangs te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[13a.7\]]'das ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don kyang mi bgyid/_gnod pa yang mi bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang mi byed pas/_rab 'byor de'i 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang la yang don dang gnod pa mi byed do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma bgyis ni sangs rgyas rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos 'phags pa thams cad kyi don ma lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'dus ma byas ni sangs rgyas 
[\[13b.2\]]rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos 'phags pa rnams kyi don yin mod kyi/_gang la yang phan pa'am/_gnod par nye bar gnas pa yang ma yin no/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha'i de bzhin nyid ni gang la yang phan pa'am gnod pa nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/_/rab 
[\[13b.3\]]'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gang la yang phan pa'am gnod par nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'dus ma byas kyi shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[13b.4\]]tu phyin pa la bslabs nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'dus ma byas kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[13b.5\]]phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslabs nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur te/_gnyis kyi tshul gyis ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyi gnyis su mchis pa'i chos kyis gnyis su mchis pa'i chos 'thob lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 
[\[13b.6\]]'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chos kyis gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chos 'thob lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chos kyis 
[\[13b.7\]]gnyis su mchis pa'i chos thob lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji ltar 'thob par 'gyur lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir gnyis kyi chos sam/_gnyis su med pa'i chos kyang mi 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]dmigs na/_de ltar dmigs su med pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las chos gnyis kyi zhu ba mang po'i le'u zhes bya ba ste drug cu rtsa gsum pa'o//_//shes rab kyi pha 
[\[14a.2\]]rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po bzhi bcu drug pa/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[14a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni sems can yang mi dmigs la/_sems can du gdags pa yang mi dmigs par sems can rnams kyi ched du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag 
[\[14a.4\]]par zhugs pas dka' ba bgyid pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper bgyi na mi la la zhig gis nam mkha' rten ma mchis pa la yal ga 'gel ba bskyed par 'tshal ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams kyi ched du rnam pa 
[\[14a.5\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'tshal ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' gang sems can rnams kyi ched du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[14a.6\]]nyid de rtogs nas kyang /_sems can thams cad chags pa las yongs su grol bar byed pa de dag ni dka' ba byed pa yin no/_/rab 'byor dper na mi zhig yal ga 'gel ba bskyed par 'dod la/_mi des yal ga 'gel ba de'i rtsa ba yang mi shes/_yal ga'i mdo dang /_lo ma 
[\[14a.7\]]dang /_me tog kyang mi shes bzhin du/_des yal ga 'gel ba de'i sdong bu bskyed de/_bskyed nas kyang dus dus su srung zhing chus bran te/_rim gyis sdong bu de'i yal ga yang phun sum tshogs par gyur/_lo ma yang phun sum tshogs par gyur/_me tog kyang phun sum 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]tshogs par gyur/_'bras bu yang phun sum tshogs par gyur nas/_de sdong bu de'i lo ma rnams la spyod do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi ched du/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[14b.2\]]la zhugs pa de yang rim gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la spyod cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur te/_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu lta bur sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa'i lo 
[\[14b.3\]]ma lta bu la brten nas sems can rnams ngan song gsum po dag las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i me tog lta bu la brten nas sems can rnams rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang /_bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang /_khyim bdag gi 
[\[14b.4\]]rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba nas/_'du shes med/_'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[14b.5\]]thob nas/_sems can de dag rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'god par byed do/_/lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god par byed do/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god par byed do/_/dgra bcom pa nyid la 'god par byed do/_/rang byang chub la 'god par byed do/_/
[\[14b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la brten nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu lta bur sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dag de 
[\[14b.7\]]la yon 'bul ba de dag thams cad kyang theg pa gsum po 'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/_theg pa chen pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur zhing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de la sems can yang mi dmigs shing sems can du gdags pa yang med la/_sems can de dag kyang bdag tu 'dzin pa las yongs su grol bar byed de/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang dag gi ched 
[\[15a.2\]]du bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba'i sems can nam/_sems can du gdags pa ci yang 'di na mi dmigs so zhes de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 
[\[15a.3\]]gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid lags par rig par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas sems can dmyal ba thams 
[\[15a.4\]]cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/_mi khom pa thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/_dbul po thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/_dman pa'i 'gro ba thams cad rgyun chad 
[\[15a.5\]]par 'gyur/_'dod pa'i khams thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/_gzugs kyi khams thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/_gzugs med pa'i khams thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_
[\[15a.6\]]rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yin par rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la ma zhugs na/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_
[\[15a.7\]]de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur zhing /_rang sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar mi 'gyur/_dgra bcom pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar mi 'gyur/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]bar dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar mi 'gyur/_sems can dmyal ba'i bar dag rgyun chad par mi 'gyur/_'dod pa'i khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams kyi bar dag rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor yang byang chub sems 
[\[15b.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid lags par rig par bgyi'o zhes gang smras pa ni/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yin par rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 
[\[15b.3\]]de bzhin nyid gang gis de bzhin gshegs par gdags pa'i de bzhin nyid de nyid kyis rang sangs rgyas su gdags pa dang /_de bzhin nyid de nyid kyis 'phags pa thams cad gdags pa dang /_de bzhin nyid de nyid kyis gzugs su gdags pa dang /_de bzhin nyid de nyid kyis rnam par shes 
[\[15b.4\]]pa'i bar du gdags pa dang /_de bzhin nyid de nyid kyis 'dus byas kyi khams dang /_'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi bar du gdags pa dang /_de bzhin nyid de nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gdags pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor ci'i 
[\[15b.5\]]phyir/_de bzhin nyid de bzhin nyid ces bya zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin nyid 'di la gnas nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur te/_de bas na de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/_/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na de bzhin nyid tshad mar byas te/_byang 
[\[15b.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yin par rig par bya ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin nyid 
[\[15b.7\]]kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs na/_sems can thams cad kyi dbang po la mkhas par 'gyur zhing /_dbang po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la mkhas pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/sems can rnams kyi las bdag gir bya ba yang shes par 'gyur ro/_/sems can rnams kyi las 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]bdag gir bya ba shes na/_smon nas shes pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/smon nas shes pa yongs su rdzogs na dus gsum shes pa rnam par dag par byed par 'gyur ro/_/dus gsum shes pa rnam par sbyangs na byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing /_sems can 
[\[16a.2\]]rnams kyi don byed par 'gyur ro/_/sems can rnams kyi don byed na/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyangs na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob na chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar 
[\[16a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can rnams theg pa gsum po dag la 'god par 'gyur ro/_/sems can rnams theg pa gsum po dag la bkod nas/_phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar 
[\[16a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yon tan dang /_phan yon thams cad mthong bas bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya zhing /_gzhan yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du gzhug par bya'o/_/de nas bcom 
[\[16a.5\]]ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de dag ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi ba'i 
[\[16a.6\]]gnas lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin te/_de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de dag ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 
[\[16a.7\]]'jig rten gyis phyag bya ba'i gnas yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can thams cad kyi ched du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]bsod nams ji tsam zhig bskyed par 'gyur lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams na/_sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad nyan thos kyi sa la gnas par gyur tam/_
[\[16b.2\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par gyur na/_ci sems can de dag bsod nams mang du bskyed dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dpag tu ma mchis lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa tshad ma mchis lags so/_/
[\[16b.3\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dang /_sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos 
[\[16b.4\]]po gang yin pa 'di gnyis la stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas bye ba 
[\[16b.5\]]phrag 'bum gyi bar gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba yin gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas las byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du sbyar 
[\[16b.6\]]te/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi bsod nams kyi cha'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen 
[\[16b.7\]]po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams lta zhog gi_/_rab 'byor gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa la gnas par gyur kyang de dag gi bsod 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]nams gang yin pa de ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsod nams kyi bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa la gnas pa rnams lta zhog gi/_gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[17a.2\]]su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad rigs kyi sa la gnas par gyur kyang /_de dag gi bsod nams gang yin pa de ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsod nams kyi bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_brgyad pa'i 
[\[17a.3\]]sa dang mthong ba'i sa dang bsrabs pa'i sa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang /_byas pa rtogs pa can gyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar du zhugs par gyur kyang /_de dag gi bsod nams gang yin pa de ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[17a.4\]]bsod nams kyi bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/rab 'byor gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs par gyur kyang /_de dag gi bsod 
[\[17a.5\]]nams gang yin pa de ni byang chub la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/rab 'byor gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad byang chub la zhugs 
[\[17a.6\]]par gyur kyang de dag gi bsod nams gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams kyi bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi cha'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro zhing rgyu dang dpe'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[17a.7\]]sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ci zhig yid la bgyi lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dngos po ni ci lta bu zhig lags/_dmigs pa ni ci zhig lags/_dbang bgyid pa ni gang lags/_rnam pa ni ci zhig lags/_mtshan nyid ni gang lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba ni dngos po med pa/_
[\[17b.2\]]mtshan nyid med pa/_mtshan ma med pa/_lhun gyis grub pa/_skye ba med pa/_'byung ba med pa'o/_/rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dmigs pa ni ci zhig lags/_dbang bgyid pa ni gang lags/_rnam pa ni ci zhig lags/_mtshan nyid ni gang 
[\[17b.3\]]lags zhes zer ba la/_rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dmigs pa ni dngos po med pa'o/_/dbang byed pa ni dran pa'o/_/rnam pa ni zhi ba'o/_/mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa ste/_rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dmigs pa ni de yin no/_/dbang byed pa ni de yin no/_/
[\[17b.4\]]rnam pa ni de yin no/_/mtshan nyid ni de yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kho na dngos po ma mchis pa lags sam/_'on te gzugs kyang dngos po ma mchis shing /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang dngos po ma 
[\[17b.5\]]mchis pa lags sam/_de bzhin du nang dang phyi'i chos rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags sam/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi 
[\[17b.6\]]rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_stong ba nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar 
[\[17b.7\]]gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]btang snyoms chen po dang /_mngon par shes pa dang po dang /_mngon par shes pa gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_lnga pa dang /_drug pa dang /_'dus byas kyi khams dang /_'dus ma byas kyi khams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 
[\[18a.2\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med do/_/gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang dngos po med do/_/'dus byas kyi khams dang /_'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi bar du yang 
[\[18a.3\]]dngos po med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de la ni ngo bo nyid med do/_/rab 'byor gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa lags/_bka' 
[\[18a.4\]]stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med de/_gang la 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med pa de dngos po med pa'o/_/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/_chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do/_/rab 'byor yang chos thams cad ni stong pa'i ngo bo nyid do/_/chos thams 
[\[18a.5\]]cad ni mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid do/_/rab 'byor yang chos thams cad ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid do/_/chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid do/_/chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid do/_/rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang chos thams cad ni dngos po med 
[\[18a.6\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid du de ltar rig par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/_sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[18a.7\]]sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pas gang dang ldan pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par bgyid la/_sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par bgyid/_ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan dang po nas bsam gtan bzhi ba'i bar dang /_byams pa nas btang snyoms kyi bar dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched 
[\[18b.2\]]nas 'du shes med/_'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid nas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang /_stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_mtshan 
[\[18b.3\]]ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[18b.4\]]ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par bgyid la/_sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[18b.5\]]pa/_rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos rnams la yongs su 'dris par byed cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed la/_sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed de/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang /_sems can de dag kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du 
[\[18b.6\]]shes pa gang yin pa de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin par rig par bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha 
[\[18b.7\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/bsam 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi 
[\[19a.2\]]lam yongs su 'dris par byed la/_byang chub kyi lam de yang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du shes par bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug po dag la spyod pa de ji srid du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag 
[\[19a.3\]]par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes dang ldan par ma gyur pa de srid du byang chub kyi lam yongs su 'dris par mi byed do/_/rab 'byor 'di dag ni byang chub kyi lam 
[\[19a.4\]]yin te/_de byang chub kyi lam 'di dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/_skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe de'i bag chags dang 
[\[19a.5\]]mtshams sbyor ba dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad ni mi skye ba'i spong pas spong bar 'gyur ro/_/des sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la rnam par bltas nas dngos po med par yang mi dmigs na/_dngos por lta ci smos/_rab 'byor byang chub 
[\[19a.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos thams cad la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/_/rab 'byor dngos po yang mi dmigs na/_dngos po med pa lta ci smos te/_de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la 
[\[19a.7\]]mkhas pa yin no/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/_de sbyin pa sbyin pa na/_rnam par mi rtog cing mtshan mar mi byed de/_dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i tshul du yid la mi byed do/_/len pa 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]por yang rnam par mi rtog cing mtshan mar mi byed de/_dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i tshul du yid la mi byed do/_/sbyin pa por yang rnam par mi rtog cing mtshan mar mi byed de/_dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i tshul du yid la mi byed do/_/byang chub kyi sems de yang mi dmigs shing mtshan mar mi byed 
[\[19b.2\]]la/_dmigs par mi byed de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yang dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i tshul du rnam par mi rtog cing /_mtshan mar mi byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i tshul du yid la mi byed 
[\[19b.3\]]cing /_rnam par mi rtog la yid la mi byed do/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du yang dmigs par mi byed cing /_mtshan mar mi byed do/_/gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'am/_gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'am/_gang gis mngon par 
[\[19b.4\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de yang dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i tshul gyis yongs su rtog par mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de/_dngos po med pa de yang sangs rgyas rnam dang /_nyan thos rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas 
[\[19b.5\]]shing /_chos thams cad ni 'gyur ba med pa ste/_byed pa po dang bral ba'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos rnams chos rnams nyid dang bral ba lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_chos rnams ni chos 
[\[19b.6\]]rnams dang bral ba yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos rnams kho na chos rnams dang bral ba lags na/_bral ba'i chos kyis bral ba'i chos dngos po mchis pa'am/_dngos po ma mchis par ji ltar 'tshal bar rung ste/_dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos kyis kyang /_dngos po 
[\[19b.7\]]mchis pa'i chos 'tshal bar mi rung la/_dngos po mchis pa'i chos kyis kyang /_dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos 'tshal bar mi rung /_dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos kyis kyang /_dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos 'tshal bar mi rung la/_dngos po mchis pa'i chos kyis kyang /_dngos po 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]mchis pa'i chos 'tshal bar mi rung lags na/_de ltar ma 'tshal ba'i chos thams cad la dngos po mchis zhes bgyi ba'am/_dngos po ma mchis zhes bgyi bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ston par lta ga la 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byang chub 
[\[20a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob bzung ste/_dngos po yod pa zhes bya ba'am/_dngos po med pa zhes bya ba ston gyi/_don dam par ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyang gzhan zhig lags la/_don dam pa yang gzhan zhig lags sam/_
[\[20a.3\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyang gzhan ma yin la/_don dam pa yang gzhan ma yin te/_'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid don dam pa'i de bzhin nyid yin la/_de bzhin nyid de sems can de dag gis mi shes shing ma mthong bas/_de dag gi phyir byang chub sems 
[\[20a.4\]]dpa'i 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyis dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po med pa zhes bya ba ston to/_/rab 'byor yang sems can 'di dag ni phung po lnga po 'di dag la dngos por 'du shes shing dngos po med par mi shes te/_ji ltar byas na dngos po med pa rtogs par 'gyur zhig gu snyam nas/_de dag gi don du 
[\[20a.5\]]chos rnams rab tu dbye ba'i phyir de ltar ston par byed de/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las yang dag par bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/_drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//
[\[20a.6\]]de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bgyi na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bgyi ba de gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_bka' 
[\[20a.7\]]stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni/_byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa ste/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi spyod pa de gang la spyod lags/_bcom ldan 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gzugs stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /_de bzhin du khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_nang dang phyi'i chos rnams stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[20b.2\]]pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /_phyi stong pa 
[\[20b.3\]]nyid stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /_bsam gtan dang po dang /_gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_
[\[20b.4\]]dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi stong ngo zhes spyod 
[\[20b.5\]]pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /_dbang po lnga stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /_stobs lnga stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag 
[\[20b.6\]]brgyad pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_
[\[20b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /_spobs pa rnams stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /_yi ge sgrub pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang yi ge rnams la 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]'jug pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /_yi ge rnams med pa la 'jug pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /_gzugs stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /_'dus byas kyi khams stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /_'dus ma byas kyi khams stong ngo zhes spyod pa ste/_ci nas byang chub la gnyis su mi 'byed pa de ltar 
[\[21a.2\]]rjes su spyod do/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/_byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa yin no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[21a.3\]]sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes bgyi na/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba de gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor yang dag pa'i don ni sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor yang des yang dag pa'i chos/_mngon par 
[\[21a.4\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na de'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor yang des yang dag pa'i don rtogs pas na/_de'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor yang chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na de'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/_/
[\[21a.5\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub byang chub ces bgyi na/_byang chub ces bgyi ba de gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub ces bya ba de ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/de ni de bzhin nyid kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/de ni yang dag pa'i tshig 
[\[21a.6\]{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/de ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/de ni chos kyi dbyings kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/rab 'byor yang byang chub ces bya ba de ni ming tsam gyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/rab 'byor yang byang chub kyi don ni yang dag pa'i don to/_/rab 'byor yang byang chub ni de 
[\[21a.7\]]bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa'i rang bzhin te/_de'i phyir byang chub ces bya'o/_/rab 'byor yang byang chub de ni chos thams cad ming dang mtshan ma tsam du rtogs par byed pa ste/_de'i phyir byang chub ces bya'o/_/rab 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]'byor byang chub de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ste/_de'i phyir byang chub ces bya'o/_/rab 'byor yang byang chub de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na de'i phyir byang chub ces bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom 
[\[21b.2\]]ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang byang chub 'di la spyod pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa lags na/_de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang 
[\[21b.3\]]bsags pa'am/_'grib pa'am/_nyams pa'am/_'phel ba'am/_skye ba'am/_'gag pa'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[21b.4\]]rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang byang chub 'di la spyod pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa de ni chos gang yang bsags pa'i phyir ro ma/_'grib par bya ba'i phyir ram/_nyams par bya ba'i phyir ram/_'phel bar bya 
[\[21b.5\]]ba'i phyir ram/_bskyed par bya ba'i phyir ram/_dgag par bya ba'i phyir ram/_kun nas nyon mongs par bya ba'i phyir ram/_rnam par byang bar bya ba'i phyir mi spyod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang 
[\[21b.6\]]chub ni bsags pa'i phyir ram/_'grib par bya ba'i phyir ram/_nyams par bya ba'i phyir ram/_'phel bar bya ba'i phyir ram/_bskyed par bya ba'i phyir ram/_dgag pa'i phyir ram/_kun nas nyon mongs par bya ba'i phyir ram/_rnam par byang bar bya ba'i phyir dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye
