[\[21b.7\]]bar gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub ni chos gang la yang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar gnas pa ma lags na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de/_ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_de bzhin du ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_ji ltar na nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong 
[\[22a.2\]]pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa lags/_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa lags/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa nas/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la spyod pa lags/_rnam par thar 
[\[22a.3\]]pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i bar la spyod pa dang /_snying rje chen po'i bar la spyod pa lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po dag la spyod pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[22a.4\]]kyi sa las shin tu 'da' ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la 'jug pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[22a.5\]]spyad pa spyod pa na/_gnyis kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_gnyis kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la mi spyod do/_/gnyis kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mi spyod do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems 
[\[22a.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang thob par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[22a.7\]]ldan 'das gal te gnyis kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod la/_de bzhin du gnyis kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mi spyod lags na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]ba rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur zhing /_sems bskyed pa tha ma'i bar du ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor gang dag gnyis 
[\[22b.2\]]la spyod pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor gnyis la rten pa ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad de/_de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni gnyis la mi spyod pas 
[\[22b.3\]]sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_dge ba'i chos rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur zhing /_sems bskyed pa tha ma'i bar du dge ba'i chos rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur te/_de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi zil gyis gnon par 
[\[22b.4\]]mi nus so/_/mi dge ba gang dag gis zil gyis non par gyur pa ni/_nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur zhing /_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan dag gis kyang 'phrogs par 'gyur ro/_/de dag gis 'phrogs pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[22b.5\]]rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar mi 'gyur ba nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa na dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/_/gsol 
[\[22b.6\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams 
[\[22b.7\]]kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin la/_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi phyir yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin mod kyi/_'on kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur ma byas sam/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par ma 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]byas sam/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag gis yongs su ma zin par yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi nus so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas 
[\[23a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par bgyis pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pas ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la 
[\[23a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis mdo'i sde dang /_dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang /_lung 
[\[23a.4\]]du bstan pa'i sde dang /_tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang /_ched du brjod pa'i sde dang /_gleng gzhi'i sde dang /_rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang /_de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang /_skyes pa'i rabs kyi sde dang /_shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang /_rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang /_gtan la dbab par bstan pa'i sde 
[\[23a.5\]]bstan pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/_bzung nas kyang tshig gis yongs su 'dris par byas nas/_yid kyi rjes su rtog par byed la/_lta bas shin tu rtogs par byed cing gzungs thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzungs thob nas kyang so so yang dag par rig pa skyed do/_/so so yang 
[\[23a.6\]]dag par rig pa bskyed nas de tshe rjes nas kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob kyi bar du nams kyang chos de dag chud za bar mi 'gyur ro/_/der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba dag skyed par byed de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis yongs su 
[\[23a.7\]]zin pas gzhar yang ngan song rnams dang /_mi khom pa rnams su mi skye zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis kyang bsam pa gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]rtsa ba de dag yongs su bzung bas kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_nyan thos gang dag sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa rnams dang nam du yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 
[\[23b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bya zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba yang yongs su gzung bar bya ste/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la yang bsten par bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[23b.3\]]phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen pa dang /_bsten pa dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i thabs kyi le'u zhes bya ste/_drug cu rtsa lnga pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[23b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur mi bgyid cing dge ba'i rtsa ba dag kyang mi bskyed la/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis kyang yongs su ma zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 
[\[23b.5\]]'gyur lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur ma byas la/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed cing /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag gis yongs su ma zin pa ni rnam pa 
[\[23b.6\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la yang bsnyen bkur byas shing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang bskyed la/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang bsten du zin kyang /_da dung rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi nus na/_sangs 
[\[23b.7\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur ma byas shing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par ma byas la dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la ma bsten par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa lta ci smos te de ni gnas med do/_/rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bya/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed par bya/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsten par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas 
[\[24a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyis shing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang bskyed la/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsten kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur lags/_bka' stsal pa/_thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba'i phyir te/_des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[24a.3\]]'das de dag las thabs de ma thos la/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang ma bskyed de/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang dag de la thabs ston pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag la yang ma bsten pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das thabs la mkhas pa gang dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[24a.4\]]sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i thabs la mkhas pa gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems dang 
[\[24a.5\]]po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_nyan thos rnams dang /_mir gyur pa rnams dang /_mi ma yin par gyur pa rnams 
[\[24a.6\]]la sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag dang ldan pas de sbyin pa la yang sbyin pa'i 'du shes su mi 'gyur/_len pa po la yang len pa po'i 'du shes su mi 'gyur/_sbyin pa po la yang sbyin pa po'i 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di 
[\[24a.7\]]ltar de ni chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa dang /_yongs su ma grub pa dang /_mngon par ma grub par mthong la/_chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid la yang 'jug ste/_chos thams cad byed pa'i mthu med cing /_mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mtshan nyid la 'jug pa'i phyir 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]te/_thabs la mkhas pa de dang ldan pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/de dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam par 'phel na/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su 
[\[24b.2\]]dag par byed la/_'khor ba na sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yongs su longs spyad pa gang yin pa'i sbyin pa'i 'bras bu la yang mi re ste/_gzhan du na sems can yongs su bskyab pa dang /_sems can yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa 
[\[24b.3\]]las/_thabs la mkhas pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/_drug cu rtsa drug pa'o//_//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[24b.4\]]nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis tshul khrims de srung ste de 'dod chags kyi sems dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_bag la nyal dang /_kun nas ldang ba dang /_byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos gang yang rung ba 'di lta ste/_ser sna dang 'chal ba'i tshul khrims 
[\[24b.5\]]dang /_'khrug pa'i sems dang /_le lo'i sems dang /_dman pa'i sems dang /_'khrul pa'i sems dang /_'chal ba'i shes rab kyi sems dang /_nga rgyal dang /_brnyas pa dang /_lhag pa'i nga rgyal lam/_nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal lam/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs 
[\[24b.6\]]rgyas kyi sems kyis bsgrib par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes shing /_chos thams cad ma byung ba dang /_yongs su ma grub pa dang /_mngon par ma grub par mthong la/_chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid la 
[\[24b.7\]]'jug ste/_chos thams cad byed pa'i mthu med cing mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mtshan nyid la 'jug pa'i phyir te/_thabs la mkhas pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/de dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]par 'phel na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed la/_'khor ba na tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu yongs su longs spyad pa 
[\[25a.2\]]gang yin pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu la yang mi re ste/_gzhan du na sems can rjes su gzung ba dang /_sems can la mi gnod pa dang /_sems can la phan par 'dod pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las tshul 
[\[25a.3\]]khrims kyi le'u zhes bya ste/_drug cu rtsa bdun pa'o//_//de bzhin du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[25a.4\]]dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis shes rab sgom par byed de/_de la 'dod chags kyi sems nas/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi bar gyi sems kyis bsgrib 
[\[25a.5\]]par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar des chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes shing chos thams cad ma byung ba dang /_yongs su ma grub pa dang /_mngon par ma grub par mthong la/_chos thams cad kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid la 'jug ste/_chos thams cad 
[\[25a.6\]]byed pa'i mthu med cing /_mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mtshan nyid la 'jug pa'i phyir te/_thabs la mkhas pa de dang ldan pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/de dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam par 'phel na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/de 
[\[25a.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/_sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed la 'khor ba na shes rab kyi 'bras bu yongs su longs spyad pa gang yin pa'i shes rab kyi 'bras bu la yang mi re ste/_gzhan du na sems can yongs su 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]bskyab pa dang /_sems can yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las rnam par 'phel ba'i le'u zhes bya ste/_drug cu rtsa brgyad pa'o//_//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[25b.2\]]chen po ni bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa nas/_bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du snyoms par 'jug_/tshad med pa rnams la snyoms par 'jug_/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la snyoms par 'jug la/_rnam par smin pa yang yongs su mi 'dzin to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[25b.3\]]'di ltar de ni thabs la mkhas pa gang dang ldan na/_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes pa nas/_mngon par ma grub pa'i bar du shes pa'i thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor 
[\[25b.4\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pas mthong ba dang bsgom pas spong ba'i lam la spyod kyang /_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang thob par mi byed do/_/lan cig phyir 
[\[25b.5\]]'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid kyang thob par mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes la/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos de dag la yang spyod cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis 
[\[25b.6\]]las kyang 'da' ba'i phyir te/_rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_rnam par thar ba brgyad la snyoms par 
[\[25b.7\]]'jug cing /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yang snyoms par 'jug la/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang thob par mi 'gyur zhing /_dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du yang thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des chos thams cad rang gi mtshan 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]nyid kyis stong par shes pa nas chos thams cad mngon par ma grub pa'i bar du shes pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_
[\[26a.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_snying rje chen po la yang 'dris par byed la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par ma byas shing /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma byas kyi bar du yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar byang 
[\[26a.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 
[\[26a.4\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de ltar chos zab mo rnams la spyod cing rnam par smin pa yang len par mi bgyid par ni/_blo'i mchog dang ldan pa lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 
[\[26a.5\]]'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de ltar chos zab mo rnams la spyod cing /_rnam par smin pa yang len par mi byed pa de ni/_blo'i mchog dang ldan pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 
[\[26a.6\]]'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo ba'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid gang las mi g.yo ba lags/_bka' stsal pa/_dngos po med pa las mi g.yo ba'o/_/rab 'byor khyod 'di skad du/_ngo bo nyid gang las mi 
[\[26a.7\]]g.yo ba lags zhes zer ba ni gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o/_/bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 
[\[26b.2\]]dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o/_/stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_snying rje chen po'i bar gyi ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar 
[\[26b.3\]]chos 'di dag gi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor dngos po med pas ni dngos po med pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci dngos po ma mchis pas dngos po mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi bar rdo thogs 
[\[26b.4\]]lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci dngos po ma mchis pas dngos po ma mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi bar rngo thogs lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci dngos po ma 
[\[26b.5\]]mchis pas dngos po ma mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi bar rdo thogs lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_ci bcom ldan 'das dngos pos dngos po mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi bar rdo thogs lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_
[\[26b.6\]]rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te dngos po ma mchis pas kyang dngos po mngon par mi rtogs shing /_dngos pos kyang dngos po ma mchis pa mngon par mi rtogs la/_dngos po ma mchis pas kyang dngos po ma mchis pa mngon par mi rtogs shing dngos pos kyang dngos 
[\[26b.7\]]po mngon par rtogs pa ma lags na/_'o na ni thob pa yang ma mchis/_mngon par rtogs pa yang ma mchis par mi 'gyur lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor mngon par rtogs pa ni yod mod kyi/_mngon par bsgrub pa 'di bzhis ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]da mngon par rtogs pa ji lta bu zhig lags/_bka' stsal pa/_ji ltar dngos po yang ma yin zhing dngos po med pa yang ma yin pa de ltar mnyam pa nyid du mthong ba ni mngon par rtogs pa ste/_spros pa med cing spros pa dang bral ba'i phyir/_gang la spros pa de dag med pa de lta bu ni mngon par rtogs 
[\[27a.2\]]pa yin no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa gang lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gzugs rtag ces bya ba dang /_mi rtag ces bya ba ni 
[\[27a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa'i spros pa'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang /_mi rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i spros pa'o/_/gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i spros pa'o/_/tshor ba 
[\[27a.4\]]dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i spros pa'o/_/gzugs bdag yod ces bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i spros pa'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed 
[\[27a.5\]]rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa bdag yod ces bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i spros pa'o/_/gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang /_ma zhi zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i spros pa'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa zhi zhes 
[\[27a.6\]]bya ba dang /_ma zhi zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i spros pa'o/_/gzugs yongs su shes par bya ba yin zhes bya ba dang /_yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i spros pa'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yongs su shes 
[\[27a.7\]]par bya ba yin zhes bya ba dang /_yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i spros pa'o/_/sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa yongs su shes par bya ba yin zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o/_/kun 'byung ba spang bar bya ba yin zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o/_/'gog pa mngon sum du bya ba yin zhes 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]bya ba ni spros pa'o/_/lam bsgom par bya ba yin zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o/_/bsam gtan bzhi bsgom par bya ba yin zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o/_/tshad med pa bzhi bsgom par bya ba yin zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o/_/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgom par bya ba yin zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o/_/
[\[27b.2\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya ba yin zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong 
[\[27b.3\]]pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa bsgom par bya ba yin zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom par bya ba yin zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 
[\[27b.4\]]'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub las 'da' bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba ni 
[\[27b.5\]]spros pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o/_/sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o/_/mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_
[\[27b.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o zhes bya ba ni spras pa'o/_/bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spang bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar ni spros pa'o/_/de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[27b.7\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni spros par bya ba ma yin par spros par mi byed de/_gzugs rtag pa'am/_mi rtag pa zhes spros par bya ba ma yin pa spros par mi byed do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rnam rtag pa'am/_mi rtag pa zhes 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]spros par bya ba ma yin pa spros par mi byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o snyam pa'i bar du spros par bya ba ma yin pa spros par mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ngo bo nyid kyis ni ngo bo nyid spros par mi byed cing /_dngos po med pas kyang dngos po spros par mi byed la/_
[\[28a.2\]]ngo bo nyid dang /_dngos po med pa ma gtogs par yang gang gis spros par byed pa dang /_gang spros par bya ba dang /_cis spros par bya ba dang /_gang la spros par bya ba gzhan ci yang mi dmigs te/_rab 'byor de bas na gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du spros pa med cing /_byang chub kyi bar du spros 
[\[28a.3\]]pa med pa ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos spros pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyad par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos thams cad spros pa ma 
[\[28a.4\]]mchis par ji ltar lta bar bgyid lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi ngo bo nyid med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid med do/_/gang la 
[\[28a.5\]]ngo bo nyid med pa de la spros pa med do/_/rab 'byor de'i phyir na gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du spros pa med do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du spros pa med do/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar 
[\[28a.6\]]spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug go/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos gang la yang ngo bo nyid dmigs su ma mchis na/_ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[28a.7\]]chen pos nyan thos kyi lam 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/_lam gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos kyi lam dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi lam dang /_sangs rgyas kyi lam gyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la mi 'jug mod kyi/_'on kyang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 
[\[28b.2\]]lam thams cad la bslabs nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug go/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na dgra bcom pas lam thams cad la bslabs nas yang dag pa nyid skyon med pa la 'jug mod kyi/_ji srid du lam gyi 'bras bu ma bskyed pa de srid du lam gyi skad cig la dgra bcom 
[\[28b.3\]]pa'i 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang lam thams cad bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug mod kyi/_rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin ma thob kyi bar du/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur te/_
[\[28b.4\]]de skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam 
[\[28b.5\]]thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyis nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la 'jug na/_bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na ni brgyad pa'i lam yang gzhan kho nar 'gyur la/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i lam yang gzhan/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba la zhugs pa'i lam yang gzhan/_lan 
[\[28b.6\]]cig phyir 'ong ba'i lam yang gzhan/_phyir mi 'ong ba la zhugs pa'i lam yang gzhan/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i lam yang gzhan/_dgra bcom pa la zhugs pa'i lam yang gzhan/_dgra bcom pa'i lam yang gzhan/_rang sangs rgyas kyi lam yang gzhan/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[28b.7\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lam yang gzhan du mi 'gyur lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das gal te lam de dag phan tshun tha dad par gyur na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyis nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]ma mchis pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi 'tshal bar gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lam thams cad bskyed pas 
[\[29a.2\]]brgyad par mi 'gyur lags grang /_mthong ba'i lam bskyed pas rgyun du zhugs par mi 'gyur lags grang /_bsgom pa'i lam bskyed pas lan cig phyir 'ong ba la zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong bar mi 'gyur lags grang /_dgra bcom pa'i bar du yang mi 'gyur lags grang /_rang sangs 
[\[29a.3\]]rgyas kyi lam bskyed pas rang sangs rgyas su mi 'gyur lags grang /_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos brgyad pa'i lam bskyed pas brgyad par 'gyur ba'am/_brgyad par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la 'jug pa de ni gnas ma mchis shing skabs ma 
[\[29a.4\]]lags te/_de ni gnas ma mchis lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la zhugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur zhes bgyi ba de ni gnas ma mchis lags so/_/de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa'am 
[\[29a.5\]]rang byang chub kyi bar du thob nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la 'jug ces bgyi ba de ni gnas ma mchis lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la zhugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur zhes bgyi ba de ni gnas ma mchis lags na/_bcom 
[\[29a.6\]]ldan 'das ji ltar bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lam thams cad bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la zhugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob cing /_bag chags kyi 
[\[29a.7\]]mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spang bar 'tshal bar bgyi lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad par gyur 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]la/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob nas lam thams cad bskyed de/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug ces bya ba ni gnas med do/_/skabs ma yin zhing de ni gnas med do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba de 
[\[29b.2\]]ni gnas med do/_/rab 'byor yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa na/_shes pa dang mthong bas sa brgyad po dag la rnam par bltas nas 'da' bar byed de/_brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa 
[\[29b.3\]]dang /_rigs kyi sa dang /_brgyad pa'i sa dang /_mthong ba'i sa dang /_bsrabs pa'i sa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang /_byas pa rtogs pa can gyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ste/_'di ni sar bstan pa yin no/_/des shes pa dang mthong bas sa brgyad po de dag las 'das 
[\[29b.4\]]par byas nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug go/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis nyon mongs pa dang /_bag chags dang /_mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spod do/_/rab 'byor de la brgyad pa'i shes pa gang yin pa 
[\[29b.5\]]de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'o/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i shes pa dang /_spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i shes pa dang /_spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'o/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i shes pa dang /_spong ba gang yin pa 
[\[29b.6\]]de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'o/_/dgra bcom pa'i shes pa dang /_spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'o/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa dang /_spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpas ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[29b.7\]]thams cad kyi lam de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas nas lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi shes pas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug go/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis/_bag chags dang /_mtshams 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]sbyor ba dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[30a.2\]]pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'bras bu ltar sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi lam dang /_sangs rgyas kyi lam dang /_
[\[30a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi lam bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i lam gang lags pa 'di dag las bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi lam gang lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa bskyed par 
[\[30a.4\]]bya'o/_/rab 'byor de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa ni 'di yin te/_rnam pa gang dang gang dag dang /_mtshan ma gang dang gang dag dang /_rtags gang dang gang dag gis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dag par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa de dang de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dang de dag dang /_rtags de dang de 
[\[30a.5\]]dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par bya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par rtogs nas kyang gzhan gdul ba'i phyir ci nas pha rol gyi khong du chud par gzhan dag la brjod par bya/_bstan par bya/_bshad par bya/_gdags par bya/_dgod par bya'o/_/de la skad 
[\[30a.6\]]dang /_brda dang /_sgra gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar 'gyur ba'i skad dang /_brda dang /_sgra thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsgrub par bya ste/_brag ca lta bur rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor de lta 
[\[30a.7\]]bas na rnam grangs des kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/_sems can rnams kyi bsam pa shes par bya'o/_/sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi lam 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]yang shes par bya/_rgyu yang shes par bya/_'bras bu yang shes par bya ste/_sems can dmyal ba'i lam de las bzlog par bya/_rgyu las kyang bzlog par bya/_'bras bu las kyang bzlog par bya'o/_/de bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi lam las kyang bzlog par bya/_rgyu las kyang bzlog par bya/_
[\[30b.2\]]'bras bu las kyang bzlog par bya'o/_/mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_mi rnams kyi lam yang shes par bya/_rgyu yang shes par bya/_'bras bu yang shes par bya'o/_/lha rnams kyi lam yang shes par bya/_rgyu yang shes par bya/_
[\[30b.3\]]'bras bu yang shes par bya'o/_/tshangs pa'i lam yang shes par bya/_rgyu yang shes par bya/_'bras bu yang shes par bya'o/_/'od gsal ba rnams dang /_dge rgyas pa rnams dang /_'bras bu che ba rnams dang /_'du shes med pa rnams dang /_mi che ba rnams dang /_mi gdung ba rnams dang /_
[\[30b.4\]]'og min gyi lha rnams kyi lam yang shes par bya/_rgyu yang shes par bya/_'bras bu yang shes par bya'o/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams kyi lam yang shes par bya/_rgyu yang shes par bya/_'bras bu yang shes par bya'o/_/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched 
[\[30b.5\]]du nye bar 'gro ba'i bar gyi lha rnams kyi lam yang shes par bya/_rgyu yang shes par bya/_'bras bu yang shes par bya'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi shes par bya/_yang dag par spong ba bzhi shes par bya/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba bzhi shes par bya/_dbang po lnga shes par bya/_stobs lnga shes par bya/_byang 
[\[30b.6\]]chub kyi yan lag bdun shes par bya/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes par bya/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid shes par bya/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa shes par bya/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa shes par bya/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu shes par bya/_mi 
[\[30b.7\]]'jigs pa bzhi shes par bya/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi shes par bya/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad shes par bya/_snying rje chen po shes par bya'o/_/lam de dag gis kyang sems can rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]'bras bu la 'god do/_/dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar la dgod par bya ba gang yin pa de dag ni dgra bcom pa nyid la 'god do/_/rang byang chub la dgod par bya ba gang yin pa de dag ni rang byang chub la 'god do/_/byang chub la dgod par bya ba gang yin pa de dag ni byang chub la 'god de/_rab 
[\[31a.2\]]'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de la bslabs nas sems can gyi bsam pa la 'jug go/_/sems can gyi bsam pa la zhugs nas ci nas de'i chos bstan pa chud mi za zhing don yod par 'gyur ba de lta bur 
[\[31a.3\]]chos ston to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni pha rol gyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa shin tu bye brag phyed cing /_shin tu rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir te/_des ni sems can rnams kyi 'gro ba dang /_'ong ba dang /_'chi 'pho dang /_skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so/_/rab 'byor 
[\[31a.4\]]byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos gang dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bslab par bya ba dang /_nyan thos rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bslab par bya ba'i lam thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i nang du 'dus pas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[31a.5\]]chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams gang lags pa dang /_byang chub gang lags pa'i chos de dag 
[\[31a.6\]]ldan pa yang ma lags/_mi ldan pa yang ma lags la/_gzugs can yang ma lags/_bstan du yang ma mchis/_thogs par yang ma mchis te/_'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis par mtshan nyid gcig pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams ji ltar byang chub 
[\[31a.7\]]sgrub par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das ldan pa yang ma lags/_mi ldan pa yang ma lags/_gzugs can yang ma lags/_bstan du yang ma mchis/_thogs pa yang ma mchis te/_'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i chos ni gang la yang sgrub pa'am/_'jig par 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]bgyid pa ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na/_nam mkha' ni chos gang la yang sgrub pa ma lags shing 'jig par bgyid pa ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa ni chos gang yang sgrub pa ma lags shing 'jig par bgyid pa ma lags so/_/bcom 
[\[31b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni chos gang yang sgrub pa 'am/_'jig par byed pa ma yin no/_/rab 'byor sems can gang dag rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos mi shes pa de dag gi phyir/_byang chub kyi 
[\[31b.3\]]phyogs kyi chos 'di dag ni byang chub bsgrub pa yin no zhes bstan to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang gzugs gang yin pa dang /_tshor ba gang yin pa dang /_'du shes gang yin pa dang /_'du byed rnams gang yin pa dang /_rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /_shes 
[\[31b.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gang yin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_phyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa dang /_bsam gtan dang po gang yin pa dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar gang yin pa dang /_
[\[31b.5\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang dag yin pa dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gang yin pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gang yin pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad gang yin pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang yin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 
[\[31b.6\]]bcu'i bar du gang yin pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang yin pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang yin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad gang yin pa dang /_snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad 
[\[31b.7\]]ni 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la ldan pa yang ma yin/_mi ldan pa yang ma yin zhing /_gzugs can ma yin pa/_bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa/_'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa yin te/_de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad gzung ba'i phyir 'jig 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]rten gyi tha snyad kyis tha snyad du 'dogs par mdzad kyi/_don dam par ni ma yin no/_/rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni thams cad la yang shes pa dang /_mthong bas bslab par bya'o/_/de la shes pa dang mthong bas ji lta ba bzhin du bslabs nas/_chos kha cig 
[\[32a.2\]]ni rtogs par bya/_chos kha cig ni rtogs par mi bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes pa dang mthong bas bslabs nas rtogs par bgyi ba'i chos rnams ni gang lags/_rtogs par mi bgyi ba'i chos rnams ni gang lags/_bka' stsal pa/_
[\[32a.3\]]rab 'byor nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis ni shes pa dang mthong bas rtogs par bya ba ma yin pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis ni chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du rtogs par bya ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar 'phags 
[\[32a.4\]]pa'i chos 'dul ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba zhes bgyi na/_
[\[32a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba zhes bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di la nyan thos dang /_
[\[32a.6\]]rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni 'dod chags dang ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin no/_/zhe sdang dang ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin no/_/
[\[32a.7\]]gti mug dang ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin no/_/'jig tshogs la lta ba dang ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin no/_/the tsom dang ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin no/_/tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]yin no/_/'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang /_gnod sems dang ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin no/_/gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang /_gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin no/_/ma rig pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin no/_/
[\[32b.2\]]rgod pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin no/_/bsam gtan dang po dang ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin no/_/bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar dang ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin no/_/byams pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin no/_/snying rje dang ldan pa yang 
[\[32b.3\]]ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin no/_/dga' ba dang ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin no/_/btang snyoms dang ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin no/_/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar dang ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin no/_/dran pa nye bar 
[\[32b.4\]]gzhag pa bzhi dang /_snying rje chen po'i bar dang ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin no/_/'dus byas kyi khams dang /_'dus ma byas kyi khams dang ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos de dag thams cad ni gzugs can ma yin zhing /_
[\[32b.5\]]bstan du med la/_thogs pa med cing /_'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro/_/gzugs can ma yin pa de dag ni gzugs can ma yin pa dang lhan cig ldan pa yang ma yin/_mi ldan pa yang ma yin no/_/bstan du med pa rnams ni bstan du med pa dang lhan cig tu ldan 
[\[32b.6\]]pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin no/_/thogs pa med pa rnams ni thogs pa med pa dang lhan cig tu ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin no/_/mtshan nyid gcig pa rnams ni mtshan nyid gcig pa dang lhan cig tu ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin no/_/mtshan nyid med pa 
[\[32b.7\]]rnams ni mtshan nyid med pa dang lhan cig tu ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin no/_/rab 'byor gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bslab par bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i pha rol 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]tu phyin pa 'di ni gzugs med cing bstan du med la thogs pa med pa ste/_de la des bslabs na chos gang gis mtshan nyid kyang mi dmigs so/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[33a.2\]]gzugs kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi zhing /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/_mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/_gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_
[\[33a.3\]]dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/_sa'i khams dang /_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid 
[\[33a.4\]]la bslab par mi bgyi/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/_nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab 
[\[33a.5\]]par mi bgyi/_de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/_bsam gtan dang po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/_bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar gyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/_byams pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/_
[\[33a.6\]]snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i mtshan 
[\[33a.7\]]nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/_stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams kyi snyoms 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi 
[\[33b.2\]]mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/_snying rje chen po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/_sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam 'phags pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i 
[\[33b.3\]]lugs su 'byung ba dang /_lugs su mi 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/_'dus byas kyi khams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/_'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos de dag gi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi 
[\[33b.4\]]bgyi zhing /_'du byed kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid dang /_'du byed kyi mtshan nyid la ma bslab par nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'da' bar ji ltar 'gyur lags/_nyan thos dang /_
[\[33b.5\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las ma 'das par yang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la 'jug par ji ltar 'gyur lags/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la ma zhugs par yang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par yang ji ltar 'gyur lags/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma 
[\[33b.6\]]thob par yang chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar ji ltar 'gyur lags/_chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor bar yang nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/_theg pa chen po'i sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar ji ltar 'gyur lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_
[\[33b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor gal te chos 'ga' zhig gi mtshan nyid yod par gyur na ni mtshan nyid de la byang chub sems dpas bslab par bya ba zhig na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid med pa/_gzugs can 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]ma yin pa bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa ste/_'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid de dag la yang bslab par mi bya/_mtshan nyid med pa rnams la yang bslab par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[34a.2\]]zhe na/_rab 'byor snga na mtshan nyid yod la phyis mtshan nyid med par gyur pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor 'di ltar de dag ni snga nas kyang mtshan nyid med la/_da ltar yang mtshan nyid med pa ste/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid rnams la yang bslab par mi bya/_
[\[34a.3\]]mtshan nyid med pa rnams la yang bslab par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/_mtshan nyid kyi khams de ni gnas pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[34a.4\]]la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad mtshan nyid ma mchis shing mtshan nyid tha dad pa yang ma lags la/_mtshan nyid gcig pa yang ma lags na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar shes rab kyi pha 
[\[34a.5\]]rol tu phyin pa la bsgom par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bsgoms par ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar rngo mi thogs lags so/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las ma 'das par 
[\[34a.6\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la 'jug par rngo mi thogs la/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la ma zhugs par yang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa bskyed par rngo mi thogs lags so/_/mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma bskyed 
[\[34a.7\]]par yang mngon par shes pa bskyed par rngo mi thogs la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mngon par shes pa ma bskyed par yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par rngo mi thogs lags so/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma bgyis la sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma bgyis par yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par rngo mi thogs la/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par yang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar rngo mi thogs lags so/_/chos kyi 'khor lo ma 
[\[34b.2\]]bskor bar yang sems can rnams rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par rngo mi thogs la/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yang dgod par rngo mi thogs/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yang dgod par rngo mi thogs/_dgra bcom pa nyid la yang dgod par yang rngo mi thogs/_
[\[34b.3\]]rang byang chub la yang dgod par rngo mi thogs/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dgod par rngo mi thogs lags so/_/sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po la yang sems can rnams dgod par rngo mi thogs/_tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi 
[\[34b.4\]]ba'i dngos po la yang dgod par rngo mi thogs/_bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po la yang dgod par rngo mi thogs lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/
[\[34b.5\]]de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid med de/_mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin la/_mtshan nyid gcig pa yang ma yin te/_rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa la bsgom pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_
[\[34b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na mtshan nyid ma mchis pa la bsgom pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos thams cad la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[34b.7\]]chos thams cad la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_gzugs la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/mig la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[35a.2\]]tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/gzugs la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/blang ba la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes 
[\[35a.3\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/dor ba la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/bsam gtan dang po la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa la 
[\[35a.4\]]bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/byams pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom 
[\[35a.5\]]pa'o/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/ci yang med pa'i skye mched la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig 
[\[35a.6\]]pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/chos rjes su 
[\[35a.7\]]dran pa dang /_dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /_tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /_gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /_lha rjes su dran pa dang /_skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang /_dbugs rngub pa dang /_dbyung ba rjes su dran pa dang /_'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang /_lus su gtogs pa rjes su dran 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang /_bdag med pa'i 'du shes la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 
[\[35b.2\]]bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/bdag tu 'du shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/sems can du 'du shes pa dang /_srog tu 'du shes pa dang /_skye ba por 'du shes pa dang /_shed las skyes 
[\[35b.3\]]par 'du shes pa dang /_shed bur 'du shes pa dang /_gso bar 'du shes pa dang /_gang zag tu 'du shes pa dang /_byed pa por 'du shes pa dang /_byed du 'jug pa por 'du shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /_
[\[35b.4\]]sdug pa'i 'du shes dang /_bde ba'i 'du shes dang /_bdag gi 'du shes la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_
[\[35b.5\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab 
[\[35b.6\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad la 
[\[35b.7\]]bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/rtog pa dang bcas pa dang /_dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]rtog pa med pa dang /_dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/kun 'byung ba dang /_
[\[36a.2\]]'gog pa dang /_lam 'phags pa'i bden pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/sdug bsngal shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/kun 'byung ba shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig 
[\[36a.3\]]pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/'gog pa shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/lam shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/zad pa shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 
[\[36a.4\]]'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/mi skye ba shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/chos shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/rjes su rtogs pa shes pa la bsgom pa rnam 
[\[36a.5\]]par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/kun rdzob shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/'dris pa shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/sgra ji bzhin shes pa la bsgom 
[\[36a.6\]]pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[36a.7\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]nyid dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/mi 'jigs pa bzhi la 
[\[36b.2\]]bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[36b.3\]]sgom pa'o/_/snying rje chen po la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra 
[\[36b.4\]]bcom pa nyid la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/rang byang chub la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/
[\[36b.5\]]bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong ba la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gzugs la bsgom pa rnam 
[\[36b.6\]]par 'jig pa ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa lags/_de bzhin du bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong ba'i bar la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[36b.7\]]rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_gzugs dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor dngos por 'du shes pa la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa med cing de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dngos por 'du shes pa la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa med 
[\[37a.2\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo/_/bag la nyal dang /_kun nas dkris pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor dngos por 'du shes pa la ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa med cing /_tshul 
[\[37a.3\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa yang med pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar de dngos po la chags kyi/_de sbyin pa dang 
[\[37a.4\]]tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab la ni chags par mi byed pa'i phyir ro/_/gang dngos po la 'di ni nga'o zhes bya bar mtha' gnyis la chags pa de la ni thar pa med do/_/rab 'byor dngos por 'du shes pa la ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa 
[\[37a.5\]]dang /_yang dag par spong ba sgom pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sgom pa dang /_dbang po sgom pa dang /_stobs sgom pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag sgom pa dang /_lam sgom pa dang /_stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa sgom pa med do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te rnam pa 
[\[37a.6\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sgom pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar de dngos po la chags pa'i phyir ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dngos po ni gang lags/_dngos 
[\[37a.7\]]po ma mchis pa ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gnyis ni dngos po'o/_/gnyis med pa ni dngos po med pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gnyis gang lags bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gzugs su 'du shes pa ni gnyis so/_/tshor bar 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]'du shes pa dang /_'du shes su 'du shes pa dang /_'du byed rnams su 'du shes pa dang /_rnam par shes par 'du shes pa dang /_mig tu 'du shes pa nas yid du 'du shes pa'i bar dang /_gzugs su 'du shes pa nas chos su 'du shes pa'i bar dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas su 
[\[37b.2\]]'du shes pa dang /_byang chub tu 'du shes pa dang /_'dus byas kyi khams su 'du shes pa dang /_'dus ma byas kyi khams su 'du shes pa dang /_rab 'byor 'du shes ji snyed pa thams cad dang /_'du shes med pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni gnyis so/_/ji tsam du gnyis yod pa de tsam du 
[\[37b.3\]]dngos po yin no/_/ji tsam du dngos po yod pa de tsam du 'du byed do/_/ji tsam du 'du byed yod pa de tsam du sems can rnams skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams las yongs su 
[\[37b.4\]]mi 'grol lo/_/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na khyod kyis gnyis kyi 'du shes can la ni sbyin pa med do/_/tshul khrims med do/_/bzod pa med do/_/brtson 'grus med do/_/bsam gtan med do/_/shes rab med do/_/lam med do/_/mngon par rtogs pa med do/_/tha na 'thun pa'i bzod 
[\[37b.5\]]pa yang med na/_gzugs yongs su shes pa nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du yongs su shes pa lta ga la yod ces de ltar rig par bya ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shes pa'i bar du yang de bzhin du sbyar ro/_/gang la lam bsgom pa med pa de la ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nas/_dgra 
[\[37b.6\]]bcom pa nyid kyi bar dang /_rang byang chub dang /_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong ba'i bar du yang ga la yod/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/_lam bsgom pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste drug cu rtsa dgu pa'o//_//de skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[37b.7\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te dngos po'i 'du shes can la 'thun pa'i bzod pa yang ma mchis na/_thob pa lta ga la mchis/_mngon par rtogs pa lta ga la mchis te/_ma mchis na ci dngos po ma mchis 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]pa'i 'du shes can la 'thun pa'i bzod pa mchis lags sam/_dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa dang /_rigs kyi sa dang /_brgyad pa'i sa dang /_mthong ba'i sa dang /_bsrabs pa'i sa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang /_byas pa rtogs pa can gyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[38a.2\]]kyi sa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang /_lam bsgom pa mchis lags sam/_lam bsgom pa la brten nas nyan thos dang ldan pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyang spong bar 'gyur lags sam/_nyon mongs pa de dag gis bsgribs na ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma 
[\[38a.3\]]mchis pa la 'jug par yang mi 'gyur la/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la ma zhugs par yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par yang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad spong bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/
[\[38a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das gal te chos 'ga' tsam gyis gnas pa dang skye ba yang ma mchis na ni/_chos ma bskyed pa de dag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par yang rngo mi thogs lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' 
[\[38a.5\]]stsal to/_/rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/rab 'byor de de bzhin te/_dngos po med pa'i 'du shes can la ni 'thun pa'i bzod pa yang med do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong ba'i bar du med do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[38a.6\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la/_dngos po'i 'du shes sam/_dngos po ma mchis pa'i 'du shes sam/_gzugs kyi 'du shes nas rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes kyi bar ram/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'du shes sam/_'dod chags kyi 'du 
[\[38a.7\]]shes sam/_'dod chags spong ba'i 'du shes sam/_zhe sdang gi 'du shes sam/_zhe sdang spong ba'i 'du shes sam/_gti mug gi 'du shes sam/_gti mug spong ba'i 'du shes sam/_ma rig pa'i 'du shes sam/_ma rig pa spong ba'i 'du shes sam/_'du byed kyi 'du shes sam/_
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]'du byed spong ba'i 'du shes sam/_rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes sam/_rnam par shes pa spong ba'i 'du shes sam/_ming dang gzugs kyi 'du shes sam/_ming dang gzugs spong ba'i 'du shes sam/_skye mched drug gi 'du shes sam/_skye mched drug spong ba'i 'du 
[\[38b.2\]]shes sam/_reg pa'i 'du shes sam/_reg pa spong ba'i 'du shes sam/_tshor ba'i 'du shes sam/_tshor ba spong ba'i 'du shes sam/_sred pa'i 'du shes sam/_sred pa spong ba'i 'du shes sam/_len pa'i 'du shes sam/_len pa spong ba'i 'du shes sam/_srid 
[\[38b.3\]]pa'i 'du shes sam/_srid pa spong ba'i 'du shes sam/_skye ba'i 'du shes sam/_skye ba spong ba'i 'du shes sam/_rga shi'i 'du shes sam/_rga shi spong ba'i 'du shes sam/_mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa'i 'du shes sam/_
[\[38b.4\]]mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa spong ba'i 'du shes sam/_sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes sam/_sdug bsngal spong ba'i 'du shes sam/_kun 'byung ba'i 'du shes sam/_kun 'byung ba spong ba'i 'du shes sam/_'gog pa'i 'du 
[\[38b.5\]]shes sam/_'gog pa mngon sum du bgyid pa'i 'du shes sam/_lam gyi 'du shes sam/_lam bsgom pa'i 'du shes sam/_de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'du shes sam/_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong ba'i 'du shes mchis lags sam/_bcom 
[\[38b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la ni chos gang la yang dngos po'i 'du shes sam/_dngos po med pa'i 'du shes med do/_/rab 'byor gang la dngos po'i 'du shes 
[\[38b.7\]]med pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i 'du shes kyang med pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'thun pa'i bzod pa yin no/_/gang la dngos po'i 'du shes med pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i 'du shes kyang med pa de ni de'i lam bsgom pa yin no/_/gang la dngos po'i 'du shes med pa dang /_dngos 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]po med pa'i 'du shes kyang med pa de ni de'i 'bras bu yin no/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam ni dngos po med pa'o/_/mngon par rtogs pa ni dngos po med pa ste/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du de ltar rig par 
[\[39a.2\]]bya'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid 
[\[39a.3\]]lags na/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid du de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la/_gang dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas chos thams cad kyi yul la mnga' brnyes par gyur/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[39a.4\]]'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di la nga sngon pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe 'dod pa dag las dben pa/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa nas/_bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du bsgrubs te 
[\[39a.5\]]gnas la ngas bsam gtan dang /_bsam gtan gyi yan lag de dag gi mtshan ma bzung yang /_bsam gtan dang /_bsam gtan gyi yan lag de dag gis rlom sems su ma byas/_bsam gtan rnams kyi ro myang ba ma byas/_bsam gtan rnams la dmigs pa ma byas shing /_nga bsam 
[\[39a.6\]]gtan de dag gi rnam pa yongs su dag pa la snyoms par zhugs nas/_rdzu 'phrul bya ba mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir te sems mngon par gzhol bar byas so/_/lha'i rna ba'i shes pa mngon sum du bya ba dang /_sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa mngon sum du bya ba dang /_sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran 
[\[39a.7\]]pa'i shes pa mngon sum du bya ba dang /_lha'i mig gi shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir sems mngon par gzhol bar bya ste/_ngas mngon sum du bya ba de dag gi mtshan ma bzung yang mngon par shes pa de dag gis rlom sems su ma byas/_ro myang ba ma byas/_dmigs pa ma byas te/_nga mngon 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]par shes pa de dag la nam mkha' lta bur mthong bas snyoms par zhugs so/_/rab 'byor ngas skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis 'di ni sdug bsngal yin no/_/'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba yin no/_/'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa yin no/_/'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam yin 
[\[39b.2\]]no zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan zhing mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang ldan pas sems can rnams phung po gsum du lung 
[\[39b.3\]]ston to/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bsam gtan bzhi ji ltar bskyed lags/_
[\[39b.4\]]dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mngon par shes pa drug ji ltar bskyed lags/_sems can ma mchis par yang sems can rnams phung po gsum du ji ltar lung bstan lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 
[\[39b.5\]]'byor gal te 'dod pa rnams sam/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid cig yod par gyur tam/_rang gi dngos po'am/_gzhan gyi dngos po zhig yod par gyur na ni/_rab 'byor nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe 'dod pa rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_sdig pa mi dge ba'i 
[\[39b.6\]]chos rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs nas bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar 'dod pa rnams dang /_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams dngos po'am/_dngos po med pa'am/_rang gi dngos po'am/_gzhan gyi dngos po med de/_gzhan 
[\[39b.7\]]du na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kho na yin pas/_de'i phyir nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe 'dod pa dag las dben pa/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]dang po bsgrubs te gnas par gyur to/_/bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/_/rab 'byor gal te mngon par shes pa rnams dngos po'am/_rang gi dngos po'am/_gzhan gyi dngos po zhig yin par gyur na ni/_rab 'byor ngas mngon par shes pa thams 
[\[40a.2\]]cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar mngon par shes pa thams cad la dngos po med de/_rang gi dngos po dang /_gzhan gyi dngos po med la/_gzhan du na dngos po med pa'i 
[\[40a.3\]]ngo bo nyid kho na yin pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mngon par shes pa thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du thugs su chud nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/de skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[40a.4\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid la/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lngas bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[40a.5\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthar gyis bgyi ba dang /_mthar gyis bslab pa dang /_mthar gyis bsgrub pa gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[40a.6\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i mthar gyis bgyi ba dang /_mthar gyis bslab pa dang /_mthar gyis bsgrub pa ji ltar mchis par 'gyur lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 
[\[40a.7\]]'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thog ma nyid du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_rgyun 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]tu zhugs pa rnams las/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_lan cig 
[\[40b.2\]]phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_'phags pa thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_tha na 'du byed thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid skra'i rtse mo'i cha'i gnas tsam yang med do zhes thos par gyur la/_thos nas kyang 
[\[40b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'di snyam du gal te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i bar du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin la/_gal te bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur yang rung /_gal te 
[\[40b.4\]]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur yang rung ste/_chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kho na'o/_/bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya na ni/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_
[\[40b.5\]]sems can dngos po'i 'du shes la gnas pa/_thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid la dgod par bya'o/_/snyam du sems te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 
[\[40b.6\]]yang dag par 'jug go/_/de sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gang la bslabs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i mthar gyis bya ba dang /_mthar gyis bslab pa dang /_mthar gyis sgrub pa rtsom par byed do/_/
[\[40b.7\]]de thog ma nyid du pha rol tu phyin pa drug la slob ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob po/_/de sbyin pa'i 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa na/_bdag nyid kyang sbyin pa sbyin par byed la/_gzhan dag kyang sbyin pa la 'god cing sbyin pa'i bsngags pa yang brjod la/_gzhan gang dag sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa yang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar byed de/_de sbyin pa la goms pa des longs 
[\[41a.2\]]spyod kyi phung po chen po thob par 'gyur ro/_/de ser sna dang bral ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/_zas 'dod pa la ni zas/_skom 'dod pa la ni skom/_bzhon pa 'dod pa la ni bzhon pa/_gos 'dod pa la ni gos/_spos 'dod pa la ni spos/_me tog phreng 'dod pa la ni me tog phreng /_
[\[41a.3\]]byug pa 'dod pa la ni byug pa/_mal 'dod pa la ni mal/_rgyab rten 'dod pa la ni rgyab rten/_gnas 'dod pa la ni gnas/_mar me 'dod pa la ni mar me'am/_mi'i yo byad ci yang rung bdag sbyin par byed de/_de sbyin pa de nyid kyis tshul khrims kyi phung po srung bar byed cing /_sbyin pa de nyid dang /_
