[\[60a.5\]]kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa'i shes pa gang yin pa dang /_spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i shes pa gang yin pa dang /_spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub 
[\[60a.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i shes pa gang yin pa dang /_spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o/_/dgra bcom pa'i shes pa gang yin pa dang /_spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[60a.7\]]chen po'i bzod pa'o/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa gang yin pa dang /_spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa ste/_rab 'byor nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi bzod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa tha dad du bya ba ni de yin no/_/rab 'byor 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bzod pa 'di lta bu dang ldan pas nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon to/_/de rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa'i lam la spyod cing lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs 
[\[60b.2\]]su rdzogs par byed do/_/de yongs su rdzogs na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de mngon par shes pa lnga dang yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de mngon par shes pa lnga po de dag dang ma 
[\[60b.3\]]bral bas sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do/_/des sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byas shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byas nas/_skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[60b.4\]]nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan nyid med pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_rmi lam lta 
[\[60b.5\]]bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag la gnas shing sprul pa lta bu'i bar gyi nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag la gnas nas/_mtshan nyid med pa'i lus dang sems kyis brtson 'grus rtsom par byed de/_de lus kyi brtson 'grus kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par sgrub cing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu 
[\[60b.6\]]song nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing sems can rnams kyi don byed do/_/de lus kyi brtson 'grus des sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas/_theg pa gsum po dag la 'god par byed do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[60b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_mtshan nyid med pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de sems kyi brtson 'grus zag pa med pa'i lam dang /_lam du rtogs pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]byed de/_der ni 'di lta ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo 
[\[61a.2\]]gsum dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par 
[\[61a.3\]]rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la spyod pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/de yongs su rdzogs na bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong bar 'gyur 
[\[61a.4\]]ro/_/des spangs shing mtshan nyid med pa yongs su grub pa/_yongs su rdzogs la snyoms par 'jug pa'i mthu bsgrubs nas chos kyi 'khor lo lan gsum du bzlas te/_rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor bskor bar 'gyur te/_de bskor bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug 
[\[61a.5\]]tu g.yo bar 'gyur/_rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur/_kun tu rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur/_'gul bar 'gyur/_rab tu 'gul bar 'gyur/_kun tu rab tu 'gul bar 'gyur/_ldeg par 'gyur/_rab tu ldeg par 'gyur/_kun tu rab tu ldeg par 'gyur zhing stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig 
[\[61a.6\]]rten gyi khams thams cad snang bas khyab par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de las sgra skad 'byung bar 'gyur te/_des sgra thos par byed do/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag 
[\[61a.7\]]gis kyang sgra de thos par 'gyur te/_de dag thams cad theg pa gsum po dag la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de ltar gces spras byed pa yin te/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas nas 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob bo//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po lnga bcu pa/_rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes 
[\[61b.2\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag la gnas nas/_ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/sprul pa lta bu'i bar gyi nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag la gnas nas/_ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 
[\[61b.3\]]rdzogs par byed do/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar rmi lam lta bu nas/_sprul pa lta bu'i bar gyi nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag la gnas nas/_ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[61b.4\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas nas bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du bsgrubs te gnas so/_/byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched nas/_'du shes med 
[\[61b.5\]]'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar du bsgrubs te gnas so/_/stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom par byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_glog lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin ma 
[\[61b.6\]]gtogs par ting nge 'dzin gang yang rung ba nyan thos kyi ting nge 'dzin tam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin tam/_ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs gzhan gang yang rung ba de dag thams cad lus kyis khyab par byas nas bsgrubs te gnas la/_ting nge 'dzin de dag dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi 'bras bu yang myong bar mi byed 
[\[61b.7\]]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan nyid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du 'du shes pa'i phyir te/_ji ltar mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyis mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyi ro myong bar mi byed cing /_dngos po med pas dngos po med pa'i ro myong bar 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]mi byed de/_de ro myong bar mi byed pas na/_ting nge 'dzin gang gi dbang gis kyang 'dod pa'i khams sam/_gzugs kyi khams sam/_gzugs med pa'i khams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des khams de dag mi dmigs la gang snyoms par 
[\[62a.2\]]'jug pa dang /_cis snyoms par 'jug pa de yang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/des mi dmigs pas mtshan nyid med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa des nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom 
[\[62a.3\]]ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis shing nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar 
[\[62a.4\]]'gyur lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nang stong pa nyid la legs par bslabs shing /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag la legs par bslabs pas na/_stong pa nyid 'di la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/_lan cig 
[\[62a.5\]]phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang byang chub bam/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gang la gnas par bya ba'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so/_/stong pa nyid de yang stong ste/_de stong pa nyid de dag gis nyan thos dang /_rang sangs 
[\[62a.6\]]rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug go/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ni gang lags/_skyon ma mchis pa ni gang lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor dmigs pa thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[62a.7\]]dpa' chen po'i skyon yin no/_/dmigs pa med pa thams cad ni skyon med pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dmigs pa ni gang lags/_dmigs pa ma mchis pa ni gang lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gzugs ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]dmigs pa yin no/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs pa yin no/_/ming dang /_gzugs dang /_rna ba dang /_sgra dang /_sna dang /_dri dang /_lce dang /_ro dang /_lus dang /_reg bya dang /_yid 
[\[62b.2\]]dang chos rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs pa yin no/_/de bzhin du sbyar te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs pa ni skyon yin no/_/rab 'byor skyon med pa ni gang la gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi chos 'di dag gi brjod pa yang mi 
[\[62b.3\]]dmigs pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid ni dmigs su med do/_/gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni dngos po med cing brjod du med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni dngos po med do/_/brjod du med 
[\[62b.4\]]do/_/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni skyon med pa la zhugs nas/_ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su rdzogs par yang byed la/_snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang skye bar mi 'gyur 
[\[62b.5\]]na/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gis mi skye ba lta ci smos te/_de la gnas nas las gang mngon par 'dus byas pas bsam gtan bzhi las gang yang rung bar skye bar 'gyur ba'i las de mngon par 'du byed pa de ni gnas med do/_/gzhan du na sgyu ma lta bu'i chos rnams la 
[\[62b.6\]]gnas nas sems can rnams kyi don kyang byed la/_sems can yang mi dmigs/_sgyu ma yang mi dmigs so/_/des mi dmigs par sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su 'dzin par byed do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[62b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/_'di lta ste/_dmigs su med pa'i 'khor lo'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i bar du skor bar byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]spyod pa ni chos thams cad rmi lam lta bur yongs su shes shing /_chos thams cad brag ca lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bur yongs su shes so/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 
[\[63a.2\]]gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ji ltar chos thams cad rmi lam lta bur yongs su 'tshal cing /_chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu'i bar du yongs su 'tshal ba lags/_bka' stsal pa/_
[\[63a.3\]]rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_rmi lam rmi ba ma yin/_rmi lam rmi ba po yang ma yin no/_/brag ca thos pa ma yin/_brag ca nyan pa po yang ma yin no/_/mig yor mthong ba ma yin/_mig yor mthong ba po yang 
[\[63a.4\]]ma yin no/_/smig rgyu mthong ba ma yin/_smig rgyu mthong ba po yang ma yin no/_/sgyu ma mthong ba ma yin/_sgyu ma mthong ba po yang ma yin no/_/sprul pa mthong ba ma yin/_sprul pa mthong ba po yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar rmi lam dang /_brag ca dang /_mig 
[\[63a.5\]]yor dang /_smig rgyu dang /_sgyu ma dang /_sprul pa ni phyin ci log yin la/_byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi phyin ci log yin te/_dgra bcom pa ni rmi lam rmi ba ma yin/_rmi lam rmi ba po yang ma yin zhing /_sprul pa'i bar du mthong ba ma yin zhing /_sprul pa mthong ba po yang ma yin 
[\[63a.6\]]la/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang rmi lam rmi ba ma yin/_rmi lam rmi ba po yang ma yin zhing /_sprul pa'i bar du mthong ba ma yin/_sprul pa mthong ba 
[\[63a.7\]]po yang ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de/_ma skyes pa dang /_yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_yongs su ma grub pa gang yin pa de dag la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_dngos po'i 'du shes can nam/_yongs su grub pa'i 'du shes can du ji ltar 'gyur te/_de ni gnas med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gal te chos 'ga' zhig la dngos po'am/_yongs su grub pa'am/_yod pa zhig tu gyur na/_de ni shes rab 
[\[63b.2\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni gzugs la chags pa med cing rnam par shes pa'i bar la chags pa med do/_/'dod pa'i khams la chags pa med do/_/gzugs kyi khams 
[\[63b.3\]]la chags pa med do/_/gzugs med pa'i khams la chags pa med do/_/bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la chags pa med do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la chags pa med pa nas/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar dag la chags pa 
[\[63b.4\]]med do/_/stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la chags pa med do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes 
[\[63b.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_sa dang po yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de la yang 'dun pa'i 'dod chags mi skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des sa de ma dmigs na/_'dun pa'i 'dod chags skyed par ji ltar 'gyur/_
[\[63b.6\]]de bzhin du sa bcu pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de la yang 'dun pa'i 'dod chags mi skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des sa de ma dmigs na/_de la 'dun pa'i 'dod chags skyed par ji ltar 'gyur/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod bzhin du/_shes 
[\[63b.7\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs so/_/de mi dmigs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_chos thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'i nang du 'dus par mthong la/_chos de dag kyang mi dmigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos de dag dang /_
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos de dag la tha dad pa ci yang med de/_chos kyi dbyings bstan pa dang /_de bzhin nyid bstan pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' bstan pa'i tshul gyis chos 
[\[64a.2\]]thams cad tha dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad dbyer ma mchis pa lags na/_dge ba dang /_mi dge ba'i chos rnams ji ltar bstan lags/_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams ji ltar bstan lags/_zag pa dang 
[\[64a.3\]]bcas pa dang /_zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos rnams ji ltar bstan lags/_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams ji ltar bstan lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems ci chos rnams kyi chos nyid de la/_'dus byas sam/_'dus ma byas sam/_rgyun du 
[\[64a.4\]]zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang byang chub bam/_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi chos 'ga' tsam gyi brjod pa yod snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis 
[\[64a.5\]]lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bas na rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis chos thams cad tha dad pa ma yin pa dang /_chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med par de ltar rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[64a.6\]]spyad pa spyod pa na gzugs zhes bya ba'am/_tshor ba zhes bya ba'am/_'du shes zhes bya ba'am/_'du byed rnams zhes bya ba'am/_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'am/_'dus byas zhes bya ba'am/_'dus ma byas zhes bya ba'i bar ram/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes 
[\[64a.7\]]bya ba'i bar ram/_byang chub ces bya ba'i bar du chos 'ga' tsam gyi ngo bo nyid kyang ma dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la mkhas par bya'o/_/chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byang chub kyi lam yang yongs su rdzogs par byed/_sems can 
[\[64b.2\]]rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su 'dzin par byed do/_/de la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_ci nas sems can rnams btul nas srid pa gsum du kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur 
[\[64b.3\]]ba de ltar 'dul bar byed do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid med pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las mtshan nyid med pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/_bdun cu 
[\[64b.4\]]rtsa gnyis pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang /_dngos po ma mchis pa dang /_dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la 'di 
[\[64b.5\]]dag ni dge ba'o/_/'di dag ni mi dge ba'o/_/'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'o/_/'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'o/_/'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'o/_/'di dag ni zag pa ma mchis pa'o/_/'di dag ni 'dus byas so/_/'di dag ni 'dus ma byas so/_/'di dag ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 
[\[64b.6\]]'bras bu mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ba'o/_/'di 
[\[64b.7\]]dag ni rang byang chub mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba'o zhes ji ltar gzhag par 'gyur lags/_de bzhin du brag ca lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_sprul 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]pa lta bu dang /_dngos po ma mchis pa dang /_dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du 'gyur bar ji ltar rnam par gzhag par 'gyur lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[65a.2\]]ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di la byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa ni rmi lam yang dmigs so/_/rmi lam rmi ba po yang dmigs so/_/sprul pa'i bar du yang dmigs so/_/sprul pa mthong ba po yang dmigs so/_/de rmi 
[\[65a.3\]]lam yang dmigs la rmi lam rmi ba po yang dmigs pa nas/_sprul pa'i bar du yang dmigs la/_sprul pa mthong ba po yang dmigs pas lus dang ngag dang /_yid kyis mi dge ba'i 'du byed rnams kyang mngon par 'du byed do/_/lus dang ngag dang yid kyis dge ba'i 'du byed rnams kyang 
[\[65a.4\]]mngon par 'du byed do/_/lus dang ngag dang yid kyis bsod nams dang /_bsod nams ma yin pa dang /_mi g.yo ba'i 'du byed rnams kyang mngon par 'du byed do/_/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa 
[\[65a.5\]]nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid de/_stong pa nyid 'di gnyis la gnas nas/_sems can rnams la khams gsum pa 'di ni stong ngo zhes chos ston par byed do/_/'di la gzugs sam/_tshor ba'am/_'du shes sam/_'du byed rnams sam/_rnam par shes pa'am/_
[\[65a.6\]]phung po rnams sam/_khams rnams sam/_skye mched rnams med do/_/'di dag ni rmi lam mo/_/'di dag ni brag ca'o/_/'di dag ni mig yor ro/_/'di dag ni smig rgyu'o/_/'di dag ni sgyu ma'o/_/'di dag ni sprul pa'o/_/'di la phung po dang /_khams rnams dang /_skye mched 
[\[65a.7\]]rnams med do/_/'di la ni rmi lam dang /_rmi lam rmi ba po dang /_brag ca dang /_brag ca thos pa po dang /_mig yor dang /_mig yor mthong ba po dang /_smig rgyu dang /_smig rgyu mthong ba po dang /_sgyu ma dang /_sgyu ma mthong ba po dang /_sprul pa dang /_sprul pa mthong ba po med de/_chos 'di 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]dag thams cad ni dngos po med pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kho na yin na khyed ni phung po rnams med pa la phung por 'du shes par gyur/_khams rnams med pa la khams su 'du shes par gyur/_skye mched rnams med pa la skye mched du 'du shes par gyur la/_chos 'di dag 
[\[65b.2\]]thams cad ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_phyin ci log las skyes pa dang /_las kyi rnam par smin pas yongs su zin pa yin na/_khyed ci'i phyir dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la dngos po'i 'du shes skyed ces ston par byed de/_de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[65b.3\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_thabs la mkhas pas sems can ser sna can gang yin pa de dag ni ser sna las bzlog nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor bar byed do/_/de dag gi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de yang longs spyod chen por 'gyur ro/_/des de dag 
[\[65b.4\]]de las spyod nas tshul khrims las 'god par byed de/_de dag gi tshul khrims yang dag par blangs pa de yang mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bskyod nas kyang ting nge 'dzin la sbyor bar byed de/_de dag gi ting nge 'dzin kyang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du bsam 
[\[65b.5\]]gtan dang po las bsam gtan gnyis pa/_bsam gtan gnyis pa las bsam gtan gsum pa/_bsam gtan gsum pa las/_bsam gtan bzhi pa/_bsam gtan bzhi pa las/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas 
[\[65b.6\]]skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la sbyor bar byed do/_/des sbyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i 'bras bu de las kyang rnam grangs du mas bskyod nas phung 
[\[65b.7\]]po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'dul bar byed/_'dzud par byed/_'god par byed do/_/des tshul khrims dang /_tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu de las kyang rnam grangs du mas bskyod nas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'dul 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]bar byed/_'dzud par byed/_'god par byed do/_/des snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'bras bu de dag las kyang rnam grangs du mas bskyod nas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'dul bar byed/_'dzud par byed/_
[\[66a.2\]]'god par byed do/_/de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag pa'i spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i 
[\[66a.3\]]sgo gsum dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dag la 'dul bar 
[\[66a.4\]]byed/_'dzud par byed/_'god par byed do/_/des zag pa med pa'i chos/_gzugs med pa/_bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa de dag gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu don du gnyer ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'god do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 
[\[66a.5\]]'bras bu don du gnyer ba gang yin pa de dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god do/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu don du gnyer ba gang yin pa de dag ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god do/_/dgra bcom pa nyid don du gnyer ba gang yin pa de dag ni dgra bcom pa nyid la 
[\[66a.6\]]'god do/_/rang byang chub don du gnyer ba gang yin pa de dag ni rang byang chub la 'god do/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba gang yin pa de dag la ni byang chub kyi lam rjod par byed de/_ston par byed/_yang dag par gzengs stod par byed/_yang dag 
[\[66a.7\]]par rab tu dga' bar byed/_'god par byed do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]pa 'di ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos rnams dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos rnams la 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so/_/'di dag ni mi dge ba'i chos so/_/'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i 
[\[66b.2\]]chos so/_/'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos so zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam par 'jog par bgyid pa 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[66b.3\]]rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa/_chos rnam par 'jog par byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[66b.4\]]dpa' chen po'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos shes na ni/_de'i phyir nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la lan du phan gdags par sla ba ma yin la/_khyed thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la chos dang ldan 
[\[66b.5\]]pas zil gyis mnan par mi nus so/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams la ma mchis pa 
[\[66b.6\]]de gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de'i phyir legs par nyon la rab tu yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[66b.7\]]drug po dag la gnas shing mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu song ste/_de dag tu sems can gang dag sbyin pas phan gdags par 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]bya ba de dag la ni sbyin pas phan 'dogs so/_/gang dag tshul khrims kyis phan gdags par bya ba dang /_gang dag bzod pas phan gdags par bya ba dang /_gang dag brtson 'grus kyis phan gdags par bya ba dang /_/gang dag bsam gtan gyis phan gdags par bya ba dang /_gang 
[\[67a.2\]]dag shes rab kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni shes rab kyis phan 'dogs so/_/gang dag bsam gtan dang pos phan gdags par bya ba dang /_gang dag bsam gtan gnyis pas phan gdags par bya ba dang /_gang dag bsam gtan gsum pas phan gdags par bya ba dang /_gang dag bsam 
[\[67a.3\]]gtan bzhi pas phan gdags par bya ba dang /_gang dag nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pas phan gdags par bya ba dang /_gang dag 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar gyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni 'du shes med 'du shes med 
[\[67a.4\]]min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pas phan 'dogs so/_/gang dag byams pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni byams pas phan 'dogs so/_/gang dag snying rjes phan gdags par bya ba dang /_gang dag dga' bas phan gdags par bya ba dang /_gang dag btang snyoms kyis phan 
[\[67a.5\]]gdags par bya ba dang /_gang dag dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhis phan gdags par bya ba dang /_gang dag yang dag par spong ba bzhis phan gdags par bya ba dang /_gang dag rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis phan gdags par bya ba dang /_gang dag dbang po lngas phan gdags par bya ba dang /_gang dag 
[\[67a.6\]]stobs lngas phan gdags par bya ba dang /_gang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyis phan gdags par bya ba dang /_gang dag 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas phan gdags par bya ba dang /_gang dag stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis phan gdags par bya ba dang /_gang dag mtshan 
[\[67a.7\]]ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis phan gdags par bya ba dang /_gang dag smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis phan 'dogs so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]tu phyin pa la spyod pa ji ltar sbyin pas sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/_zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/_skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/_bzhon pa 
[\[67b.2\]]dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_spos dang /_gos dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_mi'i yo byad ci yang rung ba'i bar du sbyin par byed de/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ji ltar 'bul ba de bzhin du/_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa 
[\[67b.3\]]rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la yang de bzhin no/_/mir gyur pa rnams la yang de bzhin no/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa rnams la yang de bzhin te/_thams cad 
[\[67b.4\]]la yang tha dad du dbye ba med par sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos thams cad tha dad pa med par rtogs pa'i phyir tha dad pa med par sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/_/tha dad pa med par sbyin pa byin pas tha dad pa med pa'i chos 'di lta ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 
[\[67b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags mthong na/_'di snyam du bdag gi sbyin gnas ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin gyi dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa ni ma yin no snyam du sems na/_byang chub 
[\[67b.6\]]sems dpa'i chos ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/_de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa la sems can 'di dag la ni bdag gis sbyin pas phan gdags par bya'o/_/'di 
[\[67b.7\]]dag la ni phan gdags par mi bya'o zhes bya ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/sbyin pas phan btags pa de dag kyang /_rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag tu skye bar 'gyur/_bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang /_khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/_sbyin pas 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]phan btags pa de nyid kyis de dag theg pa gsum po dag gis rim gyis phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang 'gyur ro/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la skye bo mang pos gsad par gsol ba 
[\[68a.2\]]btab na/_des 'khrug pa med pa'i sems kyis skye bo mang po de dag la nges par sbyin par bya'i sbyin nam mi sbyin snyam pa'i sems gzhan bskyed par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar skye bo mang po de dag gi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa'i 
[\[68a.3\]]phyir ro/_/gal te de ltar rtog par byed na ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_slob pa rnams dang /_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang khyod sems can 
[\[68a.4\]]thams cad kyi skyabs dang /_gnas dang /_mgon dang /_dpung gnyen bya bar sus ma longs zhes smad par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la mir gyur pa rnams sam/_mi ma yin par gyur pa 
[\[68a.5\]]rnams kyis yan lag dang nying lag rnams slongs na sbyin nam mi sbyin snyam pa'i sems cig shos bskyed par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ngas lus 'dis sems can rnams kyi don bya'o snyam ste/_sems can rnams kyi don du bsams bzhin du 
[\[68a.6\]]lus yongs su bzung ba'i phyir te/_des 'di ltar gang dag gi phyir bdag gis lus blangs pa de dag gis ma bslangs bzhin du khyer te/_'gro 'dod cig ces sems bskyed par bya ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslab 
[\[68a.7\]]par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos slong ba mthong na/_chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ni mi dmigs na su zhig sbyin par byed/_su la sbyin par byed/_ci zhig sbyin par byed/_ces de ltar sems bskyed par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]ltar chos de dag ni shin tu stong pa'i phyir te/_stong pa nyid ni su la yang sbyin par mi byed/_len par yang mi byed do/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_'di lta ste/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid nas de bzhin du 
[\[68b.2\]]sbyar te/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag la da ltar bslab par bya'o/_/de stong pa nyid de dag la gnas nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed pas de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pas nang dang phyi'i 
[\[68b.3\]]chos rnams bcad cing gtubs kyang /_'di snyam du su zhig nga la gcod cing gtub par byed snyam du mi sems so/_/rab 'byor 'di la ngas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam par bltas na/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[68b.4\]]dpa' chen po dag bsams bzhin du sems can dmyal ba chen por song ste/_sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag zhi bar byas nas/_cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum po rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang /_kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal ba 
[\[68b.5\]]pa'i sems can de dag la chos ston te/_de dag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis chos ston par byed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag byams pa chen po dang /_
[\[68b.6\]]snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen pos kyang chos ston par byed pa dang /_de nas sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' de dag la sems dad par gyur nas sems can dmyal ba de dag nas thar bar 'gyur ba dang /_sems can dmyal ba de dag 
[\[68b.7\]]nas theg pa gsum po dag gi rim gyis sdug bsngal mthar byed pa dag mthong ngo /_/lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_steng dang /_'og dang /_phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams su yang de bzhin du sbyar ro/_/rab 'byor 'di la ngas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]'jig rten rnam par bltas na shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[69a.2\]]dpa' chen po de dag gi dad pa drag pos yid du mi 'ong bas ma yin gyi yid du 'ong ba dang /_mi dga' bas ma yin gyi dga' ba dang /_ma gus pas ma yin gyi gus pas bsnyen bkur byed de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang dag bstan pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[69a.3\]]dpa' chen po de dag gis 'dzin par byed do/_/bzung nas kyang 'chang bar byed do/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nams kyang chud gzon par mi byed pa dag mthong ngo /_/lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi 
[\[69a.4\]]phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du yang de bzhin no/_/rab 'byor 'di la ngas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam par bltas na 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag sems can dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes 
[\[69a.5\]]pa de dag gi don du bdag nyid kyang yongs su gtong bar byed do/_/der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis yan lag dang nying lag rnams gtubs nas/_phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag tu gtor bar byed/_sems can dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa de dag 
[\[69a.6\]]gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sha rnams zos nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la byams pa 'thob par 'gyur te/_de dag byams pa thob pa des dud 'gro'i skye gnas de nas thar bar 'gyur la/_thar nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed de/_de dag 
[\[69a.7\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed cing /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos kyang nyan la chos de dag mnyan nas de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed do/_/de dag theg pa gsum po nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/_sangs 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]rgyas kyi theg pas rim gyis phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par byed cing /_bskyed 
[\[69b.2\]]nas kyang de bzhin nyid du sgrub la de bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de dag ni gces spras byed pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang 'di la ngas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam par bltas na 'jig rten gyi khams gang 
[\[69b.3\]]gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag sems can [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul na 'khod pa rnams kyi [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi sdug bsngal rnams sel bar byed de/_ser sna spong ba'i phyir yang chos ston la/_de nas de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 
[\[69b.4\]]la byams pa'i sems skyed par byed de/_de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi skye gnas nas thar bar 'gyur zhing thar nas kyang phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du nams kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar 
[\[69b.5\]]mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po la gnas pa ni 'di lta ste/_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi don du nye bar gnas pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang 'di la ngas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 
[\[69b.6\]]rnam par bltas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /_'thab bral ba rnams dang /_dga' ldan pa rnams dang /_'phrul dga' ba rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams 
[\[69b.7\]]la chos ston te/_lha'i bu de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las chos thos nas theg pa gsum po dag gis rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba dang /_rab 'byor 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]de na lha'i bu gang dag 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rgyas pa de dag gis lhag par mos pa de dag gi gzhal med khang 'bar bar byas nas grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa yin na/_su zhig 'du byed rnams la yid rton cing 'dug ces chos ston pa dag mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor gzhan 
[\[70a.2\]]yang 'di la ngas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam par bltas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na su dag bram ze'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/_kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ji ltar lta ba bskyed/_chos 
[\[70a.3\]]thams cad gsob dang /_gsog yin pa la ji ltar lta ba bskyed ces lta ba de dag las 'byed pa dag mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po la gnas nas sems can rnams la chos ston te/_rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[70a.4\]]chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos yin no/_/rab 'byor 'di la ngas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam par bltas na shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud 
[\[70a.5\]]par byed de/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sbyin pa dang /_snyan par smra ba dang /_don spyod pa dang /_don 'thun pas sdud par byed do/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud par byed ce na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[70a.6\]]chen pos ji ltar zang zing gi sbyin pa dang /_chos kyi sbyin pa dang /_sbyin pa rnam pa gnyis kyis sems can rnams sdud par byed do/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pas ji ltar sems can rnams sdud ce na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[70a.7\]]chen pos gser ram/_dngul lam/_nor bu'am/_mu tig gam/_bai dUr+ya'am/_dung ngam/_man shel lam/_byu ru'am/_zas sam/_skom 'am/_gos sam/_bzhon pa'am/_mal cha'am/_stan nam/_spos sam/_me tog phreng ngam/_mar me'am/_skyes pa'am/_
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]bud med dam/_rta'am/_ba lang ngam/_glang po che'am/_bdag gi sha sbyin par byed pa na 'di skad du kye mi dag tshur sheg_/_khyed ci 'dod pa bzhin du khyed nyid kyi dang 'dra bar bsam pa bzang pos dogs pa med par khyer te/_deng shig ces sgra sgrogs par byed do/_/des sbyin pa de byin nas sems can de dag sangs rgyas 
[\[70b.2\]]la skyabs su 'gro bar byed/_chos la skyabs su 'gro bar byed/_dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro bar byed de/_la la dag ni bslab pa'i gzhi lnga 'dzin du 'jug go/_/la la dag ni gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/_/la la dag ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la 'god par byed do/_/la la 
[\[70b.3\]]dag ni bsam gtan dang po nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar du 'dzin du 'jug go/_/la la dag ni byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/_/la la dag ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /_chos 
[\[70b.4\]]rjes su dran pa dang /_dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /_tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /_gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /_lha rjes su dran pa dang /_la la dag ni lus la so sor rtog pa mi sdug pa'i 'du shes la sogs pa la sbyor ro/_/la la dag ni rnam par dag pa la/_la la dag ni dran pa nye 
[\[70b.5\]]bar gzhag pa bzhi la/_la la dag ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi la/_la la dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la/_la la dag ni dbang po lnga la/_la la dag ni stobs lnga la/_la la dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la/_la la dag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la/_
[\[70b.6\]]la la dag ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la/_la la dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad la/_la la dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la/_la la dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs 
[\[70b.7\]]pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la/_la la dag ni byams pa chen po la/_la la dag ni snying rje chen po la/_la la dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la/_la la dag ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la/_la la dag ni dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la/_
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]la la dag ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la/_la la dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la/_la la dag ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la/_la la dag ni dgra bcom pa nyid la/_la la dag ni rang byang chub la/_la la dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[71a.2\]]byang chub la sbyor bar byed do/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pas zang zing gi sbyin pa byin nas grub pa dang /_bde ba rgya chen po la 'god par byed de/_rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[71a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos yin no/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_sems can rnams la chos kyi sbyin pas ji ltar phan 'dogs she na/_rab 'byor chos kyi sbyin pa ni 'di gnyis te/_gnyis gang 
[\[71a.4\]]zhe na/_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa gang zhe na/_'jig rten pa'i chos rnams brjod pa dang /_bstan pa dang /_bshad pa gang yin pa ste/_'di lta ste/_mi sdug pa bstan pa'i le'u las 'byung ba dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_
[\[71a.5\]]tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar dag dang /_so so'i skye bo dang thun mong ba'i 'jig rten gyi chos gang yang rung ba rnams te/_'di ni 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 
[\[71a.6\]]ni 'jig rten gyi chos kyi sbyin pa 'di byin nas/_rnam grangs du mas yang dag par blangs pa de las 'byed par byed do/_/des phyi nas thabs la mkhas pas 'phags pa'i chos rnams dang /_'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu la 'god par byed do/_/'phags pa'i chos rnams 
[\[71a.7\]]dang /_'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'phags pa'i chos rnams zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum yin no/_/'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nas dgra 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]bcom pa nyid kyi bar dag yin no/_/rab 'byor yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa nas dgra bcom pa nyid shes pa'i bar dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun shes pa'i bar dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[71b.2\]]pa'i stobs bcu shes pa'i bar dang /_byams pa chen po shes pa dang /_snying rje chen po shes pa dang /_dga' ba chen po shes pa dang /_btang snyoms chen po shes pa'i bar dang /_gzhan yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes ma gtogs par gang dag 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das 
[\[71b.3\]]pa'i chos rnams dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa rnams dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams te/_'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[71b.4\]]'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu gang zhe na/_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[71b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam 
[\[71b.6\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /_de bzhin gshegs par tha dad du bgyi ba ci mchis/_bka' stsal pa/_tha dad du bya ba gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 
[\[71b.7\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba yin la/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes thob pa zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang la gnas nas chos thams cad tha dad du dbyer med pa thob pa la byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tha dad par dmigs pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa yin te/_de la brten nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa 'byung ngo /_/rab 'byor de ltar 
[\[72a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can rnams 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa la btsud nas thabs mkhas pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la 'god par byed do/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa 
[\[72a.3\]]byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang /_thun mong ma yin pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam 
[\[72a.4\]]par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_zad par gyi skye mched bcu dang /_zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad dang /_nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_smon nas shes pa dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_shin tu yongs su dag 
[\[72a.5\]]pa bzhi dang /_dbang bcu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_bsrung ba med pa gsum dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang /_bag chags kyi sgrib pa spangs pa dang /_
[\[72a.6\]]thugs rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /_gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams te/_de dag ni 'jig rten pa ma yin pa/_
[\[72a.7\]]'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi brnab sems dang /_yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/_nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]pa dang /_rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi brnab sems dang /_yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/_phyi'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa dang /_rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi brnab sems dang /_yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/_
[\[72b.2\]]nang dang phyi'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa dang /_lus la 'byung bar rjes su lta zhing gnas pa dang /_lus la 'jig par rjes su lta zhing gnas pa dang /_lus la kun 'byung ba dang 'jig par rjes su lta zhing gnas pa dang /_lus la mi gnas par gnas shing 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar 
[\[72b.3\]]len pa med pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_sems dang /_chos rnams la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/_/rab 'byor yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams gang zhe na/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir/_'dun pa bskyed pa dang /_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang 
[\[72b.4\]]ba'i phyir/_'dun pa bskyed pa dang /_dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed pa dang /_dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang /_phyir zhing 'byung ba dang /_nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /_yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed pa'o/_/rab 'byor rdzu 
[\[72b.5\]]'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gang zhe na/_'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_sems dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o/_/rab 'byor dbang po lnga gang zhe na/_dad pa'i dbang po dang /_brtson 
[\[72b.6\]]'grus kyi dbang po dang /_dran pa'i dbang po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /_shes rab kyi dbang po ste/_de dag ni dbang po lnga zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor stobs lnga gang zhe na/_dad pa'i stobs dang /_brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang /_dran pa'i stobs dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang /_shes 
[\[72b.7\]]rab kyi stobs te/_de dag ni stobs lnga zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/_dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]yan lag dang /_shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/_de dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 
[\[73a.2\]]gang zhe na/_yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ngag dang /_yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /_yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /_yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/_'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes 
[\[73a.3\]]bya'o/_/rab 'byor de la ting nge 'dzin gsum gang zhe na/_stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_stong pa'i rnam pa dang /_dben pa'i rnam pas sems rtse gcig pa gang yin pa ste/_
[\[73a.4\]]de ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/_/mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pas sems rtse gcig pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/_/smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_mi rtag pa'i 
[\[73a.5\]]rnam pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pas sems rtse gcig pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/_/rab 'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhe na/_gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/_/nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi 
[\[73a.6\]]rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/_/sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa lus kyis mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 
[\[73a.7\]]'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /_sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar dag bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_de rnam pa thams 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes dang /_tshor ba 'gog pa lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te gnas pa'i bar dag ste/_de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya'o/_/rab 'byor mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang 
[\[73b.2\]]zhe na/_'di la kha cig 'dod pa dag las dben pa/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_gsum 
[\[73b.3\]]pa dang /_bzhi pa'i par dag bsgrubs te gnas pa dang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar dag bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes dang /_tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste/_de dag ni 
[\[73b.4\]]mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya'o/_/de la zad par gyi skye mched bcu gang zhe na/_zad par sa dang /_zad par chu dang /_zad par me dang /_zad par rlung dang /_zad par sngon po dang /_zad par ser po dang /_zad par dmar po dang /_zad par dkar po dang /_zad par rnam par shes 
[\[73b.5\]]pa dang /_zad par nam mkha' ste/_de dag ni zad par gyi skye mched bcu zhes bya'o/_/de la zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad gang zhe na/_nang gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chung ngu kha dog bzang po dang /_kha dog ngan pa rnams la lta zhing /_gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan nas shes 
[\[73b.6\]]zil gyis mnan nas mthong ste/_de lta bu 'du shes par 'gyur ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang po'o/_/nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chen por gyur pa kha dog bzang po dang /_kha dog ngan pa rnams la lta zhing gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan nas shes zil gyis mnan 
[\[73b.7\]]nas mthong ste/_de lta bur 'du shes par 'gyur ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis pa'o/_/nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po kha dog sngon po/_sngon po lta bur ston pa/_'od sngon po 'byung ba rnams la lta ste/_dper na zar ma'i me tog gam/_
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]yul bA rA na sI'i ras phun sum tshogs pa sngon po/_kha dog sngon po/_sngon po lta bur ston pa/_'od sngon po 'byung ba de bzhin du/_nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas/_phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po/_kha dog sngon po/_sngon po lta bur ston pa/_'od sngon po 'byung ba rnams la lta 
[\[74a.2\]]ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gsum pa'o/_/nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po/_kha dog ser po/_ser po lta bur ston pa/_'od ser po 'byung ba rnams la lta ste/_dper na dong ka'i me tog gam/_yul bA rA Na sI'i ras phun sum tshogs pa ser po/_kha 
[\[74a.3\]]dog ser po/_ser po lta bur ston pa/_'od ser po 'byung ba de bzhin du/_nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po/_kha dog ser po/_ser po lta bur ston pa/_'od ser po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bzhi pa'o/_/nang gzugs med par 
[\[74a.4\]]'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs dmar po kha dog dmar po/_dmar po lta bur ston pa/_'od dmar po 'byung ba rnams la lta ste/_dper na ban du dzi ba'i me tog dang /_yul bA rA Na sI'i ras phun sum tshogs pa dmar po/_kha dog dmar po/_dmar po lta bur ston pa/_'od dmar po 
[\[74a.5\]]'byung ba de bzhin du/_nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas/_phyi rol gyi gzugs dmar po/_kha dog dmar po/_dmar po lta bur ston pa/_'od dmar po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched lnga pa'o/_/nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs dkar 
[\[74a.6\]]po/_kha dog dkar po/_dkar po lta bur ston pa/_'od dkar po 'byung ba rnams la lta ste/_dper na skar ma pa ba sangs kyi mdog ltar dkar po/_kha dog dkar po/_dkar po lta bur ston pa/_'od dkar po 'byung ba de bzhin du/_nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas/_phyi rol gyi 
[\[74a.7\]]gzugs dkar po/_kha dog dkar po/_dkar po lta bur ston pa/_'od dkar po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched drug pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/_thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /_sna tshogs kyi 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bdun pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_rnam shes mtha' yas so snyam nas 
[\[74b.2\]]rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad pa ste/_de dag ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad ces bya'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa/_de la nyon mongs pa med pa gang 
[\[74b.3\]]zhe na/_bsam gtan la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gnas pa/_sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang zag gzhan dag gi nyon mongs pa mi skye bar ting nge 'dzin gang gis 'grub pa de ni nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/de la smon nas shes pa gang zhe na/_bsam gtan 
[\[74b.4\]]la gnas te 'di shes par bya'o snyam nas byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum gyi shes pa'am/_shes bya gang dang gang shes par 'dod par gyur pa de la yid kyis smon par byed cing ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas de'i smon lam de 'grub cing /_shes bya de yang shes pa de ni smon nas shes pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[74b.5\]]de la mngon par shes pa drug gang zhe na/_rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa dang /_lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa dang /_lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pa dang /_pha rol gyi sems shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /_sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /_zag pa zad pa'i 
[\[74b.6\]]mngon par shes pa ste drug po de dag go/_/de la yongs su dag pa bzhi gang zhe na/_gnas yongs su dag pa dang /_dmigs pa yongs su dag pa dang /_thugs yongs su dag pa dang /_mkhyen pa yongs su dag pa ste/_bzhi po de dag go/_/de la dbang bcu gang zhe na/_tshe la dbang ba dang /_
[\[74b.7\]]sems la dbang ba dang /_yo byad la dbang ba dang /_las la dbang ba dang /_skye ba la dbang ba dang /_mos pa la dbang ba dang /_smon lam la dbang ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang /_ye shes la dbang ba dang /_chos la dbang ba ste bcu po de dag go/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]pa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/_gnas la yang gnas su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen cing /_gnas ma yin pa la yang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa dang /_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i las rnams dang /_las yang 
[\[75a.2\]]dag par blangs pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa gnas kyi rnam pa dang /_rgyu'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa dang /_'jig rten gnas pa khams du ma pa dang /_khams sna tshogs pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa dang /_sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang zag gzhan 
[\[75a.3\]]rnams kyi 'dun pa du ma dang /_mos pa sna tshogs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa dang /_sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang zag gzhan rnams kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa'i shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa dang /_kun tu 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba 
[\[75a.4\]]bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_ldang ba thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa dang /_sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran te/_des 
[\[75a.5\]]tshe rabs gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/_sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma'i bar dag kyang rnam pa dang bcas yul phyogs dang bcas par rjes su dran pa dang /_lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las shin tu 'das pas sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang /_skye ba dag kyang gzigs te sems can gang dag gi lus 
[\[75a.6\]]dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa/_log par lta ba/_'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa dag rgyu de dang rkyen des lus zhig ste/_shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba dag tu skye ba dang /_sems can gang dag lus dang ngag dang yid kyis legs par spyod 
[\[75a.7\]]pa dang ldan pa yang dag par lta ba/_'phags pa rnams la skur ba mi 'debs pa dag rgyu des lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi lha'i nang du skye ba dag kyang gzigs la/_des lha'i mig rnam par dag pa/_mi'i las shin tu 'das pas/_sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang /_skye ba dang /_kha dog 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]bzang ba dang /_kha dog ngan pa dang /_bde 'gro dang /_ngan 'gro dag tu lus ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar 'gro ba dag kyang /_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa dang /_zag pa rnams zad pa dang /_zag pa med cing sems rnam par grol ba dang /_shes rab rnam par grol ba dag kyang yang 
[\[75b.2\]]dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa ste/_de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/_nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na/_kye ma de la chos 'di rnams mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[75b.3\]]sangs ma rgyas so zhes lha dang bcas pa dang /_bdud dang bcas pa dang /_tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na chos dang 'thun par 'ga' zhig bdag la rgol lo snyam pa'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma 
[\[75b.4\]]mthong bas bde ba thob cing bag tsha ba med pa thob la/_mi 'jigs pa thob ste/_gnas kyis khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/_/'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrag go/_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_
[\[75b.5\]]su yang rung bas chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten du bskor mi nus pa bdag gis bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_da zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas na/_de la khyod kyis zag pa 'di dag ma zad do zhes chos dang 'thun par bdag la rgol ba med pa dang /_ngas gang dag bar du gcod pa'i chos su 
[\[75b.6\]]gsungs pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur ro zhes chos dang 'thun par bdag la rgol ba med pa dang /_ngas gang sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par byed pa/_nges par 'byin pa'i lam du gsungs pa de bsten kyang sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par mi 'gyur ro zhes lha dang bcas pa dang bdud 
[\[75b.7\]]dang bcas pa dang /_tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na chos dang 'thun pa 'ga' zhig bdag la rgol lo snyam pa'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas bde ba thob cing /_bag tsha ba med pa thob 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]la mi 'jigs pa thob ste/_gnas kyis khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/_/'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrag go/_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_su yang rung bas chos dang 'thun 
[\[76a.2\]]par 'jig rten du bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste/_de dag ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang zhe na/_don so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_nges pa'i tshig 
[\[76a.3\]]so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o/_/de dag kyang gang zhe na/_don la dmigs pa dang /_chos la dmigs pa dang /_nges pa'i tshig la dmigs pa dang /_spobs pa la dmigs pa dag go/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsrung ba med pa gsum gang 
[\[76a.4\]]zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa sku'i spyod pa yongs su dag ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa la sku'i spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas gzhan dag gis ma shes na ci ma rung zhes gang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/_'di ni bsrung ba med pa dang po'o/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[76a.5\]]pa gsung gi spyod pa yongs su dag ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa la gsung gi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas gzhan dag gis ma shes na ci ma rung zhes gang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/_'di ni bsrung ba med pa gnyis pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[76a.6\]]pa thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su dag ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa la thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas gzhan dag gis ma shes na ci ma rung zhes gang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/_'di ni bsrung ba med pa gsum pa'o/_/de la de bzhin gshegs 
[\[76a.7\]]pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum gang zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa'i tshe kha cig rna blags te gus par nyan cing bka' nyan par sems nye bar 'jog la/_chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la nan tan byed na yang des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par mi 'gyur/_yid bde bar mi 'gyur 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]thugs yed yed por mi 'gyur te/_'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang po'o/_/kha cig rna mi blag gus par mi nyan cing bka' nyan pa'i sems nye bar mi 'jog la/_chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la nan tan mi byed na yang des de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas mnar sems su mi 'gyur/_mi 
[\[76b.2\]]bzod par mi 'gyur/_thugs mi ches par mi 'gyur te/_'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gnyis pa'o/_/kha cig rna blags te gus par nyan cing bka' nyan pa'i sems nye bar 'jog la chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la nan tan du byed/_kha cig ni rna mi blag_/gus par mi nyan cing bka' nyan pa'i 
[\[76b.3\]]sems nye bar mi 'jog la/_chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la nan tan mi byed na yang des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa'am/_kun nas mnar sems gnyis su mi 'gyur te/_thams cad du dran pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum 
[\[76b.4\]]pa'o/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid gang zhe na/_gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don yod pa'i chos ston pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa la dus las mi yol ba ste/_'di ni bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid ces bya'o/_/de la de bzhin 
[\[76b.5\]]gshegs pa'i bag chags kyi sgrib pa spangs pa gang zhe na/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad ni nyon mongs pa rnams spangs kyang de dag la lus kyi 'gyur ba dag 'byung gi_/_de bzhin gshegs pa la ni de dag mi mnga' ste/_de ni bag chags kyi sgrib pa spangs pa zhes bya'o/_/de la de bzhin gshegs 
[\[76b.6\]]pa'i thugs rje chen po gang zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po gang dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi brda nye bar bzung ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba la gzigs pa'i phyir dus thams cad du nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum 'jig rten la rtog pa mdzad pa ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po sems 
[\[76b.7\]]can mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba la gzigs pa rtag tu 'byung ba 'di ni thugs rje chen po zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad gang zhe na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/_bar der de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]pa med pa dang /_ca co med pa dang /_bsnyel la med pa dang /_sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa med pa dang /_tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa dang /_so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa dang /_'dun pa nyams pa med pa dang /_brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa dang /_dran pa nyams pa med 
[\[77a.2\]]pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa dang /_shes rab nyams pa med pa dang /_rnam par grol ba nyams pa med pa dang /_lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_yid kyi las 
[\[77a.3\]]thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 
[\[77a.4\]]'jug pa ste/_de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad ces bya'o/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang zhe na/_gang gi dmigs pa ni dngos po med pa dbang byed pa ni dran pa/_rnam pa ni zhi ba/_mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa ste/_'di ni rnam pa 
[\[77a.5\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o/_/rab 'byor de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/_phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa dang /_zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang /_phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel pa dang /_phyag dang zhabs 
[\[77a.6\]]'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa dang /_bdun mtho ba dang /_sor mo ring ba dang /_rting pa yangs pa dang /_sku che zhing drang ba dang /_zhabs la 'bar 'bur med pa dang /_sku'i spu gyen du phyogs pa dang /_byin pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]e ne ya'i lta bu dang /_phyag sbom zhing ring ba dang /_'doms kyi lba ba 
[\[77a.7\]]sbubs su nub pa dang /_mdog gser 'dra ba dang /_pags pa srab pa dang /_spu re re nas skye zhing g.yas su 'khyil ba dang /_zhal la mdzod spu'i mtshan mnga' ba dang /_ro stod seng ge 'dra ba dang /_dpung mgo legs par grub pa dang /_thal gong rgyas pa dang /_ro bro ba mkhyen pa dang /_shing n+ya 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa dang /_dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa dang /_ljags ring zhing srab pa dang /_tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang /_'gram pa seng ge'i lta bu dang /_tshems shin tu dkar ba dang /_tshems mnyam pa dang /_tshems thags bzang ba dang /_tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba dang /_spyan mthon ting dang /_ba'i 
[\[77b.2\]]rdzi ma lta bu rnams so/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang /_zhabs kyi mthil dag la 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa mu khyud can lte ba dang bcas pa/_rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa/_'di lta ste dper na rus pa'am/_ba so la gzugs su brkos pa lta bu dag mnga' bas na phyag dang zhabs 
[\[77b.3\]]'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin no/_/zhabs kyi mthil gnyis mnyam par sa la 'jog cing zhabs zhum pa med pas na zhabs shin tu gnas pa yin no/_/ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bas 'brel bas na phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel ba yin no/_/shing bal gyi 'da' ba ltar 
[\[77b.4\]]phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags la snyi bas na phyag dang zhabs gzhon sha chags pa yin no/_/phyag dang zhabs kyi bol gnyis dang dpung mgo gnyis dang ltag pa'i phyogs mtho bas na bdun mtho ba yin no/_/phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ring bas na sor mo ring ba yin no/_/zhabs kyi rting pa 
[\[77b.5\]]che bas na rting pa yangs pa yin no/_/khru bdun du 'phags par mtho zhing sku mi yo bas na sku che zhing drang ba yin no/_/pus mo'i lha nga dang /_long bu shin tu mi mngon pas na zhabs 'bar 'bur med pa yin no/_/spu g.yas phyogs su zlum por 'khyil zhing gyen du phyogs pas na sku'i spu gyen du phyogs pa 
[\[77b.6\]]yin no/_/byin pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]e ne ya'i byin pa dang /_mda' rgyu'i snying po ltar byin gyis zlum pas na byin pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]e ne ya'i lta bu yin no/_/phyag sbom zhing ring ba'i phyir ma btud kyang phyag gis pus mo slebs pas na phyag sbom zhing ring ba yin no/_/glang po che dang rta cang shes ltar gsang ba'i 
[\[77b.7\]]mtshan shin tu mdzes par sbubs su nub pas na mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa yin no/_/gser shin tu sbyangs pa'i mdog 'dra bas na mdog gser 'dra ba yin no/_/pags pa gser dang dngul shin tu sbyangs pa ltar 'jam zhing sku la rdul gyis mi gos pas na pags pa srab pa yin no/_/spu shin tu 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]'byes shing gcig tu gnyis ma yin pas na spu re re nas skye zhing g.yas su 'khyil ba yin no/_/me tog kun da dang /_zla ba dang /_ba'i 'o ma dang /_ba mo'i mdog ltar dkar zhing /_nyi ma dang zla ba brgya bas kyang shin tu 'phags par 'od gsal ba'i mdzod spus smin mtshams legs 
[\[78a.2\]]par brgyan pas na zhal la mdzod spu'i mtshan mnga' ba yin no/_/sku'i stod 'phel kha che bas na ro stod seng ge'i 'dra ba yin no/_/mgur zlum zhing phya ler 'dug pas na dpung mgo legs par grub pa yin no/_/gser gyi glegs ma shin tu rnam par phyis pa lta bus mthong ka shin tu rgyas pas na thal 
[\[78a.3\]]gong rgyas pa yin no/_/ljags rlung dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan gyis nyams pa mi mnga' zhing /_ro thams cad so sor rnam par rig pa dang /_'thun par rnam par shes pas na ro bro ba mkhyen pa yin no/_/sku'i khrun dang /_'dom gyi tshad du mnyam pas na shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa 
[\[78a.4\]]yin no/_/dbu'i gtsug tor zlum zhing lham la g.yas su 'khyil ba dang ldan zhing dbu legs par grub cing blta na sdug pas na dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa yin no/_/ut+pa la dmar po'i 'dab ma'i mdog 'dra zhing yangs pas na ljags ring zhing srab pa yin no/_/dbyig gi snying po dang /_bya ka 
[\[78a.5\]]la bing ka lta bu'i gsung mnga' bas na tshangs pa'i dbyangs yin no/_/me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar shin tu legs par grub cing zlum la rgyas shing blta na sdug la mkhrang bas na 'gram pa seng ge lta bu yin no/_/me tog kun da dang /_zla ba dang /_dung gi bcag 'phro ltar shin tu dkar ba'i tshems 
[\[78a.6\]]mnga' bas na tshems shin tu dkar ba yin no/_/tshems mthon dman med pas na tshems mnyam pa yin no/_/tshems mtshams ma dod pas na tshems thags bzang ba yin no/_/tshems bla 'og lhag chad med cing mnyam pas na tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba yin no/_/dkar gnag gi phyogs ma 'dres 
[\[78a.7\]]shing shin tu rnam par dag la/_dmar po'i rgyun dang ma 'brel bas na spyan mthon ting yin no/_/spyan gyi rdzi ma bla 'og legs par gzhol zhing ma 'dzings pas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyi rdzi ma ni ba'i rdzi ma lta bu yin no/_/de la bla ma rnams la bsu bskyal dang /_chos nyan pa 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]dang /_me tog phreng 'bul ba dang /_gtsug lag khang dang /_mchod rten la sogs pa'i gan du 'gro ba dang /_g.yog 'khor gyi sbyin pa byas pas na phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan par gyur te/_de ni g.yog 'khor shin tu mang ba'i snga ltas yin no/_/yi dam la brten 
[\[78b.2\]]pas na zhabs shin tu gnas par gyur te/_de ni mi g.yo ba'i snga ltas yin no/_/bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po sbyin pa dang /_snyan par smra ba dang /_don spyod pa dang /_don 'thun pa dag kun tu bsten pas na phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel bar gyur te/_de ni myur du 'du ba'i snga ltas yin no/_/
[\[78b.3\]]bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_bldag pa dang /_bca' ba bsod pa dag gi sbyin pa byas pas na phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa dang /_bdun mtho bar gyur te/_de gnyis ni bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_bldag pa dang bca' ba bsod pa dag 'thob pa'i snga ltas yin no/_/
[\[78b.4\]]gsad pa las thar bar byas pa dang /_bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa byin pas srog gi rim gro byas pa dang /_srog gcod pa spangs pa kun tu bsten pas na sor mo ring ba dang /_rting pa yangs pa dang /_sku che zhing drang bar gyur te/_de dag ni sku tshe ring ba'i snga ltas yin no/_/dge ba'i 
[\[78b.5\]]chos yang dag par blangs pa dang /_bzung ba rnams mngon par spel cing yongs su 'grib par ma byas pas na zhabs 'bar 'bur med pa dang /_sku'i spu gyen du phyogs par gyur te/_de gnyis ni chos yongs su mi nyams pa'i snga ltas yin no/_/bzo'i las dang /_rig pa'i gnas rnams 
[\[78b.6\]]gus par byas shing byin pa dang /_blangs pas na byin pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]e na ya'i lta bur gyur te/_de ni myur du 'dzin pa'i snga ltas yin no/_/bdog cing yod pa'i nor bslangs na med ces mi zer zhing byin pas na phyag sbom zhing ring bar gyur te/_de ni dbang sbyin zhing 'dul bar byed pa'i snga ltas yin no/_/
[\[78b.7\]]mdza' bshes dang /_gnyen 'dab dang /_gnyen pa phan tshun 'brel ba dag gi dbyen ma byas shing /_bye bar gyur pa dag bsdums pa dang /_tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par blangs pa dang /_gsang ba'i tshig bsrungs pas na mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub par gyur te/_de ni sras 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]mang ba'i snga ltas yin no/_/stan dang /_gos dang /_bgo ba rnams dang /_khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_gzhal med khang dang /_gnas bzang po dag gi sbyin pa byas pas na mdog gser 'dra ba dang /_pags pa srab par gyur te/_de gnyis ni stan dang /_gos dang /_bgo ba rnams 
[\[79a.2\]]dang /_khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_gzhal med khang dang /_gnas bzang po dag 'thob pa'i snga ltas yin no/_/'du 'dzi spangs pa dang /_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon dang /_pha ma dang /_phu nu la sogs pa bla ma rnams ji ltar rigs pa'i gnas su bkod cing rim gro byas pa dang /_sbyin pa byin pa 
[\[79a.3\]]dang /_mgu bar byas pas na spu re re nas skye zhing g.yas su 'khyil pa dang /_zhal la mdzod spu'i mtshan mnga' bar gyur te/_de gnyis ni zla med pa'i snga ltas yin no/_/mu cor mi smra zhing gzhan la mi smod pa dang /_snyan par smra ba dang /_legs par smras pa la rjes su 'thun par byed pa dang /_seng 
[\[79a.4\]]ge'i sgra dang 'thun par smra bas na ro stod seng ge'i 'dra ba dang /_dpung mgo legs par grub par gyur te/_de gnyis ni mi choms pa'i snga ltas yin no/_/nad pa rnams la rtsi dang /_g.yog 'khor dang /_sman dang 'thun pa'i kha zas byin zhing rim gro byas pas na thal gong rgyas pa dang /_ro bro 
[\[79a.5\]]ba mkhyen par gyur te/_de gnyis ni gnod pa mi mnga' ba'i snga ltas yin no/_/kun dga' ra ba dang /_'dun sa dang /_bsil khang dang /_khron pa dang /_bgrod dka' bar zam pa gdags pa dang /_kha zas dang /_me tog phreng dang /_gtsug lag khang dang /_'dug gnas la sogs 
[\[79a.6\]]pa bya ba la thog mar 'gro zhing gzhan dag kyang spro ba bskyed pa dang /_gzhan dag la lhag par byin pas na shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa dang /_dbu gtsug tor dang ldan par gyur te/_de gnyis ni mnga' dbang chen po brnyes pa'i snga ltas yin no/_/yun ring po nas 'jam zhing snyan pa dang /_
[\[79a.7\]]mnyen pa'i tshig brjod pas na ljags ring zhing srab pa dang /_tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan par gyur te/_de gnyis ni gsung gi lam yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i dbyangs brnyes pa'i snga ltas yin no/_/gsung gi lam yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i dbyangs ni kun tu shes par bya zhing rnam par 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]rig par bya ba dang /_mnyan par 'os shing mi 'thun pa med pa dang /_zab cing dbyangs rjes su 'byung ba dang /_mi tshugs shing rnar snyan pa dang /_ma 'khrugs shing gsal ba'o/_/yun ring po nas tshig kyal pa spangs shing dus su smra bas na 'gram pa seng ge'i lta bur gyur te/_de ni tshig 
[\[79b.2\]]btsun pa'i snga ltas yin no/_/rim gro byed pa dang /_brnyas pa med pa dang /_'tsho ba yongs su dag pas tshems shin tu dkar ba dang /_tshems mnyam par gyur te/_de gnyis ni 'khor snga nas bsags pa'i snga ltas yin no/_/yun ring po nas bden zhing phra ma med par spyad pas na/_tshems
