[\[79b.3\]]thags bzang ba dang /_tshems bzhi bcu mnga' bar gyur te/_de gnyis ni 'khor mi phyed pa'i snga ltas yin no/_/khyud pa dang smod par byed pa la yang chags pa dang /_sdang ba med cing rmongs pa med pa'i mig gis nges par rtogs pas na spyan mthon ting dang /_ba'i rdzi ma lta bur gyur te/_de gnyis 
[\[79b.4\]]ni kun nas mdzes pa'i snga ltas yin no/_/rab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yin te/_de dag gis rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang /_bzhed na 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag kyang 
[\[79b.5\]]snang bas khyab par mdzad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams la thugs brtse bas 'od 'dom gang tsam du byin gyis rlob par mdzad do/_/gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od 'dom gang bar byin gyis ma brlabs su zin na/_rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis zil gyis gnon par gyur pas nyi ma dang zla 
[\[79b.6\]]ba dag gi 'od kyang mngon par mi 'gyur la/_zla ba dang /_zla ba phyed dang /_dus tshigs dang /_lo khyud khor dag kyang yod par mi 'gyur ro/_/rang bzhin gyi sgra dbyangs kyis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par go bar mdzad do/_/bzhed na gnyis dang /_gsum dang /_bzhi 
[\[79b.7\]]dang ji snyed du snang bas khyab par 'gyur ba de snyed du dbyangs kyis mngon par go bar yang mdzad do/_/rab 'byor de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad la ma chags pa'i thugs mnga' bas na sen 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]mo zangs kyi mdog lta bu yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gnyen 'dab la byams pa bzhin du sems can la phan pa dang /_bde bar dgongs pa'i thugs mnga' bas na sen mo mdog snum pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rigs mtho ba'i rgyud du skyes pas na sen 
[\[80a.2\]]mo mtho ba yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul la kha na ma tho ba med pas na sor mo rnams zlum pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen por bsags pas na sor mo rnams rgyas pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rim gyis 
[\[80a.3\]]yang dag par bsgrubs pas na sor mo rnams byin gyis phra ba yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phrin las kyi mtha' dang /_'tsho bdag shin tu dben pas na rtsa mi mngon pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa 'grol bar mdzad 
[\[80a.4\]]pas na rtsa mdud pa med pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dgongs pa shin tu dben pas na long bu mi mngon pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa thams cad las 'grol bar mdzad pas na zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[80a.5\]]ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i seng ge yin pas na seng ge'i stabs su gshegs pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i glang po che yin pas na glang po che'i stabs su gshegs pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha' la bzhud pas na dad pa'i 
[\[80a.6\]]stabs su gshegs pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skyes bu'i khyu mchog yin pas na khyu mchog gi stabs su gshegs pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'thun pa'i lam mnga' bas na g.yas phyogs su ldog cing gshegs pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[80a.7\]]ldan 'das rnams ni lta na mdzes pas na mdzes par gshegs pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu thugs yon po mi mnga' bas nam yo bar gshegs pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul rnam par dag pa'i yon tan ston pas na sku khri la bag chags pa yin no//
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sdig pa'i chos rnams shin tu sbyangs pas na sku byi dor byas pa lta bu yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos rim gyis ston pas na sku rim par 'tsham pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku dang gsung dang thugs shin tu gtsang bas na sku 
[\[80b.2\]]gtsang ba yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis thugs 'jam pa dang ldan pas na sku 'jam pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis thugs rnam par dag pas na sku rnam par dag pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos 'dul ba shin 
[\[80b.3\]]tu yongs su rdzogs pas na mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yangs shing mdzes pa'i yon tan gsung bas na sku kho lag yangs shing bzang ba yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can thams cad la thugs mnyam pas na gom pa snyoms pa 
[\[80b.4\]]yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu 'jam pa'i chos ston pas na sku shin tu gzhon mdog can yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu zhum pa med pa'i thugs mnga' bas na sku zhum pa med pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[80b.5\]]rnams byang bas na sku rgyas pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yang 'byung ba'i srid par mtshams sbyor ba zad pas na sku shin tu grims pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag dang nying lag rnams shin tu legs par ston pas na 
[\[80b.6\]]yan lag dang nying lag shin tu rnam par 'byes pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pas na gzigs pa rab rib med cing rnam par dag pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul dang ldan pa'i slob ma mnga' bas na dku zlum pa yin no/_/sangs 
[\[80b.7\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'khor ba'i skyon rnams rab tu sbyangs pas na dku skabs phyin pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nga rgyal gyi rtse mo bcom pas na dku ma rnyongs pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos zad par byed pa rnam par zlog pas na phyal phyang de ba yin no/
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos shin tu zab mo rnams thugs su chud pas na lte ba zab pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'thun par 'dzin par zhugs pa'i slob ma mnga' bas na lte ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 
[\[81a.2\]]ni slob ma kun nas mdzes pa'i dge 'dun mnga' bas na kun nas mdzes pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs shin tu gtsang bas na kun spyod pa gtsang ba yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos 'dul ba nag po ston pa dang bral bas na sku la sme ba dang gnag bag med 
[\[81a.3\]]pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shing bal ltar yang ba'i lus thob par 'gyur ba'i chos ston pas na phyag shing bal ltar shin tu 'jam pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gnyen 'dab dang /_skye bo phal po che la snyoms par byams pas dge sbyong chen po yin 
[\[81a.4\]]pas na phyag gi ri mo mdangs yod pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu zab cing brtan par gnas pas na phyag gi ri mo zab pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bzod pa rgya chen po'i chos ston pas na phyag gi ri mo ring ba yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[81a.5\]]ldan 'das rnams ni ha cang phal che ba ma yin pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' ba na zhal ha cang yang mi ring ba yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten thams cad gzugs brnyan lta bur ston pas na zhal la gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[81a.6\]]ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam pa sngon du gtong zhing 'dul bas na ljags mnyen pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yon tan cha phra ba'i tshogs dang ldan pas na ljags srab pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byis pa'i skye bo chags pa rnams la gting dpag 
[\[81a.7\]]dka' ba'i chos kyis 'dul bar mdzad pas na ljags dmar ba yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni glang po che'i nga ro dang /_'brug gi sgra lta bus bsnyengs pa mi mnga' bas na glang po che'i nga ro dang /_'brug gi sgra dang ldan pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]ni snyan cing mnyen la 'jam par smra ba'i slob ma mnga' bas na gsung snyan cing mnyen la 'jam pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni srid pa'i kun tu sbyor ba las log pas na mche ba zlum pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skye bo rnon po 'dul ba la mkhas pas na 
[\[81b.2\]]mche ba rno ba yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos 'dul ba mchog tu dkar bas na mche ba dkar ba yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni cha mnyam pa'i sa la bzhugs pas na mche ba mnyam pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par rtogs 
[\[81b.3\]]par rim gyis ston pas na mche ba byin gyis phra ba yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shes rab kyi ri mthon po la bzhugs pas na shangs mtho ba yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'dul ba'i skye bo gtsang ma mnga' bas na shangs gtsang ba yin no/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[81b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa rnam par dag pas na spyan rnam par dag pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos shin tu yangs pa dang ldan pas na spyan yangs pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gyi tshogs shin tu bsags pas 
[\[81b.5\]]na rdzi ma stug pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lha dang lha ma yin dang mi'i na chung mig dkar gnag 'byes shing pad ma'i 'dab ma rangs pa lta bu dang ldan pa'i mchog rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar byas shing bstod pas na spyan dkar gnag 'byes shing pad ma'i 'dab ma rangs pa 
[\[81b.6\]]lta bu yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu yangs pa ston pas na smin tshugs ring ba yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam pos 'dul ba la mkhas pas na smin ma 'jam pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni kun nas skyon mkhyen pas na 
[\[81b.7\]]smin ma'i spu mnyam pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snum gyis skye bo rgyud snum pa rnams 'dul bar mdzad pas na smin ma snum pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos mchog tu yangs pa ston pas na snyan shal stug cing ring ba yin no/
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i g.yul las rgyal bas na snyan mnyam pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems kyi rgyud mnyam pa'i sems can 'dul bar mdzad pas na snyan gyi dbang po mnyams pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[82a.2\]]'das rnams ni lta bar gyur pa thams cad rnam par spangs pas na dpral ba legs par 'byes pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_phas kyi rgol ba rnams rab tu bcom pas na dpral ba dbyes che ba yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 
[\[82a.3\]]ni smon lam dam pa shin tu yongs su rdzogs pas na dbu shin tu rgyas pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yul la bung ba ltar dga' ba rnam par bzlog pas na dbu skra bung ba ltar gnag pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang 
[\[82a.4\]]bar bya ba'i bag la nyal rnams spangs pas na dbu skra stug pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dgongs pa 'jam pas bstan pa'i snying po thugs su chud pas na dbu skra 'jam pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu ma 'khrugs pa'i thugs mnga' 
[\[82a.5\]]bas na dbu skra mi 'dzing ba yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu mi brlang ba'i gsung mnga' bas na dbu skra mi bshor ba yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi spos kyi me tog gis skye bo rnams la 'thun par sgrub pas na dbu skra dri zhim 
[\[82a.6\]]pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil dpal be'u dang /_bkra shis dang /_g.yung drung 'khyil pas brgyan pa ste/_rab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mnga' ba'i dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yin no/_/rab 'byor byang chub 
[\[82a.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de ltar sbyin pa gnyis po zang zing gi sbyin pa dang /_chos kyi sbyin pa dag gis sems can rnams yang dag par sdud par byed de/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar byang 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos snyan par smra bas sems can rnams yang dag par sdud ce na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gis sems can rnams yang dag par sdud par byed de/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul 
[\[82b.2\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos snyan par smra bas 
[\[82b.3\]]sems can rnams sdud par byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad bsdus pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don spyod pas sems can rnams sdud ce na/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag nyid kyis 
[\[82b.4\]]'di lta ste/_sbyin pa dang /_snyan par smra ba dang /_don spyod pa dang /_don 'thun pas sems can rnams yun ring po nas bsdus pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[82b.5\]]dpa' chen po rnams la 'di skad du 'doms shing rjes su ston te/_rigs kyi bu dag tshur shog_/khyed cag yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par gyis shig_/yi ge gcig la mkhas par gyis shig_/yi ge gnyis la mkhas par gyis shig_/yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i bar dag la 
[\[82b.6\]]mkhas par gyis shig_/yi ge gcig gis thams cad 'grib pa dang ldan par rjes su rtogs par gyis shig_/yi ge gnyis kyis thams cad 'grib pa dang ldan par rjes su rtogs par gyis shig_/yi ge gsum gyis thams cad 'grib pa dang ldan par rjes su rtogs par gyis 
[\[82b.7\]]shig_/yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i bar dag gis thams cad 'grib pa dang ldan par rjes su rtogs par gyis shig_/yi ge gcig tu yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa lnga 'dus par sgoms shig_/yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa lnga rnams su gcig 'dus par sgoms shig ces 'doms par byed de/_rab 'byor 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni yi ge gcig la mkhas pa yin no/_/yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i bar dag la mkhas pa yin no/_/yi ge gcig tu yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa lnga 'dus par bsgom pa la mkhas pa yin no/_/yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa lnga rnams su yi 
[\[83a.2\]]ge gcig 'dus par bsgom pa la mkhas pa yin te/_yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par byas nas/_yi ge med pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa yin no/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 
[\[83a.3\]]ni chos la mkhas pa dang /_yi ge la mkhas pa yin te/_de chos la mkhas pa dang /_yi ge la mkhas pas chos ston te/_yi ge rnams kyis yi ge med pa'i chos ston pa bzhin no/_/rab 'byor chos de ni yi ge med pa'i rnam pas sprul pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[83a.4\]]la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te mtha' las 'das pa dang /_thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa stong pa nyid kyi slad du sems can yang gtan dmigs su ma mchis la/_chos kyang dmigs su ma mchis shing /_chos kyi rang 
[\[83a.5\]]bzhin yang dmigs su ma mchis lags na/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[83a.6\]]pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi la spyod pa dang /_tshad med pa bzhi la spyod pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod pa 
[\[83a.7\]]dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang /_stong pa nyid bcu bzhi la spyod pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /_rnam par 
[\[83b.2\]]smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa drug la spyod pa ji ltar sems can rnams la chos ston par bgyid lags/_de la ni sems can dang /_sems can du gdags pa yang dmigs su ma mchis lags te/_sems can dmigs su ma mchis pas/_gzugs kyang dmigs su ma mchis 
[\[83b.3\]]la/_rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang dmigs su ma mchis/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang dmigs su ma mchis la/_de bzhin du dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag kyang dmigs su ma mchis lags so/_/sems can dang sems 
[\[83b.4\]]can du gdags pa dmigs su ma mchis pa de la ni gzugs kyang ma mchis la/_de bzhin du dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar dag kyang ma mchis lags so/_/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar dag kyang ma mchis lags na/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[83b.5\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ji ltar sems can rnams la chos ston par 'gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can rnams mchis pa ma lags pa'i chos rnams la yang dag par 'dzin du stsol cing /_phyin ci log la sbyor bar bgyid 
[\[83b.6\]]pa'am/_gcig tu mi 'gyur lags grang /_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang mi dmigs na/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams lta smos kyang ci 
[\[83b.7\]]'tshal lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor de de bzhin te/_de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_rab 'byor sems can dmigs su med pas/_nang stong pa nyid du rig 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]par bya'o/_/phyi stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rig par bya'o/_/phung po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/khams stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/skye mched stong pa nyid du rig 
[\[84a.2\]]par bya'o/_/rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/bdag stong pa nyid dang /_sems can stong pa nyid dang /_srog stong pa nyid dang /_skye ba po stong pa nyid dang /_shed las skyes pa stong pa nyid dang /_gang zag stong pa nyid dang /_gso ba stong pa nyid dang /_byed pa po dang /_
[\[84a.3\]]byed du 'jug pa po dang /_slong ba po dang /_kun nas slong ba po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_tshor bar byed pa po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te bsam gtan stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/tshad med pa stong pa nyid dang /_gzugs med 
[\[84a.4\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar dag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa stong pa nyid du 
[\[84a.5\]]rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te rnam par thar pa brgyad stong pa nyid dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong pa nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stong pa nyid dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi stong pa nyid dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi stong pa nyid dang /_sangs 
[\[84a.6\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa stong pa nyid du 
[\[84a.7\]]rig par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/byang chub stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos de dag thams cad stong par mthong nas/_phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems can rnams la chos ston te/_ci nas 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]kyang stong pa nyid de dag tu phyir mi ldog pa de ltar chos ston to/_/des chos thams cad sgrib pa med par yang dag par rjes su mthong ste/_chos gang yang 'khrug par mi byed cing /_gnyis su mi 'byed par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston par byed do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs 
[\[84b.2\]]pa'i sprul pa zhig gis sprul pa bye ba phrag du ma mngon par sprul nas kha cig ni sbyin pa la bkod/_kha cig ni tshul khrims la bkod cing /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_kha cig ni bzod pa la/_kha cig ni brtson 'grus la/_kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin la/_kha cig ni shes rab la/_kha cig ni bsam gtan 
[\[84b.3\]]rnams la/_kha cig ni tshad med pa rnams la/_kha cig ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la/_kha cig ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la/_kha cig ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dag la/_kha cig ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la bkod/_
[\[84b.4\]]kha cig ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod/_kha cig ni byang chub kyi bar dag la bkod na/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_sprul pa des chos gang yang rnam par 'phel ba yod snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor rnam 
[\[84b.5\]]grangs des ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_sems can rnams la chos ston te/_ma bcings ma grol ba'i tshul gyis de dag ni phyin ci log rnams las rnam par grol bar byed cing /_de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba la 'god pa de ltar rig 
[\[84b.6\]]par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba yin la/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang ma bcings ma grol ba yin te/_gzugs kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin la/_tshor ba 
[\[84b.7\]]dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de yang rnam par shes pa ma yin zhing /_'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de yang 'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]rnams ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs dang /_rnam par shes pa'i bar dag dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi bar gyi chos rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab 
[\[85a.2\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_sems can rnams la chos ston kyang sems can du dmigs pa yang med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas te/_de yang gzugs stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_rnam par shes pa'i bar du 
[\[85a.3\]]stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas te/_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams ni gang du yang gnas pa yang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag la 
[\[85a.4\]]gang gnas par 'gyur ba'i ngo bo nyid med pas na dngos po med pa yang dngos po med pa la mi gnas la/_rang gi dngos po yang dngos po med pa la mi gnas shing /_gzhan gyi dngos po yang dngos po med pa'am/_rang gi dngos po la mi gnas pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar 
[\[85a.5\]]de dag thams cad ni dmigs su med de/_gang dmigs su med pa de ni gang la yang gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_chos de dag thams cad stong pa nyid du sgom ste/_rab 'byor byang chub 
[\[85a.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_nyan thos rnams dang /_'phags pa thams cad la nyes par byas pa ma yin no/_/de 
[\[85a.7\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_nyan thos rnams kyis kyang chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di nyid rtogs te/_rtogs nas kyang sems can rnams la chos ston cing /_chos 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]rnams kyi chos nyid de las kyang mi 'da' ste/_chos kyi dbyings kyang 'da' ba med la/_de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang 'da' ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar de dag la gang 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro//_//shes rab 
[\[85b.2\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos kyi dbyings la 'da' ba ma mchis shing /_de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i 
[\[85b.3\]]mtha' la yang 'da' ba ma mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na ci gzugs kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/_rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams 
[\[85b.4\]]dang /_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos rnams kyang gzhan pa zhig lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/_gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/
[\[85b.5\]]de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan ma yin la/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin no/_/rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma yin la/_chos thams cad kyi bar yang gzhan ma yin no/_/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan ma yin la/_de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin no/_/
[\[85b.6\]]de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags shing /_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan ma lags la/_rnam par shes pa'i bar yang gzhan ma lags/_'dus byas 
[\[85b.7\]]dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang gzhan ma lags/_de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyi bar yang gzhan ma lags na/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na nag po'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa nag po ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten lags 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]so zhes bgyi ba dang /_dkar po'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa dkar po ni lha dang mi rnams lags so zhes bgyi ba dang /_dkar gnag gi chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa dkar gnag ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal 'dren ma lags so zhes bgyi ba dang /_mi gnag cing dkar 
[\[86a.2\]]ba'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa mi gnag cing /_dkar ba ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lags so zhes bgyi 
[\[86a.3\]]bar rnam par dgod par ji ltar 'gyur lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor kun rdzob kyi bden pa nye bar bzung ste/_'bras bu rnam par dgod pa bstan par zad kyi/_don dam pa'i bden par ni 
[\[86a.4\]]'bras bu rnam par dgod pa bstan par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ming dang gzugs ni skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/_chos de ni rnam par rtog pa med cing bsnyad du med pa ste/_de ni mtha' 
[\[86a.5\]]las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te kun rdzob kyi bden pa nye bar bzung ste/_'bras bu rnam par dgod pa mchis 
[\[86a.6\]]kyi/_don dam par ma mchis pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur mi 'gyur lags sam/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_bla 
[\[86a.7\]]na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi 'gyur lags sam/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor ci byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis kun rdzob kyi bden pa 'am/_don dam pa'i bden pa 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]shes sam/_'o na ni de dag la yang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa yod par yang 'gyur te/_
[\[86b.2\]]gal te kun rdzob kyi bden pa'am/_don dam pa'i bden pa zhes bya bar shes na ni/_byis pa so so'i skye bo zhes bya ba'i grangs su yang mi 'gro ba zhig na/_'di ltar de dag la yongs su shes pa med de/_de'i phyir de dag la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 
[\[86b.3\]]dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa dag kyang med do/_/rab 'byor 'di ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la ni lam yang med la/_lam rnam par gzhag pa yang 
[\[86b.4\]]med/_lam sgom pa yang med na/_byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa lta yod par 'gyur re skan/_'phags pa'i gang zag rnams la ni/_lam yang yod la lam rnam par gzhag pa yang yod/_lam sgom pa yang yod pas na 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa yang yod do/_/
[\[86b.5\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci lam bsgoms pas 'bras bu 'byung zhing /_'bras bu thob par 'gyur lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/_lam bsgoms pas 'bras bu 
[\[86b.6\]]'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /_'bras bu thob par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor lam ma bsgoms par yang 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur te/_lam gyis kyang 'bras bu mi 'thob la/_lam ma yin pas kyang ma yin zhing lam la mi gnas par yang ma yin te/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub 
[\[86b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_sems can rnams la 'bras bu rnam par 'god par byed de/_chos kyi dbyings la tshar gcad pa'i tshul gyis 'bras bu rnam par 'god pa ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te 'dus byas 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]kyi khams sam/_'dus ma byas kyi khams la tshar gcad pas 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa ma mchis par gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni kun du sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i phyir/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yin no/_/'di ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags 
[\[87a.2\]]dang /_gnod sems bsrabs pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yin no/_/'di ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i cha dang 'thun pa'i kun du sbyor ba rnams spangs pa'i phyir/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/_/'di ni gong ma'i cha dang 'thun pa'i kun du sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa nyid 
[\[87a.3\]]yin no/_/kun 'byung ba'i chos gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad 'gog pa'i chos can no zhes bya ba ni rang byang chub yin no/_/bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa ni/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yin no zhes bka' stsal na/_bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas 
[\[87a.4\]]dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la tshar gcad pas/_'bras bu rnam par dgod pa med do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bdag gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor ci rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/_lan cig 
[\[87a.5\]]phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang byang chub bam/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dus byas yin nam/_'on te 'dus ma byas pa yin/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'dus ma bgyis lags so/_/bde 
[\[87a.6\]]bar gshegs pa 'dus ma bgyis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor ci 'dus ma byas kyi chos la tshar gcod pa yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor ci gang gi tshe rigs kyi bu 
[\[87a.7\]]'am/_rigs kyi bu mos 'dus byas sam/_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams 'di lta ste/_mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig tu rtogs pa de'i tshe 'dus byas sam/_'dus ma byas kyi chos gang la yang tshar gcod par byed dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni 'di lta ste/_nang stong pa nyid nas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi tshul gyis tshar gcad pa med pa'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/de sbyin pa'i 
[\[87b.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa'am/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/_bsam gtan dang po nas bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar ram/_
[\[87b.3\]]byams pa'am/_snying rje'am/_dga' ba'am/_btang snyoms sam/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar ram/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar ram/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi chos gang la yang /_
[\[87b.4\]]bdag nyid kyang mngon par zhen par mi byed la/_gzhan yang mngon par zhen par mi byed do/_/de mngon par zhen pa med pas gang la yang chags pa med do/_/'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni sbyin pa yang sbyin par byed la/_sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[87b.5\]]bzla ba'i don ma gtogs par sbyin pa'i 'bras bu la yang chags pa med cing /_sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi bar dag dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi bar dang /_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten 
[\[87b.6\]]las 'das pa dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gang la yang mi gnas so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yang chos thams cad la yang spyod la/_chos gang la yang mi gnas shing /_
[\[87b.7\]]chags pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid legs par rtogs pa'i phyir ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/_mtshan dang /_dpe byad bzang po dang /_yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/_
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]bdun cu rtsa gsum pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid legs par rtogs pa lags/_
[\[88a.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor dper na sprul pa 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /_gti mug la kun tu spyod pa med pa dang /_gzugs la kun du spyod pa med pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i bar la kun du spyod pa med pa dang /_de bzhin du nang dang phyi'i chos rnams la kun tu spyod pa med pa dang /_
[\[88a.3\]]bag la nyal dang /_kun nas ldang ba rnams la kun du spyod pa med pa dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la kun du spyod pa med pa dang /_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la kun du spyod pa 
[\[88a.4\]]med pa dang /_lam la kun du spyod pa med pa dang /_'bras bu rnams la kun du spyod pa med pa de ltar/_rab 'byor chos rnams kyi chos kyi tshul legs par rtogs pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sprul pa'i lam sgom pa ji lta bu lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 
[\[88a.5\]]lam bsgom pa gang la brten nas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur zhing /_rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur la/_'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na yang mi snang ba yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dngos po ma mchis pa'i 
[\[88a.6\]]chos thams cad rtogs pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la dngos po 'ga' zhig la brten nas kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'am/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po gang yang 
[\[88a.7\]]dmigs su yod snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la ni dngos po 'ga' zhig la brten nas kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'am/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'am/_'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na gda' 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]ba'i dngos po gang yang ma mchis lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ltar chos rnams kyi chos kyi tshul legs par rtogs pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci gzugs thams cad de bzhin gshegs 
[\[88b.2\]]pa'i sprul pa lta bu lags sam/_tshor ba thams cad dang /_'du shes thams cad dang /_'du byed thams cad dang /_rnam par shes pa thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa lta bu lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gzugs thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa 
[\[88b.3\]]lta bu yin no/_/tshor ba thams cad dang /_'du shes thams cad dang /_'du byed thams cad dang /_rnam par shes pa thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa lta bu yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags na/_sprul pa la 
[\[88b.4\]]ni gzugs ma mchis/_tshor ba ma mchis/_'du shes ma mchis/_'du byed rnams ma mchis/_rnam par shes pa ma mchis/_kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis/_rnam par byang ba ma mchis shing gang las sems can rnams yongs su thar bar bgyi ba'i 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor 
[\[88b.5\]]ba yang ma mchis lags na/_'o na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyes bu'i mthur 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad 
[\[88b.6\]]pa spyod pa na/_gang sems can dmyal ba'am/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/_mi'am lha dag las yongs su thar bar bya ba'i sems can 'ga' yang dmigs snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bka' stsal 
[\[88b.7\]]pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang khams gsum nas yongs su thar bar bya ba'i sems can 'ga' yang mi dmigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bur shes 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]shing mthong la rnam par rig pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bur 'tshal zhing mthong la rnam par rig lags na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[89a.2\]]pos gang gi don du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_byang chub kyi lam la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid pa dang /_sems 
[\[89a.3\]]can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor gal te sems can rnams rang rang gi chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bur shes su zin na ni/_byang chub 
[\[89a.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sems can rnams kyi don du bskal pa grangs med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa mi spyod pa zhig na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar sems can rnams rang rang gis chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bur mi shes te/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[89a.5\]]dpa' chen po bskal pa grangs med par pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos 
[\[89a.6\]]thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu lags na/_bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyang ci la gnas na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_gang las bskyod par 
[\[89a.7\]]bgyid lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor sems can rnams ni yod pa ma yin pa'i ming dang mtshan ma dag la gnas pas na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_de dag gi ming dang mtshan ma las bskyod par byed do/_/
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ming ni gang lags/_mtshan ma ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_ming zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma zhes bya ba ni glo bur du ming du btags 
[\[89b.2\]]pa ste/_'di lta ste ming zhes bya ba'am/_mtshan ma zhes bya ba'am/_gzugs zhes bya ba'am/_rnam par shes pa'i bar zhes bya ba'am/_bud med ces bya ba'am/_skyes pa zhes bya ba'am/_khye'u zhes bya ba'am/_bu mo zhes bya ba'am/_sems can dmyal ba pa zhes bya ba'am/_dud 
[\[89b.3\]]'gro'i skye gnas pa zhes bya ba'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba'am/_lha zhes bya ba'am/_mi zhes bya ba'am/_'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya ba'am/_'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya ba'am/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 
[\[89b.4\]]zhes bya ba'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya ba'am/_rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'am/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de dag ni bcos mar ming du btags pa'o/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni ming ste/_gzhol ba'i phyir 
[\[89b.5\]]ro/_/'dus byas thams cad ni ming tsam du zad na/_byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams de la chags pas/_de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_thabs la mkhas pas 'di skad du ming 'di ni yongs su rtog pas kun nas bskyed pa yin pas/_rang 
[\[89b.6\]]bzhin gyis stong zhing dngos po med pa la khyed cag yod pa ma yin par yongs su rtog pas chags par ma byed cig_/mkhas pa rnams ni chos stong pa dag la mngon par zhen par mi byed do/_/zhes kun nas 'bral bar byed de/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi 
[\[89b.7\]]pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/_thabs la mkhas pas de ltar sems can rnams la chos ston par byed do/_/rab 'byor mtshan ma gang zhe na/_rab 'byor gnyis po 'di dag ni gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams chags par 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma ste/_gnyis gang zhe na/_gzugs kyi mtshan ma 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]dang /_gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma'o/_/rab 'byor de la gzugs kyi mtshan ma gang zhe na/_rab 'byor gzugs gang ci yang rung ste/_rags pa'am/_phra ba'am/_bzang ba'am/_ngan pa dag ste/_gang skad cig pa'i chos de dag thams cad la yongs su rtog pas 
[\[90a.2\]]'dzin par byed pa de ni gzugs kyi mtshan ma zhes bya'o/_/gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma gang zhe na/_gzugs med pa'i chos gang ci yang rung ste/_mtshan mar bzung zhing yongs su btags pa las nyon mongs pa skye ba de ni gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma zhes bya'o/_/de la byis pa so so'i skye bo 
[\[90a.3\]]rnams chags pas na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pas mtshan ma de dag dang phral nas mtshan ma med pa'i dngos po la 'dzud cing 'god par byed de/_ci nas kyang 'di ni mtshan ma'o/_/'di ni mtshan ma med pa'o zhes 
[\[90a.4\]]gnyis su mi ltung ba de ltar 'dzud cing de ltar 'god par byed do/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pas de ltar sems can rnams mtshan ma dang phral nas mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings la 'dzud cing 
[\[90a.5\]]'god par byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos 'di dag thams cad de tsam du bas te/_'di ltar mtshan ma ma mchis pa tsam du bas pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub 
[\[90a.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ji ltar bdag kyang dge ba'i chos rnams kyi bye brag tu 'bogs par 'gyur la gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i chos rnams kyi bye brag tu 'bogs pa la 'god par bgyid pa dang /_sa nas sa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid 
[\[90a.7\]]cing sems can rnams kyang de dag nyid la sbyor bar bgyid lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor gal te mtshan ma dngos po zhig yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin par gyur 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]na ni/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_dge ba'i chos rnams kyis khyad par thob par mi 'gyur la/_gzhan dag kyang khyad par 'thob pa la 'god par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar mtshan ma ni dngos po ma yin zhing dngos 
[\[90b.2\]]po med de/_rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs 
[\[90b.3\]]par byed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med 
[\[90b.4\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dag yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/phyi nang stong 
[\[90b.5\]]pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_/mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rnam par thar pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs 
[\[90b.6\]]su rdzogs par byed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_des dge ba'i chos de dag yongs su rdzogs par byas nas 
[\[90b.7\]]mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i chos de dag la sbyor bar byed do/_/rab 'byor gal te chos rnams la tha na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas gzhag pa tsam gyi mtshan ma zhig yod par gyur na yang /_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]pa la spyod pa la mtshan ma med pa dang /_dran pa med pa dang /_yid la byed pa med pas chos rnams mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi 'gyur la/_sems can rnams kyang zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la de bzhin nyid du 'god par yang mi 'gyur ba zhig na/_rab 
[\[91a.2\]]'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad ni zag pa med cing /_mtshan nyid med pa dang /_dran pa med pa dang /_yid la byed pa med pa yin te/_rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis 
[\[91a.3\]]sems can thams cad kyi don byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis shing /_dran pa ma mchis la yid la bgyid pa ma mchis pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[91a.4\]]'o na 'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni thun mong gi chos so/_/'di dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni nyan thos kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni byang chub sems 
[\[91a.5\]]dpa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes bgyi bar ji ltar bgrang bar bgyi lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_mtshan ma med pa yang 
[\[91a.6\]]gzhan la/_nyan thos kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan zhig yin snyama'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan la/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan zhig 
[\[91a.7\]]yin snyama'am/_mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan la byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan la/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan zhig yin snyama'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'o na mtshan ma med pa nyid rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[91b.2\]]chos rnams yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor rnams grangs des kyang 'di ltar chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med par rig par bya ste/_rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa'i chos de dag thams cad la slob pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[91b.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i chos thams cad kyis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur te/_'di lta ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba 
[\[91b.4\]]bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi bar dag gis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di 
[\[91b.5\]]ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i chos rnams la bslab par bya ba ma gtogs par bslab par bya ba gzhan med pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po 'dir dge 
[\[91b.6\]]ba'i chos thams cad 'dus pa'i phyir te/_'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid yin no/_/mtshan ma dang bral ba ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa yin no/_/mngon par 'du byed pa med pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa yin te/_
[\[91b.7\]]rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po de dag la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni phung po lnga la slob pa yin/_skye mched bcu gnyis la slob pa yin/_khams [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la slob pa yin/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la slob pa yin/_'phags 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]pa'i bden pa bzhi la slob pa yin/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis la slob pa yin/_nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_phyi stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la slob pa yin no/_/
[\[92a.2\]]de bzhin du sbyar te pha rol tu phyin pa drug la slob pa yin/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la slob pa yin/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la slob pa yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la slob pa yin/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa 
[\[92a.3\]]bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la slob pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_ji ltar nye bar len pa'i 
[\[92a.4\]]phung po lnga po dag la slob pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_gzugs rab tu shes te/_gzugs ji ltar skye ba dang /_gzugs ji ltar 'gag pa dang /_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang 
[\[92a.5\]]yin pa yang rab tu shes so/_/gzugs ji ltar rab tu shes zhe na/_'di lta ste dper na/_dbu ba rdos pa la snying po med pa de bzhin du/_gzugs kyang shin tu gtse tshags dang /_shin tu gsong ldong dang /_shin tu snying po med par rab tu shes so/_/gzugs kyi skye ba ji ltar rab tu shes 
[\[92a.6\]]zhe na/_gzugs ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med la/_gzugs ni gang du yang 'gro ba med pas/_gang nas kyang mi 'ong /_gang du yang mi 'gro ba de ltar gzugs kyi skye ba rab tu shes so/_/rab 'byor gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/_gang du yang ma song ba de ltar gzugs kyi skye ba dang 
[\[92a.7\]]'jig pa rab tu shes so/_/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji ltar rab tu shes zhe na/_de bzhin nyid la skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_'ong ba med pa dang /_'gro ba med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa dang /_'phel ba med pa 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]dang /_'grib pa med pa de ltar de bzhin nyid rab tu shes so/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin nyid ni ma nor ba de bzhin nyid yin te/_de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/_/de la log pa nyid med pas de'i phyir yang de bzhin nyid ces bya ste/_de ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid rab tu shes so/_/tshor ba ji 
[\[92b.2\]]ltar rab tu shes/_tshor ba'i skye ba ji ltar rab tu shes/_tshor ba'i 'jig pa ji ltar rab tu shes/_tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji ltar rab tu shes zhe na/_'di lta ste dper na/_chu'i chu bur gyi skye ba dang /_'jig pa gsog tu 'dug pa de ltar tshor ba rab tu shes so/_/de gang nas 
[\[92b.3\]]kyang 'ong ba med cing /_gang du yang 'gro ba med pa de ltar tshor ba'i skye ba dang /_'jig pa rab tu shes so/_/tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji ltar rab tu shes zhe na/_de bzhin nyid ni ma nor ba de bzhin nyid de/_de ltar tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid rab tu shes so/_/'du shes ji ltar 
[\[92b.4\]]rab tu shes zhe na/_'di lta ste dper na/_smig rgyu'i tshogs la chu shin tu dmigs su med pa de ltar 'du shes rab tu shes so/_/de gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du yang 'gro ba med pa de ltar 'du shes kyi skye ba dang /_'jig pa rab tu shes so/_/'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid 
[\[92b.5\]]ji ltar rab tu shes zhe na/_tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de ltar 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid rab tu shes so/_/'du byed rnams ji ltar rab tu shes zhe na/_'di lta ste dper na/_chu shing shun pa so sor phye na snying po mi dmigs pa de ltar 'du byed rnams rab tu shes so/_/
[\[92b.6\]]'du byed rnams kyi skye ba dang /_'jig pa ji ltar rab tu shes zhe na/_de gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing /_gang du yang 'gro ba med pa de ltar 'du byed rnams kyi skye ba dang /_'jig pa rab tu shes so/_/'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji ltar rab tu shes zhe na/_tshor ba'i de 
[\[92b.7\]]bzhin nyid ji lta ba de ltar 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid rab tu shes so/_/rnam par shes pa ji ltar rab tu shes zhe na/_'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ji lta ba de ltar rnam par shes pa rab tu shes so/_/de gang nas kyang 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]'ong ba med cing /_gang du yang 'gro ba med pa de ltar rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang 'jig pa rab tu shes so/_/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ji ltar rab tu shes zhe na/_tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de ltar rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid rab tu shes te/_de ltar na rnam 
[\[93a.2\]]par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid rab tu shes pa yin no/_/khams rnams ji ltar shes zhe na/_mig gi khams ni mig gi khams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa de ltar mig gi khams rab tu shes so/_/gzugs kyi khams ji ltar shes zhe na/_gzugs kyi khams ni gzugs kyi khams kyi ngo 
[\[93a.3\]]bo nyid kyis stong pa de ltar gzugs kyi khams rab tu shes so/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams ji ltar rab tu shes zhe na/_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa de ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams rab tu shes 
[\[93a.4\]]so/_/rna ba'i khams dang /_sgra'i khams dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_sna'i khams dang /_dri'i khams dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lce'i khams dang /_ro'i khams dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lus kyi khams dang /_
[\[93a.5\]]reg bya'i khams dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_yid kyi khams ji ltar rab tu shes zhe na/_yid kyi khams ni yid kyi khams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa de ltar yid kyi khams rab tu shes so/_/chos kyi khams ji ltar rab tu shes zhe na/_chos kyi khams ni chos kyi 
[\[93a.6\]]khams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa de ltar chos kyi khams rab tu shes so/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ji ltar rab tu shes zhe na/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa de ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams rab tu shes 
[\[93a.7\]]te/_de ltar na khams [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad rab tu shes pa yin no/_/skye mched rnams ji ltar rab tu shes zhe na/_nang gi skye mched rnams ni nang gi skye mched rnams kyis stong la/_phyi'i skye mched rnams ni phyi'i skye mched rnams kyis stong pa de ltar skye mched rnams rab tu shes so/_/'phags 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]pa'i bden pa rnams ji ltar rab tu shes zhe na/_sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa rab tu shes pa dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam 'phags pa'i bden pa rab tu shes pa'o/_/sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden par ji ltar rab tu shes zhe na/_sdug bsngal tu rab 
[\[93b.2\]]tu shes pa dang /_bden par rab tu shes pa dang /_'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa'o zhes rab tu shes la/_gnyis las rnam par grol zhing /_gnyis ma yin pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa yin par rab tu shes pa ste/_kun 'byung ba yang de bzhin/_'gog pa yang de bzhin/_
[\[93b.3\]]sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam yang de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden par rab tu shes so/_/sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin nyid ji ltar rab tu shes zhe na/_sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid yin pa de ltar sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin nyid rab tu shes te/_de bzhin du kun 
[\[93b.4\]]'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam gyi de bzhin nyid kyang rab tu shes so/_/rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ji ltar rab tu shes zhe na/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni skye ba med par rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin du rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'gag pa med pa dang /_
[\[93b.5\]]tshad pa med pa dang /_rtag pa med pa dang /_don gcig pa ma yin pa dang /_don tha dad pa ma yin pa dang /_'ong ba med pa dang /_'gro ba med pa dang /_spros pa med pa dang /_zhi bar rab tu shes pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 
[\[93b.6\]]gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_phan tshun tha dad pa'i chos de dag de ltar rab tu 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na des chos kyi dbyings rnam par dkrugs 
[\[93b.7\]]par mi 'gyur lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gal te chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan 'ga' zhig dmigs su yod na ni/_rnam par dkrugs par yang 'gyur na/_rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]gang mi dmigs pas/_chos kyi dbyings rnam par dkrugs par 'gyur ba'i chos gzhan ni gang yang dmigs su med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/_de bzhin 
[\[94a.2\]]gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyis kyang gang yang ma dmigs pa'i phyir te/_ma dmigs pas na chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan 'ga' zhig dmigs su yod do zhes 'dogs par mi byed de/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha 
[\[94a.3\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_de ltar chos kyi dbyings la bslab par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings la slob pas gang la bslabs pa 
[\[94a.4\]]lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings la bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_chos thams cad la bslabs pa yin no/_/de ci'i 
[\[94a.5\]]phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_de 
[\[94a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung /_chos rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings 'di ni dbyer med pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa ste/_rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings de yang 'di lta ste/_dge ba dang /_mi dge ba dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi bar gyi chos thams cad 
[\[94a.7\]]yin te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_chos kyi dbyings la bslabs na/_chos thams cad la bslabs pa yin no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags na/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/_de bzhin 
[\[94b.2\]]du ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[94b.3\]]phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/_de bzhin du ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsam gtan dang po la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_bsam gtan gsum pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pa la bslab par bgyi/_de bzhin du 
[\[94b.4\]]ji ltar byams pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms la bslab par bgyi/_de bzhin du ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar la bslab par bgyi/_de bzhin du ji 
[\[94b.5\]]ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/_de bzhin du ji ltar yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan 
[\[94b.6\]]lag brgyad pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar rnam par thar pa brgyad la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/
[\[94b.7\]]de bzhin du ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar mngon par 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]shes pa drug dang /_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bsgrub pa'i slad du bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu bsgrub pa'i slad du bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag tu skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du 
[\[95a.2\]]bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba'i slad du bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag tu skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang 
[\[95a.3\]]du skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar 'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs 
[\[95a.4\]]ris kyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs 'khor dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_'bras bu che dang /_'du shes ma mchis pa'i 
[\[95a.5\]]sems can rnams kyi nang du skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar der mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du yang bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar gnas gtsang ma/_mi che dang /_mi gdung dang /_shin tu mthong dang /_gya nom snang dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang 
[\[95a.6\]]du skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar dag la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar sems dang po bskyed pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar gnyis pa dang /_gsum 
[\[95a.7\]]pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_lnga pa dang /_drug pa dang /_bdun pa dang /_brgyad pa dang /_dgu pa dang /_sems bskyed pa bcu pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar nyan thos kyi sa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la bslab par bgyi/_ji 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar ting nge 
[\[95b.2\]]'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar gang la bslab pas chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du 'tshal bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub kyi lam la bslab par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings la ni rnam par rtog pa de dag ma mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[95b.3\]]de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyin ci log la spyod pa'am/_ma spros pa spros par bgyid par mi 'gyur lags grang /_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings la ni rnam par rtog pa de dag ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/_gzugs kyang 
[\[95b.4\]]chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags la/_gzugs las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam 
[\[95b.5\]]par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings lags la/_chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs lags so/_/rnam par shes pa'i bar nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings lags la/_chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa lags so/_/
[\[95b.6\]]ji ltar nang gi chos bsgres pa de bzhin du chos thams cad la yang sbyar bar bgyi'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor de de bzhin te/_de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_rab 
[\[95b.7\]]'byor gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_gal te chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos 'ga' zhig mthong na ni/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[96a.2\]]byang chub la gnas par yang mi 'gyur ba zhig na/_'di ltar chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings yin te/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/
[\[96a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_chos de dag thams cad chos kyi dbyings su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes nas kyang /_ming med pa'i chos rnams la 'di ni gzugs so/_/'di ni tshor ba'o/_/'di ni 
[\[96a.4\]]'du shes so/_/'di ni 'du byed rnams so/_/'di ni rnam par shes pa'o/_/zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_'di ni byang chub bo zhes bya ba'i bar du ming dang brdas ston par byed do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma mkhan nam/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma 
[\[96a.5\]]mkhas pa zhig gis/_rdzas kyi rnam pa gang yang rung ba zhig la byin gyis brlabs nas/_gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs 'di lta ste/_bud med kyi gzugs sam/_skyes pa'i gzugs sam/_glang po che'i gzugs sam/_rta'i gzugs sam/_glang gi gzugs sam/_
[\[96a.6\]]skyed mos tshal lam/_kun dga' ra ba nyams dga' ba dag gam/_chu klung nyams dga' ba dag gam/_rdzing bu nyams dga' ba dag nye bar bstan te/_der gding ba dang /_rol dbyam sna tshogs bting ba dag kyang nye bar bstan nas/_me tog dang /_me tog phreng gi 
[\[96a.7\]]yon tan dang /_bza' ba dang bca' ba dag kyang kun tu bstan/_glu dbyangs dang rol mo mang pos skye bo dga' bar byed pa dag kyang kun du bstan nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa'am/_tshul khrims srung ba'am/_bzod pa sgrub pa'am/_brtson 'grus rtsom pa'am/_ting nge 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]'dzin gyis rnam par rtse ba'am/_shes rab sgom par byed pa'am/_des der rnam pa de lta bu dag gis rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag gam/_bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag gam/_khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag kyang bstan tam/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi 
[\[96b.2\]]lha dag bstan tam/_ri rab bstan tam/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dag bstan tam/_'thab bral 'am/_dga' ldan nam/_'phrul dga' 'am/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dag bstan tam/_gzugs 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i bar gyi lha dag bstan tam/_rgyun du zhugs pa 
[\[96b.3\]]'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'am/_dgra bcom pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas gang yin pa de dag bstan tam/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_tshul 
[\[96b.4\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_sa dang po la spyod pa dang /_sa bcu pa'i bar la spyod pa dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[96b.5\]]dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par sgrub cing /_de dag gis rnam par rtse ba dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 
[\[96b.6\]]'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa dag gis rnam par rtse ba dang /_yan lag dang nying lag dag yongs su gtong ba dang /_dka' ba spyod pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgrub par byed pa dang /_mi 'jigs 
[\[96b.7\]]pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po mngon par sgrub pa dag bstan tam/_sangs rgyas kyi sku yan lag dang /_nying lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dag bstan na/_de la sems can byis pa'i rang 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]bzhin can dag 'di snyam du/_kye ma mi 'dis ji tsam du 'di lta ste/_gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs dag dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi sku'i bar dag bstan pas skye bo 'di dag yang dag par 'dzin cing /_ci nas kyang mdzes dgu sha stag byed pa ni 
[\[97a.2\]]shin tu legs par bslabs pa yin no snyam du shes so/_/de na mi gang dag mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can/_gsal zhing yid gzhungs la gzugs de dag la dpyod pa dang ldan pa de dag ni 'di snyam du 'di la chos gang yang dmigs su med na/_mi 'dis yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams kyis skye 
[\[97a.3\]]bo'i tshogs 'di dag dga' bar byed pa dang /_'di ltar 'di ni de dag la skye bo 'di dag ni rdzas med pa la rdzas su 'du shes pa yin no snyam pa'i shes pa 'byung ba ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos yin no snyam mo/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi 
[\[97a.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yang chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan gang yang mi mthong la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_sems can dang sems can du gdags pa yang mi dmigs mod kyi/_de thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pas bdag kyang sbyin pa sbyin par byed la/_
[\[97a.5\]]gzhan dag kyang sbyin pa la sbyor bar byed cing /_sbyin pa'i bsngags pa yang brjod la/_gzhan gang dag sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa yang rjod cing rjes su dga' bar byed do/_/bdag kyang tshul khrims srung bar byed/_bdag kyang bzod pa sgom par byed/_bdag kyang 
[\[97a.6\]]brtson 'grus rtsom par byed/_bdag kyang bsam gtan la mnyam par 'jog par byed/_bdag kyang shes rab sgom par byed la/_gzhan dag kyang shes rab la sbyor bar byed cing /_shes rab kyi bsngags pa yang brjod la/_gzhan gang dag shes rab sgom par byed pa de dag gi 
[\[97a.7\]]bsngags pa yang rjod cing rjes su dga' bar byed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin la/_gzhan dag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing /_rjes su dga' bar byed do/_/bdag kyang bslab pa'i gzhi 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]lnga yang dag par 'dzin par byed cing rjes su dga' ba'i bar du byed do/_/bdag kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong la gnas par byed cing rjes su dga' ba'i bar du byed do/_/bdag kyang bsam gtan dang po dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' 
[\[97b.2\]]ba dang /_btang snyoms dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar dag bsgrubs te gnas shing rjes su dga' ba'i bar du byed do/_/bdag kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar 
[\[97b.3\]]dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[97b.4\]]ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu sgom zhing rjes su dga' ba'i bar du byed do/_/rab 'byor gal te chos kyi dbyings sngon ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin ma yin la/_bar du yang de bzhin ma yin du min na ni/
[\[97b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_thabs la mkhas pas chos kyi dbyings brjod pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed par yang mi 'gyur ba zhig na/_rab 'byor 
[\[97b.6\]]'di ltar chos kyi dbyings ni sngon ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin la/_bar du yang de bzhin te/_rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pas/_sems can rnams kyi don du byang chub sems 
[\[97b.7\]]dpa'i spyad pa spyod par byed do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/_bdun cu rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te sems can shin tu dmigs su ma mchis la/_sems can du gdags pa yang mchis na/_gang gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par bgyid lags/_de skad 
[\[98a.2\]]ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni yang dag pa'i mtha' tshad mar byas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/rab 'byor gal te yang dag pa'i 
[\[98a.3\]]mtha' yang gzhan la/_sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan pa zhig yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang mi 'gyur ba zhig na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin la/_sems can gyi 
[\[98a.4\]]mtha' yang gzhan ma yin te/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_yang dag 
[\[98a.5\]]pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khrugs pa med pas sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god par byed do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid 
[\[98a.6\]]kyang sems can gyi mtha' lags na/_'o na ji ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang dag pa'i mtha' gnas par 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das gal te yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang dag pa'i mtha' gnas par 'gyur na ni/_de lta na ngo bo nyid la ngo bo nyid gnas par 'gyur te/_
[\[98a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid la ngo bo nyid gnas pa ni ma mchis lags na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_ji ltar sems can gyi mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god par bgyid lags/_de skad 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha' yang yang dag pa'i mtha' la mi gnas la/_ngo bo nyid kyang ngo bo nyid la mi gnas mod kyi/_rab 'byor 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[98b.2\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pas sems can gyi mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god cing /_yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khrugs par yang mi byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin la/_sems can gyi 
[\[98b.3\]]mtha' yang ma yin te/_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_sems can gyi mtha' 'di ni gnyis su med de/_/gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de/_gcad du med do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[98b.4\]]ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_thabs la mkhas pa gang dang ldan pas sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khrugs par yang mi bgyid pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[98b.5\]]sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa de gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa sems dang po 
[\[98b.6\]]bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_sems can rnams sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'god par byed do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod nas kyang sbyin pa de'i sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus ston par byed de ji ltar sbyin pa 'di sngon gyi mtha' yang stong la/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang stong zhing dbus 
[\[98b.7\]]kyang stong pa de bzhin du sbyin pa 'di yang stong ngo /_/sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang stong ngo /_/sbyin bdag kyang stong ngo /_/len pa po yang stong ste/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na don de dag thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la yod pa ma yin gyis sbyin pa yang gzhan la sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan no snyam du ma sems shig_/
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]sbyin bdag kyang gzhan la len pa po yang gzhan no snyam du ma sems shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe sbyin pa yang gzhan la sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan no snyam du mi sems la/_sbyin bdag kyang gzhan la len pa po yang gzhan no snyam du mi sems pa de'i tshe khyod kyi sbyin pa 'di ni gnyi 
[\[99a.2\]]ga la bdud rtsir 'gyur te bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu dang /_bdud rtsi'i mtha' sbyin par byed kyis khyod sbyin pa 'dis gzugs yongs su ma 'dzin cig_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yongs su ma 'dzin cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar khyod kyi sbyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i ngo 
[\[99a.3\]]bo nyid kyis stong /_'bras bu de yang 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong /_sbyin bdag kyang sbyin bdag gi ngo bo nyid kyis stong /_len pa po yang len pa po'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pas na stong pa nyid la ni sbyin pa yang dmigs su med la sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dang /_sbyin bdag dang /_len pa po yang dmigs su 
[\[99a.4\]]med pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis shin tu stong pa'i phyir ro zhes ston to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams tshul khrims la rab tu 'god de rigs kyi bu tshur 
[\[99a.5\]]shog_/khyod kyis srog gcod pa spongs la srog gcod pa las phyir ldog par gyis shig_/de bzhin du sbyar te khyod kyis log par lta ba'i bar du spongs la log par lta ba las phyir ldog par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu chos 'di dag thams cad la ji ltar khyod kyis yongs su brtags pa de lta bu'i rang bzhin gang 
[\[99a.6\]]yang med kyis rigs kyi bu chos 'di dag la gang srog gcad par bya ba'i srog chags dang gang gis srog gcad par bya ba'i chos de dag gang yin zhes nye bar rtogs shig_/log par lta ba'i bar la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o zhes ston te rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha 
[\[99a.7\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing sbyin pa dang tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu yang ston la sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dang tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu de yang ngo bo nyid kyis stong par bstan pas/_rigs kyi bu des sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dang tshul khrims 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]kyi 'bras bu de dag 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong par rig nas de la mngon par zhen par mi byed do/_/mngon par zhen pa med pas rnam par g.yeng ba med pa bskyed nas shes rab skyed par byed do/_/shes rab des bag la nyal dang kun nas ldang ba thams cad bcad nas phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 
[\[99b.2\]]'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das te de yang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad yin gyi don dam par ni ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la ni gang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'am gang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos gang yang dmigs su med pa'i phyir te gzhan du na de'i yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[99b.3\]]'das pa de ni 'di lta ste mtha' las 'das pa'i stong pa nyid yin no//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa/_rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa sems can gzhan rnams dang /_
