[\[99b.4\]]gang zag gzhan dag phan tshun 'khrugs shing gnod sems su gyur pa dag mthong na/_'di skad 'doms shing rjes su ston par byed de/_rigs kyi bu tshur shog_/gang la khyod gnod sems su byed pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa yin gyis/_khyod cag bzod pa 
[\[99b.5\]]sgrubs shig_/bzod pa sgoms shig_/dang du len pa'i rang bzhin can du gyis shig_/kye gang la gnod sems su bya ba dang /_gang gnod sems su byed pa dang /_gang gis gnod sems su byed pa'i chos de dag thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid du nye bar rtogs shig_/rang bzhin gyis 
[\[99b.6\]]stong pa gang yin pa de ni nam yang mi stong bar mi 'gyur te/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ma mdzad/_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_nyan thos rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_dri za rnams dang /_
[\[99b.7\]]mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bar gyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs pa rnams dang /_dge rgyas kyi bar dag dang /_gnas gtsang ma pa rnams dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]bar dag gis kyang ma byas te/_rigs kyi bu gang la gnod sems su bya ba dang /_gang gnod sems su byed pa dang /_gang gis gnod sems su byed pa'i chos de dag thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid yin par nye bar rtogs shig dang /_stong 
[\[100a.2\]]pa nyid ni gang la yang gnod sems su byed par mi 'gyur ro zhes/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_thabs la mkhas pas de ltar sems can rnams rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la sbyor bar byed cing /_rgyu dang 
[\[100a.3\]]'bras bu la yang sbyor bar byed do/_/rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la sbyor ba na/_rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par dga' bar byed/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug_/'dzud par byed/_'god par byed de/_de yang 'jig rten gyi 
[\[100a.4\]]tha snyad yin gyi/_don dam par ni ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rang bzhin gyi stong pa nyid la ni gang thob par bya ba dang /_gang thob par byed pa dang /_gang gis thob par byed pa'i chos de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor sems can 
[\[100a.5\]]rnams kyi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag pa'i mtha' gang la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'di ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid yin te/_de la ni sems can yang mi dmigs/_sems can du gdags pa yang mi dmigs so/_/de ci'i 
[\[100a.6\]]phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad ni sems can gyis dben pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_sems can brtson 'grus zhan pa dag mthong na/_thabs la mkhas pas lus dang /_
[\[100a.7\]]sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug ste/_rigs kyi bu rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ni gang la zhum par 'gyur ba dang /_gang zhum par 'gyur ba dang /_gang gis zhum par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang yod pa ma yin te/_chos de dag thams cad ni rang 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]bzhin gyis stong pa nyid las rnam par mi 'da' ba yin gyis/_khyod lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus bskyed cing le lo spangs la/_'di lta ste/_dge ba'i chos sbyin pa'am/_tshul khrims sam/_bzod pa'am/_brtson 'grus sam/_ting nge 'dzin tam/_shes 
[\[100b.2\]]rab bam/_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dag gam/_stong pa nyid dam/_mtshan ma med pa'am/_
[\[100b.3\]]smon pa med pa'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi bar dag la brtson par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu stong pa nyid kyis chos de dag sgrib pa med par ltos shig dang /_sgrib pa med pa'i chos rnams la zhum par 'gyur ba gang yang med do zhes/_rab 'byor byang chub 
[\[100b.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_thabs la mkhas pas de ltar sems can rnams rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud la 'god par byed de/_ci nas kyang gnyis su med pa de ltar 'god par 
[\[100b.5\]]byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid ni gnyis su med cing /_gnyis su dbyer med de/_gnyis su med pa la ni zhum par 'gyur ba gang yang med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha 
[\[100b.6\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_sems can rnams rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi brtson 'grus la 'doms shing rjes su ston par byed de/_rigs kyi bu tshur shog_/sbyin pa'am/_tshul khrims sam/_bzod pa'am/_brtson 'grus sam/_ting nge 'dzin tam/_shes 
[\[100b.7\]]rab bam/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar ram/_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'am/_mi 'jigs 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]pa bzhi'am/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'am/_snying rje chen po'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag la brtson par gyis la/_chos de dag la gnyis par yang yid la ma byed cig_/mi gnyis par yang yid la ma byed 
[\[101a.2\]]cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos de dag thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa la ni gnyis dang gnyis ma yin par yid la bya ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[101a.3\]]pa la spyod pa/_thabs la mkhas pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/_yongs su smin par byas nas kyang rim gyis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'god par byed/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 
[\[101a.4\]]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god par byed/_dgra bcom pa nyid la 'god par byed/_rang byang chub la 'god par byed cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang 'god par byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes 
[\[101a.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi don byed cing /_ting nge 'dzin sgom pa la 'jug par byed de/_rigs kyi bu tshur shog_/khyod rnam par g.yeng ba'i 'du shes su yang ma byed/_ting nge 'dzin gyi 'du shes su yang ma byed par 
[\[101a.6\]]ting nge 'dzin sgoms shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos de dag thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la ni gang rnam par g.yeng ba'am/_rtse gcig tu bya ba'i chos gang yang dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/_khyod ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas shing 
[\[101a.7\]]rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la spyod na lus sam/_ngag gam/_yid kyis dge ba'i chos gang ci byed kyang rung ste/_sbyin pa gtong ngam/_tshul khrims srung ngam/_bzod pa sgrub bam/_brtson 'grus rtsom 'am/_ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug gam/_shes rab sgom 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]'am/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod dam/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dag sgom 'am/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams sam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/_snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'am/_
[\[101b.2\]]mi 'jigs pa bzhi'am/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'am/_byams pa chen po'am/_snying rje chen po'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dam/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis sam/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'am/_nyan thos kyi 
[\[101b.3\]]lam 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/_byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang byang 
[\[101b.4\]]chub 'am/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgom 'am/_sems can yongs su smin par byed dam/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed kyang rung ste/_khyod kyi dge ba'i chos de dag tshegs chung ngus 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes/_rab 'byor de ltar byang 
[\[101b.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi don byed de/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_nam du yang bya ba ma yin pa mi byed par dge ba ci yin zhes tshol zhing sems 
[\[101b.6\]]can rnams kyi don byed de/_rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[101b.7\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du tshe rabs rjes su zin kyang /_nam du yang chud za bar mi 'gyur zhing rtag tu gzungs 'thob pa dang /_lus kyi dbang po'am/_ngag gi dbang po'am/_yid kyi dbang po yang rung ste/_dbang po rtul bar mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des rtag tu rgyun mi chad par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir te/_des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu bsgoms pa des lam thams cad kyang shin tu bsgoms pa yin te/_nyan thos kyi 
[\[102a.2\]]lam 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/_byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi lam dag kyang shin tu bsgoms pa yin no/_/mngon par shes pa gang dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la chud mi za ba'i tshul gyis phan par 'gyur ba de dag kyang shin 
[\[102a.3\]]tu bsgoms pa yin te/_de rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa de dag la gnas nas sems can rnams kyi don byed cing /_'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na 'khor yang yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[102a.4\]]po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la gnas te/_sems can rnams kyi don byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la 
[\[102a.5\]]gnas nas/_thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi don byed de/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pas sems can rnams la 'di skad du 'doms shing rjes su ston par byed de/_rigs kyi bu tshur shog_/khyod lus sam/_ngag gam/_yid kyis 
[\[102a.6\]]las gang byed kyang rung ste/_de dag thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid du so sor rtogs shig dang /_khyod kyi las de dag bdud rtsir 'gyur zhing /_bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu dang /_bdud rtsi'i mthar 'gyur te/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ni gang mngon par zhen pa'am/_
[\[102a.7\]]yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang dmigs su med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid ni yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur la/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang med pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]zhe na/_'di ltar rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid ni dngos po yang ma yin/_dngos po med pa yang ma yin pa'i phyir te/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos rnams las ci zhig yongs su nyams par 'gyur zhes/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[102b.2\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_de ltar sems can rnams la 'doms shing rjes su ston par byed de/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la 'dzud par byed do/_/de de ltar 'doms shing de ltar rjes su ston pa dang /_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la 'dzud 
[\[102b.3\]]par byed pa'i tshe/_nam du yang bya ba ma yin pa mi byed de/_de bdag kyang rtag par rgyun du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin par byed la/_gzhan dag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/_/de bzhin du bdag kyang bslab pa'i 
[\[102b.4\]]gzhi lnga dang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong gi bar dag la gnas par byed la/_gzhan dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/_/bdag kyang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug la/_gzhan dag kyang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa yang dag 
[\[102b.5\]]par 'dzin du 'jug go/_/bdag kyang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar dag la snyoms par 'jug la/_gzhan dag kyang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar dag la snyoms par 'jug pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/_/bdag kyang rtag par rgyun du byams pa la gnas pa yin zhing gzhan 
[\[102b.6\]]dag kyang rtag par rgyun du byams pa bsgom pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/_/bdag kyang btang snyoms kyi bar dag sgom la/_gzhan dag kyang btang snyoms kyi bar dag la bsgom pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/_/bdag kyang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms 
[\[102b.7\]]par 'jug pa'i bar dag la snyoms par 'jug la/_gzhan dag kyang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/_/bdag kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom la/_gzhan dag kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]bsgom pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug ste/_'dul zhing 'dzud la 'god par byed do/_/bdag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dag la sgom la/_gzhan dag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dag bsgom pa yang 
[\[103a.2\]]dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/_/bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la slob la/_gzhan dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bslab pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug ste/_'dul zhing 'dzud la 'god par byed do/_/bdag kyang dpe byad bzang po 
[\[103a.3\]]brgyad cu'i bar dag sgrub pa la slob la/_gzhan dag kyang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu bsgrub pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug ste/_'dul zhing 'dzud la 'god par byed do/_/bdag kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i shes pa skyed cing /_de la gnas par yang 
[\[103a.4\]]mi byed la/_gzhan dag kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i shes pa la 'god par byed do/_/bdag kyang dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar dag gi shes pa skyed cing /_de la gnas par yang mi byed la/_gzhan dag kyang dgra bcom pa nyid kyi shes pa la 'god par byed do/_/
[\[103a.5\]]bdag kyang rang byang chub kyi shes pa skyed cing de la gnas par yang mi byed la/_gzhan dag kyang rang byang chub kyi shes pa la 'dul zhing 'dzud de 'god par byed do/_/bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam skyed par byed la/_gzhan dag kyang 
[\[103a.6\]]lam de la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa dang /_'dul zhing 'dzud de 'god par byed do/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_thabs la mkhas pas nam du yang bya ba ma yin pa mi byed do/_/de nas bcom 
[\[103a.7\]]ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la ni sems can yang mi dmigs/_chos dang lam yang mi dmigs na/_bcom ldan 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor de de bzhin te/_de de bzhin 
[\[103b.2\]]no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid yin te/_rang bzhin gyi stong pa nyid la ni sems can yang dmigs su med/_chos dang lam yang dmigs su med do/_/rab 'byor gal te chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin 
[\[103b.3\]]na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la gnas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi chos ston par yang mi 'gyur ba zhig na rab 'byor 
[\[103b.4\]]gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong la/_rab 'byor tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin gyis stong /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad 
[\[103b.5\]]cu yang rang bzhin gyis stong /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa'i bar dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_rab 'byor gang gi tshe chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa de'i phyir byang chub 
[\[103b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_phung po lnga po dag rang bzhin gyis stong zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/skye mched bcu gnyis dang /_khams [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad rang bzhin gyis stong zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad 
[\[103b.7\]]med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dag rang bzhin gyis stong zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_rnam 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs 
[\[104a.2\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar dag rang bzhin gyis stong zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_
[\[104a.3\]]rang byang chub dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa'i bar dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/rab 'byor gal te nang stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni byang chub 
[\[104a.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur la/_de bzhin du phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni byang 
[\[104a.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong zhes bya bar chos ston par yang mi 'gyur te/_de'i phyir rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bshig par 'gyur ba zhig na/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid ni 'jig par yang mi 'gyur zhing /_ther zug tu gnas 
[\[104a.6\]]pa yang ma yin te/_phyis med par 'gyur ba yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni yul na mi gnas/_phyogs na mi gnas shing /_de ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba ma yin/_gang du yang 'gro ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de ni chos gnas pa nyid yin te/_de la ni 
[\[104a.7\]]'phel ba'am/_'grib pa'am/_sogs pa'am/_'jig pa'am/_skye ba'am/_'gag pa'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang ba'i chos gang yang dmigs su med do/_/de ni chos rnams kyi rang bzhin yin te/_de la gnas nas byang chub 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas kyang /_chos gang yang 'jig par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/chos thams cad ni gnas pa yang med cing 'jig pa med pa ste/_de ni chos rnams kyi chos gnas 
[\[104b.2\]]pa nyid yin no/_/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par mthong bas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog go/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar 
[\[104b.3\]]des chos gang la yang sgrib pa yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_des chos thams cad sgrib pa med par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/de ni 'di ltar rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid de la bdag mi dmigs shing /_bdag tu gdags pa yang mi dmigs la/_
[\[104b.4\]]sems can dang /_srog dang /_skye ba po dang /_shed las skyes dang /_shed bu dang /_gso pa po dang /_gang zag dang /_byed pa po dang /_byed du 'jug pa po dang /_slong ba po dang /_kun nas slong ba po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba 
[\[104b.5\]]po yang mi dmigs/_mthong ba por gdags pa yang mi dmigs/_gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang mi dmigs/_rnam par shes par gdags pa yang mi dmigs/_de bzhin du nang dang phyi'i 
[\[104b.6\]]chos rnams kyang mi dmigs/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar dag kyang mi dmigs/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cur gdags pa yang mi dmigs na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la the tsom za bar 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor 'di 
[\[104b.7\]]lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas sprul pa'i dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma 'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma zhig la bskal pa khrag khrig snyed du rgyun mi chad par chos bstan par gyur na/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_sprul pa de dag la rgyun du 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob pa'am/_rang byang chub bam/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob pa'i skal pa yod snyam 
[\[105a.2\]]'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar de dag la dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_chos thams cad dngos po med pa la 
[\[105a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zhig rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang byang chub bam/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzud 
[\[105a.4\]]par bya ba'i sems can gang zhig yod de/_gzhan du na phyin ci log gis kun nas dkris pa'i skye dgu rnams phyin ci log med pa la 'dzud cing 'god par byed do/_/rtog pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ma yin pa'i phyir phyin ci log gang yin pa de nyid phyin ci log ma yin pa ste/_rtog 
[\[105a.5\]]pa med cing phyin ci log med pa'o/_/gang la phyin ci log med pa de la ni bdag med do/_/sems can med do/_/shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po'i bar dag med do/_/de la ni gzugs med do/_/tshor ba med do/_/'du shes med do/_/'du byed rnams med do/_/
[\[105a.6\]]rnam par shes pa med do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_byang chub kyi bar dag med do/_/gang la bdag med pa dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po'i bar dag med pa dang /_gzugs med pa dang /_tshor ba med pa dang /_'du shes med pa dang /_'du byed rnams med pa dang /_
[\[105a.7\]]rnam par shes pa med pa dang /_byang chub kyi bar dag med pa de ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid yin te/_de la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can phyin ci log tu gyur pa rnams/_sems can gyi 'du shes 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]las grol bar byed do/_/gzugs kyi 'du shes dang /_gzugs med pa'i 'du shes kyi bar dag las grol bar byed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa'i chos rnams las rnam par grol bar byed do/_/zag pa med pa'i chos gang 
[\[105b.2\]]yin pa de dag kyang 'di lta ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_
[\[105b.3\]]gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag ste/_de yang de la don dam pa ji lta ba bzhin du ni ma yin no/_/de ltar 'dus ma byas pa dang /_ma skyes pa dang /_dngos po med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa de ni 
[\[105b.4\]]rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid yin no/_/de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub yin te de la ni bdag med do/_/sems can med do/_/shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po'i bar dag med do/_/gzugs med do/_/tshor ba med do/_/'du shes med do/_/'du byed 
[\[105b.5\]]rnams med do/_/rnam par shes pa med do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar dag med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid yongs su shes par bya ba'i don ma gtogs par lam gyi don du bla na med 
[\[105b.6\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par mi byed do/_/gang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid de yang sngon gyi mtha' yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid yin la/_de ni phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus su yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid yin te/_de ni nam yang rang bzhin gyis mi stong 
[\[105b.7\]]pa nyid ma yin no/_/de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas sems can rnams sems can du 'du shes pa dang /_'du shes thams cad las dgrol ba'i phyir lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod par byed do/_/
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyi lam dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi lam dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang /_lam thams cad la yang spyod pa yin no/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[106a.2\]]chen po des lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas nas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas shing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas te/_tshe'i 'du byed byin gyis brlabs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[106a.3\]]'tshang rgya'o/_/de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang /_sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi gcod de/_'di lta ste rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi tshul yin no/_/
[\[106a.4\]]rab 'byor sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag 'das pa'i dus na byung bar gyur pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi tshul yang 'di lta ste/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid 'di yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung 
[\[106a.5\]]bar 'gyur ba rnams dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi tshul yang 'di lta ste/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid 'di 
[\[106a.6\]]yin te/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las 'byung ba ma gtogs par gzhan las 'jig rten du 'byung bar mi 'gyur bas na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar spyad na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las 
[\[106a.7\]]yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba de ltar rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la yang spyod la/_gzugs kyang gzhan 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]zhig rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/_tshor ba yang gzhan/_'du shes kyang gzhan/_'du byed rnams kyang gzhan/_rnam par shes pa yang gzhan zhing rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags la/_de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang /_byang 
[\[106b.2\]]chub kyi bar dag kyang gzhan zhing /_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags te/_gzugs nyid kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid lags la/_rang bzhin gyi stong pa nyid kyang gzugs lags shing byang chub kyi bar nyid kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid lags la/_rang 
[\[106b.3\]]bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyang byang chub lags par rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid de yang rnam par 'khrugs pa mi bgyid pa de ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 
[\[106b.4\]]gal te gzugs kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhing /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_byang chub kyi bar yang gzhan la/_
[\[106b.5\]]rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhig yin par gyur na ni/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gzugs rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur la/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams 
[\[106b.6\]]dang /_rnam par shes pa yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur la/_byang chub kyi bar dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs nyid kyang 
[\[106b.7\]]rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid yin la/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyang gzugs yin/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid yin la rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa nyid yin/_byang chub kyi 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]bar dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid yin la/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyang byang chub nyid yin te/_de'i phyir rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gzugs rang bzhin gyis stong par rig nas/_gzugs nyid rnam pa thams 
[\[107a.2\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi bar du yang rang bzhin gyis stong par rig nas/_byang chub nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid 
[\[107a.3\]]la ni rnam par 'jig pa'am/_ther zug tu gnas pa'am/_'jug par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang med pa'i phyir ro/_/gzhan du na lha dang bcas pa dang /_bdud dang bcas pa dang /_tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa'i 'jig 
[\[107a.4\]]rten gyis gzugs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mi shes so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mi shes so/_/rab tu mi shes pas byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gzugs la mngon par zhen 
[\[107a.5\]]to/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen to/_/gzugs la mngon par zhen cing /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen nas ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 
[\[107a.6\]]'dzin pa dag la spyod par byed de/_de dag ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa dag la mngon par zhen nas kyang /_nang dang phyi'i dngos po rnams la mngon par zhen to/_/mngon par zhen nas kyang skye ba'i skye mched dag tu gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du 
[\[107a.7\]]byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yongs su 'dzin par byed de/_de dag ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrugs pa dag las yongs su mi 'grol zhing /_'gro ba lnga'i 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]'khor ba las kyang yongs su mi thar ro/_/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_stong zhes bya ba'am/_mi stong zhes bya bar gzugs rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed do/_/stong zhes bya ba 
[\[107b.2\]]'am/_mi stong zhes bya bar tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_stong zhes bya ba'am/_mi stong zhes bya bar byang chub kyi bar du rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe 
[\[107b.3\]]na/_'di ni gzugs so/_/'di ni stong pa nyid do zhes gzugs kyi stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed cing /_'di ni rnam par shes pa'i bar ro/_/'di ni rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_'di ni byang chub kyi bar ro/_/'di ni rang bzhin 
[\[107b.4\]]gyis stong pa nyid do/_/zhes rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na nam mkhas ni nam mkha' rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed de/_nang gi nam mkhas kyang phyi rol gyi nam mkha' rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed la/_phyi rol gyi nam 
[\[107b.5\]]mkhas kyang nang gi nam mkha' rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyis kyang gzugs rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed la/_gzugs kyis kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed do/_/stong pa nyid kyis kyang /_tshor ba 
[\[107b.6\]]dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed la/_rnam par shes pas kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed do/_/stong pa nyid kyis kyang byang chub kyi bar du rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed la/_byang chub kyi bar 
[\[107b.7\]]gyis kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag la 'di ni gzugs so/_/'di ni stong pa nyid do zhes bya ba dang /_'di ni tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'o/_/'di ni stong pa nyid do/_/de bzhin du sbyar 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]te 'di ni byang chub kyi bar ro/_/'di ni stong pa nyid do zhes gang rnam par 'khrugs par byed pa de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[108a.2\]]ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad dbyer ma mchis pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi'o/_/zhes gang la yang dag par zhugs 
[\[108a.3\]]pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub ni gnyis su dbyer ma mchis pa lags te/_gnyis su 'byed pas ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar rdo mi thogs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de 
[\[108a.4\]]bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor byang chub ni gnyis la spyod pa ma yin te/_byang chub ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang 
[\[108a.5\]]chub bo zhes byang chub la gnyis su dbye bas mi spyod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub ni gzugs la mi spyod do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la mi spyod do/_/byang chub kyi bar la mi spyod do/_/de 
[\[108a.6\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub la ni bdag ces bya ba'i sgra med de/_/bdag gzugs la spyod do zhes bya ba dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la spyod do zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub kyi bar la spyod do zhes bya ba'i sgra med pa yin te/_
[\[108a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub ni 'dzin pa la yang mi spyod/_'dzin pa med pa la yang mi spyod pa'i phyir ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub 'dzin pa la yang mi spyod/_'dzin pa ma mchis pa la yang mi spyod lags na/_'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub gang la spyod pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam 
[\[108b.2\]]du sems/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i byang chub 'dzin pa'am/_'dzin pa med pa gang zhig la spyod snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_dgra bcom pa'i rmi lam 
[\[108b.3\]]gyi blo 'dzin pa'am/_'dzin pa med pa gang zhig la spyod snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_dgra bcom pa la g.yar lam yang gtan ma mchis lags na/_de'i g.yar lam gyi blo 'dzin pa'am/_'dzin pa ma mchis pa la spyod par 'gyur ba lta ga la 
[\[108b.4\]]mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyang 'dzin pa'am/_'dzin pa med pa la mi spyod do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad 
[\[108b.5\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub 'dzin pa la yang mi spyod/_'dzin pa ma mchis pa la yang mi spyod/_gzugs la yang mi spyod/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yang mi spyod lags na/_bcom ldan 
[\[108b.6\]]'das 'o na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad nas/_sa bcu dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_stong pa nyid bcu bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams 
[\[108b.7\]]dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar dag bsgrubs te/_mngon par shes pa lnga la gnas nas/_sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par bgyis shing byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa las zhugs nas 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyis shing /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyis te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa drug la ma spyad cing sa bcu la ma 
[\[109a.2\]]gnas/_mngon par shes pa lnga'i bar dag la ma gnas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la ma zhugs/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma bgyis/_sems can yongs su smin par ma bgyis par ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[109a.3\]]'tshang rgya bar rngo mi thogs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin te/_de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_sa bcu la ma gnas shing pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /_dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi bar dag yongs su 
[\[109a.4\]]rdzogs par ma byas par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus kyi/_rab 'byor sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par byas shing pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med 
[\[109a.5\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar 
[\[109a.6\]]dag dang /_bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang /_rtag tu btang snyoms su gnas pa dag yongs su rdzogs par byas na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par nus so/_/rab 'byor de yang gzugs kyi rang bzhin la gnas shing tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du 
[\[109a.7\]]byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin la gnas la/_byang chub kyi bar gyi rang bzhin la gnas na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par nus so/_/rang bzhin de yang nye bar zhi ba ste/_de ni chos gang yang [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa'am/_'bri ba'am/_bskyed pa'am/_
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]'gog pa'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang ba'am/_'thob pa'am/_mngon par rtogs par mi byed do/_/rab 'byor de yang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis btags pa'i chos nyid nye bar bzung nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na 
[\[109b.2\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar zad kyi/_don dam par ni de la gzugs sam/_byang chub kyi bar ram/_gang byang chub la spyod pa gang yang med de/_chos de dag thams cad ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis btags par zad kyi/
[\[109b.3\]]don dam par ni ma yin no/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na sems de dang /_sems can dang /_byang chub dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dag mi dmigs so/_/rab 
[\[109b.4\]]'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_gang gi tshe rab 'byor khyod kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba spang ba'i phyir dbang po rnams thob bam/_bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin tam/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob 'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob 'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 
[\[109b.5\]]'bras bu thob 'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur pa de'i tshe rmi lam 'am/_sems sam lam 'am/_'bras bu dmigs snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'o na ji ltar rab 'byor gyis dgra 
[\[109b.6\]]bcom pa nyid thob bo zhes shes pa brda sprad par gyur/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du bzung ste/_shes pa brda sprad lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis btags 
[\[109b.7\]]pa yin no/_/gzugs kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis btags pa yin no/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis btags pa yin no/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag kyang 'jig 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]rten gyi tha snyad kyis btags pa yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni chos rnams kyi rang bzhin stong pa nyid nye bar bzung na byang chub la gang sogs pa'am/_'bri bar byed pa'am/_phan 'dogs pa'am/_gnod par byed pa'i chos gang yang 
[\[110a.2\]]ma dmigs te/_chos rnams kyi rang bzhin de yang ma dmigs na sems dang po bskyed pa dmigs par 'gyur ba dang /_sems bskyed pa bcu pa'i bar dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar dag dmigs par 'gyur ba dang /_stong pa nyid 
[\[110a.3\]]kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te de ni gnas med do/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[110a.4\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub la spyad cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams kyi don byed do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/_mi 'khrugs pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/_bdun cu rtsa 
[\[110a.5\]]lnga pa'o//_//da nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_de bzhin 
[\[110a.6\]]gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la spyad cing /_stong pa nyid bcu bzhi dang /_byang chub kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par bgyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[110a.7\]]pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba ma mchis lags na/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pas/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yang mi dmigs/_sbyin bdag dang len pa po yang mi dmigs shing /_
[\[110b.2\]]de las gzhan pa'i chos rnams la yang mi spyod pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_thabs la mkhas 
[\[110b.3\]]pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag la yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang 
[\[110b.4\]]ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_ji ltar byang chub kyi lam la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[110b.5\]]kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pas gzugs la sbyor bar mi byed/_'byed par mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i 
[\[110b.6\]]bu 'di ltar gzugs la gang sbyar bar bya ba'am/_dbye bar bya ba'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro/_/rnam par shes pa'i bar la yang sbyor bar mi byed 'byed par mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar rnam par shes pa la gang la sbyar bar bya ba'am/_dbye bar bya ba'i ngo bo nyid 
[\[110b.7\]]med pa'i phyir ro/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor bar mi byed 'byed par mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de la gang sbyar bar bya ba'am/_dbye bar bya ba'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]brgyad kyi bar dag la yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos gang la yang gang sbyar bar bgyi ba'am/_dbye bar bgyi ba'i ngo bo nyid ma mchis lags na/_'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang la bslab par 
[\[111a.2\]]bgyi ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs par ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar rngo 
[\[111a.3\]]mi thogs lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/_de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 
[\[111a.4\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus te/_de yang thabs la mkhas pas yin gyi thabs la mi mkhas pas ni ma yin no/_/shA ri'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos 'ga' zhig gi rang bzhin dmigs na ni/_de 
[\[111a.5\]]dag 'dzin par 'gyur ba zhig na ci ste mi dmigs na go/_/'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[111a.6\]]pa'o/_/'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/'di ni gzugs so/_/'di ni rnam par shes pa'i bar dag go/_/'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag go zhes bya bar ci zhig 'dzin par 'gyur te/_byang chub kyi bar dag kyang dmigs su med na de ci zhig 'dzin par 'gyur/_
[\[111a.7\]]shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzung du med pa ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag kyang gzung du med pa yin no/_/shA ri'i bu pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dzin pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya ste/_de la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni slob pa yang mi dmigs na byang chub lta ci smos/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lta yang ci smos/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams lta yang ci smos/_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[111b.2\]]chos rnams lta yang ci smos/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /_nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang /_so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams lta yang ci smos/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'di ltar chos gang la yang ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir te/_de la ngo bo nyid med pa'i chos thams cad 
[\[111b.3\]]la ni so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang gang zhig yin/_rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[111b.4\]]dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang gang zhig yin/_gal te gang zag de dag dmigs su med na chos gang dag gis 'di ni so so'i skye bo'o/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar dag go zhes bya bar 
[\[111b.5\]]brjod pa'i chos de dag kyang 'byung bar ga la 'gyur/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa la 'di ni so so'i skye bo lags so/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar dag lags 
[\[111b.6\]]so zhes bgyi ba gang nas 'byung zhing mchis par 'gyur lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu ci gzugs la ji ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo mngon par zhen par gyur pa lta bu'i 
[\[111b.7\]]dngos po yod par gyur tam yod par 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das so so'i skye bo bslad pa'i sems kyis gzugs so zhes mngon par zhen pa ma gtogs par de ni ma mchis lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu ci tshor ba dang /_'du shes 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la ji ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo mngon par zhen par gyur pa lta bu'i dngos po yod par gyur tam yod par 'gyur ram/_de bzhin du sbyar te shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[112a.2\]]thams cad kyi bar dag la ji ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu'i dngos po yod par gyur tam/_yod par 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das so so'i skye bo bslad pa'i sems kyis rnam par shes pa'i bar dag dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[112a.3\]]kyi chos thams cad kyi bar dag la dngos por rtog pa ma gtogs par de ni ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_so so'i skye bo ni bslad pa'i sems kyis dngos po med pa'i sems kyis 
[\[112a.4\]]dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la dngos por rtog ste/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_thabs la mkhas pas chos de dag thams cad dngos po med par mthong nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[112a.5\]]byang chub la zhugs so/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das thabs la mkhas pa gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis par 
[\[112a.6\]]yang dag par rjes su mthong nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa de gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces 
[\[112a.7\]]bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_dngos po gang la khong khro bar 'gyur ba dang /_gang la khong khro bas zhum par 'gyur ba dang /_zhum nas kyang sgyid lug par 'gyur ba dang /_sgyid 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]lug nas le lor 'gyur ba'i chos kyi dngos po gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_shA ri'i bu 'di ltar sems can bdag tu rmongs pa dag phung po rnams zhes bya ba'am/_khams rnams zhes bya ba'am/_skye mched rnams zhes bya bar mngon par zhen pa ma gtogs 
[\[112b.2\]]par chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa dang /_srog med pa dang /_srog dang bral ba dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yin te/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi 
[\[112b.3\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong nas lus sgyu ma mkhan lta bur byin gyis brlabs shing /_sems can rnams la chos ston 
[\[112b.4\]]par byed de/_sems can gang dag ser sna dang ldan pa de dag la ni sbyin pa'i gtam byed do/_/sems can tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la ni tshul khrims kyi gtam byed do/_/sems can gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa rnams la ni bzod pa'i gtam byed do/_/sems 
[\[112b.5\]]can le lo can rnams la ni brtson 'grus kyi gtam byed do/_/sems can sems rnam par g.yengs pa rnams la ni ting nge 'dzin gyi gtam byed do/_/sems can shes rab 'chal pa rnams la ni shes rab kyi gtam byed do/_/des gang gi tshe sems can rnams sbyin pa la bkod 
[\[112b.6\]]par gyur pa dang /_shes rab kyi bar la bkod par gyur pa de'i tshe sems can de dag la gtam gang gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar dag thob par 'gyur ba dang /_rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ba dang /_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[112b.7\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag thob par 'gyur ba'i gtam 'phags shing nges par 'byin pa dag kyang byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang gis sems can ma mchis shing mchis pa ma lags pa dag sbyin pa la rab tu 'god par bgyid cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag la rab tu 'god par bgyid kyi steng du bka' mchid gang gis rgyun tu zhugs 
[\[113a.2\]]pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag 'thob par 'gyur ba'i bka' mchid 'phags shing nges par 'byin pa dag bgyid na/_ji ltar dmigs pa ma mchis par 'gyur lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[113a.3\]]kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la ni dmigs pa 'ga' yang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[113a.4\]]po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa des ni kun rdzob kyi brdas tha snyad 'dogs pa ma gtogs par sems can gang yang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bden pa gnyis la gnas te/_sems can rnams la chos 
[\[113a.5\]]ston par byed kyang /_shA ri'i bu bden pa gnyis po dag la ni sems can dmigs pa yang med sems can du gdags pa yang med mod kyi/_'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa sems can 
[\[113a.6\]]rnams la chos ston cing /_des sems can de dag kyang tshe 'di nyid la bdag tu yang mi dmigs na gang 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /_gang gis thob par 'gyur ba dag lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[113a.7\]]phyin pa la spyod pa ni de ltar thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos ston par byed do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das a la la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang yang gcig pa'am/_tha dad pa'am/_so so bar yang mi dmigs la/_go cha gang 'tshal bas 'dod pa'i khams na yang mi gda'/_gzugs kyi khams na yang mi gda'/_gzugs ma mchis pa'i khams na yang mi gda'/_'dus 
[\[113b.2\]]byas kyi khams na yang mi gda'/_'dus ma byas kyi khams na yang mi gda' la/_sems can rnams khams gsum nas yongs su thar bar bgyid kyang sems can dang /_sems can du gdags pa yang mi dmigs pa de lta bu'i go cha 'tshal ba de ni/_bcom ldan 
[\[113b.3\]]'das spro ba che ba lags so/_/sems can du gdags pa ma mchis pas sems can ma bcings ma grol la/_sems can ma bcings ma grol bas/_kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis shing /_rnam par byang ba ma mchis lags so/_/kun nas nyon mongs pa ma 
[\[113b.4\]]mchis la/_rnam par byang ba ma mchis pas 'gro ba'i bye brag kyang ma mchis lags so/_/'gro ba'i bye brag ma mchis pa la ni las kyang ma mchis/_nyon mongs pa rnams kyang ma mchis lags so/_/las ma mchis shing nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa la ni rnam par smin pa 
[\[113b.5\]]gang gis bdag gam/_sems can dag 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na gda' bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa mchis par yang ga la 'gyur lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[113b.6\]]shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/_de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_shA ri'i bu gal te sems can zhig sngon yod par gyur la/_phyis med par gyur na ni de'i phyir de ltar sngon yod par gyur la/_phyis med par 'gyur ro zhes byang chub sems dpa' dang /_de bzhin 
[\[113b.7\]]gshegs pa la yang skyon du 'gyur zhing /_'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba yang sngon dngos po yod par gyur la/_phyis dngos po med par gyur na/_de yang skyon du 'gyur ba zhig na/_shA ri'i bu 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid 'di ni gnas pa ste/_de la bdag kyang med/_sems can yang med/_srog kyang med gang zag kyang med/_byed pa po yang med/_byed du 'jug pa 
[\[114a.2\]]po yang med na/_de la gzugs lta ga la yod/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams lta yang ga la yod/_rnam par shes pa lta yang ga la yod de/_med cing yod pa ma yin pa'i chos de dag la gang las/_sems can rnams yongs su thar bar bya ba'i 'gro 
[\[114a.3\]]ba lnga'i 'khor ba lta yang yod par ga la 'gyur te/_shA ri'i bu de'i phyir chos 'di dag ni de ltar rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 
[\[114a.4\]]las thos nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la zhugs te gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo phyin ci log gis rmongs par gyur pa rnams mngon par zhen pa ma gtogs par gang la mos par nus pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid gang yang dmigs su med do/_/byang chub sems 
[\[114a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de ltar go cha gang bgos pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dang /_bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bar mi bya'i/_bdag gis ni bla na med pa 
[\[114a.6\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam pa dang /_mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang don gang gis sems can rnams phyin ci log las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don bya'o zhes de lta 
[\[114a.7\]]bu'i go cha bgos pa yin no/_/shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa'i mi zhig gis srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag cig sprul nas/_de sprul pa de dag la bza' ba dang /_bca' ba nyams su bsod pa mang po dag stobs shing tshim par byed 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]de/_bstabs shing tshim par byas nas kyang /_bdag gis ni bsod nams mang du spel to/_/zhes ched du brjod pa ched du rjod par byed na/_shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_de la bstabs shing tshim par byas pa gang yang yod snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[114b.2\]]ni ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi la spyod pa dang /_tshad med pa bzhi la spyod pa dang /_gzugs 
[\[114b.3\]]med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la spyod pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan 
[\[114b.4\]]lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang /_stong pa nyid bcu bzhi dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres 
[\[114b.5\]]pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong ba na sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang gang dmigs nas gdul bar bya ba'i sems can gang yang mi dmigs so//_//shes rab 
[\[114b.6\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang la spyad de/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par 
[\[114b.7\]]bgyi ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam 
[\[115a.2\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag la spyod par byed cing sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do/_/gsol pa/_
[\[115a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[115a.4\]]la spyod pa sems can rnams la sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/_sbyin pa byin nas kyang 'di ltar 'doms shing rjes su ston te/_rigs kyi bu dag 'di la sbyin pa la sbyin par 'dzin pas 'dzin par ma byed cig_/sbyin pa la sbyin par 'dzin pas lus gang mngon par grub pas sdug 
[\[115a.5\]]bsngal mang po nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i lus dag mngon par 'grub par ma byed cig_/rigs kyi bu dag 'di la don dam par na sbyin pa yang med/_sbyin bdag kyang med len pa po yang med de/_chos de gsum ni rang bzhin gyis stong pas na rang bzhin gyis stong 
[\[115a.6\]]pa'i chos ni len par mi byed la rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la ni gzung ba yang med do/_/zhes rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_de ltar sems can rnams la sbyin pa sbyin par byed kyang de la sbyin pa yang mi dmigs 
[\[115a.7\]]sbyin bdag kyang mi dmigs len pa po yang mi dmigs so/_/de ni mi dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/de chos gsum po de dag thams cad mi dmigs pas rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/_sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sbyor bar byed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar dag la sbyor bar byed de/_rab 'byor byang chub sems 
[\[115b.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/_de bdag kyang sbyin pa sbyin par byed la gzhan dag kyang sbyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing sbyin pa'i bsngags pa yang rjod la gzhan gang dag sbyin pa sbyin par 
[\[115b.3\]]byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa yang rjod cing rjes su dga' bar byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa de lta bu byin nas/_rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o/_/bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang skal ba 
[\[115b.4\]]mnyam par skye'o/_/khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o/_/khams kyi rgyal por 'gyur ba'am/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'am/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid thob nas kyang des sems can rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po 
[\[115b.5\]]bzhis sdud par byed de/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sbyin pa dang /_snyan par smra ba dang /_don spyod pa dang /_don 'thun pa dag gis sdud par byed do/_/des sems can de dag sbyin pas bsdus nas rim gyis tshul khrims la 'god par byed do/_/ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang bsam 
[\[115b.6\]]gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar dag dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 
[\[115b.7\]]'god par byed do/_/yang dag pa nyid kyi skyon med pa la 'jug par byed do/_/dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub kyi bar dag dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar dag yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/_/kye skyes bu dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]pa'i byang chub ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi dka' ste/_phyin ci log gis rmongs pa'i sems kyis ma rtogs pa ma gtogs par gang la sems can rnams chags pa'i chos gang yang ngo bo nyid kyis yod pa ma yin gyis/_de'i phyir khyed cag gis phyin ci 
[\[116a.2\]]log tu 'dzin pa thams cad spongs la/_bdag kyang 'khor ba las thar bar gyis shig_/gzhan dag kyang thar bar gyis shig_/de ltar khyed cag gis bdag cag kyang don che bar gyis la/_gzhan dag kyang don chen po la sbyor bar gyis shig ces/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub 
[\[116a.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya ste/_de ltar spyod pa'i tshe sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_gzhan yang ngan song du mi ltung ba dang /_nam yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mi byed par mi 'gyur ba de ltar spyod do/_/de ci'i 
[\[116a.4\]]phyir zhe na/_sa bon ci 'dra ba 'bras bu yang de 'dra ba'i phyir ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba de'i drung du slongs mo pa gang dag lhags na/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid yongs su bzung ba ni sems can 
[\[116a.5\]]rnams kyi don ma gtogs par gzhan gyi phyir ma yin no snyam nas/_de 'di skad du gang ci 'dod pa de dag khyed cag la byin zin gyis/_de'i phyir 'di ni khyed kyi yin gyi nga'i ma yin no/_/nga ni nang gi gzugs 'di yang don du gnyer ba ma yin na gzhan dag lta ci smos te/_
[\[116a.6\]]ngas sems can thams cad kyi don du 'khor ba yongs su bzung ba ma gtogs par/_nga ni 'khor ba don du gnyer ba ma yin no zhes zer te/_de snying rje bas snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/_ji tsam du snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byas shing /_sems can 
[\[116a.7\]]rnams kyi don byed kyang ming dang btags pa dang /_brdas tha snyad 'dogs pa ma gtogs par gang dag yongs su grub par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems can dag mi dmigs te/_tha snyad de yang brag ca lta bur tha snyad med par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]dpa' chen pos ji ltar spyad pas sems can rnams la rdzas yongs su mi gtong bar mi 'gyur ba ci yang med de/_cher na bdag gi sha dag kyang yongs su gtong bar byed na/_yo byad gang dag gis sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir phyi rol gyi yo 
[\[116b.2\]]byad dag lta smos kyang ci dgos pa/_de ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das yo byad de dag gang lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor yo byad de dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do/_/tshul 
[\[116b.3\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad 
[\[116b.4\]]kyi bar dag ni yo byad do/_/de dag ni yo byad yin te/_yo byad de dag gis phan btags pa'i sems can rnams ni 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas 
[\[116b.5\]]sems can rnams la sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa de'i tshe/_tshig 'di skad ces brjod de/_rigs kyi bu dag tshur shog_/ngas khyed cag zas dang /_skom dang /_gos dang /_yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar dag gis brel ba med par byas/_khyed cag tshul khrims 
[\[116b.6\]]srungs shig_/khyed cag zas sam/_skom 'am/_rin po che sna bdun gyi bar dag gam/_gang gis phongs nas tshul khrims 'chal par byed pa de dag ngas brel ba med par byas/_khyed cag ji nas kyang tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas nas theg pa gsum po nyan thos kyi 
[\[116b.7\]]theg pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi theg pa chen po gang yang rung bas rim gyis sdug bsngal gyi mthar phyin par gyis shig ces/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]la gnas nas/_de ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams sdud par byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_sems can gang dag 'khrug pa dang /_
[\[117a.2\]]gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag la tshig 'di skad ces brjod de/_rigs kyi bu dag khyed cag rgyu gang gis phongs nas/_'khrug par byed pa'am/_gnod sems su byed pa'am/_skyon 'dogs par byed pa'i zas sam/_skom 'am/_yo 
[\[117a.3\]]byad gang yang rung ba'i bar dag nga las long shig dang /_ngas khyed cag phongs pa med par byas/_de'i phyir khyed cag 'khrug pa dang /_gnod sems su ma byed cig_/nga yang khyed kyi yin la khyed kyang nga'i yin te/_nga la ci bdog pa de yang khyed kyi yin gyis 
[\[117a.4\]]su la ci dgos pa dag long shig dang /_ngas khyed cag zas dang skom dang /_gos dang yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar dag gis phongs pa med par byas/_ci nas kyang khyed cag khro ba dang /_gnod sems kyi dbang du mi 'gyur bar gyis shig ces de ltar byang 
[\[117a.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_sems can de dag bzod pa la sbyor bar byed de/_khyed cag gang gi phyir khro ba skye bar 'gyur ba de ni snying po med pa ste/_de la ni dngos po gang yang med do/_/khro ba de ni yang dag 
[\[117a.6\]]pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pas khyed cag gang gi phyir mngon par chags pa dang /_'khrug pa dang /_gnod sems su byed cing /_mngon par chags pa dang /_'khrug pa dang /_gnod sems su gyur nas kyang dbyig pas rdeg pa dang /_mtshon gyis 'debs 
[\[117a.7\]]shing /_gcig gis gcig srog dang 'bral bar byed pa de la ni dngos po gang yang med do/_/de'i phyir khyed cag yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pas 'khrugs par gyur na sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ba'am/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]'jig rten nam/_de las gzhan pa'i ngan 'gro dag tu ltung bar 'gyur te/_der khyed cag sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/_rtsub pa/_tsha ba dag gi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur gyis/_kye skyes bu dag las gang yongs su bzung bas mir skye ba yang thob par mi 'gyur na/_sangs rgyas 
[\[117b.2\]]'byung ba dang phrad par 'gyur ba lta smos su yang med pa de lta bu'i dngos po med pa'i chos rnams kyi don gyi las yongs su ma 'dzin cig_/kye skyes bu dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni rnyed par dka'o/_/mir skye ba yang rnyed par dka' bas/_dal ba 'di chud gzan par ma byed cig 
[\[117b.3\]]mi khom par gyur cing /_gsor mi rung bar gyur ta re zhes de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag kyang bzod pa sgrub par byed la/_gzhan dag kyang bzod pa la sbyor bar byed cing bzod pa'i bsngags pa yang brjod la/_gzhan gang dag bzod pa sgom 
[\[117b.4\]]pa de dag gi bsngags pa yang rjod cing rjes su dga' bar byed do/_/des sems can de dag bzod pa la sbyar cing bzod pa la bkod nas/_theg pa gsum gyis rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin 
[\[117b.5\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_sems can rnams bzod pa la sbyor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems can rnams brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor bar byed ce na/_rab 
[\[117b.6\]]'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can le lo can dag mthong na/_'di skad du sems can khyed cag ci'i phyir le lo byed ces 'doms par byed do/_/de dag 'di skad du rkyen dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[117b.7\]]dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_sems can de dag la 'di skad du/_kye skyes bu dag ngas gang khyed cag la sbyin pa'i rkyen tam/_tshul khrims kyi rkyen tam/_bzod pa'i rkyen tam/_rnam pa gzhan gang dag gis brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur ba de dag 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]thams cad nye bar bsgrub par byas/_khyed cag brtson 'grus rtsoms shig ces zer te/_der sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i yo byad de dag gis lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus rtsom par byed de/_de dag lus 
[\[118a.2\]]dang sems kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pas/_dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dge ba'i chos de dag gis 'phags pa zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad sgom par byed do/_/de dag bsgoms pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[118a.3\]]lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar byang 
[\[118a.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_sems can rnams brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_sems 
[\[118a.5\]]can rnams bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor bar byed pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can sems rnam par g.yengs pa dag mthong na/_'di skad du/_kye skyes bu dag khyed cag ci'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol 
[\[118a.6\]]tu phyin pa la snyoms par mi 'jug ces 'doms par byed do/_/de dag 'di skad du rkyen dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa sems can de dag la 'di skad du/_kye skyes bu dag ngas khyed cag rkyen 
[\[118a.7\]]gang dag gis 'di ni nang ngo /_/'di ni phyi rol lo/_/'di ni nang dang phyi rol lo/_/zhes rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rkyen dag nye bar bsgrub par bya'o zhes zer te/_der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can de dag la rkyen gang dang gang dag 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]gis rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rkyen dag nye bar sgrub par byed do/_/des sems can de dag rnam par rtog pa'i rgyun chad nas bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas so/_/bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas so/_/
[\[118b.2\]]byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms dag la snyoms par 'jug go/_/de dag bsam gtan de dag dang /_tshad med pa de dag gis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dag sgom par byed do/_/de dag bsgoms nas theg pa gsum 
[\[118b.3\]]po dag gis rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag las kha cig ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/_byang chub kyi lam las yongs su mi nyams te/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems 
[\[118b.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_sems can rnams ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor bar byed pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_sems can 
[\[118b.5\]]rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su sdud pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can shes rab 'chal ba dag mthong na/_'di skad du kye sems can dag khyed cag ci'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par 
[\[118b.6\]]mi byed ces 'doms shing rjes su ston par byed do/_/de dag 'di skad du/_rkyen dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_sems can de dag la 'di skad du/_kye sems can dag nga las 
[\[118b.7\]]yo byad dag long shig_/nga las yo byad dag blangs nas kyang sbyin pa byin cig_/tshul khrims srungs shig_/bzod pa sgrubs shig_/brtson 'grus rtsoms shig_/bsam gtan sgoms shig_/rnam pa de dag yongs su rdzogs nas kyang 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]sgom pa la/_bdag gam sems can nam srog gam/_gso ba'am/_gang zag gam/_shes pa po dang mthong ba po dang /_byed pa po'i bar dag gam/_'dod pa'i khams sam/_gzugs kyi khams sam/_gzugs med pa'i khams sam/_
[\[119a.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa drug gam/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun nam/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang byang chub bam/_bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[119a.3\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub bam/_gang dmigs par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang yod dam/_tshol cig ces 'doms shing rjes su ston to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni gang la dmigs shing mngon par zhen par 
[\[119a.4\]]'gyur ba'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so/_/de mngon par zhen pa med pas chos gang yang skye ba'am/_'gag pa'am kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/des de dag yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas 'di ni 
[\[119a.5\]]sems can dmyal ba'o/_/'di ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa'o/_/'di ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'o/_/'di ni lha ma yin gyi ris so/_/'di ni lha'o/_/'di ni mi'o/_/'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o/_/'di ni tshul khrims 'chal pa'o/_/'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'o/_/'di ni 
[\[119a.6\]]lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o/_/'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o/_/'di ni dgra bcom pa'o/_/'di ni rang sangs rgyas so/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so/_/zhes bya bar rnam par mi rtog ste/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems 
[\[119a.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa sems can rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su sdud par byed pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/_tshul khrims kyi 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar dag yongs su 'dzin 
[\[119b.2\]]par byed ce na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can rnams la yo byad dag sbyin par byed de/_yo byad de dag gis yongs su bsdus pa'i sems can rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom par byed do/_/yang dag par spong 
[\[119b.3\]]ba bzhi sgom par byed do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom par byed do/_/dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dag sgom par byed do/_/lam des yongs su zin par gyur pa ni/_'khor ba ji snyed 
[\[119b.4\]]pa las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis sems can rnams yongs su 'dzin par byed pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[119b.5\]]chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_sems can mgon med pa sdug bsngal ba/_zas dang skom gyis phongs pa dag mthong na/_'di ltar yongs su smin par byed de/_rigs kyi bu dag tshur shog_/khyed cag nga las zas dang /_skom dang /_gos dang bzhon 
[\[119b.6\]]pa dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_rin po che sna bdun dang /_yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar dag long la/_sems can rnams la phan thogs shig dang /_de ni khyed cag la yun ring po'i don dang /_phan pa dang bde bar 
[\[119b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/'di ni nga'i don yin gyi/_khyed cag gi ma yin no/_/snyam du bsam par mi bya bar 'di ni bdag gis yun ring po nas sems can rnams kyi don du bsgrubs pa yin no snyam du de ltar khyed kyis bdag rang gi yin no snyam du sems la sems can rnams la sbyin pa 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]byin cig_/sbyin pa des kyang tshul khrims la sbyor cig_/bzod pa la sbyor cig_/brtson 'grus la sbyor cig_/ting nge 'dzin la sbyor cig_/bsam gtan la sbyor cig_/shes rab la sbyor cig_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar 
[\[120a.2\]]dag la sbyor cig_/de tsam gyis chog par mi 'dzin par gong du 'phags pa'i chos zag pa med pa rnams la yang khod cig_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang 
[\[120a.3\]]byang chub dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la khod cig ces rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_ji ltar yongs su smin par byas pas sems can rnams ngan song gsum po dag 
[\[120a.4\]]las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ba dang 'khor ba thams cad kyi bar dag las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ba de ltar sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[120a.5\]]gnas te/_'di ltar sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu dag tshur shog_/khyed cag zas sam/_skom 'am/_mi'i yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar dag gis phongs nas tshul khrims 'chal bar byed pa'i yo byad de dag ngas nye bar bsgrub par 
[\[120a.6\]]bya'o/_/zhes des sems can de dag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod nas kyang phan gdags pa ji lta bus phan btags pas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par len par 'gyur zhing tshul khrims ma ral ba dang /_tshul khrims nag nog med par gyur pa de 
[\[120a.7\]]dag tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i phan gdags pas phan 'dogs par byed de/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi bar dag la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]go cha'i le'u zhes bya ste/_bdun cu rtsa drug pa'o//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems te/_gang la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de lta bu'i go cha bgo bar bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam 
[\[120b.2\]]de gang yin snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi sems kyi yongs su rtogs pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
