[\[141a.6\]]mngon par 'dus bgyis pas sems can dmyal bar mchi ba'am/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/_lha'am mir mchi bar 'gyur ba'i las mngon par 'du bgyid pa lta ga la mchis lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_de la lam 
[\[141a.7\]]bsgom pa gang la brten nas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/_rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba'i lam bsgom pa 'ga' zhig yod snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das gzugs brnyan de nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]na/_de la lam bsgom pa gang la brten nas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/_rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba'i lam bsgom pa lta ga la mchis lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_chu klung dang /_sman ljongs dang /_nags thibs po dang /_
[\[141b.2\]]ri khrod dang /_bya skyibs dag nas brag ca byung bar gyur na/_brag ca de la las gang mngon par 'dus byas pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'am/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba'am/_mi rnams sam/_'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams sam/_
[\[141b.3\]]gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams sam/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi lha rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i las mngon par 'du byed pa 'ga' zhig yod snyama'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das brag ca de nyid 
[\[141b.4\]]kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags na/_de'i las gang mngon par 'dus bgyis pas/_sems can dmyal bar mchi ba'am/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba'am/_mi'am/_'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams sam/_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams 
[\[141b.5\]]sam/_gzugs ma mchis pa na spyod pa 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi lha rnams su mchi bar 'gyur ba'i las mngon par 'du bgyid pa lta ga la mchis lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_brag ca de la lam bsgom pa gang 
[\[141b.6\]]la brten nas/_kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/_rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba'i lam bsgom pa 'ga' zhig yod snyama'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das brag ca de nyid kyang gtan ma mchis lags na/_de la lam bsgom pa gang la brten nas/_kun 
[\[141b.7\]]nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/_rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba'i lam bsgom pa lta ga la mchis lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_smig rgyu la chu med par chur 'du shes pa dang /_klung med par klung du 'du shes pa dang /_grong khyer med par 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]grong khyer du 'du shes pa dang /_skyed mos tshal med par skyed mos tshal du 'du shes par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de la las gang mngon par 'dus byas pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'am/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur 
[\[142a.2\]]ba'i las mngon par 'du byed pa 'ga' zhig yod snyama'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'du shes phyin ci log tu gyur pa dang /_mig 'khrul pa ma gtogs par smig rgyu la ni chab kyang gtan ma mchis la/_klung yang ma mchis/_grong khyer yang ma mchis/_skyed mos tshal yang 
[\[142a.3\]]ma mchis lags na/_de la las gang mngon par 'dus bgyis pas sems can dmyal bar mchi ba'am/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar dag tu mchi bar 'gyur ba'i las mngon par 'du bgyid pa lta ga la mchis lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di 
[\[142a.4\]]ji snyam du sems/_'du shes phyin ci log tu gyur pa de la lam bsgom pa gang la brten nas/_kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/_rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba'i lam bsgom pa gang 'ga' zhig yod snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'du shes 
[\[142a.5\]]phyin ci log tu gyur pa yang gtan ma mchis lags na/_de la lam bsgom pa gang la brten nas/_kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/_rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba'i lam bsgom pa lta ga la mchis lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_sgyu 
[\[142a.6\]]ma mkhan gyis sgyu ma sna tshogs dag cig mngon par sprul te/_glang po che'i tshogs sam/_rta'i tshogs sam/_glang gi tshogs sam/_dpung bu chung gi tshogs sam/_shing rta'i tshogs sam/_bud med kyi gzugs sam/_skyes pa'i gzugs dag cig mngon par sprul na/_sgyu ma'i 
[\[142a.7\]]tshogs de dag la las gang mngon par 'dus byas pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'am/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i las mngon par 'du byed pa 'ga' zhig yod snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_bcom 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]ldan 'das sgyu ma de la ni gang la gnas nas/_las mngon par 'du bgyid par 'gyur ba'i dngos po tha na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas bzhag pa tsam yang ma mchis lags na/_de la las gang mngon par 'dus bgyis pas sems can dmyal bar mchi ba'am/_'du shes med 'du 
[\[142b.2\]]shes med min skye mched kyi bar dag tu mchi bar 'gyur ba'i las mngon par 'du bgyid pa lta ga la mchis lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma de la lam bsgom pa gang la brten nas/_kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/_rnam par 
[\[142b.3\]]byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba'i lam bsgom pa 'ga' zhig yod snyama'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma de nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags na/_de la lam bsgom pa gang la brten nas/_kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 
[\[142b.4\]]'gyur la/_rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba'i lam bsgom pa lta ga la mchis lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas sprul pa/_gzhan zhig mngon par sprul na/_sprul pa de la las gang mngon par 'dus 
[\[142b.5\]]byas pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'am/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i las mngon par 'du byed pa 'ga' zhig yod snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das sprul pa de nyid 
[\[142b.6\]]kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags na/_de la las gang mngon par 'dus bgyis pas sems can dmyal bar mchi ba'am/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar dag tu mchi bar 'gyur ba'i las mngon par 'du bgyid pa lta ga la mchis lags/_bka' stsal 
[\[142b.7\]]pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_sprul pa de la lam bsgom pa gang la brten nas/_kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/_rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba'i lam bsgom pa 'ga' zhig yod snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bka' 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_de la kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'am/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba 'ga' zhig yod snyam 'am/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'ga' yang ma mchis lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor ji 
[\[143a.2\]]ltar kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba 'ga' yang med cing /_rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba 'ga' yang med pa de bzhin du/_kun nas nyon mongs pa yang med la/_rnam par byang ba yang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang dag ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa 
[\[143a.3\]]la gnas pa'i sems can rnams ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur gyi/_yang dag par mthong ba ni/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/_ji ltar yang dag par mthong ba/_kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur 
[\[143a.4\]]zhing rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_kun nas nyon mongs pa yang med la rnam par byang ba yang med do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba med pa'i le'u ste/_brgyad cu pa'o//_//de nas 
[\[143a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa mthong ba la/_kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba ma mchis shing /_rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba ma mchis pa bzhin du/_yang dag pa ma mthong ba la yang kun 
[\[143a.6\]]nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba ma mchis shing /_rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba ma mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos thams cad ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags pas/_dngos po ma mchis pa la yang kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis shing /_rnam par 
[\[143a.7\]]byang ba ma mchis la/_bcom ldan 'das dngos po la yang kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis shing /_rnam par byang ba ma mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid la yang kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis shing /_rnam par byang ba ma mchis la/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid la yang kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis shing /_rnam par byang ba ma mchis lags na/_'o na bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par byang ba bka' stsal pa/_de ci lta bu lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad kyi mnyam 
[\[143b.2\]]pa nyid gang yin pa de ni ngas rnam par byang bar gsungs so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid de gang lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_
[\[143b.3\]]chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos gnas pa nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/_chos gnas pa nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings de bzhin du gnas pa de ni 
[\[143b.4\]]'di lta ste/_chos kyi dbyings yin te rab 'byor de ni rnam par byang ba zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor de ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis brjod par zad kyi/_brjod du med cing 'jig rten gyi tha snyad dang bral ba ste/_ngag dang /_sgra dang /_tshig gi lam thams cad kyis brjod du med pa 
[\[143b.5\]]yin no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang /_rmi lam lta bu dang /_brag ca lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_gzugs brnyan lta 
[\[143b.6\]]bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu lags na/_'o na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgyu ma lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu'i bar gyi chos dngos po ma mchis shing /_rdzas ma mchis pa dag la bdag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[143b.7\]]phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/de bzhin du thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]dang /_mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms par 'jug par bgyi'o/_/tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/dran pa nye 
[\[144a.2\]]bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom par bgyi'o/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dag bsgom par bgyi'o/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi 
[\[144a.3\]]dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_spobs pa dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams thob par bgyi'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/skyes bu chen po'i 
[\[144a.4\]]mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar dag thob par bgyi'o/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag snang bas khyab par bgyid pa'i 'od tshad ma mchis pa dag yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[144a.5\]]kyi sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis yongs su btsal bar bgyis nas/_dbyangs gcig gis mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston par 'gyur ba'i tshangs pa'i dbyangs yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[144a.6\]]byang chub tu sems skyed par bgyid lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_gang khyod kyis brjod pa'i chos de dag sgyu ma lta bu dang /_rmi lam lta bu dang /_brag ca lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_gzugs brnyan lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_dri 
[\[144a.7\]]za'i grong khyer lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu ma yin snyam 'am/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos de dag sgyu ma lta bu dang /_rmi lam lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu'i bar dag 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]lags na/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji ltar sgyu ma lta bu dang /_rmi lam lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu'i bar gyi chos rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par bgyid lags/_bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma dang /_rmi lam dang sprul 
[\[144b.2\]]pa'i bar dag ni yang dag pa ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa ma lags pas ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag la spyad pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar dag la spyad par yang rngo 
[\[144b.3\]]mi thogs la/_de bzhin du yang dag pa ma lags pas ni/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag la spyad cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar rngo mi thogs lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[144b.4\]]tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor yang dag pa ma yin pas ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la spyad par mi nus so/_/yang dag pa ma yin pas ni 
[\[144b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag la spyad cing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/_/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[144b.6\]]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya snyama'am/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya snyam 'am/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_stong pa nyid bcu bzhi dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa 
[\[144b.7\]]rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya snyam 'am/_gsol 
[\[145a.2\]]ba/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]
[\[145a.3\]]brgyad kyi bar dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar chos de dag thams cad ni mngon par 'dus byas pa dang /_bsams pa ste/_mngon par 'dus byas pa dang /_bsams 
[\[145a.4\]]pa'i chos rnams kyis ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob par mi nus pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor 'on kyang chos de dag thams cad ni lam sgrub pa dang lam skyed par byed pa yin gyi/_'bras bu 'thob par byed pa ni ma yin no/_/chos de dag gi skye ba med pa dang 
[\[145a.5\]]'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni mtshan nyid med pa yang de yin te/_de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_dge ba'i chos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag gam/_
[\[145a.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag gam/_dge ba'i chos gang dang gang rtsom yang rung ste/_de dag thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rab tu shes so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 
[\[145a.7\]]'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar gyi chos de dag yongs su rdzogs par ma byas par sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'am/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi nus pas/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dge 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]ba'i chos gang ci rtsom yang rung ste/_de dag thams cad rmi lam lta bur rab tu shes so/_/sprul pa lta bu'i bar du rab tu shes so/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rmi lam lta bur rab tu shes so/_/sprul pa lta bu'i 
[\[145b.2\]]bar du rab tu shes so/_/sems can de dag kyang rmi lam lta bu la spyod do zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/sprul pa lta bu'i bar dag la spyod do zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_sgyu ma lta bu'i 
[\[145b.3\]]chos rnams dngos po med par 'dzin te/_de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par byed do/_/sprul pa lta bu'i bar gyi chos rnams dngos po med par 'dzin te/_de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[145b.4\]]pa gzung du med cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar yang gzung du med la/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag kyang gzung du med pa/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad gzung du med par rig par byas shing /_bla na med 
[\[145b.5\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'jug par byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos thams cad ni rmi lam lta bu dang /_sprul pa'i bar dag lta bur gzung du med cing dngos po med pa ste/_sems can thams cad kyis chos de dag mi shes ma mthong ba ma gtogs par 
[\[145b.6\]]gzung du med pa'i chos kyis gzung du med pa'i chos thob par mi nus pa'i phyir ro/_/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'jug par byed de/_de sems dang po bskyed 
[\[145b.7\]]pa nas bzung ste/_sbyin pa gang ci sbyin yang rung /_de thams cad sems can rnams kyi don du gtong ngo /_/tshul khrims gang ci srung ba dang /_bzod pa gang ci sgom pa dang /_brtson 'grus gang ci rtsom pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gang la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_shes rab 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]gang ci sgom yang rung ste/_de dag thams cad sems can rnams kyi don du sgom gyi/_bdag gi don du ni ma yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams kyi don ma gtogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[146a.2\]]byang chub la mi 'jug ste/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can gang dag sems can med pa la sems can du 'du shes par gnas pa dang /_bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes par gnas pa dang /_skye ba po dang /_shed bu dang /_shed las 
[\[146a.3\]]skyes dang /_srog dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_byed du 'jug pa po dang /_slong ba po dang /_kun nas slong ba po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po'i bar dag kyang med pa la mthong ba po'i 'du shes su gnas pa'i 
[\[146a.4\]]sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_phyin ci log dag las rnam par 'grel bar byed do/_/phyin ci log dag las rnam par bkrol nas kyang 'chi ba med pa'i dbyings su 'god par byed do/_/der bkod nas 
[\[146a.5\]]kyang kun tu 'byung ba 'di dag mi 'byung mi rgyu ste/_bdag gi 'du shes kun tu 'byung ba'am/_byed pa po'i 'du shes kun tu 'byung ba'i bar dag kun tu mi 'byung ste/_de g.yo ba dang /_'gul ba dang /_rlom sems dang /_spros pa de dag thams cad btang nas/_spros pa med pa'i 
[\[146a.6\]]sems kyis rdzogs par byas te mang du gnas so/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_thabs la mkhas pa des bdag kyang chos gang la yang mngon par zhen pa med la/_sems can thams cad kyang mngon par zhen pa med pa 
[\[146a.7\]]la rab tu 'god par byed de/_de yang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad yin gyi/_don dam par ni ma yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]sangs rgyas pa de ji 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas lags sam/_'on te don dam par lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas chos 'di bstan to/_/de bzhin gshegs pas chos 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/
[\[146b.2\]]zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis tha snyad btags pa ste/_de la ni chos 'dis chos 'di lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba gang yang dmigs su med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos 'dis chos 'di lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/
[\[146b.3\]]zhes bya ba de ni dmigs pa ste/_gnyis kyis ni 'thob pa dang /_mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba gang yang med pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te gnyis kyis 'thob pa dang /_mngon 
[\[146b.4\]]par rtogs par mi 'gyur lags na/_'o na ji gnyis su ma mchis pas 'thob pa dang /_mngon par rtogs par 'gyur lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gnyis kyis kyang mngon par rtogs par mi 'gyur la/_gnyis su med pas kyang mngon par rtogs par mi 
[\[146b.5\]]'gyur te/_gang la gnyis kyang med la gnyis ma yin pa yang med pa de ni 'dir mngon par rtogs pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ni mngon par rtogs pa'o/_/'dis ni mngon par rtogs so zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni spros pa'o/_/chos mnyam pa nyid la ni spros 
[\[146b.6\]]pa med de/_spros pa med pa ni chos mnyam pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid rnams la chos kyi mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba gang zhig mchis lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gang la dngos po med 
[\[146b.7\]]pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa dang /_yongs su brjod pa med pa de ni 'dir mnyam pa nyid yin te/_chos mnyam pa nyid ni brjod par bya ba ma yin no/_/chos mnyam pa nyid ma gtogs par yang chos gang yang dmigs su med de/_chos mnyam pa nyid ni chos thams cad las 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]shin tu 'das pa yin no/_/chos mnyam pa nyid ni byis pa'am/_'phags pa gang gi rten dang gnas kyang ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji chos mnyam pa nyid po de de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul yang ma lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_
[\[147a.2\]]rab 'byor chos mnyam pa nyid ni 'phags pa thams cad kyi yul ma yin te/_rgyun du zhugs pa rnams sam/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams sam/_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams sam/_dgra bcom pa rnams sam/_rang sangs rgyas rnams sam/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[147a.3\]]sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yul yang ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi yul la mnga' sgyur ba ma lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gal 
[\[147a.4\]]te chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang gzhan pa zhig yin na ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi yul la mnga' sgyur bar yang 'gyur 
[\[147a.5\]]ba zhig na/_rab 'byor byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang /_chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_lan 
[\[147a.6\]]cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa'i mnyam pa nyid 
[\[147a.7\]]dang /_mnyam pa nyid la ni tha dad du bya ba cung zad kyang med do/_/so so'i skye bo rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_'phags pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mnyam pa nyid gcig pa ste/_mnyam pa nyid gcig pa la 'di ni so so'i skye bo'o/_/'di ni de 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar dag go zhes bya bar gnyis su med de/_mnyam pa nyid la ni 'di ni so so'i skye bo'o/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar dag go zhes bya ba'i chos 
[\[147b.2\]]de dag thams cad dmigs su med do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'di ni so so'i skye bo'o/_/'di ni rgyun du zhugs 
[\[147b.3\]]pa'o/_/'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi bar dag go/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar dag go zhes bgyi ba'i chos de dag thams cad dmigs su ma mchis lags na/_de ltar na byis pa 
[\[147b.4\]]so so'i skye bo rnams dang /_dad pas rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /_chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[147b.5\]]dpa' rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yang bye brag ma mchis par 'gyur lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_chos mnyam pa nyid la ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams 
[\[147b.6\]]dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bar dag la bye brag med do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos mnyam pa nyid la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang /_dad pas rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /_de bzhin 
[\[147b.7\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bar dag la bye brag ma mchis lags na/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na gang las dkon mchog gsum po sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang /_chos dkon mchog dang /_dge 'dun dkon mchog 'jig rten du 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]'byung bar 'gyur lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang gzhan la/_chos dkon mchog kyang gzhan zhing /_dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang gzhan pa zhig yin la/_chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan pa zhig 
[\[148a.2\]]yin snyam 'am/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/_sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang gzhan la/_chos dkon 
[\[148a.3\]]mchog kyang gzhan zhing /_dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang gzhan la/_chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan pa ma lags kyi/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas dkon mchog gang lags pa dang /_chos dkon mchog gang lags pa dang /_dge 'dun dkon mchog gang lags pa dang /_
[\[148a.4\]]chos mnyam pa nyid gang lags pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma lags/_mi ldan pa yang ma lags/_gzugs ma mchis pa/_bstan du ma mchis pa/_thogs pa ma mchis pa ste/_'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis par mtshan nyid gcig pa lags na/_mtshan nyid 
[\[148a.5\]]ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la/_'di ni so so'i skye bo'o/_/'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'o/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar dag go zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par dgod pa mdzad pa 'di ci las byung lags/_de skad ces gsol pa 
[\[148a.6\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur la/_mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma 
[\[148a.7\]]rgyas te/_chos rnams rnam par dgod pa ma mdzad na/_sems can dmyal ba yod par mngon nam dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_lha dang mi dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bar dag dang /_tshangs ris dang /_'du shes med 'du 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar dag dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dag dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang de bzhin du sbyar te/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres 
[\[148b.2\]]pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag yod par mngon snyama'am/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de lta bas na gang chos mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo la/_chos rnams rnam par dgod pa yang mdzad pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu'i mthu yin no/_/
[\[148b.3\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba de bzhin du so so'i skye bo rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi bar dag kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/_de 
[\[148b.4\]]bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo'o/_/chos mnyam pa nyid las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di 
[\[148b.5\]]ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos gnas pa nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i 
[\[148b.6\]]mtha' gang yin pa de nyid so so'i skye bo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos gnas pa nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' yin la/_de nyid dad pas rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /_chos kyi 
[\[148b.7\]]rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /_brgyad pa rnams dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos gnas pa nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid yang dag pa'i mtha' yin te/_de dag thams cad ni chos mnyam pa nyid las mi 'da' ba'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag gi de bzhin nyid dang /_
[\[149a.2\]]ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos gnas pa nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' ni de nyid yin te/_de dag las chos mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba gzhan gang yang med pa'i phyir ro/_/de skad ces 
[\[149a.3\]]bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad kyi chos nyid gang lags pa de nyid so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos nyid kyang de nyid lags la/_rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_
[\[149a.4\]]phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid kyang de nyid lags na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_gzugs dang /_
[\[149a.5\]]tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa gang lags pa de dag ni mtshan nyid tha dad pa lags te/_gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan la/_tshor ba'i yang gzhan/_'du shes kyi yang gzhan/_'du byed rnams kyi yang gzhan/_rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_
[\[149a.6\]]mig gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang /_chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_sa'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_chu'i khams kyi yang gzhan/_me'i 
[\[149a.7\]]khams kyi yang gzhan/_rlung gi khams kyi yang gzhan/_nam mkha'i khams kyi yang gzhan/_rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_lta bar gyur pa rnams kyi yang gzhan/_bsam gtan 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]rnams kyi yang gzhan/_tshad med pa rnams kyi yang gzhan/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi'ang gzhan/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi'ang gzhan/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dag gi yang gzhan/_stong pa nyid kyi'ang gzhan/_mtshan ma 
[\[149b.2\]]med pa'i yang gzhan/_smon pa med pa'i yang gzhan/_nang stong pa nyid kyi yang gzhan/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag gi yang gzhan/_rnam par thar pa rnams kyi yang gzhan/_snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi yang gzhan/_stobs rnams kyi yang gzhan/_mi 
[\[149b.3\]]'jigs pa rnams kyi yang gzhan/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi yang gzhan/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_'dus byas kyi khams kyi yang gzhan/_'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar 
[\[149b.4\]]mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i chos rnams kyi chos nyid mtshan nyid gcig par ji ltar 'gyur lags/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de la gnas nas/_chos rnams tha dad du bgyis pa lags/_chos rnams tha dad du ma bgyis par ni byang chub 
[\[149b.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang rngo mi thogs lags na/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_sa nas sar 'phar zhing /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis 
[\[149b.6\]]pa la 'jug pa lags/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la zhugs nas kyang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las shin tu 'da' bar bgyid pa lags/_shin tu 'das nas kyang mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dag yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/_byang chub 
[\[149b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par rtse ba na/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/_ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/_rnam par rtse zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi ba lags/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid cing /_de dag las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par bgyid pa lags/_dge ba'i rtsa ba des kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[150a.2\]]yongs su dag par bgyid pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor khyod gang 'di skad du/_gal te chos thams cad kyi chos nyid gang lags pa de nyid so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos nyid kyang de nyid lags 
[\[150a.3\]]la/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid kyang de nyid lags na/_mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i chos rnams kyi chos nyid mtshan nyid gcig par ji ltar rigs zhes zer ba ni/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_gzugs kyi chos nyid gang 
[\[150a.4\]]yin pa de yang stong pa nyid ma yin snyama'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar gyi chos nyid gang yin pa de yang stong pa nyid ma yin snyama'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'o na ci stong pa nyid la gang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid tha dad pa'am/_
[\[150a.5\]]rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi mtshan nyid tha dad pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar gyi mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i chos shig dmigs su yod snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis 'di ltar chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang 
[\[150a.6\]]yin pa de la yang so so'i skye bo med la so so'i skye bo las gud na yang de med do/_/de la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar dag med la/_de bzhin gshegs pa las gud na yang de med par rig par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci chos nyid de 'dus bgyis lags sam/_'on 
[\[150a.7\]]te 'dus ma bgyis pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni 'dus byas kyang ma yin la/_'dus ma byas kyang ma yin te/_'dus byas las gud na yang 'dus ma byas dmigs su med la/_'dus ma byas las gud na yang 'dus byas dmigs su med de/_rab 'byor de lta bas na/_'dus byas kyi 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]khams gang yin pa dang /_'dus ma byas kyi khams gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ni ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin/_gzugs med pa/_bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa ste/_'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o/_/de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas 
[\[150b.2\]]'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis brjod par zad kyi/_don dam par ni ma yin te/_don dam par ni lus kyi 'du byed dam/_ngag gi 'du byed dam/_yid kyi 'du byed gang yang med la/_lus kyi 'du byed dang /_ngag gi 'du byed dang /_yid kyi 'du byed las gud na yang don dam par dmigs su med de/
[\[150b.3\]]'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos de dag mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni don dam pa yin no/_/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa don dam pa las kyang mi g.yo la/_byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba dag kyang byed do/_/shes rab 
[\[150b.4\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/_don dam pa'i rnal 'byor gyi le'u zhes bya ba ste/_brgyad cu rtsa gcig pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid rang 
[\[150b.5\]]bzhin gyis stong pa lags na/_de'i slad du chos gang yang ci yang mi bgyid na/_ci yang ma bgyid cing [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_don dam pa las kyang mi g.yo la/_sbyin pa dang /_snyan 
[\[150b.6\]]par smra ba dang /_don 'thun pa dang /_don spyod pa dag gis sems can rnams kyi don kyang bgyid pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor de de bzhin te/_de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa bzhin te/_rab 
[\[150b.7\]]'byor stong pa nyid ni bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa ci yang mi byed cing [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang med do/_/rab 'byor gal te sems can 'di dag bdag nyid kyis stong pa nyid shes par gyur na ni/_'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo la/_sems can rnams kyang bdag tu 'du shes pa dang bral 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]bar mdzad cing phral nas kyang stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las thar bar mdzad pa dang /_de bzhin du sems can du 'du shes pa dang /_byed pa por 'du shes pa'i bar dang /_gzugs su 'du shes pa dang /_rnam par shes par 'du shes pa'i bar dang /_mig tu 'du shes pa dang /_yid 
[\[151a.2\]]du 'du shes pa'i bar dang /_sa'i khams su 'du shes pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams su 'du shes pa'i bar dang /_'dus byas kyi khams su 'du shes pa dang bral bar mdzad cing phral nas kyang 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings stong pa de la 'god par mdzad pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog 
[\[151a.3\]]tu gyur par mi 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci zhig gis stong pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de la 'du shes pa gang yin pa des stong ngo /_/rab 'byor sprul pa zhig gis sprul pa gzhan sprul na/_ci de la gang stong pa nyid ma yin pa'i dngos po 'ga' zhig yod 
[\[151a.4\]]snyama'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_sprul pa la ni gang stong pa nyid ma lags pa'i dngos po 'ga' yang ma mchis te/_stong pa nyid gang lags pa dang /_sprul pa gang lags pa'i chos de gnyis ni ldan pa yang ma lags mi ldan pa yang ma lags te/_chos de gnyis 
[\[151a.5\]]ni stong pa nyid kyis stong pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_'di ni sprul pa'o/_/'di ni stong pa nyid do zhes rnam par sprul pa zhig yod snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar stong pa nyid la ni 'di ni sprul pa'o/_/
[\[151a.6\]]'di ni stong pa nyid do zhes bgyi ba'i chos de gnyis su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gang sprul pa ma yin pa'i gzugs sam/_tshor ba'am/_'du shes sam/_'du byed rnams sam/_rnam par shes pa ni gang yang med de/_sprul pa gang yin pa de yang stong pa nyid 
[\[151a.7\]]yin no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te 'jig rten pa'i chos de dag sprul pa lags na/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos 'di lta ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa 
[\[151b.2\]]bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad po de dag kyang sprul pa lags sam/_de dag gi 'bras bu gang lags pa dang /_gang gis de dag gi gang zag tu mngon pa rgyun du zhugs pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs 
[\[151b.3\]]rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang lags pa'i chos de dag kyang sprul pa lags sam/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' 
[\[151b.4\]]stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad ni sprul pa ste/_de la la la ni nyan thos kyis sprul pa'o/_/la la ni rang sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa'o/_/la la ni byang chub sems dpas sprul pa'o/_/la la ni de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'o/_/la la ni nyon mongs pas sprul pa'o/_/
[\[151b.5\]]la la ni chos kyis sprul pa ste/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na chos thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang 'di spong ba zhes bgyi/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra 
[\[151b.6\]]bcom pa nyid kyi chos de dag kyang sprul pa lags sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sa dang /_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa'i chos de dag kyang sprul pa lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor bskyed pa'am/_bkag pa'i chos gang ci yang rung 
[\[151b.7\]]ste/_de dag thams cad ni sprul pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang ma sprul pa'i chos de gang lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gang la skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa de ni ma sprul pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de gang lags/_bka' stsal pa/_
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]rab 'byor de ni mi slu ba'i chos can mya ngan las 'das pa ste/_chos de dag ni ma sprul pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du stong pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo la/_gnyis kyis kyang mi gos te/_gang stong pa nyid ma yin pa'i chos 
[\[152a.2\]]gang yang med do zhes bka' stsal pa ltar na/_bcom ldan 'das mi slu ba'i chos can mya ngan las 'das pa yang sprul pa lags par 'gyur ro/_/bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste/_de dag 
[\[152a.3\]]ni nyan thos rnams kyis ma byas/_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ma byas/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang ma mdzad de/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa gang yin pa de ni mya 
[\[152a.4\]]ngan las 'das pa yin no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das las dang po pa'i gang zag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid yongs su 'tshal bar bgyid na/_ji ltar gdams shing rjes su bstan 
[\[152a.5\]]par bgyi lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor ci sngon dngos po yod par gyur la/_phyis de dngos po med par 'gyur ba yod dam/_rab 'byor 'di la dngos po yang med dngos po med pa yang med/_rang gi dngos po yang med/_gzhan gyi dngos po yang med na/_de la gang yang yongs su 
[\[152a.6\]]shes par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba lta yod par ga la 'gyur/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/_chos nyid 'gyur ba med pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/_brgyad cu rtsa gnyis pa'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_
[\[152a.7\]]bam po lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la slob par 'tshal bas/_gzugs 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/_mig gi skye mched dang /_rna ba'i skye mched dang /_sna'i skye mched dang /_lce'i skye mched dang /_lus kyi skye mched dang /_yid kyi skye mched la ji ltar 
[\[152b.2\]]bslab par bgyi/_gzugs kyi skye mched dang /_sgra'i skye mched dang /_dri'i skye mched dang /_ro'i skye mched dang /_reg bya'i skye mched dang /_chos kyi skye mched la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/_mig gi khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_
[\[152b.3\]]rna ba'i khams dang /_sgra'i khams dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_sna'i khams dang /_dri'i khams dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lce'i khams dang /_ro'i khams dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lus kyi khams dang /_reg bya'i khams 
[\[152b.4\]]dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_yid kyi khams dang /_chos kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i skye mched dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i skye mched la 
[\[152b.5\]]ji ltar bslab par bgyi/_ma rig pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_sred pa dang /_len pa dang /_srid pa dang /_skye ba dang /_rga shi la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/_sdug 
[\[152b.6\]]bsngal gyi bden pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/_kun 'byung ba'i bden pa dang /_'gog pa'i bden pa dang /_lam gyi bden pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/_gzugs can gyi chos rnams la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/_gzugs can ma lags pa dang /_bstan du mchis pa dang /_bstan 
[\[152b.7\]]du ma mchis pa dang /_thogs pa dang bcas pa dang /_thogs pa ma mchis pa dang /_'dus bgyis dang /_'dus ma bgyis dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa ma mchis pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa dang /_bsten par bgyi ba dang /_
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]bsten par bgyi ba ma lags pa dang /_ngan pa dang /_gya nom pa dang /_nang dang /_phyi dang /_mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang /_bye brag phyed pa dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba dang /_dge ba dang /_mi dge ba dang /_lung du ma bstan 
[\[153a.2\]]pa dang /_'dod pa dang rab tu ldan pa dang /_gzugs dang rab tu ldan pa dang /_gzugs med pa dang rab tu ldan pa dang /_ldan pa ma lags pa dang /_slob pa dang mi slob pa dang /_'dod chags dang /_khong khro ba dang /_nga rgyal dang /_ma rig pa dang /_lta ba dang /_the tsom la ji ltar 
[\[153a.3\]]bslab par bgyi/_ser sna dang /_sbyin pa dang /_'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang /_tshul khrims bzang po dang /_gnod sems dang /_bzod pa dang /_le lo dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_rnam par g.yeng ba dang /_bsam gtan dang /_'chal pa'i shes rab dang /_shes rab la ji ltar bslab 
[\[153a.4\]]par bgyi/_rnam par rtog pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma dang /_mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_log pa'i smon lam dang /_smon pa ma mchis pa dang /_mi sdug pa'i chos rnams dang /_mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa rnams la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/_nyon mongs 
[\[153a.5\]]ba rnams dang /_nyon mongs pa spangs pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_'khor ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_byang chub dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub 
[\[153a.6\]]sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la slob par 'dod pas gzugs ming tsam mo zhes bya bar bslab par bya'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed 
[\[153a.7\]]rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ming tsam mo zhes bya ba nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ming tsam mo zhes bya bar bslab par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]gi tshe 'di lta ste/_gzugs zhes bgyi ba'i ming 'di ni dngos po dang bcas par dmigs pa nas/_'di lta ste/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming 'di dngos po dang bcas par dmigs pa nas 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[153b.2\]]rnams zhes bgyi ba'i bar gyi ming 'di ni 'du byed kyi mtshan ma nye bar bzung ste/_dngos po dang bcas par dmigs pa lags na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas gzugs ming tsam zhes bgyi bar bslab par bgyi/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par 
[\[153b.3\]]shes pa ming tsam zhes bgyi ba nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ming tsam zhes bgyi bar ji ltar bslab par bgyi/_dngos po ma mchis su lags na/_de'i ming de yang ming tsam kho na zhes bgyir mi rung lags te/_'di lta ste/_gzugs zhes bgyi ba ni ming tsam kho na zhes 
[\[153b.4\]]bgyir mi rung lags so/_/'di lta ste/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba ni ming tsam kho na zhes bgyir mi rung lags so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bgyi ba'i bar du yang ming tsam kho na zhes bgyir mi rung lags so/_/de skad ces 
[\[153b.5\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_byams pa 'di lta ste/_gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni 'du byed kyis mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la glo bur du ming btags pa'o/_/'di lta ste/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_
[\[153b.6\]]rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming btags pa'o/_/'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya ba'i bar 'di yang glo bur du ming btags pa'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[153b.7\]]ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs zhes bgyi ba'i ming ma mchis par ni 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po des ming de rig pa dang /_rtogs pa dang /_'tshal bar yang mi 'gyur la/_gzugs zhes bgyi ba'i ming des ni 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de rig pa dang /_rtogs pa dang /_'tshal bar yang 'gyur 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]na/_'di lta ste/_gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de la glo bur du ming du btags so zhes bgyi bar ji ltar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po des tshor ba zhes bgyi ba dang /_'du shes zhes bgyi ba dang /_'du byed 
[\[154a.2\]]rnams zhes bgyi ba dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po des sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bgyi ba'i bar gyi ming rig pa dang rtogs pa dang /_'tshal bar yang mi 'gyur la/_tshor ba zhes bgyi ba dang /_'du shes zhes bgyi ba 
[\[154a.3\]]dang /_'du byed rnams zhes bgyi ba dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba de dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bgyi ba'i bar des ni 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de nyid rig pa dang rtogs pa dang /_'tshal bar yang 'gyur na/_'di lta ste/_gzugs zhes bya ba dang /_'di lta ste tshor ba dang /_'du 
[\[154a.4\]]shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la glo bur du ming btags so/_/zhes bgyi bar ji ltar 'gyur/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[154a.5\]]'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_byams pa de'i phyir khyod nyid la dris khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob shig_/byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_'di lta ste/_khyod 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang /_de la gzugs zhes bya ba'i ming 
[\[154a.6\]]de la ma brten ma gnas gnas ma bcas par/_'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la 'di ni gzugs yin no/_/zhes bya bar ji ga de snyam sems sam/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/byams pa de ji snyam du sems/_khyod 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang 
[\[154a.7\]]de la 'di lta ste/_tshor ba zhes bya ba dang /_'du shes zhes bya ba dang /_'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /_byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang /_de la 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]bar gyi ming de la ma brten ma gnas gnas ma bcas par/_'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya ba'i bar la khyod ji ga de snyam sems sam/_gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[154b.2\]]ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/byams pa rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di lta ste/_gzugs zhes bya ba dang /_tshor ba zhes bya ba dang /_'du shes zhes bya ba dang /_'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la glo 
[\[154b.3\]]bur du ming btags pa dang /_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar de yang 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la glo bur du ming btags pa yin pa de ltar rig par bya'o/_/byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_ming dang /_brda dang /_tha snyad dang /_
[\[154b.4\]]btags pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de la nye bar 'dogs pa'am/_tha snyad dam/_'dogs pa'am/_mngon par zhen pa yin nam/_bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so/_/byams pa rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di lta ste/_gzugs zhes bya ba 
[\[154b.5\]]dang /_'di lta ste/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar de ni 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de la glo bur du ming du btags pa yin par de ltar rig par bya'o/_/byams 
[\[154b.6\]]pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_'di la 'ga' zhig 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de nyid la/_de las gzhan pa'i 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos por ming 'dogs sam/_'du shes sam/_rjes su tha snyad 'dogs sam/_mngon par zhen par byed dam/_bcom ldan 'das de lta 
[\[154b.7\]]lags so/_/byams pa rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di lta ste/_gzugs zhes bya ba dang /_'di lta ste/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar 'di ni glo bur du ming btags 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]pa yin pa de ltar rig par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na ni 'di lta ste/_gzugs zhes bgyi ba dang /_'di lta ste/_tshor ba 
[\[155a.2\]]dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bgyi ba'i bar du 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang nye bar bzung nas/_ming dang /_'du shes dang /_'dogs pa dang /_rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par 'gyur 
[\[155a.3\]]ba dang /_gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho nar mi 'gyur lags sam/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_byams pa 'di lta ste/_'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po la gzugs zhes bya bar ming dang /_'du 
[\[155a.4\]]shes dang /_'dogs pa dang /_rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa byed pa la/_byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_de gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid yin nam/_btags pa tsam du zad/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das btags pa tsam du bas lags so/_/byams pa 'o na 'di lta ste/_'du byed 
[\[155a.5\]]kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po la tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar ni gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid du dmigs pa kho na'o zhes bya bar byams pa khyod ji ltar de snyam du sems/_byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_
[\[155a.6\]]tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid de btags pa tsam du zad dam/_bcom ldan 'das btags pa tsam du bas lags so/_/byams pa 'o na tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams 
[\[155a.7\]]dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho na'o zhes bya bar khyod ji ltar de snyam du sems sam/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]ldan 'das gal te gzugs ming dang /_'du shes dang /_brda dang /_btags pa dang /_tha snyad tsam kho na lags shing /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ming dang /_'du shes 
[\[155b.2\]]dang /_brda dang /_btags pa dang /_tha snyad tsam kho na lags na/_de lta na 'di lta ste/_ming dang /_'du shes dang /_brda dang /_btags pa dang /_tha snyad tsam zhes bgyi bas gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho nar mi 'gyur lags sam/_de ltar na tshor ba dang /_'du 
[\[155b.3\]]shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho nar mi 'gyur lags sam/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[155b.4\]]byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_gzugs zhes bya ba'i ming dang /_'du shes dang /_brda dang /_btags pa dang /_tha snyad tsam kho na gang yin pa de la ji ga skye ba'am/_'jig pa'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang ba yod dam/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 
[\[155b.5\]]ma mchis lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_byams pa 'o na khyod 'di ji snyam du gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho na'o snyam du sems pa de ci las gyur/_byams pa de ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_sangs 
[\[155b.6\]]rgyas kyi chos zhes bya ba'i bar gyi ming dang /_'du shes dang /_brda dang /_btags pa dang /_tha snyad tsam kho na gang yin pa de la ji ga skye ba'am/_'jig pa'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang ba yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/_/
[\[155b.7\]]bka' stsal pa/_byams pa 'o na khyod 'di ji snyam du/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho na'o snyam du sems pa de ci las gyur/_de skad ces 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci rnam pa thams cad du mtshan nyid thams cad kyis gzugs ma mchis pa kho na lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das ci rnam pa thams 
[\[156a.2\]]cad du mtshan nyid thams cad kyis tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ma mchis pa kho na lags sam/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 
[\[156a.3\]]bka' stsal pa/_byams pa rnam pa thams cad du mtshan nyid thams cad kyis gzugs med do/_/zhes nga mi smra'o/_/byams pa rnam pa thams cad du mtshan nyid thams cad kyis tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[156a.4\]]rnams kyi bar du med do zhes nga mi smra'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du 
[\[156a.5\]]byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du mchis pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_byams pa 'jig rten gyi brda dang /_tha snyad kyis gzugs yod kyi/_don 
[\[156a.6\]]dam par ni ma yin no/_/byams pa 'jig rten gyi brda dang /_tha snyad kyis tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du yod kyi/_don dam par ni ma yin no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom 
[\[156a.7\]]ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/_dbyings 'di ni don dam par ni brjod du ma mchis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te brjod du ma mchis pa'i 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]dbyings don dam par mchis su lags na/_'o na 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang la gzugs zhes bgyi bar glo bur du ming du 'dogs par ji ltar 'gyur/_don dam par mchis na/_'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang la tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_
[\[156b.2\]]rnam par shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bgyi ba'i bar du glo bur du ming du 'dogs par ji ltar 'gyur/_gal te don dam par ma mchis na ni/_'o na brjod du ma mchis pa'i dbyings su yang ji ltar 'gyur te/_'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po ni brjod du ma mchis 
[\[156b.3\]]pa'i dbyings zhes bgyir mi rung lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_byams pa de'i phyir khyod nyid la dris/_ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob shig_/byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_gang 
[\[156b.4\]]gi tshe brjod du med pa'i dbyings dang /_'brel pa'i shes rab kyi spyod pa la gnas pa de'i tshe/_'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang la 'di lta ste/_gzugs zhes bya ba dang /_tshor ba zhes bya ba dang /_'du shes zhes bya ba dang /_'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par shes pa 
[\[156b.5\]]zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du glo bur du ming du btags pa 'di khyod kyis dmigs sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni mi dmigs lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_byams pa rnam grangs 'dis 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang yin pa 
[\[156b.6\]]de brjod du med pa'i dbyings kyang ma yin la/_'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan pa yang ma yin par rig par bya'o/_/'di lta ste/_gzugs zhes bya ba dang /_tshor ba zhes bya ba dang /_'du shes zhes bya ba dang /_'du byed rnams zhes bya ba 
[\[156b.7\]]dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du gang la glo bur du ming du btags pa'i 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de gal te brjod du med pa'i dbyings yin du zin na/_'o na ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'das 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]par 'gyur zhing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par yang 'gyur ro/_/byams pa gal te 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan yin du zin na ni/_'o na mtshan ma de yang mi 
[\[157a.2\]]dmigs na/_'di ltar brjod du med pa'i dbyings de rtogs par 'gyur ram/_byams pa rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan pa yang ma yin la/_'di lta ste/_gzugs zhes bya ba dang /_tshor ba zhes bya ba dang /_'du shes 
[\[157a.3\]]zhes bya ba dang /_'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du gang la glo bur du ming du btags pa de las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan ma yin pa yang ma yin par rig par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_
[\[157a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' brjod du ma mchis pa'i dbyings dang 'brel ba'i shes rab kyi spyod pa la gnas pa na/_'di lta ste/_gzugs zhes bgyi ba dang /_tshor ba zhes bgyi ba dang /_
[\[157a.5\]]'du shes zhes bgyi ba dang /_'du byed rnams zhes bgyi ba dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bgyi ba'i bar dag gang la glo bur du ming btags pa'i 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de mi dmigs na/_bcom ldan 'das ci mchis pa mi dmigs lags 
[\[157a.6\]]sam/_'on te ma mchis pa mi dmigs pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_byams pa 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de la ni rang dbang nyid dam yod pa nyid gang yang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[157a.7\]]byams pa gang gi tshe khyod 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de la rnam par rtog pa de'i tshe/_'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis gzung bar 'gyur ram/_gang gi tshe brjod du med pa'i dbyings dang 'brel ba'i shes rab kyi spyod pa la gnas te/_rnam par mi rtog pa de'i tshe/
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]rnam par mi rtog pas gzung bar 'gyur ram/_bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so/_/byams pa de lta yin na/_'di lta ste/_'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang la 'di ltar gzugs zhes bya ba dang /_tshor ba zhes bya ba dang /_'du shes zhes bya ba dang /_'du byed rnams 
[\[157b.2\]]zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du glo bur du ming du btags pa de rnam par rtog pa tsam du zad dam/_rnam par rtog pa tsam nyid do/_/de de ltar rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la gnas te/_rnam par rtog pa rnams 
[\[157b.3\]]dang bral bar gyur pa na/_'di lta ste/_gzugs zhes bya ba dang /_tshor ba zhes bya ba dang /_'du shes zhes bya ba dang /_'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du gang la glo bur du ming du btags pa de la yod pa gang 
[\[157b.4\]]yin/_gang yod pa ni mi dmigs par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_chos rab tu dbye ba la mkhas 
[\[157b.5\]]pa la zhugs pas/_gzugs rab tu dbye ba'i brtags pa rnam pa du zhig tu rtogs par bgyi/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du rab tu dbye ba'i brtags pa rnam pa du zhig tu rtogs par bgyi lags/_de skad ces 
[\[157b.6\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_byams pa byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_chos rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa la zhugs pas/_gzugs rab tu dbye ba'i brtags pa rnam pa gsum du rtogs par 
[\[157b.7\]]bya/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du rab tu dbye ba'i brtags pa rnam pa gsum du rtogs par bya ste/_'di lta ste/_'di ni kun brtags pa'i gzugs so/_/'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs so/_/
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]'di ni chos nyid kyi gzugs so/_/'di lta ste/_'di ni kun brtags pa'i tshor ba'o/_/'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i tshor ba'o/_/'di ni chos nyid kyi tshor ba'o/_/'di lta ste/_'di ni kun brtags pa'i 'du shes so/_/'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i 'du 
[\[158a.2\]]shes so/_/'di ni chos nyid kyi 'du shes so/_/'di lta ste/_'di dag ni kun brtags pa'i 'du byed rnams so/_/'di dag ni rnam par brtags pa'i 'du byed rnams so/_/'di dag ni chos nyid kyi 'du byed rnams so/_/'di lta ste/_'di ni kun brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa'o/_/
[\[158a.3\]]'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa'o/_/'di ni chos nyid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/_/'di lta ste/_'di dag ni kun brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag go/_/'di dag ni rnam par brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so/_/'di dag ni chos nyid kyi sangs 
[\[158a.4\]]rgyas kyi chos rnams so zhes bya ba'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kun brtags pa'i gzugs ni gang lags/_rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs ni gang lags/_chos nyid 
[\[158a.5\]]kyi gzugs ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kun brtags pa'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_kun brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ni gang lags/_rnam par brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni gang lags/_
[\[158a.6\]]chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa gang 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la gzugs zhes bya ba'i ming dang /_'du shes dang /_btags pa dang /_tha snyad la brten nas/_gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid du yongs su rtog 
[\[158a.7\]]pa 'di ni kun brtags pa'i gzugs so/_/byams pa gang 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la tshor ba zhes bya ba dang /_'du shes zhes bya ba dang /_'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar gyi ming dang /_'du 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]shes dang /_btags pa dang /_tha snyad la brten nas tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid du yongs su rtog pa 'di ni kun brtags pa'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed 
[\[158b.2\]]rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'o/_/'di dag ni kun brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag go/_/'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de rnam par rtog pa tsam gyi chos nyid la gnas pa'i rnam par rtog pa la brten nas/_mngon par brjod de/_gang la 'di ni 
[\[158b.3\]]gzugs so zhes bya ba dang /_tshor ba'o zhes bya ba dang /_'du shes so zhes bya ba dang /_'du byed rnams so zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par shes pa'o zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so zhes bya ba'i bar gyi ming dang /_'du shes dang /_btags pa dang /_tha snyad gang yin 
[\[158b.4\]]pa 'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs so/_/'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i tshor ba'o/_/'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i 'du shes so/_/'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i 'du byed rnams so/_/'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa'o/_/'di dag ni rnam par brtags pa'i 
[\[158b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag go/_/gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/_chos nyid 'di ni gnas pa nyid dang /_chos gnas pa'i dbyings dang /_gang kun brtags pa'i gzugs des rnam par brtags pa'i 
[\[158b.6\]]gzugs rtag pa rtag pa'i dus dang /_ther zug ther zug gi dus su ngo bo nyid med pa kho na dang /_chos la bdag med pa dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di ni chos nyid kyi gzugs so/_/'di ni chos nyid kyi tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam 
[\[158b.7\]]par shes pa'o/_/'di dag ni chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag go/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gzugs gsum po 'di dag las rdzas su ma mchis par 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]lta ba'i gzugs ni gang lags/_rdzas su mchis pa ni gang lags/_rdzas su ma mchis pa yang ma lags la/_rdzas su mchis pa yang ma lags shing /_don dam pas rab tu phye ba ni gang lags/_tshor ba gsum po 'di dag dang /_'du shes gsum po 'di dag 
[\[159a.2\]]dang /_'du byed gsum po 'di dag dang /_rnam par shes pa gsum po 'di dag dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du gsum po 'di dag las rdzas su ma mchis pa dag ni gang lags/_rdzas su mchis pa dag ni gang lags/_rdzas su ma mchis pa yang ma lags la/_rdzas su mchis 
[\[159a.3\]]pa yang ma lags shing /_don dam pas rab tu phye ba dag ni gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_byams pa gang kun tu brtags pa'i gzugs de ni rdzas su med par blta bar bya'o/_/rnam 
[\[159a.4\]]par brtags pa'i gzugs gang yin pa de ni rnam par rtog pa rdzas su yod pa'i phyir/_rdzas su yod par blta bar bya ste/_rang dbang du 'byung ba'i phyir ni ma yin no/_/gang chos nyid kyi gzugs de ni rdzas su med pa yang ma yin/_rdzas su yod pa yang ma yin zhing /_don dam pas 
[\[159a.5\]]rab tu phye bar blta bar bya'o/_/kun brtags pa'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_gang dag kun brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar de dag ni rdzas su med par blta bar bya'o/_/gang rnam par brtags pa'i tshor ba dang /_'du 
[\[159a.6\]]shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_gang dag rnam par brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar de dag ni rnam par rtog pa rdzas su yod pa'i phyir rdzas su yod par blta bar bya ste/_rang dbang du 'byung ba'i phyir ni ma yin no/_/byams pa gang chos nyid kyi tshor ba 
[\[159a.7\]]dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_byams pa gang dag chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar de dag ni rdzas su med pa yang ma yin la/_rdzas su yod pa yang ma yin zhing /_don dam pas rab tu phye bar blta bar bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar gzugs rab tu dbye ba'i brtags pa yang ma mchis la/_de ltar tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[159b.2\]]chos rnams kyi bar du rab tu dbye ba'i brtags pa yang ma mchis na/_'di lta ste/_gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/_/'di lta ste/_tshor ba zhes bya ba dang /_'du shes zhes bya ba dang /_'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[159b.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gang bka' stsal pa de/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ci la dgongs nas/_'di lta ste/_gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/_/'di lta 
[\[159b.4\]]ste/_tshor ba zhes bya ba dang /_'du shes zhes bya ba dang /_'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o zhes bka' stsal/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[159b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_kun brtags pa'i gzugs la rdzas su med pa nyid gang yin pa de gzugs yin nam/_'on te ma yin/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/de la gzugs zhes bya ba ming 
[\[159b.6\]]dang /_'du shes dang /_btags pa dang /_tha snyad tsam nyid gang yin pa de ji ga gzugs yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/byams pa rnam grangs 'dis gang kun brtags pa'i gzugs de gzugs kyang ma yin la/_gzugs ma yin pa yang 
[\[159b.7\]]ma yin te/_gang gzugs kyang ma yin la/_gzugs ma yin pa yang ma yin pa de ni gnyis su med pa ste/_ngas 'di la dgongs nas/_'di lta ste/_gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/_/zhes bka' stsal par rig par bya'o/_/byams pa 'di ji snyam 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]du sems/_gang la brten nas gzugs zhes bya ba'i ming dang /_btags pa dang /_tha snyad du 'gyur ba rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs rdzas su yod pa nyid gang yin pa de ji ga gzugs ma yin pa yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags 
[\[160a.2\]]so/_/byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs de nyid la kun brtags pa'i gzugs des/_de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin zhing /_de'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa gang yin pa de gzugs yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/
[\[160a.3\]]byams pa rnam grangs 'dis kyang /_'di ltar gang rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs de yang gzugs kyang ma yin la/_gzugs ma yin pa yang ma yin te/_gang gzugs kyang ma yin la/_gzugs ma yin pa yang ma yin pa de gnyis su med pa ste/_ngas de la dgongs 
[\[160a.4\]]nas 'di lta ste/_gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/_/zhes bka' stsal par rig par bya'o/_/byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_gang chos nyid kyi gzugs bdag med pas/_rab tu phye ba'i gzugs de ji ga gzugs yin nam/_gsol 
[\[160a.5\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/chos nyid kyi gzugs de nyid gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin pa de yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/byams pa rnam grangs 'dis kyang /_'di ltar chos nyid kyi gzugs 
[\[160a.6\]]gang yin pa de yang gzugs kyang ma yin la/_gzugs ma yin pa yang ma yin te/_gang gzugs kyang ma yin la/_gzugs ma yin pa yang ma yin pa de ni gnyis su med pa ste/_ngas de la dgongs nas 'di lta ste/_gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas 
[\[160a.7\]]pa'o/_/zhes bka' stsal par rig par bya ste/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar la yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_de ltar gzugs la gnyis su ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid la mkhas shing /_de ltar tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed 
[\[160b.2\]]rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag la mtshan nyid ma mchis pa la mkhas pa mtha' gnyis spangs nas/_dbu ma'i lam la zhugs pa'i yongs su 'tshal ba'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta bu/_spong ba'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta bu/_mngon 
[\[160b.3\]]sum du bgyid pa'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta bu/_bsgom pa'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta bur blta bar bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_byams pa byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[160b.4\]]la spyod pa/_mtha' gnyis spangs nas/_'di ltar dbu ma'i lam la zhugs pas gang gzugs yongs su shes pa yang ma yin/_yongs su mi shes pa yang ma yin pa de nyid de'i yongs su shes pa'o/_/gang tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_
[\[160b.5\]]rnam par shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du yongs su shes pa yang ma yin/_yongs su mi shes pa yang ma yin pa de nyid de'i yongs su shes pa'o/_/gang gzugs spong ba yang ma yin/_mi spong ba yang ma yin pa de nyid de'i spong ba'o/_/gang tshor ba 
[\[160b.6\]]dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du spong ba yang ma yin/_mi spong ba yang ma yin pa de nyid de'i spong ba'o/_/gang gzugs spong ba mngon sum du yang mi byed la/_mngon sum du mi byed pa yang ma 
[\[160b.7\]]yin pa de nyid de'i mngon sum du byed pa'o/_/gang gzugs spang ba'i phyir lam bsgom pa yang ma yin/_mi bsgom pa yang ma yin pa de nyid de'i bsgom pa'o/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]chos rnams kyi bar dag la yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[161a.2\]]pa 'di lta bu'i yongs su 'tshal ba dang /_spong ba dang /_mngon sum du bgyid pa dang /_bsgom pa dang ldan pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_byams pa 
[\[161a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa ni zab bo/_/mchog tu zab bo/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[161a.4\]]kyi mya ngan las 'das pa 'di ltar zab pa dang /_mchog tu zab pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa ni/_'di ltar mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma yin/_mya ngan las ma 'das pa'ang ma 
[\[161a.5\]]yin te/_de'i phyir zab pa dang /_mchog tu zab pa zhes bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa ni mya 
[\[161a.6\]]ngan las 'das pa yang ma lags/_mya ngan las ma 'das pa yang ma lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa gzhan gyi don las brtsams te/_'khor ba yongs su mi gtong bas mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma yin no/_/bdag gi don las brtsams 
[\[161a.7\]]te/_mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su mi gtong bas/_mya ngan las ma 'das pa yang ma yin no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]don las brtsams te/_'khor ba yongs su mi gtong na/_de 'khor ba yongs su ma btang bas 'dis ji ltar mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su gtang bar mi 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi don las brtsams te/_mya ngan las 'das 
[\[161b.2\]]pa yongs su mi gtong na/_'dis ji ltar 'khor ba yongs su gtang bar mi 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_'khor ba la yang 'khor ba nyid du rnam par 
[\[161b.3\]]mi rtog_/mya ngan las 'das pa la yang mya ngan las 'das pa nyid du rnam par mi rtog ste/_de de ltar rnam par mi rtog pas/_'di lta ste/_'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa de dag mnyam pas mnyam par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de 'khor ba la 'khor 
[\[161b.4\]]ba nyid du rnam par mi rtog pas/_'khor ba las yid byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la yang mya ngan las 'das pa nyid du mi rtog pas/_mya ngan las 'das pa las nyams par yang mi 'gyur te/_de bzhin du 'khor ba na yang mi nyams so/_/de ltar 
[\[161b.5\]]rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la gnas pa de rigs pa 'dis 'khor ba yang yongs su mi gtong la/_mya ngan las 'das pa yang yongs su mi gtong bar rig par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di
