[\[183a.4\]]cad ni sems can med pa/_srog med pa/_gang zag med pa/_sgyu ma lta bu/_rmi lam lta bu/_brag ca lta bu/_mig yor lta bu ste/_rigs kyi bu chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul de ltar rtog cing chos smra ba'i phyir 'brang na ring po mi thogs par shes rab kyi 
[\[183a.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bdud kyi las la soms shig_/rigs kyi bu gal te chos smra ba dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu la brnyas par byed cing mi sems na/_de la 
[\[183a.6\]]rigs kyi bu khyod kyis phyir dgyed par mi bya ste/_gzhan du na chos don du gnyer ba nyid dang /_chos la gus par byed pa nyid dang /_yid mi skyo bas dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o zhes thos so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag 
[\[183a.7\]]tu ngus sgra de las rjes su bstan pa 'di blangs nas/_shar phyogs ga la ba der song ba dang /_ring por ma phyin par de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis sgra de la ji srid du 'gro bar bya ba ma dris so snyam nas/_de sa phyogs de nyid na ngu zhing mya ngan byed de smre zhing 'dug 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]go/_/de sa phyogs de na nyin zhag gcig 'das par byed/_nyin zhag gnyis sam/_gsum 'am/_bzhi'am/_lnga 'am/_bdun 'das kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par ma gyur gyi bar du lus ngal ba yid la byed pa mi skyed/_rmugs pa dang /_gnyid 
[\[183b.2\]]yid la byed pa mi skyed/_bza' ba yid la byed pa mi skyed/_btung ba yid la byed pa mi skyed/_mtshan mor yid la byed pa mi skyed/_nyin mor yid la byed pa mi skyed/_grang ba yid la byed pa mi skyed/_tsha ba yid la byed pa mi skyed do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_
[\[183b.3\]]skyes bu la la zhig bu gcig pa 'chi ba'i dus byas na/_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/_de lta bu'i mya ngan gyis bu gcig pu yid la byed pa 'byung ba ma gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan gang yang mi 'byung ngo /_/rab 'byor de bzhin du 
[\[183b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu yang de'i tshe/_bdag gis nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur snyam pa ma gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan gang yang mi 'byung ngo /_/rab 'byor de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu 
[\[183b.5\]]ngu de ltar gdung zhing 'dug pa'i mdun du/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs shig bzhugs nas/_legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_rigs kyi bu khyod tshig de skad smra ba legs so legs so/_/ji ltar khyod kyis da ltar yongs su btsal ba de bzhin du sngon gyi de bzhin 
[\[183b.6\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang /_sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su btsal to/_/rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod kyis brtson 'grus 'di dang /_spro ba 'di dang /_'dod 
[\[183b.7\]]du gnyer ba 'di dang /_'dod pa 'di lta bus rjes su 'brang zhing /_shar phyogs nyid du song shig dang /_rigs kyi bu 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgya na/_spos ldan zhes bya ba'i grong khyer rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i ra ba rim bdun gyis bskor ba/_'obs rim pa 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]bdun dang /_shing ta la'i phreng rim bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba/_tshur dpag tshad bcu gnyis/_zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/_'byor ba rgyas pa/_bde ba lo legs pa/_skye bo mang po dang /_mis gang ba/_grong bar dang srang 
[\[184a.2\]]mnyam zhing mtshungs pa lnga brgya dag gis ri mor bris pa bzhin du gtams pa/_khyogs khri nyam mi nga ba dang /_bar bar dag tu zam pa btags pa/_grong khyer gyi khor yug tu zhol gyi phyir rin po che sna bdun las legs par byas shing bskor la/_rin po che sna bdun gyi 
[\[184a.3\]]ra ba de dag gi mda' yab rnams ni 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas pa/_mtho zhing tshad dang ldan pa/_mda' yab thams cad kyi rtse mo las kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi shing skyes te/_rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing tog gi 'bras bu chags pa/_mda' yab 
[\[184a.4\]]shing skyes pa thams cad las kyang rin po che'i tha gu byung bas mda' yab cig shos gzhan dang 'brel pa/_grong khyer thams cad gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas khebs te gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka de dag la rlung gis btab na/_sgra 'jam zhing snyan pa yid 
[\[184a.5\]]du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba 'di lta ste/_dper na yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i rol mo tshogs pa/_rol mo mkhan mkhas pas brdungs shing blangs na sgra 'jam zhing snyan la/_yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba de bzhin du dril bu g.yer ka de dag la rlung gis btab na/_sgra 'jam 
[\[184a.6\]]zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ste/_sgra des sems can de dag rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do/_/grong khyer de khor yug tu 'obs chu 'bab pas gang zhing chu ha cang yang mi grang /_ha cang yang mi dro bas gang ba dag yod do/_/chu de la sngon gyi rnam par smin 
[\[184a.7\]]pas grub pa/_rin po che sna bdun gyi rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa'i gru dag yod de/_der sems can de dag zhugs nas rtse dga' zhing rab tu rgyu'o/_/chu de thams cad kyang me tog ut+pa la dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dag gis khebs pa/_me tog 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]rigs che zhing bzang la/_dri zhim po'i ngad ldang ba gzhan pa dag gis kyang khebs te/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na yod pa'i me tog gi rigs las de na med pa gang yang med do/_/grong khyer de'i nang na skyed mos tshal lnga brgya yod de/_thams cad 
[\[184b.2\]]kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/_rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa sha stag ste/_skyed mos tshal de dag re re na yang rdzing bu khor yug tu rgyang grags kyi tshad tsam lnga brgya lnga brgya yod de/_rdzing bu de dag gi khor yug thams cad nas rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog ut+pa la 
[\[184b.3\]]dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa dag skyes te/_de dag gis chu de khebs shing /_me tog ut+pal dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po de dag thams cad kyang chu zheng du shing rta'i phang lo tsam ste/_sngon po kha dog sngon 
[\[184b.4\]]po/_sngon po lta bur ston pa/_'od sngon po 'byung ba/_ser po kha dog ser po/_ser po lta bur ston pa/_'od ser po 'byung ba/_dmar po kha dog dmar po/_dmar po lta bur ston pa/_'od dmar po 'byung ba/_dkar po kha dog dkar po/_dkar po lta 
[\[184b.5\]]bur ston pa/_'od dkar po 'byung ba dag yod do/_/rdzing bu de dag thams cad na/_ngang ngur dang /_khrung khrung dang /_bya ka ra na da dang /_bzhad sgra 'byin pa dag yod do/_/skyed mos tshal de dag thams cad kyang nga yir bya ba med cing ris su bcad pa med de/_'di 
[\[184b.6\]]ltar sems can dag yun ring por shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_yun ring por chos zab mo la mos pa'i sems can de dag gi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas grub pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu grong khyer de dag gi dbus kyi bzhi mdo na/_byang chub sems 
[\[184b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi khang pa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/_khor yug tu dpag tshad kyi tshad tsam yod pa rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa/_ra ba rim bdun dang /_ta la'i phreng rim bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba zhig yod de/_khang pa 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]de na khang pa'i longs spyod du rtag tu rab dga' zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang /_mya ngan med ces bya ba dang /_mya ngan bral zhes bya ba dang /_me tog sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang /_skyed mos tshal bzhi yod de/_skyed mos tshal de dag 
[\[185a.2\]]re re na yang rdzing bu bzang po zhes bya ba dang /_bzang mchog ces bya ba dang /_dga' ba zhes bya ba dang /_dga' mchog ces bya ba dang /_bde ba zhes bya ba dang /_bde ldan zhes bya ba dang /_nges pa zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'bab ces bya ba brgyad brgyad yod de/_rdzing bu 
[\[185a.3\]]de dag gi ngos gcig ni gser las byas/_ngos gnyis pa ni dngul las byas/_ngos gsum pa ni bai dUr+ya las byas/_ngos bzhi pa ni shel las byas/_nang gi sa gzhi ni ke ke ru la/_gser gyi bye ma bdal ba ste/_rdzing bu de dag re re la yang /_them skas them pa 
[\[185a.4\]]rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas brgyan pa brgyad brgyad yod de/_them skas de dag thams cad kyi bar nas kyang 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi shing ljon pa dag skyes so/_/rdzing bu de dag thams cad kyi chu ni me tog ku mu da dang /_ut+pa la dang /_pad ma dkar 
[\[185a.5\]]po sna tshogs kyis khebs shing /_ngang ngur dang /_khrung khrung dang /_bzhad rnams skad 'byin to/_/rdzing bu de dag gi khor yug tu me tog gi shing rnam pa sna tshogs skyes te/_shing de dag la rlung gis bskyod pa dang /_me tog rnams rdzing bu'i nang du lhung bas/_rdzing 
[\[185a.6\]]bu de thams cad kyi chu yang tsan dan gyi drir phyogs shing kha dog dang ldan/_dri dang ldan no/_/de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'khor dang bcas pa bud med drug khri brgyad stong dang lhan cig tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing 'byor te/_
[\[185a.7\]]rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do/_/grong khyer de na sems can skyes pa dang /_bud med gang gzhan dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang skyed mos tshal lam/_rdzing bu dag na rtag tu dga' zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing 'byor te/_rtse dga' zhing dga' 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]mgur spyod do/_/yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de 'khor rnams dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' ste/_dga' mgur spyod cing de na dus gsum du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to/_/sems can gang dag grong khyer spos ldan na 'khod 
[\[185b.2\]]pa de dag kyang grong khyer gyi dbus kyi bzhi mdor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi khri gser gyi rkang pa dang /_dngul gyi rkang pa dang /_bai dUr+ya'i rkang pa dang /_shel gyi rkang pa btsugs pa/_shing bal bting ba/_stan nang tshangs 
[\[185b.3\]]can bting ba/_steng snying po can du byas pa/_ka shi ka'i ras bting ba/_'phang du rgyang grags phyed yod pa bshams te/_steng gi bar snang la ras kyi bla re mu tig gis brgyan pa bres shing /_de ltar chos la gus par byed pas sa phyogs de khor yug kyang /_me 
[\[185b.4\]]tog kha dog sna lnga pa dag mngon par gtor cing sa phyogs de yang spos sna tshogs dang /_bdug pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu bdug par byed de/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[185b.5\]]pa ston te/_rigs kyi bu sems can de dag ni de lta bur gus par byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyan to/_/de na gang dag nyan pa'i lha dang mi srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang /_
[\[185b.6\]]srog chags stong phrag mang po dang /_srog chags 'bum phrag mang po tshogs pa de dag las/_la la ni klog slob/_la la ni 'dzin/_la la ni 'chang /_kha cig ni zlos/_la la ni lung nod/_la la ni kha ton byed/_la la ni yi ger 'dri/_la la ni tshul bzhin 
[\[185b.7\]]yid la byed pas rtogs par byed de/_sems can de dag thams cad kyang log par mi ltung ba'i chos can de/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]chos 'phags de'i drung du song shig dang /_de las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de ni yun ring po nas khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag 
[\[186a.2\]]par ston pa/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/_yang dag par gzengs stod pa/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu ngas kyang sngon da ltar khyod ji ltar tshol ba bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su btsal gyis/_rigs 
[\[186a.3\]]kyi bu khyod nyin mtshan du yid la byed pa/_rgyun ma gcad par song shig dang /_ring por mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/_de thos nas dga' mgu yid 
[\[186a.4\]]rangs rab tu mgu zhing dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes par gyur pa 'di lta ste/_dper na skyes bu mde'u dug can zhig gis phog na yid la byed pa gzhan mi bskyed kyi/_gang bdag sdug bsngal 'di las thar bar byed pa/_zug rngu 'byin pa'i sman pa 
[\[186a.5\]]bdag gis nam rnyed snyam sems pa de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu yang /_gang bdag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de thos par byed cing /_chos gang thos nas bdag gi dmigs pa yid la byed pa spong bar 'gyur 
[\[186a.6\]]ba'i rigs kyi bu de/_bdag gis nam mthong snyam sems pa ma gtogs par/_chos gang yang yid la mi byed do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu sa phyogs de nyid du 'dug ste/_chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i 
[\[186a.7\]]'du shes bskyed nas/_de ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo du ma mngon du gyur pa 'di lta ste/_chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad mi 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]shes pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad 'gyur ba med par mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[186b.2\]]chos thams cad mi shes pa sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_me tog bkram pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad bdag gi dngos po mi sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[186b.3\]]sgyu ma rnam par spangs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_me long gi dkyil 'khor snang ba sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sgra sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad tha dad pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[186b.4\]]sems can thams cad mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sgra la mkhas pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sgra dang /_tshig dang /_'bru sna tshogs sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ma khengs pa zhes 
[\[186b.5\]]bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rang bzhin rnam par bltas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ming dang nges pa'i sgra dang /_tshig dang /_'bru zhes 
[\[186b.6\]]bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[186b.7\]]dang /_gzugs kyi rngul sel ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rgyal ba thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i mig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos kyi dbyings las nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dbugs 'byin pa sbyin 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_seng ge mngon par bsgrags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sems can thams cad zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdul med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_kun nas 
[\[187a.2\]]nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_pad ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nem nur gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_snying po thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad las mngon 
[\[187a.3\]]par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad las nges par 'bigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad kyi 'byor pa 
[\[187a.4\]]rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad bye brag med par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_lta bar gyur pa thibs po thams cad rnam par spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos 
[\[187a.5\]]thams cad mtshan ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chags pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_le lo thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos zab mo'i 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[187a.6\]]'dzin dang /_ri rab 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'jig rten gsum la mngon par ma zhen pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[187a.7\]]'dzin dang /_'od zer sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams mngon du gyur te/_de ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]'das grangs med dpag tu med pa dag_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rab tu ston pa dag mthong ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis legs so zhes bya ba byin nas dbugs dbyung ba mdzad de/_tshig 'di 
[\[187b.2\]]skad kyang gsung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu nged kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzhin du btsal te/_yongs su tshol ba na yang ting nge 'dzin 'di dag thob ste/_ting nge 'dzin 'di dag thob nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[187b.3\]]phyin pa rtogs par khong du chud par gyur te/_phyir mi ldog pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la gnas par gyur to/_/nged kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di dag gi ngo bo nyid dang rang bzhin la bltas na/_gang mnyam par gzhag par bya ba'am/_ldang bar bya ba'am/_byang chub tu 
[\[187b.4\]]spyad pa'am/_gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos de gang yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo /_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yin te/_rigs kyi bu chos gang gis 
[\[187b.5\]]kyang rlom sems sam/_rlom sems med par mi byed pa la gnas nas nged kyis 'di 'dra ba'i lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu thob ste/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /_'od 'dom gang ba dang /_sangs 
[\[187b.6\]]rgyas kyi ye shes dang /_sangs rgyas kyi shes rab bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin bla na med pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su thob ste/_yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[187b.7\]]dag gis kyang tshad gzung ba'am/_mtha' bstan par mi nus na/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dag gis lta ci smos/_rigs kyi bu de lta bas na khyod kyis chos 'di dag nyid la rab tu don du gnyer ba dang /_'dun pas gus pa mchog tu bskyed par bya ste/_
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]rigs kyi bu don du gnyer ba dang /_'dun pa la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par dka' ba ma yin no/_/khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen la shin tu gus pa bskyed par bya'o/_/phangs par bya'o/_/dge ba'i 
[\[188a.2\]]bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[188a.3\]]chen po rtag tu ngus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang lags de dag gis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu khyod yun ring po nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis bla na med pa yang 
[\[188a.4\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas shing yongs su bzung ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa la bslabs so/_/rigs kyi bu de ni khyod kyi yongs su 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin gyis/_des khyod la ji skad 
[\[188a.5\]]bsgo ba bzhin du zung shig_/rigs kyi bu gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bskal pa'am/_bskal pa gnyis sam/_bskal pa brgya'am/_bskal pa stong ngam/_de las lhag par yang mgo la thod 
[\[188a.6\]]bzhin du thogs shing /_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro byas te/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad phul yang rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 
[\[188a.7\]]de la lan lon pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu de'i mthus khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di lta bu dag rnyed par gyur te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_thabs la mkhas pa thos shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur to/_/de 
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dbugs phyung nas mi snang bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de yang ting nge 'dzin de dag las langs te/_langs nas kyang 'di snyam du sems so/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[188b.2\]]pa de dag gang nas byon/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud snyam ste/_de de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ma mthong bas rab tu gdung zhing mi dga' bar gyur to/_/yang de 'di snyam du sems te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 
[\[188b.3\]]'phags ni gzungs thob pa/_mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/_sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag par bya ba byas pa ste/_bdag yongs su 'dzin pa bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yun ring po nas des bdag gi don byas pa yin gyis/_bdag byang 
[\[188b.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du mngon par song ste phyin nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud ces don 'di nyid dri'o snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[188b.5\]]sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la dga' ba dang /_dad pa dang /_ri mo dang /_gus par bya ba nye bar bzhag ste/_nye bar bzhag nas 'di snyam du sems so/_/bdag gis ji lta bu'i bkur sti bya 
[\[188b.6\]]bas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de'i drung du 'gro bar bya/_bdag ni dbul te/_gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bdag gis bkur stir bya ba'i gos rin po che'am/_gser ram/_
[\[188b.7\]]nor bu'am/_mu tig gam/_bai dUr+ya'am/_dung ngam/_men shel lam/_byu ru'am/_dngul lam/_sa le sbram 'am/_me tog gam/_spos sam/_me tog phreng ngam/_byug pa'am/_gdugs de lta bu yang bdag la med na/_bdag 'di bzhin 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du song na ni bdag gis tshul ma yin pa byas par 'gyur te/_bdag dga' ba'am rangs par yang mi skye'o snyam du sems so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[189a.2\]]chen po rtag tu ngu de lta bu'i yon tan dag dang /_bla ma la gus pa yid la byed pa dang ldan pas song nas mthar gyis grong gzhan zhig tu phyin pa dang /_de'i grong bar gyi dbus su de 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar bdag gis lus btsongs la/_de'i rin gyis 
[\[189a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya'o/_/yun ring po nas bdag gis lus stong zhig cing zad de btsongs la 'khor ba dpag tu med pa na 'dod pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i rgyus yang dang yang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal 
[\[189a.4\]]dpag tu med pa myong yang /_'di lta bu'i chos kyi phyir ram/_'di lta bu'i sems can chen po la bkur sti bya ba'i phyir ma yin no snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus grong bar du 'dug ste/_mi su 'dod mi su 'dod 
[\[189a.5\]]ces sgra bsgrags shing skad kyis bos so/_/de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid btsongs nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur 
[\[189a.6\]]sti byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyad na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_thos pa rgya mtsho rjes su thob par 'gyur/_bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha dag gis mi 
[\[189a.7\]]thub par 'gyur/_yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su thob par 'gyur zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa yongs su 'dri bar 'gyur te/_der sems can mang po dag gi don byed par 'gyur/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de dag kyang nga'i yul las 'da' bar byed/_sems can gzhan dag kyang nga'i yul las 'da' bar byed par 'gyur gyis/_bdag gis 'di la bar chad bya'o snyam nas/_bdud sdig can gyis ji nas bram 
[\[189b.2\]]ze dang khyim bdag de dag gis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/_mi su 'dod su nga nyo bar 'dod ces zer ba'i sgra mi thos par 'gyur ba de lta bur yongs su bsgribs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag 
[\[189b.3\]]tu ngu /_gang gi tshe bdag nyo ba ma rnyed pa de'i tshe/_phyogs gcig tu song nas mchi ma phyung ste/_'di ltar bdag gi lus btsongs la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya snyam na/_lus nyo ba yang bdag 
[\[189b.4\]]gis ma rnyed de/_kye ma bdag ni rnyed pa ngan pa rnyed do snyam mo/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu /_'di lta ste/_chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag gi lus yongs su gtang 
[\[189b.5\]]bar lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin nam ma yin pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la bdag gis bgam par bya'o snyam ste/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas/_byang chub sems 
[\[189b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu ga la ba der song ste/_phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod 'di ltar yid la mi dga' zhing yid gdung la mchi ma 'byung ba ci nyes/_des smras pa/_
[\[189b.7\]]bram ze'i khye'u kho bo ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid btsongs te/_chos la mchod par bya ba 'dod na/_lus nyo ba de kho bos ma rnyed nas/_de la kho bo 'di snyam du sems so/_/kye ma nga ni bsod nams chung bas 'di ltar lus btsongs te/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bya ba dang /_'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur sti bya snyam na/_bdag gi lus nyo ba yang ma rnyed do snyam mo/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u des byang chub sems 
[\[190a.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu kho bo la mis ni bya ba med kyi/_kho bo mchod sbyin zhig byed de/_der mi'i snying dang /_khrag dang /_rus pa dang /_rkang dag kho bo la dgos na/_de rin gyis nyor byin cig ces 
[\[190a.3\]]byas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/_gang bdag gis bram ze'i khye'u bdag gi snying dang /_khrag dang /_rus pa dang /_rkang nyo ba rnyed pa 'di ni bdag gis rnyed pa'i mchog rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/_/
[\[190a.4\]]bdag gi lus ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa rnams la yongs su rdzogs par gyur to snyam ste/_de sems dga' ba dang /_sems bde ba dang /_sems rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/_bram ze'i khye'u la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[190a.5\]]bram ze'i khye'u kho bo'i lus 'di las khyod gang 'dod pa sbyin no/_/des de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod rin du ci 'dod pa sbyin no zhes byas pa dang /_des de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bram ze'i khye'u khyod kyis gang yongs su btang ba 
[\[190a.6\]]de kho bo la byin cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu mtshon rnon po thogs nas/_lag pa g.yas pa phug ste khrag gzags so/_/brla g.yas pa sha med par btogs nas rus pa gcog tu rtsig pa'i drung du song ngo /_/
[\[190a.7\]]de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig khang pa'i yang thog na 'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu brla sha med par btogs nas/_rus pa gcog tu rtsig pa'i drung du song ba mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_rigs kyi bu 'di ci'i 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]phyir bdag nyid la bdag nyid 'di lta bu'i na tsha byed pa/_bdag rigs kyi bu de'i drung du song ste dri'o snyam nas/_tshong dpon gyi bu mo de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu ga la ba der song ste/_phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[190b.2\]]dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod ci'i phyir khyod bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i na tsha dag byed/_khrag dang /_rus pa dang /_rkang 'dis ci zhig bya/_rtag tu ngus bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bram ze'i 
[\[190b.3\]]khye'u 'di la btsongs te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya'o/_/'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bsnyen bkur bya'o/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[190b.4\]]sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod 'di ltar bdag gi snying dang /_khrag dang /_rus pa dang /_rkang yang btsongs te/_rigs kyi bu de la bkur sti bya bar 'dod pa khyod la yon tan gyi rnam pa ci zhig 'grub 
[\[190b.5\]]par 'gyur/_des de la smras pa/_bu mo rigs kyi bu de ni gang la kho bos bslab par bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa dag ston par 'gyur te/_kho bos de la bslabs na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[190b.6\]]mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur/_lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu yang 'thob par 'gyur/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_'od 'dom gang ba dang /_'od zer mtha' yas pa dang /_
[\[190b.7\]]byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyang 'thob par 'gyur/_mngon 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]par shes pa lnga dang /_tshul khrims rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_shes rab rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[191a.2\]]stobs bcu dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ye shes kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'gyur/_gang gis sems can thams cad la kun tu bgo bsha' bya ba'i bla na med pa'i chos rin po che yang rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshong 
[\[191a.3\]]dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di ltar chos rgya chen po 'di dag yongs su brjod pa ni ngo mtshar te/_rigs kyi bu chos 'di lta bu re re'i phyir yang bskal pa gang 
[\[191a.4\]]gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du lus yongs su gtang bar bya ba yin na/_gcig lta ci smos te/_de tsam du khyod kyis chos 'di dag rgya cher yongs su brjod na/_rigs kyi bu khyod gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya 
[\[191a.5\]]ba'i gser ram/_nor bu 'am/_mu tig gam/_bai dUr+ya'am/_dngul lam/_me tog gam/_bdug pa'am/_spos sam/_dri'am/_me tog phreng ngam/_byug pa 'am/_phye ma 'am/_gos sam/_gdugs sam/_khyod la ci dgos pa de khyod la 
[\[191a.6\]]sbyin gyis bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal ma byed cig_/bdag kyang khyod dang 'grogs te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der dong la/_bdag kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu 'di lta ste/_de lta bu'i chos 'di dag thob 
[\[191a.7\]]par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya'o/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byad mi snang bar byas nas bdag nyid kyi lus su/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad ces smras 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod de ltar yi dam la brtan pa ni legs so legs so/_/'di lta bu'i chos 'dod pas sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag gis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_
[\[191b.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad de/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/rigs kyi bu kho bo la snying dang /_khrag dang /_rus pa dang /_rkang gis 
[\[191b.3\]]bya ba med kyi/_kho bo khyod sad pa'i phyir 'dir 'ongs kyis rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dam pa slongs shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod la dam pa ji lta bu zhig sbyin par bya/_des de la smras pa/_brgya byin sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa dag bdag la stsol cig_/
[\[191b.4\]]brgya byin gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu yul 'di kho bo'i yul du gyur pa ma yin te/_yul 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul du gyur pa yin gyis/_dam pa gzhan slongs shig_/byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ngus smras pa/_bdag 
[\[191b.5\]]gi lus yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i gnas 'di la ni/_lha'i dbang po brtson pa chung bar gyis shig_/lha'i dbang po bdag nyid kyis bden pa'i byin gyis rlabs bya'o/_/lha'i dbang po bden pa gang gis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[191b.6\]]chub las phyir mi ldog par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan cing bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa g.yo med par mkhyen ce na/_bden pa de dang /_bden pa'i tshig des/_bdag gi lus sngon gyi 
[\[191b.7\]]bzhin du gyur cig ces byas pa dang /_skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la/_sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i lus sngon gyi bzhin du gnas par gyur to/_/de 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin spobs pa med par gyur nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la lan glan par spobs pa ma skyes nas/_de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub 
[\[192a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu tshur shog_/kho mo'i khyim ga la ba der 'dong ngo /_/kho mos pha ma las nor blangs te/_des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang mchod par bya ba dang /_byang chub 
[\[192a.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de la yang bkur sti bya ba sbyin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang /_tshong dpon gyi bu mo de 'grogs nas/_de rang gi khyim ga la ba der 'dong ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon 
[\[192a.4\]]gyi bu mo de bdag gi khyim du phyin nas/_pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/yab yum gser dang /_dngul dang /_rin po che dang /_nor bu dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_
[\[192a.5\]]gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_rol mo'i cha byad mang po dag stsol cig_/bdag kyang khyed kyis stsal ba'i g.yog mo lnga brgya 'di dag dang lhan cig dgyer gsol/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang /_bdag 
[\[192a.6\]]cag 'grogs te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o/_/de'ang bdag cag la chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bu mo de'i pha mas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu mo byang chub sems 
[\[192a.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de su zhig_/bu mo rigs kyi bu de da ltar gang na 'dug_/bu mos smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de da ltar 'o skol gyi sgo drung na mchis te/_rigs kyi bu de ni lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]tu yang dag par zhugs pa 'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu ma mchis pa las thar bar bgyi bar 'tshal bas/_de chos 'tshal ba'i slad du bdag nyid btsongs la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa 
[\[192b.2\]]bgyi bar 'tshal/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bgyi bar 'tshal na/_de'i lus nyo ba su yang ma byung ste/_de sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas/_mi dga' bar sems shing mchis te/_des nga ni lus 'tshong 
[\[192b.3\]]bar 'dod na/_lus nyo ba ma rnyed do zhes bgyis pa dang /_brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su bsgyur te/_de la 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi phyir lus 'tshong bar 'dod ces bgyis pa dang /_rtag tu ngu des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod 
[\[192b.4\]]par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de la yang bkur stir bya'o/_/nga'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni de la rag las pas/_'di lta ste/_chos 'dod pa'i phyir ro zhes bgyis pa dang /_brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i 
[\[192b.5\]]gzugs su bsgyur bas 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod ni nga mi 'dod de/_nga mchod sbyin zhig byed pa der mi'i snying dang /_khrag dang /_rus pa dang /_rkang dag dgos so zhes bgyis pa dang /_rigs kyi bu des yi ma bsad par de la 'di skad du sbyin no zhes 
[\[192b.6\]]smras nas/_de mtshon rnon po thogs te bdag gi lag pa phug nas khrag gzags brla'i sha btogs te/_rus pa gcog tu song nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/_rus pa dang /_rkang sbyin no snyam nas de khrag gzags pa bdag khang pa'i yang thog na mchis 
[\[192b.7\]]pas mthong ste/_de la bdag 'di snyam du bgyid do/_/mi 'di ci'i slad du 'di lta bur bdag nyid la na tsha dag bgyid snyam ste/_de'i thad du mchis nas 'di skad bgyis so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ltar bdag nyid kyis lus kyi khrag gzags pa 'dis ci zhig bya zhes 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]bgyis pa dang /_de bdag la 'di skad mchi ste/_bram ze'i khye'u 'di la khrag dang /_snying dang /_rus pa dang /_rkang sbyin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nga ni dbul te nga la nor gzhan ci yang med do zhes mchi'o/_/bdag gis khyod la nor 
[\[193a.2\]]gyis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang /_de bdag la 'di skad du 'di lta ste/_chos 'dod pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur sti bya'o zhes mchi nas/_bdag gis 
[\[193a.3\]]de la 'di skad ces bgyis te/_rigs kyi bu des khyod la yon tan gyi rnam pa'am khyad par ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/_de bdag la 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa rnams rab tu ston par 'gyur 
[\[193a.4\]]ro/_/'di lta bu'i chos rnams de las 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi ste/_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag thos nas/_bdag kyang dga' ba dang /_rab tu mgu ba chen po skyes nas/_'di snyam bgyid de/_rigs kyi bu 'di ltar 'di lta 
[\[193a.5\]]bu'i gnas la spro bar bgyid pa ni shin tu dga' ba bgyid pa ste ngo mtshar to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyang yongs su gtong na/_bdag cag la longs spyod rgya chen po dag yod la/_ci'i phyir chos la mchod pa mi bgyi/_'di lta bu'i gnas dag la smon 
[\[193a.6\]]lam ci'i phyir mi gdab snyam nas/_rigs kyi bu de la bdag gis 'di skad ces bgyis so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i na tsha dag ma byed cig_/khyod 'dod pa gang gis 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya ba'i nor mang 
[\[193a.7\]]po de dag khyod la sbyin no/_/bdag kyang khyod nyid dang 'grogs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der mchi'o/_/bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu de la mchod pa bgyi'o/_/gang khyod kyis yongs su brjod pa 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]pa dag bdag gis kyang thob par bgyi'o zhes bgyis shing mchis na/_yab yum gyis dkor gyi phung po chen po bdag la stsal du gsol/_bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu de dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa 
[\[193b.2\]]bgyi'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po drug cu pa ste tha ma/_de nas bu mo de'i pha mas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu de'i dka' ba'i gnas dag khyod kyis bstan pa las na/_chos 
[\[193b.3\]]de dag ni gcig tu nges pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_'jig rten thams cad las bye brag tu 'phags pa/_sems can thams cad bde ba thob par byed pa yin te/_rigs kyi bu de'i phyir de lta bu'i dka' ba'i gnas la spro bar byed na/_khyod nged kyis 
[\[193b.4\]]gnang gis/_bu mo nged kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags blta zhing mchod du nged kyang 'gro/_nged 'gro ba'i skabs phye shig_/de nas bu mo de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 
[\[193b.5\]]la mchod pa bya ba dang /_bkur sti bya ba'i phyir chas te/_pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag ni dge ba'i phyogs gang gi yang bar chad mi bgyid do/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des shing rta lnga brgya yang rgyan gyis brgyan/_bu mo lnga brgya de dag kyang 
[\[193b.6\]]rgyan gyis brgyan to/_/rgyan gyis brgyan nas me tog kha dog sna tshogs thogs/_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag thogs/_gser dang /_dngul 
[\[193b.7\]]gyi me tog dag thogs/_rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dag kyang thogs te/_bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_myang ba mang po mang du bskur nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang /_shing rta gcig tu zhugs te/_bu mo lnga 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]brgya shing rta lnga brgya'i nang du zhugs pa/_de dag gis yongs su bskor cing /_mdun du bdar nas/_pha ma la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa 'khor mang po dang /_shar phyogs ga la ba de logs su dong ste mthar gyis song ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[194a.2\]]dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus rgyang ring mo zhig nas grong khyer spos ldan rin po che sna bdun rnam par bkra ba/_blta na sdug pa las byas pa/_rin po che sna bdun gyi rab rim bdun gyis bskor ba/_rta babs bdun yod pa/_'obs rim pa bdun dang /_ta la'i 
[\[194a.3\]]phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba/_chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis/_zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/_'byor cing rgyas pa/_bde ba lo legs pa/_mi dang skye bo mang pos gang ba/_grong bar dang srang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa/_lnga brgya dag 
[\[194a.4\]]gis ri mor bris pa bzhin du gtams pa khyogs khri nyam mi nga ba dang /_bar bar dag tu zam pa btags pa/_legs par byas pa mthong ngo /_/de'i dbus kyi bzhi mdo na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos kyi khri la 'dug 
[\[194a.5\]]nas/_'khor brgya phrag du ma dang /_stong phrag du ma dang /_'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas/_chos 'chad pa mthong ste/_mthong ma thag tu de dga' ba dang /_bde ba thob pa 'di lta ste dper na/_dge slong bsam gtan 
[\[194a.6\]]dang po rtse gcig tu yid la byed pas snyoms par zhugs pa bzhin no/_/de mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag shing rta'i nang du zhugs bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du 'gro ba ni bdag gi mi cha'o snyam nas/_de 
[\[194a.7\]]nas shing rta de las babs pa dang tshong dpon gyi bu mo dang /_bu mo lnga brgya de dag dang mnyam du shing rta de las babs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu mo la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa bu mo lnga brgyas yongs su bskor cing /_mdun 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]du bdar te/_bkod pa tshad med pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der dong ngo /_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa/_rin po 
[\[194b.2\]]che sna bdun las byas pa tsan dan dmar pos brgyan cing /_mu tig gi dra bas g.yogs pa zhig byed du bcug ste/_khang bu brtsegs pa de'i grwa bzhir/_nor bu rin po che bzhag par gyur te/_de dag sgron me'i bya ba byed do/_/bdug spos kyi snod dngul las 
[\[194b.3\]]byas pa bzhi yang phyogs bzhir btags te/_'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/_a ga ru nag po 'ba' zhig gis bdug par byed do/_/khang bu brtsegs pa de'i dbus su rin po che sna bdun gyi khri bzhi btsugs te/_de'i 
[\[194b.4\]]steng du rin po che'i sgrom bzhi bzhag nas/_de'i nang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gser gyi glegs bam la bai dUr+ya bzhu bas bris pa bcug ste/_khang bu brtsegs pa de'ang dar gyi chun po sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa 'phyang bas brgyan to/_/de nas byang chub 
[\[194b.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu /_tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs te/_bu mo lnga brgya dang bcas pas khang bu brtsegs pa de/_bkod pa tshad med pas brgyan pa mthong /_lha stong phrag du ma dag kyang mthong ste/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang 
[\[194b.6\]]lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang /_lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang /_lha'i gser phye dang /_lha'i dngul sil ma dag gis khang bu brtsegs pa de la 'thor/_mngon par 'thor/_mngon par rab tu 'thor ba mthong ngo /_/lha'i sil snyan dag kyang thos so mthong zhing 
[\[194b.7\]]thos nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i dbang po khyod lha stong phrag du ma dag dang /_rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa 'di la ci'i phyir me tog man dA ra ba dang /_tsan dan gyi 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]phye ma dag gis 'thor zhing mngon par 'thor/_mngon par rab tu 'thor/_lha'i sil snyan 'di dag kyang lha rnams bar snang las ci'i phyir brdung /_de skad ces smras pa dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[195a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum dang /_yongs su 'dren pa yin te/_'di la bslabs pas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[195a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po dag yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myur du thob par 'gyur ba yin na/_khyod mi shes sam/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[195a.4\]]sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum dang /_yongs su 'dren pa de gang na bzhugs/_brgya byin gyis 
[\[195a.5\]]smras pa/_de ni khang bu brtsegs pa 'di'i nang na gser gyi glegs bam la bai dUr+ya bzhu bas bris pa/_'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis rgya bdun gyis btab nas bzhag ste/_nged kyis khyod la bstan par dka'o/_/de 
[\[195a.6\]]nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu /_tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs te/_bu mo lnga brgya dag dang tshogs nas/_de dag gis me tog dang /_me tog phreng gi chun po dang /_gos rin po che dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng 
[\[195a.7\]]dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_gser dang /_dngul gyi me tog ji snyed thogs te 'ongs pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa byas te/_de dag las byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya ba'i phyir shas shas kyis bzhag go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na 
[\[195b.2\]]bza' dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan la sogs pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sngar mchod pa byas nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_chos la mchod pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub 
[\[195b.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_chos gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_tsan dan gyi phye ma dang /_gser dang /_dngul gyi 
[\[195b.4\]]me tog dag gis gtor/_mngon par gtor/_mngon par rab tu gtor to/_/de nas me tog de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi spyi bo'i steng na/_me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa zhig tu gyur to/_/gser dang /_dngul gyi me 
[\[195b.5\]]tog dag nam mkha' la gzhal med khang 'dra bar 'dug par gyur to/_/chos gos dang /_gos rin po che de dag kyang /_rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi dkyil 'khor 'dra bar 'dug par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang /_
[\[195b.6\]]tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas/_de dag 'di snyam du sems te ngo mtshar to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 
[\[195b.7\]]'di/_'di lta bur rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che 'di ltar gzi brjid che ste/_rigs kyi bu 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang /_rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa 'di 'dra na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]sangs rgyas pa ci 'dra bar 'gyur snyam mo/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la dga' ba chen po bskyed nas/_de dag thams cad kyis bla na 
[\[196a.2\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_'di skad du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig_/byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[196a.3\]]spyad pa spyod pa na yang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis/_chos gang thob par gyur pa 'di lta bu'i chos rnams thob par gyur cig_/bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang /_'di lta bu'i chos rnams 
[\[196a.4\]]mngon sum du gyur cig_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti byed pa 'di bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkur sti byed par shog shig_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[196a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ji ltar ston pa bzhin du bdag cag kyang skye bo mang po la ston par gyur cig_/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan 
[\[196a.6\]]zhing yongs su rdzogs pa 'di bzhin du bdag cag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs par shog shig ces smras so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang /_tshong dpon gyi bu mo la 
[\[196a.7\]]sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa byas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur sti byas te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]'tshal nas zhe sa byed cing thal mo sbyar te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[196b.2\]]rigs kyi bu 'di la bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshol zhing 'brog dgon par phyin pa na/_sgra thos pa rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su song shig dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro/_/zhes bdag gis sgra de thos nas/_shar phyogs 
[\[196b.3\]]ga la ba de logs su mchis nas/_'di snyam du bsams te/_bdag gis sgra de la ji srid cig tu mchi bar bgyi/_su las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan pa rnyed par 'gyur ba ma dris so/_/snyam ste/_des bdag yid mi bde zhing shin tu gdung bar 
[\[196b.4\]]gyur nas/_sa phyogs de nyid du nyin mtshan bdun 'das te/_de ltar shin tu gdung bas zas la sems pa ni ma byung gi_/gzhan du na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig yid la bgyis te/_ji srid du mchi bar bgyi ba dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[196b.5\]]tu phyin pa 'di su las mnyan pa rnyed par 'gyur ba sgra de la ma dris so snyam pa dang /_de nas bdag gi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs shig byung ste/_de 'di skad gsung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu khyod 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgyar song dang /_grong khyer spos 
[\[196b.6\]]ldan zhes bya ba de na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes gsungs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de las bdag gis 'di thos nas/_ji ltar gtams 
[\[196b.7\]]pa bzhin du shar phyogs ga la ba de logs su zhugs te/_mchis pa dang /_rgyang ring mo zhig nas 'phags pa chos ston pa mthong ste/_mthong ma thag tu bdag la bde ba 'di lta bu skyes pa/_dper na dge slong bsam gtan dang po la zhugs pa bzhin te/_bdag 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]dga' ba dang /_rab tu dga' ba des khyab par gyur nas/_sa phyogs de nas ma bskyod par khyod las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos so/_/de nyan pa na ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po skyes par gyur to/_/bdag de na mchis pa na phyogs bcu'i 
[\[197a.2\]]'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dbugs dbyung ba mdzad de/_rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/khyod kyi ting nge 'dzin 'di dag ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las skyes pa yin te/_'di la gnas pas nged kyis kyang 
[\[197a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas so/_/zhes de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bdag la shin tu legs par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs stod/_yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas mi snang 
[\[197a.4\]]bar gyur to/_/bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas 'di snyam du bsams te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud snyam mo/_/de nas yang bdag gis 'di snyam du bsams te/_byang chub 
[\[197a.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa chos 'phags ni/_sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_thabs mkhas pa la shin tu bslabs pa lags te/_de de bzhin gshegs pa de 
[\[197a.6\]]dag gang nas byon pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud pa/_de bdag la ston par 'gyur ro snyam nas/_rigs kyi bu khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud pa bdag zhu na/_ci 
[\[197a.7\]]nas bdag de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang /_bzhud pa 'tshal zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur bar/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang /_bzhud pa bdag la bshad du gsol/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/_rtag tu ngu'i le'u zhes bya ste/_brgyad cu rtsa lnga pa'o//_//de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu 
[\[197b.2\]]ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dag ni gang nas kyang ma byon/_gang du yang ma bzhud de/_de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos so/_/de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu mi skye ba la 'ong ba 
[\[197b.3\]]'am 'gro ba med de/_mi skye ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de/_yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu stong pa nyid la 'ong ba'am 
[\[197b.4\]]'gro ba med de/_stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu ji lta ba bzhin la 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de/_ji lta ba bzhin gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'dod chags dang bral ba la 'ong ba'am 
[\[197b.5\]]'gro ba med de/_'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'gog pa la 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de/_'gog pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu nam mkha'i khams la 'ong ba 
[\[197b.6\]]'am 'gro ba med de/_nam mkha'i khams gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos de dag las de bzhin gshegs pa gud na med de/_rigs kyi bu chos 'di dag gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin 
[\[197b.7\]]nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig ste/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid la gnyis su byar med do/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid gcig ste/_'di lta ste/_med pa'i phyir gnyis sam gsum du bgrang ba las 'das pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]dper na mi nyi mas gdungs pas sos ka'i zla ba tha ma la/_nyi ma gung gi dus la bab pa'i tshe/_smig rgyu g.yo ba mthong nas/_der chu btung ngo zhes de dang der rgyug na rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_chu de gang nas 'ongs/_gang du song 
[\[198a.2\]]chu de shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho'am/_lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho'am/_nub phyogs kyi rgya mtsho'am/_byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho gang du song /_rtag tu ngus smras pa/_rigs kyi bu smig rgyu la chu ma mchis na 'ong ba'am 'gro ba lta ga la mchis te/_rigs kyi bu mi nyi mas 
[\[198a.3\]]gdungs shing byis pa'i rang bzhin can/_shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can gyis/_smig rgyu mthong nas/_chu ma mchis pa la chur 'du shes skyed kyi/_de la chu ni rang bzhin gyis ma mchis so/_/chos 'phags kyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/_/
[\[198a.4\]]de de bzhin te/_de bzhin du rigs kyi bu gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pa la gzugs sam/_sgrar mngon par zhen par byed pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa'am/_bzhud par rtog go/_/gang de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa'am/_bzhud par 
[\[198a.5\]]rtog pa de dag thams cad ni byis pa'i rang bzhin can shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can zhes bya ste/_dper na mi de chu med pa la chur 'du shes skyed pa bzhin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzugs kyi skur mi blta ste/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[198a.6\]]pa ni chos kyi sku'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos nyid ni 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la byon pa'am/_bzhud pa med do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma sprul pa'i glang po che'i tshogs sam/_rta'i tshogs 
[\[198a.7\]]sam/_shing rta'i tshogs sam/_dpung bu chung gi tshogs la 'ong ba'am/_'gro ba med do/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la'ang byon pa'am/_bzhud pa med do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]du de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gam/_gnyis sam/_gsuma'am/_bzhi'am/_lnga'am/_bcu'am/_nyi shu'am/_sum cu'am/_bzhi bcu'am/_lnga bcu'am/_de las lhag pa zhig mthong ba las sad pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang ma 
[\[198b.2\]]mthong na/_rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/_gang du bzhud/_rtag tu ngus smras pa/_rigs kyi bu rmi lam la chos gang yang grub pa mi gda'o/_/rmi lam ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]te yang dag pa ma lags pa'o/_/chos 
[\[198b.3\]]'phags kyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/_chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pas rmi lam lta bu'o/_/zhes gsungs so/_/rigs kyi bu gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad rmi lam lta bur yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan 
[\[198b.4\]]pa mi shes pa de dag ni ming mtshan gyi sku dang /_gzugs kyi skur mngon par zhen par byed de/_de ltar chos nyid mi shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa dang /_bzhud par rtog go/_/gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa dang /_bzhud par 'dod 
[\[198b.5\]]pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo de dag thams cad ni 'khor ba 'gro ba drug por dong ba 'dod pa 'dod par 'gyur ba'o/_/de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rgyang ring du gyur pa'o/_/de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las rgyang ring du gyur 
[\[198b.6\]]pa'o/_/yang rigs kyi bu gang dag chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu la de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu'o/_/zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu bstan pa shes pa de dag ni chos gang la yang 'ong ba'am/_'gro ba'am skye ba'am 'gag par 
[\[198b.7\]]mi rtog go/_/gang dag chos gang la yang 'ong ba'am 'gro ba'am skye ba'am/_'gag par mi rtog pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid du rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos nyid du rab tu shes pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa'am 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]bzhud par mi rtog go gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid de lta bu rab tu shes pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nye bar gyur pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[199a.2\]]nyan thos de dag ni yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms don yod par za ste/_de dang de dag ni 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na rin po che dag yod pa ni shar phyogs nas kyang ma 'ongs/_lho dang nub dang /_
[\[199a.3\]]byang dang /_phyogs mtshams dang /_steng dang /_'og dang /_phyogs bcu gang nas kyang ma 'ongs mod kyi/_sems can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba la brten nas/_rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas rin po che dag 'byung ste/_de dag kyang rgyu med par 'byung ba ma yin gyi/
[\[199a.4\]]rgyu dang rkyen dang /_gzhi las rag las pa yin te brten nas byung ngo /_/rin po che de dag 'gag pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang du yang mi 'pho mod kyi/_rkyen de dag yod na/_rin po che de dag rab tu 'byed do/_/rkyen de dag med na rin po che de dag 
[\[199a.5\]]rab tu dbye ba yang med par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sku mngon par grub pa yang gang nas kyang ma byon/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang du yang ma bzhud do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sku rgyu 
[\[199a.6\]]med pa yang ma yin te/_sngon gyi spyad pas yongs su grub pa yin pas/_rgyu dang rkyen la rag las pa sngon gyi phrin las rnam par smin pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin no/_/de dag kyang rkyen rnams yod na/_sku mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/_rkyen de dag med na 
[\[199a.7\]]sku mngon par 'grub pa yang mi snang ngo /_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_pi bang gi sgra byung ba yang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/_'gags pa na yang gang du yang mi 'gro/_gang du yang mi 'pho ste/_brten nas 'byung ba rgyu la rag las rkyen la rag las pa'o/
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]'di lta ste pi bang gi khog pa la brten/_pags pa la brten/_rgyud la brten/_shing bu la brten/_rgyud rten la brten/_mi de las skyes pa'i rtsol ba la brten nas/_pi bang de las sgra 'byung ste/_sgra de yang pi bang gi khog pa las ma byung /_pags pa las 
[\[199b.2\]]ma byung /_rgyud las ma byung /_shing bu las ma byung /_rgyud rten las ma byung /_mi de las skyes pa'i rtsol ba las sgra ma byung mod kyi/_de dag thams cad 'dus pa las kyang sgrar grag la/_sgra de 'gags pa yang gang du yang mi 'gro ba de bzhin du/_rigs 
[\[199b.3\]]kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku yongs su 'grub pa yang rgyu la rag las pa/_rkyen la rag las pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba du mas yongs su grub pa yin te/_rgyu gcig gis ma yin/_rkyen gcig gis ma yin/_dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig gis sangs rgyas 
[\[199b.4\]]kyi sku rab tu dbye ba ma yin te/_rgyu med pa yang ma yin no/_/rgyu dang rkyen mang po tshogs pa las byung ba yin te/_de ni gang nas kyang ma byon/_rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa med kyang gang du yang mi bzhud de/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag 
[\[199b.5\]]byon pa dang bzhud pa de ltar blta'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kyang khyod kyis 'di bzhin du khong du chud par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod gang tshun cad de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med 
[\[199b.6\]]par shes pa de tshun cad khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges shing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_thabs mkhas pa la nges par spyod par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa dang /_bzhud pa med pa 'di bshad pa'i 
[\[199b.7\]]tshes g.yo ba chen po byung ste/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa 'di lta ste/_g.yos rab tu g.yos/_kun tu rab tu g.yos/_'gul rab tu 'gul/_kun tu rab tu 'gul te/_bdud kyi 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]gnas thams cad kyang dkrogs shing spa bkong bar gyur to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_rtswa dang /_shing gel pa dang /_nags tshal ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[200a.2\]]chen po chos 'phags ga la ba de logs su rab tu 'dud par gyur to/_/dus ma yin pa'i me tog dag kyang steng gi bar snang las 'thor zhing /_me tog gi char dag kyang bab bo/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang /_byang chub 
[\[200a.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la/_lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang /_lha'i me tog dag gis 'thor mngon par 'thor mngon par rab tu 'thor zhing tshig 'di skad ces/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyi mthus deng bdag cag gis kyang /_don dam pa las 
[\[200a.4\]]byung ba'i gtam 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa gang 'jig tshogs la gnas pa thams cad kyis ma yin pa bstan pa thos so zhes 'dzer to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[200a.5\]]dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu sa g.yos pa chen po byung ba 'di rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags/_chos 'phags kyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mi byon mi bzhud pa 'di khyod kyis dris te/_kho 
[\[200a.6\]]bos bstan pas srog chags brgyad stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur pa dang /_khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes pa dang /_srog chags drug khri bzhi stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul 
[\[200a.7\]]med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag par gyur pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dga' ba dang /_rangs pa rgya chen po dang ldan par gyur te/_bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]pa rnams byon pa dang bzhud pa med pa bstan pa 'di dris pas/_sems can 'di snyed kyi don byas par gyur pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/_/'di nyid kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'grub par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[200b.2\]]mchog gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la phyir the tshom mi bya'o/_/bdag ni the tshom med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro snyam pa dang /_de dga' ba dang /_rangs pa de dang ldan 
[\[200b.3\]]pas ta la bdun tsam du nam mkha' la 'phags nas/_ta la bdun tsam na 'dug ste/_bdag nam mkha' la 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya'o snyam du sems so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 
[\[200b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu mngon par 'phags pa mthong nas/_de'i sems sems kyis shes nas de la lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dag byin te/_'di skad du rigs kyi bu me tog 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[200b.5\]]chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti gyis shig_/'di ni ngas khyod yongs su bzung ba yin te/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyi mthus srog chags stong phrag mang po'i don byas te/_rigs kyi bu gang sems can thams cad kyi phyir ji ltar khyod spro bar byed pa de lta 
[\[200b.6\]]bur bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med par spro bar byed pa'i sems can de dag ni rnyed par dka'o zhes smras so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin las me tog de dag blangs te/_byang chub sems 
[\[200b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor mngon par gtor/_mngon par rab tu gtor nas bdag gi lus kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mngon par bkab ste tshig 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]deng slan chad khyod kyi rim gro dang zhabs 'bring bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gi lus khyod la 'bul lo/_/des bdag gi lus phul nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi mdun du thal mo sbyar te 'dug go/_/
[\[201a.2\]]de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang /_'khor lnga brgya de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu bdag cag kyang khyod la lus dbul gyis bdag cag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chos de dag 
[\[201a.3\]]thob par gyur cig_/khyod nyid dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bkur stir bgyi/_de dag dang nye bar gyur par bgyi'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus tshong dpon gyi bu mo la 
[\[201a.4\]]sogs pa lnga brgya la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu mo dag khyed kho bo la lhag pa'i bsam pas gnas par byed na kho bo la lhag pa'i bsam pas bdag nyid byin cig dang bu mo khyod kho bos blang ngo /_/bu mo de dag gis smras pa/_khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pa 
[\[201a.5\]]thag pa nas khyod kyi rjes su 'thun par 'jug go/_/khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pas ci 'dod pa bya bar bdag nyid 'bul lo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag rgyan thams 
[\[201a.6\]]cad kyis brgyan te/_shing rta lnga brgya yang brgyan nas de thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la phul te/_rigs kyi bu bdag ni 'khor 'di dag dang /_shing rta lnga brgya 'di dag kyang yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir khyod la 
[\[201a.7\]]'bul lo/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rigs kyi bu de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o/_/
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]yongs su gtong ba'i sems de lta bus myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/de ltar na chos smra ba dag la mchod pa byas nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa nyan nus te/_
[\[201b.2\]]sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_'di lta bu'i gtong ba la gnas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs 
[\[201b.3\]]te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa yongs su dris so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag dang /_shing rta lnga brgya de dag byang chub sems 
[\[201b.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskang ba'i phyir blangs te/_blangs nas rigs kyi bu rtag tu ngu la byin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags stan las langs te/_bdag gi khyim du zhugs pa dang nyi 
[\[201b.5\]]ma nub par gyur nas/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_'di ltar bdag chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'ongs la 'dug pa'am nyal bar byed pa ni/_bdag gi mi cha la 'di ni ma legs kyis/_byang chub sems 
[\[201b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di lta ste/_chos ston du phyir ma byung gi bar du bdag 'greng ba'am/_'chag pa'i spyod lam gnyis kyis gnas par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun gyi bar du ting nge 
[\[201b.7\]]'dzin cig la snyoms par zhugs par gyur cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa las byung ba la gnas par gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]rtag tu ngu yang lo bdun gyi bar du 'dod pa'i rtog pa ma byung /_gnod sems kyi rtog pa ma byung /_rnam par 'tshe ba'i rtog pa ma byung /_bro la brkam pa ma skyes te/_gzhan du na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags nam 
[\[202a.2\]]ldang bar 'gyur bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi khri gang la rigs kyi bu de 'dug nas/_chos ston par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi khri bshams na/_bdag gis sa phyogs 'di chag chag btab kyis legs par byugs 
[\[202a.3\]]la me tog sna tshogs gtor te/_sa phyogs gang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa rab tu ston par 'gyur ba der legs par byugs par bya'o/_/snyam mo/_/tshong dpon gyi bu mo la 
[\[202a.4\]]sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i rjes su slob cing /_spyod lam gnyis kyis dus 'das par byed de/_bya ba thams cad kyang de'i rjes su 'jug go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[202a.5\]]chen po rtag tu ngus lha'i sgra thos te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags zhag bdun na ting nge 'dzin 'di las ldang ste/_langs nas grong khyer gyi dbus su 'dug ste/_chos ston par 'gyur ro zhes grag nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[202a.6\]]dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu lha'i sgra de thos pa dang dga' mgu yid rangs rab tu mgu zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/_tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya dang sa phyogs de phyags nas chos kyi khri rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa bshams so/_/de nas 
[\[202a.7\]]bu mo de dag gis rang rang gi bla gos phud de/_stan gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas/_chos ston par 'gyur ba der bting ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus phyogs der chag 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]chag gdab par 'dod na bdud sdig can gyis chu thams cad mi snang bar byas nas/_ci nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu chu ma rnyed nas yid mi dga' zhing sems sdug bsngal te/_sems gzhan du 'gyur ba dang dge ba'i rtsa ba nub par 
[\[202b.2\]]'gyur ba dang /_mchod pa de yang mi mdzes par bya ba'i phyir chu de dag mi snang bar byas nas/_kun tu chu btsal na chu ma rnyed do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi lus phug la khrag gis sa phyogs 
[\[202b.3\]]'di chag chag gdab bo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sa phyogs 'di ni rdul che ste rdul gyi khams 'di nas byung bas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi lus la phog na mi rung na/_bdag gi lus gdon mi za bar 'jig pa 'dis ci zhig bya/
[\[202b.4\]]bdag gi lus 'di lta bu'i bya ba la zhig pa ni bla'i nus pa med pa'i bya ba la 'dod pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i gzhis 'khod pa dag na/_bdag gi lus brgya stong mang po de lta bu'i gnas su zhig pa ni cir yang ma rung ngo snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[202b.5\]]sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus mtshon rnon po blangs te/_bdag gi lus la kun tu phug nas rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug tu chag chag btab bo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i rjes su slob pa tshong dpon gyi bu 
[\[202b.6\]]mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag thams cad kyis kyang mtshon rnon po blangs te/_rang rang gi lus phug nas rang rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs de chag chag btab ste/_gang de dag la bdud sdig can gyis dge ba'i phyogs kyi bar chad bya ba'i glags rnyed par ma gyur par 
[\[202b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang bu mo de dag sems gzhan du gyur pa med do/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di 'di ltar chos 'dod pa dang /_'di ltar yi dam la 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]brtan pa dang /_'di ltar go cha chen po bgos pa dang /_lus dang srog dang longs spyod rnams la mi lta ba dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir 'di lta ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[203a.2\]]mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa las sems can thar bar bya'o snyam du lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa ni ngo mtshar to snyam du sems so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis khrag de dag thams cad lha'i 
[\[203a.3\]]tsan dan gyi chur byin gyis brlabs te/_lha'i tsan dan gyi chu de'i dri dam pa rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad lnga brgya tshang bar dris khyab bo/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag 
[\[203a.4\]]tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/khyod kyi brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/khyod kyi chos 'dod pa dang /_chos yongs su tshol ba bla na med do/_/rigs kyi bu sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[203a.5\]]pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang lhag pa'i bsam pa 'di lta bu dang /_brtson 'grus 'di lta bu dang /_chos 'dod pa 'di lta bus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag 
[\[203a.6\]]tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi stan ni bting /_sa phyogs 'di phyag dar ni byas/_chag chag ni btab na/_bdag gis me tog gang dag gis sa phyogs 'dir gtor bar bya ba dang /_
[\[203a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos 'chad pa la gtor bar bya ba'i me tog de dag gang nas rnyed par 'gyur snyam du sems so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu lha'i me tog man dA ra ba 'di dag long la khyod kyis sa phyogs 'di dag tu me tog bkram pa gyis shig_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos ston cing seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa la yang gtor cig ces 
[\[203b.2\]]des de la lha'i me tog man dA ra ba khal stong byin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus me tog de dag blangs te/_me tog kha cig gis ni sa phyogs der me tog dgram pa byas so/_/me tog kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[203b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun 'das pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/_chos kyi stan gang na yod pa der 'ongs nas/_stan bting ba la 'dug ste/_'khor 
[\[203b.4\]]brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags mthong ma thag tu 'di 
[\[203b.5\]]lta ste dper na/_bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dge slong rtse gcig tu yid la byed pa bzhin du bde ba de lta bu thob bo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa ni 'di lta ste/_chos 
[\[203b.6\]]thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do/_/chos thams cad dben pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa nyid do/_/chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa g.yo ba med pa nyid do/_/chos thams 
[\[203b.7\]]cad rlom sems med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rlom sems med pa nyid do/_/chos thams cad khengs pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khengs pa med pa nyid do/_/chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ro 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]gcig pa nyid do/_/chos thams cad mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do/_/chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med pa nyid do/_/chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa nyid pas shes 
[\[204a.2\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag pa med pa nyid do/_/nam mkha' mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do/_/rgya mtsho mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do/_/ri rab sna tshogs nyid yin pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[204a.3\]]phyin pa sna tshogs pa nyid do/_/nam mkha' rtog pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtog pa med pa nyid do/_/gzugs mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams 
[\[204a.4\]]dang /_rnam par shes pa mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do/_/sa'i khams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do/_/chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab 
[\[204a.5\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do/_/nam mkha'i khams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do/_/rdo rje lta bu'i chos mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do/_/chos thams cad ma 'dres pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha 
[\[204a.6\]]rol tu phyin pa ma 'dres pa nyid do/_/chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa nyid do/_/chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid do/_/chos 
[\[204a.7\]]thams cad byed pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byed pa med pa nyid do/_/chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]chen po rtag tu ngu de ltar 'dug bzhin du de'i tshe/_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin skyes par gyur to/_/chos thams cad dben zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams 
[\[204b.2\]]cad rlom sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad khengs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad ro gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad 
[\[204b.3\]]skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nam mkha' mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rgya mtsho mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ri rab sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[204b.4\]]nam mkha' rtog pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzugs mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sa'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i 
[\[204b.5\]]ting nge 'dzin dang /_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nam mkha'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad ma 'dres pa zhes 
[\[204b.6\]]bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dmigs su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad byed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[204b.7\]]chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/_de la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'bum phrag drug cu thob par gyur to/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri 
[\[205a\]]
