[\[205a.1\]]brgyad stong pa las chos 'phags kyi le'u zhes bya ste brgyad cu rtsa drug pa'o//_//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'bum phrag drug cu thob ma thag tu shar phyogs dang /_lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang 
[\[205a.2\]]phyogs dang /_phyogs mtshams dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs dang /_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing byang chub sems 
[\[205a.3\]]dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas te tshul 'di lta bu nyid dang /_ming 'di nyid dang /_yi ge 'di nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa mthong ngo /_/'di lta ste dper na da ltar nga stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na chos ston pa dge slong gi dge 
[\[205a.4\]]'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas te tshul 'di nyid dang /_ming 'di nyid dang /_yi ge 'di nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa bzhin no/_/de mang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang thos pa rgya mtsho lta bu 
[\[205a.5\]]dang ldan par gyur te/_gar skyes pa thams cad du yang sangs rgyas dang mi 'bral bar gyur to/_/skye ba thams cad du yang gang dang gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon sum du 'gyur ba de dang de dag tu skyes te/_tha na rmi lam na yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[205a.6\]]'das ngag dang mi 'bral bar gyur to/_/des mi khom pa thams cad ni spangs dal ba phun sum tshogs pa ni bsgrubs so/_/rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen 
[\[205a.7\]]pa'i ye shes sgrub pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'thob par 'dod pa dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par yongs su gzung ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zung shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher 
[\[205b.2\]]rab tu ston cig_/kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis mnyan par bya/_gzung bar bya/_bcang bar bya/_klag par bya/_kun chub par bya/_gdon par bya/_lung nod par bya/_bstan par bya/_kha ton tu bya/_de bzhin 
[\[205b.3\]]gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis glegs bam chen po la yi ge gsal zhing rab tu gsal ba legs par bris te me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang /_
[\[205b.4\]]mchod pa rnam pa mang pos bkur sti bya/_bla mar bya/_ri mor bya/_mchod par bya/_rjed par bya gsol bar bya ste/_kun dga' bo 'di ni nga'i gdams ngag go/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/_de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyi ston pa yin nam/_kun dga' bos 
[\[205b.5\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ston pa lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa bdag gi ston pa lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs 
[\[205b.6\]]pa la kun dga' bo khyod kyis lus kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang /_ngag gi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang /_yid kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong bas rim gro byas so/_/kun dga' bo de lta bas na da ltar nga bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sku 'di la khyod kyis phangs 
[\[205b.7\]]pa dang /_dad pa dang gus par byas pa de bzhin du nga 'das nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yang byos shig_/kun dga' bo ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nub par mi 'gyur zhing ci nas khyod skyes bu tha mar mi 'gyur bar khyod la lan gnyis lan 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]gsum du yongs su gtad do/_/rjes su yongs su gtad do/_/kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'jig rten na ji srid du spyod pa de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par rig par bya'o/_/kun dga' bo de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston 
[\[206a.2\]]par rig par bya'o/_/kun dga' bo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang /_lung nod pa dang ston pa dang kha ton du byed pa dang yi ger 'dri ba dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_
[\[206a.3\]]spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag dang /_khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dang /_mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis/_bkur stir byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod par byed/_rjed par byed/_
[\[206a.4\]]gsol bar byed pa'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas mthong ba dang ma bral ba dang /_dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang ma bral ba dang /_dge 'dun la rim gro byed pa dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o/_/kun dga' bo sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung na spyod par rig 
[\[206a.5\]]par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung dang /_
[\[206a.6\]]tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 
[\[206a.7\]]'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/_yongs su gtad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/_brgyad cu rtsa bdun pa'o//_//
[\[206b\]]
[\[1a\]]
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D11}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya da sha sA ha sri kA pradz+nyA pAr mi tA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal 
[\[1b.2\]]lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab/_bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong phrag du ma'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/_nyon mongs pa med 
[\[1b.3\]]pa/_dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/_sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/_cang shes pa/_glang po chen po/_bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_khur bor ba/_bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid par kun tu sbyor ba/_yongs su zad pa/_
[\[1b.4\]]yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag ste/_gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni 'di lta ste/_slob pa rgyun tu zhugs pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o/_/dge slong ma lnga brgya tsam dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_
[\[1b.5\]]dge bsnyen ma thams cad kyang bden pa mthong ba sha stag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong phrag du ma thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin thob pa/_stong pa nyid la gnas pa/_mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul ba/_ma brtags pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa/_
[\[1b.6\]]mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa thob pa/_spobs pa thogs pa med pa thob pa thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/_gzung ba'i tshig dang ldan pa/_tshul 'chos pa med pa/_shes kyi khe dang /_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti'i sems dang bral ba/_zang zing med pa'i chos ston pa/_
[\[1b.7\]]chos zab mo la bzod pa'i pha rol tu son pa/_mi 'jigs pa thob pa/_bdud kyi las las yang dag par 'das pa/_las kyi sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba/_bstan pa'i chos ston pas bsags pa/_bskal pa grangs med pa nas smon lam shin tu bsags pa/_bzhin 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]'dzum pa dang ldan pa/_gsong por smra ba/_bzhin khro gnyer med pa/_'khor mtha' yas pa zil gyis gnon pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa/_bskal pa bye ba phrag du mar bstan pas nges par 'byung ba la mkhas pa/_chos la sgyu ma dang /_smig rgyu dang /_rmi lam 
[\[2a.2\]]dang /_chu zla dang /_mig yor dang /_nam mkha' dang /_brag ca dang /_dri za'i grong khyer dang /_gzugs brnyan dang /_sprul pa lta bur mos pa/_mi 'jigs pa tshad med pa dang ldan pa/_sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang /_mos pa dang /_phra ba mkhyen pa/_
[\[2a.3\]]khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa/_sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_bzod pa chen po dang ldan pa/_ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug pa la mkhas pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par smon lam yongs su bzung ba/_'jig rten gyi khams grangs 
[\[2a.4\]]med pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mngon du gyur pa/_sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la gsol ba 'debs pa la mkhas pa/_lta ba sna tshogs kyis kun nas bslang ba'i nyon mongs pa spong ba la mkhas pa/_ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtse ba 'bum 
[\[2a.5\]]mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang /_dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang /_ded dpon dang /_na las byin dang /_gzas byin dang /_chu lhas byin dang /_dbang pos 
[\[2a.6\]]byin dang /_blo gros rgya chen dang /_blo gros khyad par can dang /_blo gros 'phel dang /_mthong ba don yod dang /_shin tu yang dag zhugs dang /_rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa dang /_rtag tu brtson dang /_brtson pa mi gtong ba dang /_nyi ma'i snying po dang /_zla ba'i 
[\[2a.7\]]snying po dang /_blo gros dpe med dang /_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_'jam dpal dang /_lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lag brkyang dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /_de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]stong phrag du ma thams cad kyang gzhon nur gyur pa sha stag dang /_thabs cig go/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyi gzi brjid zil gyis mnan nas/_'khor bzhi po de dag gi mdun na lam me lhan ne lhang nge zhing rdzu 
[\[2b.2\]]'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul rnam pa du ma dag yang dag par bstan to/_/spu'i khung bu rnams nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag byung bar gyur to/_/yang de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dA ti'i bu 'khor der 'dus par gyur te/_'dug pa des de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 
[\[2b.3\]]'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_rab tu mgu zhing dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas/_stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs 
[\[2b.4\]]su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_
[\[2b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu ba'i phyir rtag tu skabs phye zin gyis khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /_dris pa de dang de'i lan btab pas khyod kyi sems 
[\[2b.6\]]rangs par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems 
[\[2b.7\]]dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de gang lags/_chos gang gi pha rol tu phyin pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol tu son pa lags shing /_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]'gyur lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu legs so legs so/_/'di ltar khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis zhu ba zhus pa mdzes so/_/khyod kyis yongs su rtog 
[\[3a.2\]]pa bzang ngo /_/de'i phyir khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan par bya'o/_/btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol te/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[3a.3\]]to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' mngon par zhen pa med pa rnams ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol tu son pa yin zhing myur du bla na med 
[\[3a.4\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gang la mngon par zhen par mi bgyi ba'i chos de dag thams cad gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[3a.5\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ces bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_phung po lnga dang /_skye mched bcu gnyis dang /_khams [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag 
[\[3a.6\]]par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med 
[\[3a.7\]]pa nyid dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_'du shes dgu dang /_rjes su dran pa bcu dang /_'du shes kyi rnam pa drug dang /_
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]chos shes pa dang /_rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang /_pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang /_kun rdzob shes pa dang /_sdug bsngal shes pa dang /_kun 'byung shes pa dang /_'gog pa shes pa dang /_lam shes pa dang /_zad pa shes pa dang /_mi skye ba shes pa dang /_ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa 
[\[3b.2\]]dang /_de bzhin du rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rtog pa med pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang /_kun shes pa'i dbang po dang /_kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang 
[\[3b.3\]]po dang /_zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad dang /_zad par gyi skye mched bcu dang /_stong pa nyid [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[3b.4\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_de bzhin du thams cad shes pa nyid dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_mig lnga dang /_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe 
[\[3b.5\]]byad bzang po brgyad cu po dag ste/_gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis mngon par zhen par mi bya ba'i chos thams cad ni de dag yin no/_/mngon par zhen pa med pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol tu son pa yin zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[3b.6\]]byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das phung po lnga gang lags zhes bya ba nas rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i bar du de bzhin du sbyar 
[\[3b.7\]]ro/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi gang lags zhes bya ba nas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du de bzhin du sbyar ro/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid gang lags zhes bya ba nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du de bzhin du sbyar ro/_/pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang lags zhes bya ba nas dpe byad 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]bzang po brgyad cu po dag ces bya ba'i bar du de bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu phung po lnga zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed 
[\[4a.2\]]rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'o/_/de la skye mched bcu gnyis gang zhe na/_nang gi drug dang /_phyi'i drug ste/_de dag ni skye mched bcu gnyis zhes bya'o/_/de la nang gi skye mched drug gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_/mig gi skye mched dang /_rna ba'i skye mched dang /_sna'i skye mched dang /_lce'i skye mched dang /_lus 
[\[4a.3\]]kyi skye mched dang /_yid kyi skye mched de/_de dag ni nang gi skye mched drug ces bya'o/_/de la phyi'i skye mched drug gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gzugs kyi skye mched dang /_sgra'i skye mched dang /_dri'i skye mched dang /_ro'i skye mched dang /_reg bya'i skye mched dang /_chos kyi skye mched de/_de dag ni phyi'i skye 
[\[4a.4\]]mched drug ces bya'o/_/de la khams [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mig gi khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_rna ba'i khams dang /_sgra'i khams dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_sna'i khams dang /_dri'i khams dang /_sna'i rnam 
[\[4a.5\]]par shes pa'i khams dang /_lce'i khams dang /_ro'i khams dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lus kyi khams dang /_reg bya'i khams dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_yid kyi khams dang /_chos kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams te/_de dag ni 
[\[4a.6\]]khams [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad ces bya'o/_/de la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_lam 'phags pa'i bden pa ste/_de dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi zhes bya'o/_/de la 
[\[4a.7\]]rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/_'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/_rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/_ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug_/_skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/_reg pa'i rkyen 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]gyis tshor ba/_tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/_sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/_len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/_srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/_skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrugs pa rnams 'byung ste/_de ltar na sdug bsngal 
[\[4b.2\]]gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag_/'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag_/rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag_/ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag_/
[\[4b.3\]]skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag_/reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag_/tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag_/sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag_/len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag_/srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag_/skye ba 'gags pas rga shi 'gag_/
[\[4b.4\]]rga shi 'gags pas mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrugs pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/_de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'ba' zhig po 'di dag 'gag par gyur te/_de ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis pa 
[\[4b.5\]]lugs dang 'thun pa dang /_lugs dang mi 'thun pa zhes bya'o/_/de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i 
[\[4b.6\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_chos la chos kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ste/_de dag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi zhes bya'o/_/de la yang dag par spong ba bzhi gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed 
[\[4b.7\]]pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed cing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom ste/_sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang /_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed cing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom ste/_sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang /_dge 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed cing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom ste/_sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang /_dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang /_mi brjed pa dang /_shin tu rgyas pa dang /_phyir zhing bsgom pa yongs 
[\[5a.2\]]su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed cing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom ste/_sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa ste/_de dag ni yang dag pa'i spong ba bzhi zhes bya'o/_/de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i 
[\[5a.3\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ste/_de dag ni rdzu 'phrul 
[\[5a.4\]]gyi rkang pa bzhi zhes bya'o/_/de la dbang po lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dad pa'i dbang po dang /_brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /_dran pa'i dbang po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /_shes rab kyi dbang po ste/_de dag ni dbang po lnga zhes bya'o/_/de la stobs lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[5a.5\]]'di bzhin du dad pa'i stobs dang /_brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang /_dran pa'i stobs dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang /_shes rab kyi stobs te/_de dag ni stobs lnga zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan 
[\[5a.6\]]lag dang /_chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag 
[\[5a.7\]]dang /_btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/_de dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ces bya'o/_/de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ngag dang /_yang dag pa'i 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]las kyi mtha' dang /_yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /_yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/_de dag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya'o/_/de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad 
[\[5b.2\]]rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong bar so sor rtog pa'i sems gnas pa/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid de/_de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis mtshan ma med par so 
[\[5b.3\]]sor kun tu rtog pa'i sems gnas pa/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa ste/_de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa zhes bya'o/_/de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la/_mngon par 'du byed pa 
[\[5b.4\]]med par sems gnas pa/_smon pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste/_de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/de la bsam gtan bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'dod pa dag las dben pa/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa/_
[\[5b.5\]]dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_de rtog pa dang /_dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/_sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/_dpyod pa med pa/_ting nge 'dzin las skyes 
[\[5b.6\]]pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te/_gnas pa dang /_de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/_bde ba lus kyis myong la/_'phags pa rnams kyis gang de la dran pa dang ldan pa/_bde ba 
[\[5b.7\]]dang ldan pa/_bde ba la gnas pa/_btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/_dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te/_gnas pa dang /_de bde ba yang spangs te snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang /_yid mi bde ba yang nub pas sdug bsngal yang ma yin/_bde 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]ba yang ma yin pa/_btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa/_bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste/_de dag ni bsam gtan bzhi zhes bya'o/_/de la tshad med pa bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms te/_de dag 
[\[6a.2\]]ni tshad med pa bzhi zhes bya'o/_/de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched de/_de dag ni gzugs med 
[\[6a.3\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi zhes bya'o/_/de la rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/_/nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas/_phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/_/
[\[6a.4\]]sdug pa nyid du mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/_thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub cing /_sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/_nam mkha' 
[\[6a.5\]]mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o/_/
[\[6a.6\]]de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_ci yang med do snyam nas/_ci yang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes med 
[\[6a.7\]]'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/_de dag ni rnam 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]par thar pa brgyad ces bya'o/_/de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'dod pa dag las dben pa/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba 
[\[6b.2\]]can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa dang po'o/_/de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/_sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/_dpyod pa med pa/_ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa 
[\[6b.3\]]bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa gnyis pa'o/_/de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/_bde ba lus kyis myong la/_'phags pa rnams kyis gang dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes 
[\[6b.4\]]brjod pa ste/_dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa gsum pa'o/_/de bde ba yang spangs te/_snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang /_yid mi bde ba nub pas sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/_bde ba yang ma yin pa btang snyoms 
[\[6b.5\]]dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/_thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /_sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas 
[\[6b.6\]]nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa lnga pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye 
[\[6b.7\]]mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa drug pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_ci yang med do snyam nas/_ci yang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa bdun pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa brgyad pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes dang 
[\[7a.2\]]tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa dgu pa ste/_de dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya'o/_/de la 'du shes dgu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa'i 'du shes dang /_
[\[7a.3\]]rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang /_rus gong gi 'du shes dang /_rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes te/_de dag ni 'du shes dgu zhes bya'o/_/de 
[\[7a.4\]]la rjes su dran pa bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /_chos rjes su dran pa dang /_dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /_tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /_gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /_lha rjes su dran pa dang /_nye bar zhi ba rjes su dran pa dang /_dbugs 'byung ba dang 
[\[7a.5\]]rngub pa rjes su dran pa dang /_lus su gtogs pa rjes su dran pa dang /_'chi ba rjes su dran pa ste/_de dag ni rjes su dran pa bcu zhes bya'o/_/de la 'du shes kyi rnam pa drug gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang /_bdag med pa'i 
[\[7a.6\]]'du shes dang /_mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang /_'chi ba'i 'du shes dang /_'jig rten thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes te/_de dag ni 'du shes kyi rnam pa drug ces bya'o/_/de la chos shes pa gang zhe na/_phung po lnga po rnams yongs su sbyang ba bya ba la yongs su gcod pa'i 
[\[7a.7\]]shes pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni chos shes pa zhes bya'o/_/de la rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa gang zhe na/_mig mi rtag go zhes shes pa gang yin pa dang /_de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid dang /_gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]rnams mi rtag go zhes shes pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni rjes su rtogs pa shes pa zhes bya'o/_/de la pha rol gyi sems shes pa gang zhe na/_sems nyid kyis sems can gzhan rnams dang /_gang zag gzhan rnams kyi sems dang /_sems las byung ba'i chos rnams la the tsom med par shes 
[\[7b.2\]]pa ste/_de ni pha rol gyi sems shes pa zhes bya'o/_/de la kun rdzob shes pa gang zhe na/_lam shes pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni kun rdzob shes pa zhes bya'o/_/de la sdug bsngal shes pa gang zhe na/_sdug bsngal skye ba dang gnas pa shes pa ste/_de ni sdug bsngal shes pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[7b.3\]]de la kun 'byung ba shes pa gang zhe na/_kun 'byung ba spong ba shes pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni kun 'byung ba shes pa zhes bya'o/_/de la 'gog pa shes pa gang zhe na/_sdug bsngal 'gog pa shes pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni 'gog pa shes pa zhes bya'o/_/de la lam shes pa gang zhe na/_
[\[7b.4\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni lam shes pa zhes bya'o/_/de la zad pa shes pa gang zhe na/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug rnams zad par shes pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni zad par shes pa zhes bya'o/_/de la mi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na/_
[\[7b.5\]]srid pa'i 'gro ba rnams su mi skye ba shes pa ste/_de ni mi skye ba shes pa zhes bya'o/_/de la ji lta ba bzhin shes pa gang zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes gang yin pa ste/_de ni ji lta ba bzhin shes pa zhes bya'o/_/de la mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i 
[\[7b.6\]]dbang po gang zhe na/_gang zag slob pa mngon par rtogs par ma gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /_dran pa'i dbang po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /_shes rab kyi dbang po gang yin pa ste/_de ni mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o/_/
[\[7b.7\]]de la kun shes pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/_gang zag slob pa mngon par rtogs par gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang /_brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /_dran pa'i dbang po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /_shes rab kyi dbang po gang yin pa ste/_de ni kun shes pa'i dbang po zhes 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]bya'o/_/de la kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/_gang zag mi slob pa 'di lta ste/_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[8a.2\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang /_brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /_dran pa'i dbang po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /_shes rab kyi dbang po ste/_de ni kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o/_/de la rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_
[\[8a.3\]]'dod pa dag las dben pa/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/_dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa ste/_de ni rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o/_/de la rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_
[\[8a.4\]]bsam gtan dang po dang bsam gtan gnyis pa'i bar gang yin pa ste de ni rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/_/de la mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_bsam gtan dang po nas bzung ste/_'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi bar du snyoms par 'jug 
[\[8a.5\]]pa ste/_de ni mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/_/de la zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nang gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chung ngu kha dog bzang po dang /_kha dog ngan pa rnams la lta zhing gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan 
[\[8a.6\]]nas shes zil gyis mnan nas mthong ste/_de lta bur 'du shes par 'gyur ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang po'o/_/nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chen por gyur pa kha dog bzang po dang /_kha dog ngan pa rnams la lta zhing gzugs de dag zil gyis 
[\[8a.7\]]mnan nas shes zil gyis mnan nas mthong ste/_de lta bur 'du shes par gyur pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis pa'o/_/nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po kha dog sngon po sngon po lta bur ston pa/_'od sngon po 'byung ba rnams la 'di lta 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]ste/_dper na zar ma'i me tog gam/_yul bA ra nA si'i ras phun sum tshogs pa sngon po kha dog sngon po sngon po lta bur ston pa/_'od sngon po 'byung ba de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po kha dog sngon po sngon po lta bur ston pa/_'od sngon po 'byung ba 
[\[8b.2\]]rnams la lta ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gsum pa'o/_/nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po kha dog ser po ser po lta bur ston pa/_'od ser po 'byung ba rnams la 'di lta ste/_dper na dong ka'i me tog gam/_yul bA ra nA si'i ras phun sum 
[\[8b.3\]]tshogs pa ser po/_kha dog ser po ser po lta bur ston pa/_'od ser po 'byung ba de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas/_phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po kha dog ser po ser po lta bur ston pa/_'od ser po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bzhi pa'o/_/
[\[8b.4\]]nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas/_phyi rol gyi gzugs dmar po kha dog dmar po/_dmar po lta bur ston pa/_'od dmar po 'byung ba rnams la 'di lta ste/_dper na ban du dzi ba'i me tog gam/_yul bA ra nA si'i ras phun sum tshogs pa dmar po kha dog dmar po/_dmar po 
[\[8b.5\]]lta bur ston pa/_'od dmar po 'byung ba de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas/_phyi rol gyi gzugs dmar po kha dog dmar po/_dmar po lta bur ston pa/_'od dmar po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched lnga pa'o/_/nang gzugs med par 
[\[8b.6\]]'du shes pas/_phyi rol gyi gzugs dkar po kha dog dkar po/_dkar po lta bur ston pa/_'od dkar po 'byung ba rnams la 'di lta ste/_dper na skar ma pa ba sangs kyi mdog dkar po kha dog dkar po/_dkar po lta bur ston pa/_'od dkar po 'byung ba de bzhin du nang gzugs 
[\[8b.7\]]med par 'du shes pas/_phyi rol gyi gzugs dkar po kha dog dkar po/_dkar po lta bur ston pa/_'od dkar po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched drug pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /_sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/_nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bdun pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du nam 
[\[9a.2\]]mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad pa ste/_de dag ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad ces bya'o/_/
[\[9a.3\]]de la zad par gyi skye mched bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_zad par sa dang /_zad par chu dang /_zad par me dang /_zad par rlung dang /_zad par nam mkha' dang /_zad par sngon po dang /_zad par ser po dang /_zad par dmar po dang /_zad par dkar po dang /_zad par rnam 
[\[9a.4\]]par shes pa ste/_de dag ni zad par gyi skye mched bcu zhes bya ste/_khams thams cad sa'i khams su mos par byed de/_thams cad kyang sa'i khams kho nar khams gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/khams thams cad chu'i khams su mos par byed de/_thams cad kyang chu'i khams kho 
[\[9a.5\]]nar khams gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/khams thams cad me'i khams su mos par byed de/_thams cad kyang me'i khams kho nar khams gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/khams thams cad rlung gi khams su mos par byed de/_thams cad kyang rlung gi khams kho nar khams gcig tu 'gyur 
[\[9a.6\]]ro/_/khams thams cad nam mkha'i khams su mos par byed de/_thams cad kyang nam mkha'i khams kho nar khams gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/khams thams cad sngon por mos par byed de/_de thams cad kyang sngon po nyid du 'gyur ro/_khams thams cad ser por mos par 
[\[9a.7\]]byed de/_de thams cad kyang ser po kho nar 'gyur ro/_/khams thams cad dmar por mos par byed de/_de thams cad kyang dmar po kho nar 'gyur ro/_/khams thams cad dkar por mos par byed de/_de thams cad kyang dkar po kho nar 'gyur ro/_/khams thams 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]cad rnam par shes par mos par byed de/_thams cad kyang rnam par shes pa kho nar khams gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/sa dang /_chu dang /_me dang /_rlung dang /_nam mkha' dang /_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_rnam par shes pa thams cad kyang gcig kho 
[\[9b.2\]]nar 'gyur te/_de ni zad par gyi skye mched rnams zhes bya'o/_/zad par du skye ba rgyas par byed pas de ni zad par gyi skye mched rnams zhes bya'o/_/re re yang skye mched thams cad du 'gyur te de'i phyir zad par gyi skye mched rnams zhes bya'o/_/de la stong pa nyid [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad gang zhe na/_'di 
[\[9b.3\]]lta ste/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma 
[\[9b.4\]]dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong ba nyid dang /_/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med 
[\[9b.5\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/_/de la nang stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_nang gi chos rnams zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid de/_de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /_'jig pa med pa'i phyir mig ni mig gis stong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i 
[\[9b.6\]]rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /_'jig pa med pa'i phyir rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid ni yid kyis stong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/_de ni nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/de la phyi stong pa 
[\[9b.7\]]nyid gang zhe na/_phyi'i chos rnams zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos rnams te/_de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /_'jig pa med pa'i phyir gzugs rnams ni gzugs rnams kyis stong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /_'jig pa med pa'i phyir sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos rnams ni chos rnams kyis stong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/_de ni phyi stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/
[\[10a.2\]]de la phyi nang stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_phyi dang nang gi chos rnams zhes bya ba ni nang gi skye mched drug dang phyi'i skye mched drug ste/_de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /_'jig pa med pa'i phyir nang gi chos rnams ni nang gi chos rnams kyis stong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin 
[\[10a.3\]]de yin pa'i phyir ro/_/ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang 'jig pa med pa'i phyir phyi'i chos rnams kyang phyi'i chos rnams kyis stong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/_de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_ther zug 
[\[10a.4\]]tu gnas pa med pa dang /_'jig pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa'i stong pa nyid des kyang chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid stong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/_de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/de la chen po stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_
[\[10a.5\]]ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /_'jig pa med pa'i phyir shar phyogs ni shar phyogs kyis stong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /_'jig pa med pa'i phyir lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_phyogs mtshams bzhi ste/_
[\[10a.6\]]phyogs de brgyad kyang de bzhin no/_/steng gi phyogs ni steng gi phyogs kyis stong ngo /_/'og gi phyogs kyang 'og gi phyogs kyis stong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/_de ni chen po stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/de la don dam pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_don dam 
[\[10a.7\]]pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba la don dam pa zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ste/_de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /_'jig pa med pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa ni mya ngan las 'das pas stong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/_de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ces 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]bya'o/_/de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_'dus byas zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams te/_de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /_'jig pa med pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams ni 'dod pa'i khams kyis stong ngo /_/de bzhin du 
[\[10b.2\]]gzugs kyi khams ni gzugs kyi khams kyis stong ngo /_/gzugs med pa'i khams ni gzugs med pa'i khams kyis stong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te de ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_'dus ma byas zhes bya ba ni 
[\[10b.3\]]chos gang la skye ba med pa dang gnas pa med pa dang /_'jig pa med pa dang gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa ste/_de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang 'jig pa med pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas ni 'dus ma byas kyis stong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/_de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces 
[\[10b.4\]]bya'o/_/de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang rnam par 'jig pa med pa'i phyir chos gang la skye ba shin tu mi dmigs pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/_de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa 
[\[10b.5\]]nyid gang zhe na/_ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang 'jig pa med pa'i phyir chos gang la 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/_de ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /_
[\[10b.6\]]'jig pa med pa'i phyir gang la chos gang yang dor du med pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te de ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/de la rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang 'jig pa med pa'i phyir 'dus byas sam/_'dus ma byas kyi chos thams 
[\[10b.7\]]cad kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni nyan thos rnams kyis ma byas rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ma byas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ma mdzad pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/_de ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]ces bya'o/_/de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_rang gi mtshan nyid ces bya ba la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ni gzugs su rung ba/_tshor ba'i mtshan nyid ni myong ba/_'du shes kyi mtshan nyid ni kun tu shes par byed pa/_'du byed rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni mngon par 
[\[11a.2\]]'du byed pa/_rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam par shes par byed pa ste/_'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa'i bar du de bzhin du sbyar te/_ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /_'jig pa med pa'i phyir 
[\[11a.3\]]mtshan nyid de dag thams cad ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/_de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_chos thams cad ces bya ba ni phung po lnga dang /_skye mched bcu gnyis 
[\[11a.4\]]dang /_khams [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_chos gzugs can rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i chos rnams dang /_'dus byas kyi chos rnams dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams te/_de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /_'jig pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni chos thams cad kyis 
[\[11a.5\]]stong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/_de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_de yang ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /_'jig pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad mi dmigs pa gang yin pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang 
[\[11a.6\]]bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/_de ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_gang la dngos po 'ga' yang mi dmigs pa ste/_de ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid 
[\[11a.7\]]gang yang med pa ste/_de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid 'ga' yang med pa ste/_de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang dngos po ni dngos pos stong ngo //
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]dngos po med pa ni dngos po med pas stong ngo /_/ngo bo nyid ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo /_/gzhan gyi dngos po ni gzhan gyi dngos pos stong ngo /_/de la dngos po gang zhe na/_dngos po zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga po rnams te/_'di lta ste/_gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams 
[\[11b.2\]]dang /_rnam par shes pa ste/_de la dngos po ni dngos pos stong ngo /_/ji ltar na dngos po med pa dngos po med pas stong zhe na/_dngos po med pa zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/_de la 'dus ma byas pa ni 'dus ma byas kyis stong ngo /_/de bzhin du dngos po med pa ni dngos po med pas stong ngo /_/
[\[11b.3\]]ji ltar na ngo bo nyid ngo bo nyid kyis stong zhe na/_chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni shes pas kyang ma byas/_mthong bas kyang ma byas/_gang gis kyang ma byas pa ste/_de ni ngo bo nyid ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa zhes bya'o/_/ji ltar na gzhan gyi dngos po gzhan gyi dngos pos stong zhe na/_gang 
[\[11b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung /_chos rnams kyi chos gnas pa nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_phyin ci ma log pa de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid 
[\[11b.5\]]dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' ni gnas pa nyid de/_chos 'di dag gi gzhan gyi stong pa gang yin pa de ni gzhan gyi dngos po gzhan gyi dngos pos stong pa zhes bya ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mngon par zhen par mi bya ba'i chos thams cad 
[\[11b.6\]]ni de dag yin no/_/mngon par zhen pa med pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol tu son pa yin zhing /_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las/_gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya 
[\[11b.7\]]ste dang po'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa/_bam po gnyis pa/_de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_de bzhin 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]gshegs pas gnas la yang gnas su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/_gnas ma yin pa la yang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i las rnams dang /_las yang dag par 
[\[12a.2\]]len pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa gnas kyi sgo dang /_rgyu'i sgo nas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams dum pa/_khams sna tshogs pa/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /_des sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang zag gzhan rnams 
[\[12a.3\]]kyi mos pa sna tshogs nyid dang /_mos pa du ma nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /_des sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang zag gzhan rnams kyi dbang po mchog dang /_mchog ma yin pa nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /_thams cad du 'gro 
[\[12a.4\]]ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_ldang ba shes pa yang dag pa 
[\[12a.5\]]ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /_sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran pa dang /_sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang /_skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /_zag pa rnams zad pas zag pa med par sems rnam par grol ba dang /_shes rab rnam par grol ba'i tshe 'di 
[\[12a.6\]]nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te gnas shing bdag gi skye ba ni zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa ni spyad do/_/bdag gi bya ba ni byas so/_/srid pa ni 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes bya ba ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yin 
[\[12a.7\]]no/_/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de la mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/_nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas pa na/_'dir chos 'di dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so zhes dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_su yang rung ba 'ga' 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]zhig 'jig rten na chos dang 'thun par bdag la rgol ba'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_ngas rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas bde ba thob ste/_gnas shing bag tsha ba med pa thob la mi 'jigs pa thob ste/_gnas kyis khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/_/
[\[12b.2\]]'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrag go/_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo sngon dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_sus kyang chos dang 'thun par ma bskor ba rab tu bskor ro zhes bya ba dang /_nga zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas na 'dir zag pa 'di dag ma zad 
[\[12b.3\]]do zhes dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_su yang rung ba 'ga' zhig 'jig rten na chos dang 'thun par bdag la rgol ba'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_ngas rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas bde ba thob ste/_gnas shing bag tsha ba med pa 
[\[12b.4\]]thob la mi 'jigs pa thob ste/_gnas kyis khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/_/'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrag go/_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo sngon dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_sus kyang 'jig rten na chos dang 'thun 
[\[12b.5\]]par ma bskor bar bskor ro zhes bya ba dang /_ngas bar du gcod pa'i chos gang dag bshad pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_de ni gnas med do zhes dam bcas na 'dir dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_/bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_su yang rung ba 'ga' zhig 
[\[12b.6\]]'jig rten na chos dang 'thun par bdag la rgol ba'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_ngas rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas bde ba thob ste/_gnas shing bag tsha ba med pa thob la mi 'jigs pa thob ste/_gnas kyis khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/_/'khor 
[\[12b.7\]]gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrag go/_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo sngon dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang 'thun par ma bskor bar bskor ro zhes bya ba dang /_ngas nyan thos rnams la 'phags pa nges par 'byin pa 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]nges par 'byed pa de byed pa sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur ba'i lam gang bshad pa de bsgrubs na/_nges par 'byin pa ma yin zhing sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par mi 'gyur te/_de ni gnas med do zhes 'dir dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_
[\[13a.2\]]bdud dam tshangs pa'am/_su yang rung ba 'ga' zhig 'jig rten na chos dang 'thun par rgol ba'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_ngas rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_bde ba thob ste gnas shing bag tsha ba med pa thob la mi 'jigs pa 'thob ste/_gnas kyis khyu mchog 
[\[13a.3\]]rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/_/'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrag go/_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo sngon dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang 'thun par ma bskor ba rab tu bskor ro zhes bya ba ste/_de 
[\[13a.4\]]dag ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi zhes bya'o/_/de la so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_don so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ste/_de dag ni 
[\[13a.5\]]so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zhes bya'o/_/de la byams pa chen po gang zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la dgra bo dang /_mdza' bshes la 'dra bar mdzad pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni byams pa chen po zhes bya'o/_/de la snying rje chen po gang zhe na/_sems can yod 
[\[13a.6\]]pa ma yin pa'i sems can rnams la byams pa mi gtong ba gang yin pa ste/_de ni snying rje chen po zhes bya'o/_/de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul ba med pa dang /_ca co med pa dang /_bsnyel ba med pa dang /_
[\[13a.7\]]tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa dang /_sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa med pa dang /_so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa dang /_'dun pa nyams pa med pa dang /_brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa dang /_dran pa nyams pa med pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa dang /_shes 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]rab nyams pa med pa dang /_rnam par grol ba nyams pa med pa dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba nyams pa med pa dang /_lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 
[\[13b.2\]]'brang ba dang /_yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i dus la 
[\[13b.3\]]ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa ste/_de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad ces bya'o/_/de la thams cad shes pa nyid gang zhe na/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams skye mched bcu gnyis po dag la gang zag la bdag med par phyogs gcig 
[\[13b.4\]]shes pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni thams cad shes pa nyid ces bya'o/_/de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' theg pa gsum gyi lam shes kyang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas dga' bar mi sems kyi/_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[13b.5\]]lam gyis nges par 'byung ba gang yin pa ste/_de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bya'o/_/de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pas dus gsum po dag tu rnam pa thams cad du chos thams cad la the tshom med par mkhyen pa gang yin pa ste/_
[\[13b.6\]]de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o/_/de la pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha 
[\[13b.7\]]rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug ces bya'o/_/de la mngon par shes pa drug gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bya ba shes pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /_lha'i mig shes pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]shes pa dang /_lha'i rna ba shes pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /_pha rol gyi sems shes pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /_sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /_zag pa 
[\[14a.2\]]zad pa shes pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ste/_de dag ni mngon par shes pa drug ces bya'o/_/de la mig lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sha'i mig dang /_lha'i mig dang /_shes rab kyi mig dang /_chos kyi mig dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mig ste/_de dag ni mig lnga zhes 
[\[14a.3\]]bya'o/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bcom ldan 'das ni zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/de la zhabs shin tu gnas pa ni 'di yin te/_zhabs kyi 'og gi mthil gnyis thams cad kyis sa la kun tu 
[\[14a.4\]]reg pa ste/_dper na za ma tog gi zhabs mnyam zhing zhabs phyang nge ba sa gzhi shin tu mnyam pa la gzhag na/_'og gi zhabs thams cad kyis sa la kun tu reg par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das ni zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni mu khyud 
[\[14a.5\]]khor yug dang ldan pa yin no/_/de la mu khyud khor yug dang ldan pa ni 'di yin te/_zhabs kyi 'og gi mthil gnyis la 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa lte ba dang bcas pa mu khyud dang bcas pa rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa mdzes par skyes pa gang dag yin pa'o/_/bcom 
[\[14a.6\]]ldan 'das ni phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa yin no/_/de la phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa nyid ni 'di yin te dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba'am/_ras bal gyi 'da' ba lta bu ste/_ji ltar mi gzhan dag la med pa lta bu yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[14a.7\]]ni sor mo ring ba yin no/_/de la sor mo ring ba nyid ni 'di yin te/_de'i phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dag lhag par ring ba ste/_ji ltar mi gzhan dag la med pa lta bu yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni phyag dang zhabs dra ba dang ldan pa yin te/_de'i phyag dang zhabs la dra ba lhag pa dag skyes te/_ji 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]ltar mi gzhan dag la med pa lta bu yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni rting pa yangs pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/de la rting pa yangs pa ni 'di yin te/_de'i zhabs kyi rting pa gnyis kyi mthil ni yangs pa ste/_ji ltar mi gzhan dag la med pa lta bu yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni zhabs long mo'i 
[\[14b.2\]]tshigs mi mngon pa yin no//de la zhabs long mo'i tshigs mi mngon pa nyid ni 'di yin te/_rting pa yangs pa la yang dag par sbyor la/_rting pa yangs pa yang zhabs long mo'i tshigs mi mngon pa la sbyor ba ste/_ji ltar mi gzhan dag la med pa lta bu yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni byin pa 
[\[14b.3\]{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]e n+ya ya'i lta bu dang ldan pa yin no/_/de la byin pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]e n+ya ya'i lta bu ni 'di yin te/_de'i byin pa byin gyis phra bar skyes shing /_byin gyis phra bar yang dag par byung ba ste/_dper na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po e n+ya ya'i lta bu yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni bzhengs bzhin du ma 
[\[14b.4\]]btud par phyag pus mor sleb pa yin no//de la bzhengs bzhin du ma btud par phyag pus mo la sleb pa ni 'di yin te/_bcom ldan 'das ni bzhengs na skru ma btud par phyag gi mthil gnyis kyis rang gi pus mo'i lha nga la yang dag par reg par mdzad cing kun tu nyug par mdzad pa yin 
[\[14b.5\]]no//bcom ldan 'das ni 'doms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa yin no/_/de la 'doms kyisba ba sbubs su nub pa nyid ni 'di yin te/_dper na rigs btsun pa'i glang po che cang shes sam/_rta cang shes kyi lta bu yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni spu re re nas mdzes par skyes shing g.yas su 
[\[14b.6\]]'khyil pa yin no/_/de la spu re re nas mdzes par skye shing g.yas su 'khyil pa nyid ni 'di yin te/_de'i spu'i khung bu re re nas spu re re mthon ting la lcang lor 'khyil ba 'jam zhing snum la g.yas su 'khyil cing mdzes par skyes pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni sku'i spu gyen du phyogs 
[\[14b.7\]]pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/de la sku'i spu gyen du phyogs pa nyid ni 'di yin te/_de'i sku dang dbu las skyes pa'i dbu skra dang /_spu rnams ni kha gyen du bltas shing mthon ting la kun nas lcang lor 'khyil ba 'jam zhing snum la g.yas su 'khyil ba mdzes par skyes pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]ni pags pa srab cing 'jam la snum pa yin no/_/de la pags pa srab cing 'jam la snum pa ni 'di yin te/_de'i sku la chu'am/_rdul kun tu mi 'chags shing mi gnas pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni mdog gser lta bu dang ldan te/_dper na 'dzam bu chu 
[\[15a.2\]]bo'i gser gyi mchod sdong la rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa ltar gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa yin te/_des na gser gyi mdog lta bu zhes bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das ni bdun mtho ba yin no/_/de la bdun mtho ba nyid ni 'di yin te de'i zhabs gnyis kyi gong mtho ba 
[\[15a.3\]]gnyis gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa sha dang khrag gis yongs su rgyas par gyur pa dang /_de bzhin du phyag gnyis kyi ma tho ba gnyis gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa sha dang khrag gis yongs su rgyas par gyur pa dang /_thal gong gnyis su gnyis mtho bar 
[\[15a.4\]]gyur pa dang /_gnya' gong du mtho ba gcig gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa sha dang khrag gis yongs su rgyas par gyur pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni thal gong rgyas pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/bcom 
[\[15a.5\]]ldan 'das ni sku shin tu drang por 'khrungs pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni sku n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa yin no/_/de la n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa nyid ni 'di yin te/_chur ji srid pa zheng du yang de srid la zheng du ji srid pa chur yang de srid de/_de ni n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa zhes 
[\[15a.6\]]bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das ni 'gram pa seng ge'i dang 'dra ba yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni tshems thags bzang ba yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni tshems rtse mo mtho zhing rno la dkar ba yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni ro bro ba'i 
[\[15a.7\]]mchog dang ldan pa yin te/_de ni mgur drang por mid pa drang zhing mi yo la thogs pa med par mid du rung bar gyur pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni ljags ring zhing srab pa yin no/_/de la ljags ring zhing srab pa nyid ni 'di yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa bzhed na zhal nas ljags phyung ste/_
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]shangs kyi bu ga gnyis dang /_spyan gyi khung bu gnyis dang /_snyan gyi bu ga gnyis su reg par mdzad cing yongs su nyug par mdzad la/_dbu'i mtshams su thug pa'i zhal gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang 'gebs par mdzad pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan 
[\[15b.2\]]pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni spyan yangs shing ba'i rdzi ma lta bu yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni spyan mthon ting lta bu dang ldan pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni spyan gyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni 'od 'dom gang ba yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni 
[\[15b.3\]]zhal zla ba nya ba lta bu yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni mdzod spu smin mtshams su 'khrungs la shing bal ltar 'jam zhing me tog kun da dang /_zla ba dang /_dung dang /_pad ma'i rtsa lag dang /_ba'i 'o ma dang /_ba mo'i mdog lta bu dang ldan pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni dbu gtsug tor 
[\[15b.4\]]dang ldan pa yin te/_de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis zhes bya'o/_/de la dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bu dang ldan pa yin no/_/sred med kyi bu'i ltar 
[\[15b.5\]]sku grims pa yin no/_/pus mo'i lha nga dag mdzes par gyur pa yin no/_/sku gtsang ba dag yin no/_/sku 'jam pa dag yin no/_/sku mnyen pa dag yin no/_/sku snum bag can dag yin no/_/sku ma btud pa dag yin no/_/sor mo rnams ring ba dang byin gyis phra ba dag yin no/_/
[\[15b.6\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sor mo rnams zlum pa dag yin no/_/sor mo rnams byin gyis phra bdag yin no/_/rtsa rnams mi mngon pa dag yin no/_/long bu rnams mi mngon pa dag yin no/_/sku dbyibs legs pa dag yin no/_/sku shin tu legs par 'brel pa dag 
[\[15b.7\]]yin no/_/skye mched rnams shin tu yongs su dag pa dag yin no/_/mkhyen pa yongs su dag pa dag yin no/_/spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dpal dang blo gros dang ldan pa dag yin no/_/lta bar 'os pa dag yin no/_/zhal ha 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]cang yang mi ring ba dag yin no//zhal rkang rkong med pa dag yin no//sgros pim pa ltar dmar ba dag yin no//zhal yongs su rgyas pa dag yin no/_/dbyangs zab pa dag yin no//lte ba zab pa dag yin no/_/lte ba shin tu zlum pa dag yin no/_/lte ba 
[\[16a.2\]]g.yas su 'khyil ba dag yin no/_/phyag dang zhabs yongs su rgyas pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyag dang zhabs ji ltar dgongs pa bzhin dang ldan pa dag yin no/_/phyag gi mthil mnyam pa dag yin no/_/phyag gi ri mo bar ma chad pa dag yin no/_/
[\[16a.3\]]phyag gi ri mo mtho ba dag yin no/_/sku la dri ma med cing dri mi zhim pa med pa dag yin no/_/mdog gsal ba dag yin no/_/skye mched kyi sgo bzang ba dag yin no//zhal zla ba lta bu dag yin no/_/gsong por gsung ba dag yin no/_/zhal la khro gnyer gyi rim pa med pa dag yin 
[\[16a.4\]]no//spu'i khung bu thams cad nas dri yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba dag yin no/_/de dag gi zhal dri zhim pa dag yin no/_/seng ge'i stabs su gshegs pa dag yin no/_/glang po che'i dbang po'i stabs su gshegs pa dag yin no/_/ngang pa'i stabs su gshegs pa dag yin no//dbu 
[\[16a.5\]]gdugs 'dra ba dag yin no//gsung snyan cing rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dag yin no/_/tshems mche ba rno ba dang ldan pa dag yin no/_/shangs mtho ba dag yin no/_/ljags dmar ba dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ljags srab cing che ba dag yin 
[\[16a.6\]]no/_/spu mthon ting can dag yin no/_/spu gtsang ba dag yin no/_/spyan yangs pa dag yin no/_/bu ga'i sgo rnams yongs su mnyams pa dag yin no/_/phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil dmar ba dag yin no/_/lte ba ma bye ba dag yin no//dku ma rnyongs pa dag yin no//phyal phyang nge ba 
[\[16a.7\]]dag yin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku la gnyer ma med pa dag yin no//tshigs mdzes pa dag yin no//tshigs ring ba dag yin no/_/phyag dang zhabs yongs su dag pa dag yin no/_/'od 'dom gang mnyam pa dag yin no/_/'od kyis gsal bar mdzad cing /_
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]gshegs pa dag yin no/_/lha dang mi gang dag de dag gi sku mthong ba de dag tshim par 'gyur ro/_/srog chags thams cad kyis mthong yang brnyas par mi byed do/_/sems can rnams la rjes su ston par mdzad do/_/de dag gi gsung ni 'khor dang 'thun par khyab par mdzad kyi 'khor gyi phyi rol du 
[\[16b.2\]]gsung mi 'gro'o/_/ro stod seng ge lta bu dag yin no/_/sku'i tshigs legs par 'brel pa dag yin no/_/spyi gtsug ba ltar mi mngon pa dag yin no/_/dbu skra mthon ting la 'jam zhing ring ba dag yin no/_/dbu skra ma 'khrugs pa dag yin no/_/dbu skra gyen du phyogs shing bzang la lcang 
[\[16b.3\]]lor 'khyil ba dag yin no/_/dbu skra ma 'dzings pa dag yin no/_/thugs kar dpal gyi be'us legs par brgyan pa dang ldan pa dag yin no/_/phyag dang zhabs kyi mtshan dpal gyis 'bar ba dang ldan pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mtshal dang ldong ros 
[\[16b.4\]]dang /_tsi na biSh+Ta dang /_mthing shun dang /_zangs g.ya'i kha dog gis bris pa lta bu'i mtshan rnams dang ldan pa yin te/_de dag ni dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 
[\[16b.5\]]gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis chos thams cad la mngon par zhen par mi bgyi na/_des na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis chos thams cad tha dad par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong lags te/_'di lta ste 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos rnams so/_/'di dag ni mi 
[\[16b.6\]]dge ba'i chos rnams so/_/'di dag ni lung du bstan pa'i chos rnams so/_/'di dag ni lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams so/_/'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams mo/_/'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams so/_/'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams so/_/
[\[16b.7\]]'di dag ni zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos rnams so/_/'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos rnams so/_/'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams so/_/'di dag ni thun mong gi chos rnams so/_/'di dag ni thun mong ma lags pa'i chos rnams so zhes bgyi bar yang dag par rjes su mi 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]mthong na byang chub kyi lam ji ltar bsgrub par bgyid lags/_ma bsgrubs na ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob par 'gyur lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[17a.2\]]to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis chos thams cad tha dad par mthong mod kyi/_de ni kun rdzob tu yin gyi don dam par ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na kun rdzob tu lags kyi don dam par ni ma lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[17a.3\]]pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du de la 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba rnams gang yin snyam du sems pa las de 'di snyam du 'di lta ste/_phar 'dzin pa dang /_mar 'dzin pa dang /_dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang /_bram zer 'dzin pa dang /_rigs kyi gtso bo la rim 
[\[17a.4\]]gro byed pa dang /_sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang /_tshul khrims las byung ba dang /_bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang /_zhal ta byed pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams dang /_thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams dang /_dge ba 
[\[17a.5\]]bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang /_'jig rten pa'i rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes 
[\[17a.6\]]dang /_rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang /_rus gong gi 'du shes dang /_rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes dang /_de bzhin du bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /_chos rjes su 
[\[17a.7\]]dran pa dang /_dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /_tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /_gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /_lha rjes su dran pa dang /_nye bar zhi ba rjes su dran pa dang /_dbugs rngub pa dang /_'byung ba rjes su dran pa dang /_lus su rtogs pa rjes su dran pa dang /_'chi ba rjes su dran 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]pa ste/_de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams yin no snyam du sems so/_/de la mi dge ba'i chos rnams gang yin snyam pa las de 'di snyam du 'di lta ste/_srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_phra ma dang /_
[\[17b.2\]]tshig rtsub po dang /_ngag 'khyal ba dang /_brnab sems dang /_gnod sems dang /_log par lta ba dang /_khro ba dang /_khon du 'dzin pa dang /_'chab pa dang /_'tshig pa dang /_rnam par 'tshe ba dang /_phrag dog dang /_ser sna dang /_nga rgyal te/_de dag ni mi dge ba'i chos rnams yin 
[\[17b.3\]]no snyam du sems so/_/de la lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams gang yin snyam pa las/_de 'di snyam du 'di lta ste/_lus kyi las lung du ma bstan pa dang /_ngag gi las lung du ma bstan pa dang /_yid kyi las lung du ma bstan pa dang /_'byung ba chen po bzhi lung du ma bstan pa dang /_
[\[17b.4\]]dbang po lnga lung du ma bstan pa dang /_phung po lnga lung du ma bstan pa dang /_skye mched bcu gnyis dang /_khams [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_rnam par smin pa ste/_de dag ni lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams yin no snyam du sems so/_/de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams gang yin 
[\[17b.5\]]snyam pa las/_de 'di snyam du 'di lta ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i 
[\[17b.6\]]sgo gsum dang /_mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang /_kun shes pa'i dbang po dang /_kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang /_rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i 
[\[17b.7\]]ting nge 'dzin dang /_nang stong pa nyid nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad de/_de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams yin no snyam du sems so/_/de la zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/_khams gsum du gtogs pa'i phung po lnga dang /_skye mched bcu gnyis dang /_khams [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_bsam gtan 
[\[18a.2\]]bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ste/_de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams zhes bya'o/_/de la zag pa med pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres 
[\[18a.3\]]pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du ste/_de dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos rnams yin no/_/de la 'dus byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'dod pa'i khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams dang /_de bzhin du phung po lnga dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad 
[\[18a.4\]]med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du de bzhin du sbyar bar bya ste/_de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos rnams yin no/_/de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/_chos 
[\[18a.5\]]gang dag la skye ba med pa dang /_gnas pa med pa dang /_'jig pa med pa dang /_gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa dang /_de bzhin du 'dod chags zad pa dang /_zhe sdang zad pa dang /_gti mug zad pa dang /_de bzhin du chos gnas pa dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos skyon 
[\[18a.6\]]med pa nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/_de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams zhes bya'o/_/de la thun mong ba'i chos rnams gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi 
[\[18a.7\]]dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga ste/_de dag ni so so'i skye bo rnams dang /_thun mong gi chos rnams yin no/_/de la so so'i skye bo rnams dang /_thun mong ma yin pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag ste/_de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos rnams zhes bya ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na kun rdzob tu 
[\[18b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad tha dad par mthong mod kyi/_don dam par ni mngon par zhen par mi byed do/_/ji ltar mngon par zhen par mi byed ce na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/_dper na mi la la zhig gis sgyu ma sprul pa'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa 'di lta ste/_glang po 
[\[18b.3\]]che'i tshogs dang /_rta ba'i tshogs dang /_shing rta'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs shig mthong na/_de la dpung gi tshogs yin no snyam du mngon par zhen par mi byed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad tha dad par mthong mthong 
[\[18b.4\]]mod kyi/_mngon par zhen par ni mi byed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na mi la la tsha bas gdungs pa zhig gis smig rgyu rnam pa sna tshogs dba' rlabs 'dra bar g.yo ba mthong na/_'di ni chu yin no snyam du mngon par zhen par mi byed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[18b.5\]]dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad tha dad par mthong mod kyi mngon par zhen par mi byed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na mi la la zhig gis rmi lam na gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag mthong yang sad nas de dag gi gzugs yin no snyam du mngon par zhen par mi byed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i 
[\[18b.6\]]bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad tha dad par mthong mod kyi mngon par zhen par mi byed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na mi la la zhig gis chu'i nang na zla ba mthong na de de la zla ba yin no snyam du mngon par zhen par mi byed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin 
[\[18b.7\]]du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad tha dad par mthong mod kyi chos thams cad la dngos por mngon par zhen par mi byed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na mi la la zhig gis mig yor mthong na de de la dngos por mngon par zhen par mi byed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad la tha dad par mthong mod kyi/_chos thams cad la dngos por mngon par zhen par mi byed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na mi la la zhig gis rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la 'gro yang de la nam mkha'o snyam du mngon 
[\[19a.2\]]par zhen par mi byed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad la rnam par dpyad na/_chos de dag thams cad nyid la mngon par zhen par mi byed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na mi la la zhig gis brag ca'i sgra thos na sgra yin no snyam du mngon par 
[\[19a.3\]]zhen par mi byed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad la tha dad par mthong mod kyi mngon par zhen par mi byed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na mi la la zhig gis dri za'i grong khyer mthong na de de la grong khyer yin no snyam du mngon par zhen par mi 
[\[19a.4\]]byed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad la tha dad par mthong mod kyi mngon par zhen par mi byed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na mi la la zhig gis me long gi nang du bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan mthong na 'di bzhin yin no snyam du mngon par zhen 
[\[19a.5\]]par mi byed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad tha dad par mthong mod kyi mngon par zhen par mi byed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad tha dad par mthong mthong mod kyi/_chos de dag 
[\[19a.6\]]la mngon par zhen par mi byed do/_/chos rnams la mngon par ma zhen pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol tu son pa yin zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las/_chos thams cad kyi le'u 
[\[19a.7\]]zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par zhen pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 
[\[19b\]]
