[\[39a.1\]]chos brnyes par gyur lags so/_/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar du gyur lags so/_/de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad nas/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 
[\[39a.2\]]brnyes par gyur lags so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar du gyur lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags pas pas na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu mchi bar 'tshal bas shes rab 
[\[39a.3\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor gyis gnas par bgyi'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shes ldan dag rigs kyi bu dag de de bzhin te/_de de bzhin no/_/
[\[39a.4\]]shes ldan dag rigs kyi bu dag ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_shes ldan dag rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis gnas pa de dag ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya bar 'os pa yin no/_/
[\[39a.5\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las rnal 'byor gyi le'u zhes bya ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[39a.6\]]pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis gnas pa de dag ni phyag bya bar 'os pa yin no zhes de skad ces bka' stsal na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor de dag dang /_rtag tu ma bral bar gnas pa 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i chos de gang lags/_de ci'i 
[\[39a.7\]]slad du zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i chos de bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i slad du'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]gzugs byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa 
[\[39b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_mig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam pa'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 
[\[39b.3\]]'di ji snyam du sems/_gzugs rnams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_de bzhin du sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg pa dang /_chos rnams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_
[\[39b.4\]]mig gi khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_rna ba'i khams dang /_sgra'i khams dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 
[\[39b.5\]]khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_sna'i khams dang /_dri'i khams dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 
[\[39b.6\]]'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_lce'i khams dang /_ro'i khams dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_lus kyi 
[\[39b.7\]]khams dang /_reg bya'i khams dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_yid kyi khams dang /_chos kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_sa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_de bzhin du chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam 
[\[40a.2\]]mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_ma rig pa byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rga shi'i bar du byang chub 
[\[40a.3\]]sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_gzugs las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa las 
[\[40a.4\]]gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_mig las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/de bzhin du 
[\[40a.5\]]rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_gzugs dag las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_
[\[40a.6\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/de bzhin du sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg pa dang /_chos rnams las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_mig gi khams las 
[\[40a.7\]]gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi khams kyi bar dag las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_sa'i khams las gzhan zhig byang 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_de bzhin du chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa 
[\[40b.2\]]ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_ma rig pa las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rga shi'i bar las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_
[\[40b.3\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub 
[\[40b.4\]]sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_mig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji 
[\[40b.5\]]snyam du sems/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_mig gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa 
[\[40b.6\]]de byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_
[\[40b.7\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]rga shi'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_de 
[\[41a.2\]]bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_mig gi de bzhin nyid las gzhan 
[\[41a.3\]]zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma 
[\[41a.4\]]lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_mig gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi rnam par shes 
[\[41a.5\]]pa'i khams kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_
[\[41a.6\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rga shi'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[41a.7\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis don gyi dbang gang zhig mthong na/_'di skad du gzugs byang chub sems dpa' ma yin zhing de bzhin du sbyar te/_rga shi'i bar du byang chub sems dpa' ma yin la/_gzugs las gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]yin zhing /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rga shi'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin la/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin te/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rga shi'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid las byang chub sems dpa' gzhan ma yin zhes zer/_de skad 
[\[41b.2\]]ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sems can gtan ma mchis pa mi dmigs na/_de byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_gzugs byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga 
[\[41b.3\]]la mchis/_gzugs las byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rga shi'i bar du byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_rga shi las byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub 
[\[41b.4\]]sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rga shi'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_rga shi'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid las byang chub 
[\[41b.5\]]sems dpa' gzhan du 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis te/_de dag ni gnas ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu legs so legs so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_mi dmigs 
[\[41b.6\]]pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_gzugs kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes 
[\[41b.7\]]dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_gzugs rtag pa'am/_mi rtag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' yin 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rtag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]sam/_mi rtag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' yin 
[\[42a.2\]]snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_gzugs bde ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]sam/_sdug bsngal ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/
[\[42a.3\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i bde ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]sam/_sdug bsngal ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i 
[\[42a.4\]]bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_gzugs bdag yod pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]sam/_bdag med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du 
[\[42a.5\]]byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa bdag yod pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]sam/_bdag med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_gzugs stong pa'i tshig bla

[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg pa dang /_chos rnams skye ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]sam/_'gag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa 
[\[46a.2\]]ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_gzugs rnams dngos po yod pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]sam/_dngos po med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_sgra dang /_dri dang /_
[\[46a.3\]]ro dang /_reg pa dang /_chos rnams dngos po yod pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]sam/_dngos po med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_mig gi khams kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]
[\[46a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_mig gi khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 
[\[46a.5\]]'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_
[\[46a.6\]]mig gi khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams rtag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]sam/_mi rtag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi rnam par shes 
[\[46a.7\]]pa'i khams kyi bar rtag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]sam/_mi rtag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_mig gi khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]shes pa'i khams nas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi bde ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]sam/_sdug bsngal ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji 
[\[46b.2\]]snyam du sems/_mig gi khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi bdag yod pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]sam/_bdag med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 
[\[46b.3\]]'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_mig gi khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi stong pa'i tshig 
[\[46b.4\]{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]sam/_mi stong pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_mig gi khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_de bzhin 
[\[46b.5\]]du sbyar te/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]sam/_mtshan ma med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_mig gi khams dang /_
[\[46b.6\]]gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi smon pa yod pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]sam/_smon pa med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 
[\[46b.7\]]'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_mig gi khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi zhi ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]sam/_ma zhi ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_mig gi khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 
[\[47a.2\]]khams kyi bar gyi dben pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]sam/_mi dben pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_mig gi khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes 
[\[47a.3\]]pa'i khams dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]sam/_rnam par byang ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji 
[\[47a.4\]]snyam du sems/_mig gi khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi skye ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]sam/_mi skye ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_
[\[47a.5\]]gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_mig gi khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi dngos po yod pa'i 
[\[47a.6\]]tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]sam/_dngos po med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_ma rig pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rga shi'i bar gyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems 
[\[47a.7\]]dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_ma rig pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rga shi'i bar gyi rtag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]sam/_mi rtag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_ma rig pa dang de bzhin du sbyar te/_rga shi'i bar gyi bde ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]sam/_sdug bsngal ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma 
[\[47b.2\]]lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_ma rig pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rga shi'i bar gyi bdag yod pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]sam/_bdag med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha 
[\[47b.3\]]ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_ma rig pa dang de bzhin du sbyar te/_rga shi'i bar gyi stong pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]sam/_mi stong pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_
[\[47b.4\]]ma rig pa dang de bzhin du sbyar te/_rga shi'i bar gyi mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]sam/_mtshan ma med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_ma rig pa dang /_de 
[\[47b.5\]]bzhin du sbyar te/_rga shi'i bar gyi smon pa yod pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]sam/_smon pa med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_ma rig pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rga shi'i 
[\[47b.6\]]bar gyi zhi ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]sam/_ma zhi ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_ma rig pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rga shi'i bar gyi dben pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]sam/_
[\[47b.7\]]mi dben pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_ma rig pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rga shi'i bar gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]sam/_rnam par byang ba'i 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_ma rig pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rga shi'i bar gyi skye ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]sam/_'gag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang 
[\[48a.2\]]chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_ma rig pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rga shi'i bar gyi dngos po yod pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]sam/_dngos po med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[48a.3\]]yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na/_'di skad du gzugs kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]
[\[48a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_gzugs rtag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]sam/_mi rtag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_de bzhin du 
[\[48a.5\]]tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rtag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]sam/_mi rtag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_de bzhin du gzugs bde ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]ma yin/_bdag yod pa'i 
[\[48a.6\]]tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]ma yin/_bdag med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]ma yin/_stong pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]ma yin/_mi stong pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]ma yin/_mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]ma yin/_mtshan ma med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]ma yin/_smon pa yod pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]ma yin/_smon pa med 
[\[48a.7\]]pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]ma yin/_zhi ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]ma yin/_ma zhi ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]ma yin/_dben pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]ma yin/_mi dben pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]ma yin/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]ma yin/_rnam par byang ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]ma yin/_skye ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]ma yin/_'gag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]ma yin/_dngos po yod pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]ma yin/_dngos po med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla 
[\[48b.2\]]dgas dang /_dngos po med pa'i bar gyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_de bzhin du mig gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_de bzhin du mig 
[\[48b.3\]]rtag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]dang /_mi rtag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid rtag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]sam/_mi rtag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_mig 
[\[48b.4\]]dngos po yod pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]sam/_dngos po med pa'i bar gyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid dngos po yod pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]sam/_dngos po med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' ma 
[\[48b.5\]]yin/_gzugs rnams kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_de bzhin du sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg pa dang /_chos rnams kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_gzugs rnams rtag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]dang /_mi rtag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]
[\[48b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_de bzhin du sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg pa dang /_chos rnams rtag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]dang /_mi rtag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_gzugs rnams dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla 
[\[48b.7\]]dgas dang /_dngos po med pa'i bar gyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_de bzhin du sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg pa dang /_chos rnams dngos po yod pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]dang /_dngos po med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_mig gi khams 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_de bzhin du yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_mig gi khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams 
[\[49a.2\]]dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams rtag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]dang /_mi rtag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_mig 
[\[49a.3\]]gi khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po yod pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]dang /_dngos po med pa'i bar gyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_de bzhin du yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po yod pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]dang /_
[\[49a.4\]]dngos po med pa'i bar gyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_ma rig pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rga shi'i bar gyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_de bzhin du ma rig pa rtag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[49a.5\]]ma yin/_ma rig pa mi rtag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rga shi'i bar gyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_de bzhin du ma rig pa rtag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]sam/_mi rtag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' ma 
[\[49a.6\]]yin/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rga shi'i bar du rtag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]sam/_mi rtag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_ma rig pa dngos po yod pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]dang /_dngos po med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]kyi bar du byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rga shi'i 
[\[49a.7\]]bar du dngos po yod pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]dang /_dngos po med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpa' ma yin zhes zer/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs gtan 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]mi dmigs lags na gzugs kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang de lta lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs rtag pa'am/_mi rtag pa gtan mi 
[\[49b.2\]]dmigs lags na/_gzugs kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang de lta lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs bde zhes bgyi ba'am/_sdug bsngal zhes 
[\[49b.3\]]bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/_gzugs kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang de lta lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs bdag ces bgyi ba 
[\[49b.4\]]'am/_bdag ma mchis zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/_gzugs kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang de lta lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 
[\[49b.5\]]'das gzugs stong zhes bgyi ba'am/_mi stong zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/_gzugs kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang de lta lags so/_/btsun

[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]kyi le'u zhes bya ste/_lnga pa'o//_//sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i chos de bdag gis yang 
[\[54a.2\]]dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo zhes de skad zer ba yang /_sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos kyis chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs kyi khams kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi 
[\[54a.3\]]mthong ngo /_/chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang gzugs kyi khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyis kyang /_chos kyi dbyings 
[\[54a.4\]]yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu mig gi khams kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang mig gi khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi khams kyi bar gyis chos kyi dbyings yang 
[\[54a.5\]]dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang yid kyi khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams 
[\[54a.6\]]yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sha ra dwa 
[\[54a.7\]]ti'i bu 'dus byas kyi khams kyis 'dus ma byas kyi khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/_'dus ma byas kyi khams kyis kyang /_'dus byas kyi khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus byas la ma gtogs par 'dus ma byas kyi khams 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]gdags par mi nus la/_'dus ma byas kyi khams la ma gtogs par yang 'dus byas kyi khams gdags par mi nus so/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 
[\[54b.2\]]gal te chos kyis chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong lags mod kyi/_'on kyang btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' byang chub 
[\[54b.3\]]sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de'i gzhi'i don gang lags/_de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don ni gzhi med pa'i don to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[54b.4\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don gyi bdag nyid med pa'i phyir te/_de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don ni gzhi med pa'i don to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na nam mkha' la bya rnams kyi rjes med do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i 
[\[54b.5\]]don med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na rmi lam la gzhi med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/_sgyu ma la gzhi med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/sha ra dwa 
[\[54b.6\]]ti'i bu dper na/_smig rgyu la gzhi med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/de bzhin du brag cad nga /_mig yor dang /_chu zla dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la gzhi'i don med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i 
[\[54b.7\]]don med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/_de bzhin nyid la gzhi med do/_/de bzhin du ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid la gzhi med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/sha 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/_yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhi med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/_sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs kyi phung po la gzhi med do/_/de bzhin du tshor ba'i phung po dang /_
[\[55a.2\]]'du shes kyi phung po dang /_'du byed kyi phung po dang /_rnam par shes pa'i phung po la gzhi med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/_sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig la gzhi med do/_/de bzhin du yid kyi bar la gzhi 
[\[55a.3\]]med do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_gzugs kyi skye mched la gzhi med pa nas/_chos kyi skye mched kyi bar la gzhi med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/_sgyu ma'i skyes bu nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa la 
[\[55a.4\]]gzhi med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_sgyu ma'i skyes bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa la 
[\[55a.5\]]gzhi med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/_sgyu ma'i skyes bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod pa la gzhi med 
[\[55a.6\]]do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar la spyod pa la gzhi med do/_/sha 
[\[55a.7\]]ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]gzhi'i don med do//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la gzhi med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i 
[\[55b.2\]]don med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig la gzhi'i don med do/_/de bzhin du yid kyi bar la gzhi'i don med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes 
[\[55b.3\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa la gzhi'i don med do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_dngos po med pa'i 
[\[55b.4\]]ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa la gzhi'i don med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[55b.5\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gzhi med do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar la yang gzhi med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab 
[\[55b.6\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/_'dus byas kyi khams la/_'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi gzhi med do/_/'dus ma byas kyi khams la/_'dus byas kyi khams kyi gzhi med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin 
[\[55b.7\]]du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/_skye ba med pa la gzhi med do/_/de bzhin du 'gag pa med pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang /_'byung ba 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]med pa dang /_dmigs su med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[56a.2\]]gzhi'i don med do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gi skye ba ma mchis pa la gzhi ma mchis pa lags/_gang gi kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i bar la gzhi ma mchis pa lags/_gang 
[\[56a.3\]]gi rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i bar la gzhi ma mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi skye ba med pa la gzhi med do/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa la gzhi 
[\[56a.4\]]med do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_gzugs kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i bar la gzhi med do/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam 
[\[56a.5\]]par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu mig gi skye ba med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do/_/de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus kyi skye ba med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa 
[\[56a.6\]]med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi bar gyi skye ba med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do/_/de bzhin du mig gi khams kyi skye ba med pa dang /_kun nas 
[\[56a.7\]]nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi skye ba med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do/_/de bzhin du dran pa nye bar 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]gzhag pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi skye ba med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa la 
[\[56b.2\]]gzhi med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i skye ba med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag gi skye ba med 
[\[56b.3\]]pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med pa yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper 
[\[56b.4\]]na/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shin tu rnam par dag pa la gzhi med do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar shin tu rnam par dag pa la gzhi med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi 
[\[56b.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa/_bam po drug pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu shin tu rnam par dag pa la gzhi med do/_/de bzhin 
[\[56b.6\]]du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad shin tu rnam par dag pa la gzhi med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i 
[\[56b.7\]]bu dper na/_bdag med pa nyid kyi phyir bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa la gzhi med do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po'i bar du med pa'i phyir sems can dang /_srog dang /_gso ba dang /_gang zag dang /_shed las skyes dang /_shed bu dang /_byed du 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]'jug pa po dang /_byed pa po dang /_slong ba po dang /_kun nas slong ba po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_tshor bar byed pa po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po rnams shin tu rnam par dag pa la gzhi med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems 
[\[57a.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba la mun pa'i gzhi med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[57a.3\]]po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du bsregs pa'i bskal pa 'byung ba na/_'du byed du gtogs pa thams cad kyi gzhi med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[57a.4\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po la 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi gzhi 
[\[57a.5\]]med do/_/de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po la sems rnam par g.yeng ba'i gzhi med do/_/de bzhin du shes rab kyi phung po la 'chal ba'i shes rab kyi gzhi med do/_/de bzhin du rnam par grol ba'i phung po la yang /_rnam par ma grol ba'i gzhi med do/_/de bzhin 
[\[57a.6\]]du rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po la yang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba ma yin pa'i gzhi med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med 
[\[57a.7\]]do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od dang /_zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'od la gzhi med do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /_de 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]bzhin du tshangs ris nas gnas gtsang ma'i bar gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gzhi med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sha ra dwa 
[\[57b.2\]]ti'i bu byang chub gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin/_mi ldan pa yang ma yin/_gzugs med pa/_bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa ste/_'di lta ste/_mtshan nyid med par 
[\[57b.3\]]mtshan nyid gcig pa yin pas/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad la ma chags par bslab par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal 
[\[57b.4\]]te byang chub gang lags pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don gang lags pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma lags/_mi ldan pa yang ma lags/_gzugs ma mchis pa/_bstan du ma mchis pa/_thogs pa ma mchis pa/_'di lta ste/_mtshan 
[\[57b.5\]]nyid ma mchis par mtshan nyid gcig pa lags na/_'o na la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri ste/_gal te chos thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin/_mi ldan pa yang ma yin/_gzugs med pa/_bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa ste/_'di lta ste/_mtshan nyid med par 
[\[57b.6\]]mtshan nyid gcig pa yin na/_ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_zhes de skad du dris na/_de la bdag gis lan ji skad du gdab par bgyi/_de bzhin du ci sgyu ma'i skyes 
[\[57b.7\]]bu 'di bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_de bzhin du ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bslabs nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di 'phags pa'i lam yan 
[\[58a.2\]]lag brgyad pa'i bar la bslabs nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bslabs nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_
[\[58a.3\]]de bzhin du sbyar te/_ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar la bslabs nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram zhes bgyi ba nas/_ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la bslabs nas/_
[\[58a.4\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram zhes dris na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de la bdag gis lan ji skad gdab par bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' 
[\[58a.5\]]stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i phyir khyod nyid la dris/_khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lan thob shig_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_gzugs kyang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_
[\[58a.6\]]'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_'phags 
[\[58a.7\]]pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar yang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du yang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan/_stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan/_mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan/_smon pa med pa yang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_
[\[58b.2\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_byang chub kyang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/de ltar na gzugs kyang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang 
[\[58b.3\]]gzhan ma yin te/_sgyu ma nyid gzugs yin la/_gzugs nyid sgyu ma yin no/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma yin te/_rnam par shes pa nyid sgyu ma yin la/_sgyu ma nyid rnam 
[\[58b.4\]]par shes pa yin no/_/de bzhin du mig kyang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma yin te/_mig nyid sgyu ma yin la/_sgyu ma nyid mig yin no/_/de bzhin du yid kyi bar dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar yang gzhan la/_sgyu ma 
[\[58b.5\]]yang gzhan ma yin te/_sgyu ma nyid mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yin la/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid sgyu ma yin no/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar yang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma yin te/_sgyu ma nyid yid kyi 'dus te 
[\[58b.6\]]reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yin la/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid sgyu ma yin no/_/de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma yin te/_sgyu ma nyid dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yin la/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 
[\[58b.7\]]rnams nyid sgyu ma yin no/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du yang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma yin te/_sgyu ma nyid 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yin la/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid sgyu ma yin no/_/de 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma yin te/_sgyu ma nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yin la/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nyid sgyu ma yin no/_/de bzhin du rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams 
[\[59a.2\]]kyang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma yin te/_sgyu ma nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams yin la/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams nyid sgyu ma yin no/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du yang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma yin te/_sgyu ma 
[\[59a.3\]]nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yin la/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad nyid sgyu ma yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_'o na sgyu ma de la kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang ba 
[\[59a.4\]]dmigs snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_'o na sgyu ma la skye ba'am/_'gag pa yod snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam 
[\[59a.5\]]du sems/_gang la kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa mi snang ba de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/_rnam pa thams 
[\[59a.6\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rjes su 'thob par 'gyur snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i ming dang /_brda dang /_gdags pa dang /_tha snyad 'di 
[\[59a.7\]]nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po rnams la 'dogs sam/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_gang la ming med pa dang /_brda med pa dang /_btags pa med pa dang /_tha snyad med pa dang /_ming du gdags 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]pa med pa dang /_lus med pa dang /_lus kyi las med pa dang /_ngag med pa dang /_ngag gi las med pa dang /_yid med pa dang /_yid kyi las med pa dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa de shes 
[\[59b.2\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar mi 
[\[59b.3\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom 
[\[59b.4\]]ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'tshal bas/_rtag tu sgyu ma'i skyes bu ltar bslab par bgyi lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_
[\[59b.5\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'di lta ste/_nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag_/sgyu ma'i skyes bu lta bur rig par bgyi ba'i slad du'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_'o na nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas/_rnam 
[\[59b.6\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar phung po lnga po dag ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags la/_dngos po ma mchis 
[\[59b.7\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid de yang dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]'gyur snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rmi lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags la/_dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid de yang dmigs su ma 
[\[60a.2\]]mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_phung po lnga po dag brag ca lta bu yin snyam 'am/_de bzhin du mig yor lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de lta 
[\[60a.3\]]lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_ci phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags 
[\[60a.4\]]so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu lags shing /_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu lags la/_rnam par shes pa gang lags pa de ni dbang po drug lags 
[\[60a.5\]]la/_dbang po drug gang lags pa de ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po rnams lags pa'i slad du'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni rmi lam lta bu lags la/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni rmi lam lta bu lags te/_
[\[60a.6\]]rnam par shes pa gang lags pa de ni dbang po drug lags la/_dbang po drug gang lags pa de ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag lags te/_de dag kyang nang stong pa nyid la mi dmigs/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la yang mi dmigs lags so/_/btsun 
[\[60a.7\]]pa bcom ldan 'das 'o na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa la gsar du zhugs pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na skrag cing dngang la/_dngang bar mi 'gyur lags sam/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs la mkhas pa yang ma yin/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lag tu song ba yang ma yin no/
[\[60b.2\]]skrag cing dngang la dngang bar 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_gang la spyod na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos 
[\[60b.3\]]nas/_mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba'i thabs la mkhas pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[60b.4\]]nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs la/_de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba'i 
[\[60b.5\]]rnam par so sor rtog cing de yang mi dmigs te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha 
[\[60b.6\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba'i rnam 
[\[60b.7\]]par so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs de bzhin du sbyar te/_gzugs bdag med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa bdag med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]dmigs/_gzugs stong pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa stong pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs/_gzugs mtshan ma med 
[\[61a.2\]]pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs/_gzugs smon pa med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi 
[\[61a.3\]]dmigs/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs/_gzugs zhi ba'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_
[\[61a.4\]]'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa zhi ba'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs/_gzugs dben pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dben pa'i rnam 
[\[61a.5\]]par so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs/_gzugs rnam par byang ba'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rnam par byang ba'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/_de yang 
[\[61a.6\]]mi dmigs/_gzugs skye ba med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs/_gzugs 'gag pa 
[\[61a.7\]]med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa 'gag pa med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs/_gzugs dngos po med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]dmigs/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs pa ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs 
[\[61b.2\]]la mkhas pa yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de de ltar so sor rtog cing /_gang gi tshe sems can thams cad la gzugs dang /_de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston cing /_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[61b.3\]]gyis ston pa dang /_gzugs dang de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston cing /_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /_gzugs dang de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du bdag med ces bya bar chos ston cing /_de yang mi dmigs 
[\[61b.4\]]pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /_gzugs dang /_de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du stong zhes bya bar chos ston cing /_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /_gzugs dang /_de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du mtshan ma med ces bya bar chos ston cing /_de yang 
[\[61b.5\]]mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /_gzugs dang /_de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du smon pa med ces bya bar chos ston cing /_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /_gzugs dang /_de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du zhi zhes bya bar chos ston cing /_
[\[61b.6\]]de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /_gzugs dang /_de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du dben zhes bya bar chos ston cing /_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /_gzugs dang /_de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du skye ba med ces 
[\[61b.7\]]bya bar chos ston cing /_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /_gzugs dang /_de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du 'gag pa med ces bya bar chos ston cing /_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /_gzugs dang /_de bzhin du rnam par shes 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]pa'i bar du dngos po med ces bya bar chos ston cing /_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa de ni/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i 
[\[62a.2\]]bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis gzugs dang /_de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du mi rtag ces bya bar yid la mi byed de/_de 
[\[62a.3\]]yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so/_/gzugs dang /_de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yid la mi byed de/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag 
[\[62a.4\]]gis gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par byang zhes bya ba dang /_skye ba med ces bya ba dang /_'gag pa med ces bya ba dang /_dngos po 
[\[62a.5\]]med ces bya ba'i bar du yid la mi byed de/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so/_/de bzhin du nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la byed pa dang ldan pa dag gis tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya ba dang /_stong 
[\[62a.6\]]zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par byang zhes bya ba dang /_skye ba med ces bya ba dang /_'gag pa med ces bya ba dang /_dngos po med ces bya bar yid la mi byed cing /_de yang 
[\[62a.7\]]mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang /_bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang /_stong pa'i rnam pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i rnam 
[\[62b.2\]]pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang /_zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /_dben pa'i rnam pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'i rnam pa dang /_skye ba med pa'i rnam pa dang /_'gag pa med pa'i rnam pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog cing bzod la 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems 
[\[62b.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i mi 'khrug pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan 
[\[62b.4\]]pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis gzugs la mi rtag pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so/_/de bzhin du sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang /_bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang /_stong pa'i rnam pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i rnam 
[\[62b.5\]]pa dang /_zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /_dben pa'i rnam pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'i rnam pa dang /_skye ba med pa'i rnam pa dang /_'gag pa med pa'i rnam pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du 
[\[62b.6\]]shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang /_bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang /_stong pa'i rnam pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang /_zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /_dben pa'i rnam pa dang /_rnam par byang 
[\[62b.7\]]ba'i rnam pa dang /_skye ba med pa'i rnam pa dang /_'gag pa med pa'i rnam pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog la/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa'i brtson pa mi 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni/_byang chub sems 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs la mi rtag pa'i 
[\[63a.2\]]rnam par so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so/_/de bzhin du sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang /_bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang /_stong pa'i rnam pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang /_zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /_dben pa'i 
[\[63a.3\]]rnam pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'i rnam pa dang /_skye ba med pa'i rnam pa dang /_'gag pa med pa'i rnam pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par 
[\[63a.4\]]shes pa la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang /_bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang /_stong pa'i rnam pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang /_zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /_dben pa'i rnam pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'i rnam pa 
[\[63a.5\]]dang /_skye ba med pa'i rnam pa dang /_'gag pa med pa'i rnam pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag dang /_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag bla 
[\[63a.6\]]na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar chad byed pa dag gi skabs mi 'byed pa de ni/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[63a.7\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_'di ltar so sor rtog ste/_gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong ste/_gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]dang /_rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong ste/_rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/_/de bzhin du mig gi stong pa nyid kyis mig stong ste/_mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang mig go/_/de bzhin du rna ba 
[\[63b.2\]]dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi stong pa nyid kyis yid stong ste/_yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang yid do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong ste/_
[\[63b.3\]]mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong ste/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 
[\[63b.4\]]rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/_/de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i stong pa nyid kyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang dran pa 
[\[63b.5\]]nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong ste/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/_/de bzhin 
[\[63b.6\]]du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i stong pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stong ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres 
[\[63b.7\]]pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams stong ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so zhes so sor rtog go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab pa lags te/_theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos nas skrag cing /_dngang la dngang bar 
[\[64a.2\]]mi 'gyur lags grang /_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed pa yang ma yin/_sangs rgyas 'bum phrag mang po 
[\[64a.3\]]la bsnyen bkur byas pa yang ma yin/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po'i nye bar rton pas nye bar brtan pa yang ma yin/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa yang ma yin/_rgya chen po la mos pa yang ma yin/_lus dang yid kyi gnas ngan len dang bral ba yang ma yin/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'bar 
[\[64a.4\]]ba dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na skrag cing dang nga la/_dang nga bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas 'bum phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur 
[\[64a.5\]]ma byas pa rnams dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma zin pa rnams dang /_mos pa med pa rnams dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par lhung ba'i bsam pa can rnams dang /_brtson 'grus zhan pa rnams dang /_le lo can rnams dang /_srid pa'i bde ba mngon 
[\[64a.6\]]par 'dod pa rnams kyi rna lam du ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di grag par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid la bslab 
[\[64a.7\]]par bya'o/_/de bzhin du gzugs yongs su shes par 'dod pa dang /_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yongs su shes par 'dod pa dang /_de bzhin du mig yongs su shes par 'dod pa dang /_de bzhin du yid kyi bar du yongs su 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]shes par 'dod pa dang /_de bzhin du gzugs rnams yongs su shes par 'dod pa dang /_de bzhin du chos kyi bar du yongs su shes par 'dod pa dang /_de bzhin du mig gi khams yongs su shes par 'dod pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du 
[\[64b.2\]]yongs su shes par 'dod pa dang /_de bzhin du mig gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su shes par 'dod pa dang /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su shes par 'dod pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su shes par 'dod pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te 
[\[64b.3\]]reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar du yongs su shes par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kho na la bslab par bya'o/_/de bzhin du 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug spang bar 'dod pa dang /_'jig tshogs la lta ba spang bar 
[\[64b.4\]]'dod pa dang /_de bzhin du the tshom dang /_tshul khrims dang /_brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa dang /_'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /_gnod sems spang bar 'dod pa dang /_gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang /_gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang /_ma rig pa dang /_nga rgyal 
[\[64b.5\]]dang /_rgod pa spang bar 'dod pa dang /_kun tu sbyor ba dang /_bag la nyal ba dang /_kun nas ldang ba thams cad spang bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kho na la bslab par bya'o/_/de bzhin du zas bzhi yongs su shes par 'dod pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyor ba bzhi dang /_chu bo 
[\[64b.6\]]bzhi dang /_mdud pa bzhi dang /_phyin ci log bzhi spang bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/de bzhin du mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag spang bar 'dod pa dang /_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par bsgrub par 'dod pa dang /_rdzogs par byed 
[\[64b.7\]]'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kho na la bslab par bya'o/_/de bzhin du bsam gtan bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]bar la bsgom par 'dod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag bsgom par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kho na la bslab par bya'o/_/
[\[65a.2\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'dod pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag yongs su rdzogs pas nam yang ngan song gsum po dag tu mi ltung ba dang /_rigs dma' bdag tu yang mi 
[\[65a.3\]]skye ba dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang ltung bar mi 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kho na la bslab par bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las/_bslab pa'i le'u zhes bya ste 
[\[65a.4\]]drug pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang gis yongs su zin na/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[65a.5\]]phyin pa 'di bstan pa 'di thos nas/_mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur la/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung bar myur du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa 
[\[65a.6\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston cing /_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston 
[\[65a.7\]]pa dang /_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston cing /_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston la/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos dang /_rang sangs 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston cing /_de yang mi 
[\[65b.2\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston cing /_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston la/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par 
[\[65b.3\]]nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang /_
[\[65b.4\]]stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par byang zhes bya ba dang /_skye ba med ces bya ba dang /_'gag pa med ces bya ba dang /_dngos po med ces bya bar chos ston cing /_de yang mi dmigs 
[\[65b.5\]]pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par 
[\[65b.6\]]byang zhes bya ba dang /_skye ba med ces bya ba dang /_'gag pa med ces bya ba dang /_dngos po med ces bya bar chos ston cing /_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston la/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 
[\[65b.7\]]yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang mig mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston cing /_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]gyis ston pa dang /_de bzhin du yid kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston cing /_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston la/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/_
[\[66a.2\]]de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang mig sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan 
[\[66a.3\]]ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par byang zhes bya ba dang /_skye ba med ces bya ba dang /_'gag pa med ces bya ba dang /_dngos po med ces bya bar chos ston cing /_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa 
[\[66a.4\]]dang /_yid kyi bar du yang sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par byang zhes bya ba dang /_skye ba med ces bya ba dang /_
[\[66a.5\]]'gag pa med ces bya ba dang /_dngos po med ces bya bar chos ston cing /_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston la/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/_de ni byang chub 
[\[66a.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston pa dang /_de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te reg 
[\[66a.7\]]pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar du mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston cing /_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston la dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub 
[\[66b\]]
