[\[66b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no/_/de bzhin du sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya ba dang /_rnam 
[\[66b.2\]]par byang zhes bya ba dang /_skye ba med ces bya ba dang /_'gag pa med ces bya ba dang /_dngos po med ces bya bar chos ston cing /_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston la/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos dang /_rang sangs 
[\[66b.3\]]rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 
[\[66b.4\]]bsgom pa'i phyir chos ston par byed pa nas/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa nyid kyi phyir chos ston cing /_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /_de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba bsgom pa'i phyir dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom pa'i phyir dang /_dbang po dang /_
[\[66b.5\]]stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam bsgom pa'i phyir chos ston cing /_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /_de bzhin du stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa bsgom pa'i phyir chos ston cing /_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[66b.6\]]ston pa dang /_de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom pa'i phyir/_chos ston pa nas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag bsgom pa'i phyir chos ston cing /_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston la/_dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[66b.7\]]ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/_gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa'i phyir chos ston pa dang /_gang byang chub bsgom pa'i phyir chos ston cing /_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston la/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad 
[\[67a.2\]]mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces 
[\[67a.3\]]gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos nas skrag cing /_dngang la dngang bar 'gyur te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs la mi mkhas pa lags shing /_sdig 
[\[67a.4\]]pa'i grogs po'i sug par mchis pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i 
[\[67a.5\]]yid la byed pa dag dang bral bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang dmigs la/_des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang /_de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[67a.6\]]dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar de dag kyang dmigs la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar des kyang rlom sems su byed pa ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang 
[\[67a.7\]]chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs la mi mkhas pa yin zhing /_sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song ba yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag dang bral bas dmigs pa'i 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]tshul gyis nang gzugs stong zhes bya bar yid la byed pa nas/_nang gi gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yin zhes yid la byed pa dang /_de bzhin du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa nang stong zhes bya bar 
[\[67b.2\]]yid la byed pa dang /_nang gi gzugs de yang nang stong pa nyid nas/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs par byed pa dang /_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa de yang nang stong pa nyid nas/_dngos po med pa'i 
[\[67b.3\]]ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs par byed cing /_de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang /_de bzhin du mig nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed pa nas/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing /_stong pa de dag kyang dmigs la/_de 
[\[67b.4\]]dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang /_de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang lce dang /_lus dang /_yid dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed pa nas/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i bar du yid la byed la/_stong pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su 
[\[67b.5\]]byed pa ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs la mi mkhas pa yin zhing /_sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song ba yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na 
[\[67b.6\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom zhing /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang dmigs la/_de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag bsgom zhing /_de dag kyang dmigs la/_de dag gis kyang rlom sems 
[\[67b.7\]]su byed pa ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_thabs mi mkhas pas thabs la mi mkhas pa yin zhing /_sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na yang skrag cing /_dngang la 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]dngang bar 'gyur ro//_//'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa/_bam po bdun pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[68a.2\]]sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa lags shing /_sdig pa'i grogs po gang gis yongs su bzung bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos nas/_skrag cing dngang la dngang bar 'gyur lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[68a.3\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar byed/_'dun pa zlog par byed cing /_de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus 
[\[68a.4\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar byed/_'dun pa zlog par byed de/_kye rigs kyi bu 'di la bslab par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kye pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag ni de 
[\[68a.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs shing bshad pa ma yin gyis/_'di dag ni snyan dngags mkhan gyis rang bzor byas pa yin te/_kye 'di dag ni mnyan par mi bya/_gzung bar mi bya/_kun chub par mi bya/_bklag par 
[\[68a.6\]]mi bya/_yid la mi bya/_gzhan dag la yang bstan par mi bya'o zhes zer ba gang yin pa ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i 
[\[68a.7\]]grogs po ni 'di la bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i drung du 'ongs nas/_kye rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis khyod la ci zhig bya/_de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas ci zhig bya/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]tu phyin pas ci zhig bya/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ci zhig bya/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ci zhig bya/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ci zhig bya zhes pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang 'bral bar byed pa'i bdud kyi las dag mi ston cing /_bdud kyi nyes pa dag mi rjod pa gang yin pa ste/_
[\[68b.2\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/_de la nyan thos dang /_rang sangs 
[\[68b.3\]]rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo'i sde dang /_rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang /_gtan la phab par bstan pa'i sde'i bar du ston par byed/_rab tu ston par byed/_rnam par 'byed par byed/_gsal bar byed/_yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi rjod mi ston cing /_
[\[68b.4\]]yang dag par rtogs par mi byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/_'di skad du kye 
[\[68b.5\]]rigs kyi bu khyod ni byang chub sems dpa' ma yin no/_/khyod la ni byang chub kyi sems kyang med do/_/khyod ni phyir mi ldog pa yang ma yin no/_/khyod kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi nus so zhes zer ba'i bdud kyi las de lta bu 
[\[68b.6\]]de dag mi rjod mi ston cing /_yang dag par rtogs par mi byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung 
[\[68b.7\]]du 'ongs nas/_'di skad du rigs kyi bu mig ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo /_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo /_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du sbyar te mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar ni bdag dang 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]bdag gis stong pa nas/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo /_/de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo /_/de bzhin du dran pa nye bar 
[\[69a.2\]]gzhag pa rnams stong pa nas/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi bar ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo /_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar ni bdag dang 
[\[69a.3\]]bdag gis stong na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag de la mi rjod mi ston cing /_yang dag par rtogs par mi byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[69a.4\]]sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang bdud sdig can rang sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/_'di skad du kye rigs kyi bu shar phyogs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_
[\[69a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/_'di la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams med/_nyan thos rnams med de/_shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[69a.6\]]khams thams cad kyang de bzhin no zhes zer ba'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag de la mi rjod mi ston cing /_yang dag par rtogs par mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang 
[\[69a.7\]]bdud sdig can nyan thos kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag zlog cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag ston te/_de dag rjes su 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]ston par byed pa'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag de la mi rjod mi ston cing /_yang dag par rtogs par mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang bdud sdig can mkhan po dang /_slob 
[\[69b.2\]]dpon gyi cha byad du bsgyur cing 'ongs nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang 'bral bar byed/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag dang 'bral bar byed/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dag dang 'bral bar byed pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/_'phags pa'i 
[\[69b.3\]]lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dag dang 'bral bar byed la/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dag dang sbyor bar byed/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing /_'di skad du kye rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos 'di dag bsgoms la/_nyan thos kyis mngon du 
[\[69b.4\]]gyis shig_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi rjod mi ston cing /_yang dag par rtogs par mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[69b.5\]]sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang bdud sdig can mi snang ba'i cha byad du bsgyur cing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas 'di skad du rigs kyi bu tshur shog_/gang gi don du bskal pa tshad med grangs med par 'khor ba na 
[\[69b.6\]]'khor zhing lag pa bcad pa dang /_rkang pa bcad pa dang /_mgo bcad pa dpag tu med pa dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas khyod la ci zhig bya/_gang la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 
[\[69b.7\]]mngon sum du bya bar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig_/gang la dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du bya bar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig ces zer ba'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag de la mi rjod mi ston cing /_yang dag par rtogs par mi byed pa de ni/_byang chub sems 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang bdud sdig can dge slong gi cha byad du bsgyur cing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/_de la mig mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[70a.2\]]chos ston/_de bzhin du sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par byang zhes bya ba dang /_skye ba med ces bya ba dang /_
[\[70a.3\]]'gag pa med ces bya ba dang /_dngos po med ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston/_de bzhin du ji ltar mig la sbyar ba de bzhin du yid kyi bar la yang rgya cher sbyar bar bya ste/_de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston 
[\[70a.4\]]cing /_de bzhin du sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par byang zhes bya ba dang /_skye ba med ces bya ba dang /_'gag 
[\[70a.5\]]pa med ces bya ba dang /_dngos po med ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang /_de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi 
[\[70a.6\]]rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang /_de bzhin du sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya ba dang /_rnam 
[\[70a.7\]]par byang zhes bya ba dang /_skye ba med ces bya ba dang /_'gag pa med ces bya ba dang /_dngos po med ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi rjod mi ston cing /_yang dag par rtogs par mi byed pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya ste/_rig nas kyang yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[70b.2\]]po thabs la mkhas pa gang dang ldan na/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa lags shing sdig pa'i grogs po rnam par spangs pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag tu lta ba spang ba'i 
[\[70b.3\]]phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /_de bzhin du sems can du lta ba spang ba'i phyir dang /_skye ba por lta ba dang /_srog tu lta ba dang /_gso bar lta ba dang /_gang zag tu lta ba dang /_shed las skyes dang /_shed bu dang /_byed du 'jug pa po dang /_byed pa po dang /_
[\[70b.4\]]slong ba po dang /_kun nas slong ba po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_tshor bar byed pa po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba por lta ba spang ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /_de bzhin du chad pa dang /_rtag par lta ba spang ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /_de 
[\[70b.5\]]bzhin du yod par lta ba dang /_med par lta ba dang /_phung por lta ba dang /_khams su lta ba dang /_skye mched du lta ba dang /_bden par lta ba dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar lta ba spang ba'i phyir/_sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /_de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag 
[\[70b.6\]]pa rnams su lta ba nas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du lta ba spang ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /_de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcur lta ba spang ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_
[\[70b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du lta ba spang ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /_de bzhin du sems can yongs su smin par bya bar lta ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar lta ba dang /_byang chub tu lta ba dang /_sangs rgyas su lta ba 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta ba spang ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po rnam par spangs pa yin no/_/sha ra dwa 
[\[71a.2\]]ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bdag tu lta ba spang ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar du lta ba spang ba'i phyir/_sems can rnams la chos ston pa de thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos 
[\[71a.3\]]ston na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pas yongs su zin pa dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po rnam par spangs pa'i bar du yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom 
[\[71a.4\]]ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad spang ba'i slad du sems can rnams la chos ston lags na/_bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur lags/_de bzhin du tshor bar lta 
[\[71a.5\]]ba dang /_'du shes su lta ba dang /_'du byed du lta ba dang /_rnam par shes par lta ba lags/_de bzhin du mig tu lta ba lags shing /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi bar du lta ba lags/_de bzhin du gzugs su lta ba lags shing /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_chos kyi bar 
[\[71a.6\]]du lta ba lags/_de bzhin du mig gi khams su lta bar 'gyur ba nas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du lta ba lags/_de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams su lta bar 'gyur ba nas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_chos kyi khams kyi bar du lta ba lags/_de 
[\[71a.7\]]bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag par lta ba nas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du lta ba lags/_de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcur lta ba lags shing /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du lta ba 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas gzugs dmigs shing dmigs 
[\[71b.2\]]pa'i tshul gyis gzugs su lta ba bskyed do/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par shes par lta ba bskyed do/_/de bzhin du mig du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mig tu lta ba 
[\[71b.3\]]bskyed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi bar du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid du lta ba bskyed do/_/de bzhin du gzugs rnams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzugs rnams su lta ba bskyed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_chos kyi bar du dmigs shing dmigs 
[\[71b.4\]]pa'i tshul gyis chos rnams su lta ba bskyed do/_/de bzhin du mig gi khams dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mig gi khams su lta ba bskyed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 
[\[71b.5\]]khams su lta ba bskyed do/_/de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzugs kyi khams su lta ba bskyed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_chos kyi khams kyi bar du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi khams su lta ba bskyed do/_/de bzhin 
[\[71b.6\]]du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag par lta ba bskyed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par lta ba bskyed do/_/
[\[71b.7\]]de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de dag la lta ba bskyed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de dag la lta ba bskyed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]rgyu des na/_byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mi mkhas pa gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du tshor bar lta ba dang /_'du shes su lta ba dang /_'du byed du lta ba dang /_rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du mig tu lta bar 'gyur ba nas/_
[\[72a.2\]]de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi bar du lta bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba nas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_chos kyi bar du lta bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du mig gi khams su lta bar 'gyur ba nas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams 
[\[72a.3\]]kyi bar du lta bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams su lta bar 'gyur ba nas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_chos kyi khams kyi bar du lta bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag par lta bar 'gyur ba nas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 
[\[72a.4\]]bar du lta bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcur lta bar 'gyur ba nas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du lta bar 'gyur te/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa shes rab 
[\[72a.5\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pas lta ba de dag spang ba'i phyir/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das don gang gis byang chub 
[\[72a.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la bdag kyang spobs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod spobs sam/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das spobs lags so/_/'o na ji lta bu yin/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 
[\[72a.7\]]'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa ste/_don des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]'das 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mchis pa khams gsum du ma gtogs pa de ni/_de'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mchis pa khams gsum du ma gtogs pa gang lags pa de la yang de chags pa ma mchis pas/_de'i slad du byang chub 
[\[72b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang /_rang sangs 
[\[72b.3\]]rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems de gang yin/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_
[\[72b.4\]]chos gang yang skye ba'am 'gag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_chos gang yang 'grib pa'am/_'phel bar yang mi 'gyur/_chos gang yang kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang ba yang ma mchis lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la mi skye mi 'gag cing /_
[\[72b.5\]]'grib pa ma mchis/_'phel ba ma mchis/_kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis/_rnam par byang ba ma mchis/_nyan thos kyi sems dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems ma mchis pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[72b.6\]]mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems lags so/_/de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bus gang smras pa de bzhin te/_
[\[72b.7\]]nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis de la yang sems de chags pa med do/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'o na sems de gzugs la yang chags pa ma mchis lags sam/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la yang sems de chags pa ma 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]mchis lags sam/_de bzhin du mig la yang sems de chags pa ma mchis lags sam/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi bar la yang sems de chags pa ma mchis lags sam/_de bzhin du gzugs rnams la yang sems de chags pa 
[\[73a.2\]]ma mchis lags sam/_sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang /_chos rnams la yang sems de chags pa ma mchis lags sam/_de bzhin du mig gi khams la yang sems de chags pa ma mchis lags sam/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar la yang sems 
[\[73a.3\]]de chags pa ma mchis lags sam/_de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams la yang sems de chags pa ma mchis lags sam/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_chos kyi khams kyi bar la yang sems de chags pa ma mchis lags sam/_de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yang sems 
[\[73a.4\]]de chags pa ma mchis lags sam/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la yang sems de chags pa ma mchis lags sam/_de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yang sems de chags pa ma mchis lags sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[73a.5\]]ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar la yang sems de chags pa ma mchis lags sam/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_gzugs la yang sems de chags pa med do/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam 
[\[73a.6\]]par shes pa la yang sems de chags pa med do/_/de bzhin du mig la sems de chags pa med pa nas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi bar la sems de chags pa med do/_/de bzhin du gzugs rnams la sems de chags pa med pa nas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_chos rnams kyi bar la 
[\[73a.7\]]sems de chags pa med do/_/de bzhin du mig gi khams la sems de chags pa med pa nas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar la sems de chags pa med do/_/de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams la sems de chags pa med pa nas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_chos kyi 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]khams kyi bar la sems de chags pa med do/_/de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la sems de chags pa med pa nas/_de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la sems de chags pa med pa yang de bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 
[\[73b.2\]]bcu la sems de chags pa med pa nas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar la sems de chags pa med pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di 
[\[73b.3\]]skad ces rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems gang yin pa de yang zag pa med cing khams gsum thams cad du gtogs pa ma yin no/_/zhes bka' stsal nas/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi sems kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du zag 
[\[73b.4\]]pa ma mchis shing khams gsum du ma gtogs pa lags sam/_de bzhin du nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis thugs de yang zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum du ma gtogs pa lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_
[\[73b.5\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum du ma gtogs pa lags sam/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes 
[\[73b.6\]]pa yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum du ma gtogs pa lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du zag pa ma mchis shing khams 
[\[73b.7\]]gsum du ma gtogs pa lags sam/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi bar du yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum du ma gtogs pa lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no/_/gsol ba/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]gzugs rnams kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum du ma gtogs pa lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos rnams kyi bar yang rang bzhin gyis 
[\[74a.2\]]stong pa nyid kyi slad du zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum du ma gtogs pa lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig gi khams kyi bar yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum du 
[\[74a.3\]]ma gtogs pa lags sam/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum du ma gtogs pa lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom 
[\[74a.4\]]ldan 'das gzugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum du ma gtogs pa lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_chos kyi khams kyi bar du yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du zag pa ma mchis 
[\[74a.5\]]shing khams gsum du ma gtogs pa lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum du ma gtogs pa lags 
[\[74a.6\]]sam/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum du ma gtogs pa lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 
[\[74a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum du ma gtogs pa lags sam/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du zag pa ma mchis shing khams 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]gsum du ma gtogs pa lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi sems kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khams gsum du gtogs pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin du nyan thos dang /_rang 
[\[74b.2\]]sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khams gsum du gtogs pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin du gzugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khams gsum du gtogs pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_
[\[74b.3\]]'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khams gsum du gtogs pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin du mig kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khams gsum du gtogs pa ma yin pa nas/_yid kyi bar du yang de bzhin du 
[\[74b.4\]]sbyar ro/_/de bzhin du mig gi khams kyang zag pa med cing khams gsum du gtogs pa ma yin pa nas/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang de bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams kyang zag pa med cing khams gsum du gtogs pa ma yin pa nas/_chos kyi 
[\[74b.5\]]khams kyi bar du yang de bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang zag pa med cing khams gsum du gtogs pa ma yin pa nas/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du yang de bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang 
[\[74b.6\]]zag pa med cing khams gsum du gtogs pa ma yin pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khams gsum du gtogs pa ma yin no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[74b.7\]]'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces sems ma yin pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems de la chags pa med do/_/zhes bka' stsal na/_btsun pa bcom 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]ldan 'das gzugs ma mchis pa yang gzugs ma mchis pa la chags pa ma mchis lags sam/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam par shes pa'i bar du ma mchis pa yang rnam par shes pa'i bar du ma mchis pa la chags pa ma mchis lags sam/_btsun pa bcom 
[\[75a.2\]]ldan 'das mig ma mchis pa yang mig ma mchis pa la chags pa ma mchis lags sam/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi bar du ma mchis pa yang yid ma mchis pa la chags pa ma mchis lags sam/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs rnams ma mchis pa yang gzugs rnams 
[\[75a.3\]]ma mchis pa la chags pa ma mchis lags sam/_de bzhin du chos rnams ma mchis pa'i bar dag chos rnams ma mchis pa la chags pa ma mchis lags sam/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig gi khams ma mchis pa mig gi khams ma mchis pa la chags pa ma mchis lags 
[\[75a.4\]]sam/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du ma mchis pa yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma mchis pa la chags pa ma mchis lags sam/_de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma mchis pa yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma mchis pa la 
[\[75a.5\]]chags pa ma mchis lags sam/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du ma mchis pa yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma mchis pa la chags pa ma mchis lags sam/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 
[\[75a.6\]]ma mchis pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma mchis pa la chags pa ma mchis lags sam/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du ma mchis pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ma mchis pa rnams la chags pa ma mchis lags sam/_
[\[75a.7\]]bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_gzugs med pa yang gzugs med pa la chags pa med do/_/rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang de bzhin du sbyar ba nas/_de bzhin du mig nas yid kyi bar du yang de bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de bzhin du gzugs 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]rnams nas chos rnams kyi bar du yang de bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de bzhin du mig gi khams nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa'i bar du yang de bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams nas chos kyi khams kyi bar du yang de bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag 
[\[75b.2\]]pa rnams med pa yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med pa la chags pa med do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du yang de bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu med pa yang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu med pa la chags pa 
[\[75b.3\]]med do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar la yang chags pa med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa ni/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang /_
[\[75b.4\]]rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems des kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su mi byed/_mngon par zhen par mi byed do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las mi dmigs pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bdun pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[75b.5\]]la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi mkhas pas nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar rab tu ltung zhing byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa 
[\[75b.6\]]la mi 'jug pa lags/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ni gang lags skyon ma mchis pa ni gang lags/_de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi tshe/_byang chub sems 
[\[75b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngar nges par ltung bar gyur la nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar rab tu ltung zhing byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par mi 'jug pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon yin no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sngar nges par ltung ba'i skyon gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi tshe/_byang chub 
[\[76a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi mkhas pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa na/_thabs la mi mkhas pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i rnam par thar ba'i sgo la brten nas/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyis mngon 
[\[76a.3\]]sum du byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la mi 'jug pa ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sngar nges par ltung ba'i skyon yin no/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon gang lags/_
[\[76a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu skyon zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_chos la sred pa ste skyon yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos la sred pa'i skyon gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang 
[\[76a.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_gzugs la mi rtag ces bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang /_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la mi rtag 
[\[76a.6\]]ces bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la sred pa ste skyon yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[76a.7\]]spyod pa ni/_gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la sdug bsngal zhes bya bar gnas par byed cing /_kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang /_gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la bdag med ces bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang /_
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la stong zhes bya bar gnas par byed cing kun shes la mngon par zhen pa dang /_de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la mtshan ma med ces bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang /_de bzhin du 
[\[76b.2\]]gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la smon pa med ces bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang /_de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la zhi zhes bya bar gnas par byed cing /_kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang /_de bzhin du gzugs 
[\[76b.3\]]nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la dben zhes bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang /_de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la rnam par byang zhes bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang /_de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam 
[\[76b.4\]]par shes pa'i bar la skye ba med ces bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang /_de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la 'gag pa med ces bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang /_de bzhin du gzugs la dngos 
[\[76b.5\]]po med ces bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i bar la dngos po med ces bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su 'thun pa'i chos 
[\[76b.6\]]la sred pa ste skyon yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi mkhas pas sngar nges par ltung ba yin zhing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung la/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la yang mi 'jug pa yin no/_/sha ra dwa 
[\[76b.7\]]ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni thabs la mkhas pas mig nas chos rnams kyi bar la mi rtag ces bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang /_de bzhin du mig nas chos rnams kyi bar la 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]sdug bsngal zhes bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang /_de bzhin du mig nas chos rnams kyi bar la bdag med ces bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang /_de bzhin du mig nas chos rnams kyi bar la stong 
[\[77a.2\]]zhes bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang /_de bzhin du mig nas chos rnams kyi bar la mtshan ma med ces bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang /_de bzhin du mig nas chos rnams kyi bar la smon pa med ces bya bar gnas par byed 
[\[77a.3\]]cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang /_de bzhin du mig nas chos rnams kyi bar la zhi zhes bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang /_de bzhin du mig nas chos rnams kyi bar la dben zhes bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang /_de 
[\[77a.4\]]bzhin du mig nas chos rnams kyi bar la rnam par byang zhes bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang /_de bzhin du mig nas chos rnams kyi bar la skye ba med ces bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang /_de bzhin du mig nas chos rnams kyi 
[\[77a.5\]]bar la 'gag pa med ces bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang /_de bzhin du mig la dngos po med ces bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang /_chos rnams kyi bar la dngos po med ces bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes 
[\[77a.6\]]la mngon par zhen pa ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la sred pa ste skyon zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi mkhas pas sngar nges par ltung ba yin zhing nyan thos dang /_
[\[77a.7\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi sar rab tu ltung ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la mi 'jug pa yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_thabs la mi mkhas pas khams rnams dang /_dran pa 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]nye bar gzhag pa dag nas/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang /_de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_ji ltar phung po dag gi skabs su sbyar ba bzhin thams cad du rgya cher sbyar bar 
[\[77b.2\]]bya ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi mkhas pas sngar nges par ltung ba yin zhing nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar rab tu ltung ba la byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la yang mi 'jug pa yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di skad ces byang chub 
[\[77b.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon ma mchis pa gang lags zhes gang smras pa yang /_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_ci nas gzugs kyis rlom sems su mi bya'o/_/tshor ba 
[\[77b.4\]]dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pas rlom sems su mi bya/_mig gis rlom sems su mi bya/_de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang lce dang /_lus dang yid kyis rlom sems su mi bya/_gzugs rnams kyis rlom sems su mi bya/_de bzhin du sgra dang /_
[\[77b.5\]]dri dang ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos rnams kyis rlom sems su mi bya/_mig gi khams kyis rlom sems su mi bya/_gzugs kyi khams kyis rlom sems su mi bya/_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis rlom sems su mi bya/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi khams kyi bar gyis 
[\[77b.6\]]rlom sems su mi bya/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyis rlom sems su mi bya/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas rlom sems su mi bya/_de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan 
[\[77b.7\]]gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rlom sems su mi bya/_de bzhin du bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis rlom sems su mi bya/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis rlom sems su mi bya/_de bzhin du 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]sbyar te/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyis rlom sems su mi bya/_de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus rlom sems su mi bya/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar gyis rlom sems su mi bya'o/_/sha ra 
[\[78a.2\]]dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pas/_byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems thun mong pa ma yin pa'i sems/_rgya chen po'i sems de nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar sems kyi rang 
[\[78a.3\]]bzhin 'od gsal ba nyid kyi phyir ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba nyid gang lags/_de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe 
[\[78a.4\]]dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems gang 'dod chags dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_mi ldan pa yang ma yin/_zhe sdang dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_mi ldan pa yang ma yin/_gti mug dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_mi ldan pa yang ma yin zhing /_de bzhin 
[\[78a.5\]]du kun nas ldang ba rnams dang /_kun tu sbyor ba rnams dang /_bag la nyal rnams dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_mi ldan pa yang ma yin pa dang /_de bzhin du lta ba'i kun tu sbyor ba thams cad dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_mi ldan pa yang ma yin pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[78a.6\]]sems dag dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_mi ldan pa yang ma yin pa 'di ni sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyid yin no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[78a.7\]]'das ci sems ma lags pa'i sems gang lags pa de mchis lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems kyi sems nyid gang yin pa de la ci yod pa nyid ma/_med pa nyid ma/_bdog pa'am/_mi bdog pa'am/_dmigs pa nyid dmigs 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]su yod ma/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma mchis lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te sems kyi sems nyid gang la yod pa nyid dam/_med pa nyid med cing mi dmigs na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bus gang 'di skad ces smras te/_sems ma lags pa'i sems de 
[\[78b.2\]]mchis lags sam/_zhes brgal zhing brtag pa 'di ji ga rigs sam/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sems kyi sems nyid de gang lags/_bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa 
[\[78b.3\]]ti'i bu chos thams cad la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sems kyi sems nyid ces bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sems de kho na 'gyur 
[\[78b.4\]]ba ma mchis shing rnam par rtog pa ma mchis la/_gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa de kho na 'gyur ba ma mchis shing rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa lags sam/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_'du byed thams cad kyi bar dag 
[\[78b.5\]]kyang 'gyur ba ma mchis shing rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa lags sam/_de ltar gyur na ni byang chub kyi bar du yang 'gyur ba ma mchis shing rnam par rtog pa ma mchis par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/_gang gi sems 
[\[78b.6\]]de ltar 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa nas/_'du byed thams cad kyi bar dag dang /_de bzhin du byang chub kyi bar du yang de la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems 
[\[78b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i skyon med pa zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa ni 'di lta ste/_thabs kyis yang dag par zin pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'jig rten la brnab sems dang /_yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/_nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas la/_lus la brten pa'i rnam par rig pa 
[\[79a.2\]]yang mi skyed pa dang /_de bzhin du rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'jig rten la brnab sems dang /_yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/_phyi'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas la/_lus la brten pa'i rnam par rig pa yang mi skyed pa dang 
[\[79a.3\]]de bzhin du rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'jig rten la brnab sems dang /_yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/_nang dang phyi'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas la/_lus la brten pa'i rnam par rig pa yang mi skyed pa dang /_de bzhin du 
[\[79a.4\]]rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'jig rten la brnab sems dang /_yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/_nang gi tshor ba rnams dang /_phyi'i tshor ba rnams dang /_phyi nang gi tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing gnas la/_tshor ba la 
[\[79a.5\]]brten pa'i rnam par rig pa yang mi skyed pa dang /_de bzhin du rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'jig rten la brnab sems dang /_yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/_nang gi sems rnams dang /_phyi'i sems rnams dang /_phyi nang gi sems rnams la 
[\[79a.6\]]sems kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas la/_sems la brten pa'i rnam par rig pa yang mi skyed pa dang /_de bzhin du rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'jig rten la brnab sems dang /_yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/_nang gi chos rnams dang /_phyi'i 
[\[79a.7\]]chos rnams dang /_phyi nang gi chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas la/_chos la brten pa'i rnam par rig pa yang mi skyed pa'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa/_bam po brgyad pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar na nang gi 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas she na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod na yang spyod par rab tu shes so/_/'greng na yang bdag 'greng bar rab tu shes so/_/'dug na yang bdag 'dug par rab tu shes so/_/nyal na yang bdag nyal bar rab tu shes so/_/
[\[79b.2\]]de'i lus ji lta ji lta bur gnas par gyur pa de lta de lta bur rab tu shes te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la brnab sems dang /_yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/_nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta 
[\[79b.3\]]zhing gnas so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'gro'am ldog kyang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/_kun tu lta'am/_rnam par lta yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/_bskum pa dang /_brkyang pa dang /_snam sbyar dang /_ras yug chen dang /_lhung 
[\[79b.4\]]bzed thogs pa dang /_za ba dang /_'thung ba dang /_'cha' ba dang /_myang ba dang /_gnyid bsad pa dang /_ngal bso ba dang /_'ong ba dang /_'gro ba'am/_'dug pa dang /_nyal ba dang /_mi nyal ba dang /_smra ba dang /_mi smra ba na yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/_nang du yang dag 'jog 
[\[79b.5\]]dang /_ldang na yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang 
[\[79b.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dran bzhin du dbugs rngub cing /_dran bzhin du dbugs 'byin te/_des dbugs ring du brngubs na yang dbugs ring du brngubs pa dang /_dbugs ring du phyung na yang dbugs ring du phyung bar rab tu shes so/_/dbugs thung ngu brngubs na 
[\[79b.7\]]yang dbugs thung ngu brngubs par rab tu shes so/_/dbugs thung ngu phyung na yang dbugs thung ngu phyung bar rab tu shes so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na rdza mkhan nam/_rdza mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pas 'phang lo skor ba ni ring du srub na yang ring du srub par rab tu shes so/_/thung ngu srub na yang thung 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]ngu srub par rab tu shes so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dran bzhin du dbugs brngubs cing /_dran bzhin du dbugs 'byin te/_des dbugs ring du brngubs na yang dbugs ring du brngubs par rab tu shes so/_/
[\[80a.2\]]dbugs ring du phyung na yang dbugs ring du phyung bar rab tu shes so/_/dbugs thung ngu brngubs na yang dbugs thung ngu brngubs par rab tu shes so/_/dbugs thung ngu phyung na yang dbugs thung ngu phyung bar rab tu shes so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun 
[\[80a.3\]]pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'jig rten la brnab sems dang /_yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/_nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lus 'di nyid la 
[\[80a.4\]]khams kyis so sor rtog par byed de/_lus 'di la ni sa'i khams dang /_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams yod do snyam du rtog go/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na ba lang gsod pa la mkhas pa'am/_ba lang gsod pa'i slob ma mkhas pas mtshon rnon pos ba lang 
[\[80a.5\]]bsad nas/_bag bzhir gshags te gzugs bzhir phye nas 'greng ngam 'dug ste/_so sor rtog pa de bzhin du/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yang lus 'di nyid la khams kyis so sor rtog par byed de/_lus 
[\[80a.6\]]'di la ni sa'i khams dang /_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams yod do snyam du rtog ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa 
[\[80a.7\]]yin te/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lus 'di nyid rkang pa'i mthil yan chad skra dang mgo bo man chad mi gtsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang ste/_lus 'di la ni skra dang spu dang /_sen mo dang /_pags 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]pa dang /_pags shun dang /_sha dang rgyus pa dang /_rus pa dang /_rkang dang /_mkhal ma dang /_snying dang /_mtsher ba dang /_glo ba dang /_mchin pa dang /_sul [{]mangs [,]mang [}]dang /_rgyu ma dang /_gnye ma dang /_gzhang dang /_lgang ba dang /_phyi sa dang /_mchi ma dang /_rngul dang /_tshil 
[\[80b.2\]]dang /_mchil ma dang /_snabs dang /_rnag dang /_khrag dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan dang /_zhag dang /_chu ser dang /_dri ma dang /_gcin dang /_klad pa dang /_klad rgyas dag yod do snyam du so sor rtog ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na khyim bdag zhing pa'i spyang 'bru'i rnam pa 
[\[80b.3\]]sna tshogs 'di lta ste/_til dang /_'bras thug po che dang /_mon sran sde'u dang /_mon sran na gu dang /_nas dang /_gro dang /_sran chung dang /_'bras sA lu dang /_'bru dang /_yungs 'bru dag gis gang ba sgo drung gnyis su bzhag pa la skyes bu mig dang ldan pas mthong na/_'di dag 
[\[80b.4\]]ni til yin no/_/'di dag 'bras thug po che yin no/_/'di dag ni mon sran sde'u yin no/_/'di dag ni mon sran na gu yin no/_/'di dag ni nas yin no/_/'di dag ni gro yin no/_/'di dag ni sran chung yin no/_/'di dag ni 'bras sA lu yin no/_/'di dag ni 'bru yin no/_/'di dag 
[\[80b.5\]]ni yungs kar yin no snyam du shes so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang lus 'di nyid la rkang pa'i mthil yan chad skra dang mgo man chad mi gtsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang ste/_lus 'di la ni skra dang /_spu dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_
[\[80b.6\]]klad pa dang /_klad rgyas kyi bar dag yod do snyam du so sor rtog go/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la brnab sems dang /_yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal nas/_nang gi lus la lus 
[\[80b.7\]]kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul du ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i skyon med pa yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i skyon med pa ni 'di lta ste/_yang dag par spong ba bzhi'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed cing rtsol la/_brtson 
[\[81a.2\]]'grus rtsom ste/_sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang /_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed cing rtsol la brtson 'grus rtsom ste/_sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang /_dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa 
[\[81a.3\]]rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed cing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom ste/_sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang /_dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang /_mi brjed pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_phyir zhing bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa 
[\[81a.4\]]skyed cing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom ste/_sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog la/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul du ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[81a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa ni 'di lta ste/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin spang ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/_'dod chags 
[\[81a.6\]]dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba bsgom pa dang /_de bzhin du sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spang ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spang ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom 
[\[81a.7\]]pa dang /_dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spang ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba bsgom ste de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul du ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa ni 'di lta ste/_dbang po lnga'o/_/lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dad pa'i dbang po dang /_brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /_dran pa'i 
[\[81b.2\]]dbang po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /_shes rab kyi dbang po ste/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul du ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[81b.3\]]skyon med pa ni 'di lta ste/_stobs lnga'o/_/lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dad pa'i stobs dang /_brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang /_dran pa'i stobs dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang /_shes rab kyi stobs so/_/de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul du ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni byang 
[\[81b.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa ni 'di lta ste/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun no/_/bdun gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_
[\[81b.5\]]chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_btang 
[\[81b.6\]]snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/_dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag de yang dben pa la gnas pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la gnas pa/_rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba bsgom pa dang /_de bzhin du chos rnam par 'byed pa 
[\[81b.7\]]yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_brtson 'grus dang dga' ba dang shin tu sbyangs pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong bas yongs su 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]bsgyur ba bsgom ste/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa ni 'di lta ste/_'phags 
[\[82a.2\]]pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ste/_brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ngag dang /_yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /_yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /_yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /_yang dag 
[\[82a.3\]]pa'i ting nge 'dzin nyid ni brgyad pa yin te/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul du ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa ni 'di lta ste/_chos thams 
[\[82a.4\]]cad gnyis su med par shes pa la 'jug pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_chos thams cad la rnam par mi rtog cing bsam gtan gyi bde ba la ro myang ba med par bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_chos thams cad mi skye bar bzod pa la 
[\[82a.5\]]'jug pas tshad med pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_khams gsum dmigs su med par shes pas gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_sems dang yid dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang bral bas rnam par thar ba brgyad la snyoms par 
[\[82a.6\]]'jug pa dang /_'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la gnyis su med par mthong bas/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgul snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_chos thams cad smig rgyu lta bu la 'jug pas 'du shes dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_dran pa med cing 
[\[82a.7\]]yid la byed pa med par rjes su dran pa bcu la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu la 'jug pas 'du shes drug la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_shes pa dang mi shes pa'i chos mnyam pas shes pa bcu la 'jug pa dang /_chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mnyam par 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]bzhag par rtogs nas gsum la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_dus gsum dang bral ba'i shes pas dbang po gsum bsgom pa dang /_tshul gcig cing tha dad par mi byed pa'i shes pa la 'jug pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched rnams bsgom pa dang /_chos zab mo la bzod pa la 
[\[82b.2\]]'jug pas zad par gyi skye mched rnams la snyoms par 'jug ste/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis snyoms par 'jug pa ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[82b.3\]]chen po'i skyon med pa ni gang gi tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_nang stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid mi mthong /_phyi stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid mi mthong /_nang stong pa nyid dang phyi stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi mthong /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la nang dang phyi stong 
[\[82b.4\]]pa nyid mi mthong /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid mi mthong /_chen po stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid mi mthong /_don dam pa stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi mthong /_'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi mthong /_'dus ma byas 
[\[82b.5\]]stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi mthong /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la/_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi mthong /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi mthong /_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la rang bzhin gyis 
[\[82b.6\]]stong pa nyid mi mthong /_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi mthong /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi mthong /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi mthong /_mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la dngos 
[\[82b.7\]]po med pa stong pa nyid mi mthong /_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi mthong /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi mthong /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi mthong ba ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa ni 'di 
[\[83a.2\]]lta ste/_gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing gzhan la bstan pa shes pa la 'jug pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o/_/bdag dang gzhan la rlom sems med pa la lhag par 'jug pas mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs 
[\[83a.3\]]su rdzogs par byed de/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yongs su spangs pa'i shes pas de la yang rlom sems su mi byed pas so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[83a.4\]]byed pa'o/_/sems can dang sems can med pas byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o/_/bdag bdag med pas snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o/_/rig pa gnyis kyi 
[\[83a.5\]]bsam pa dang bral bas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid la 'jug pas thams cad shes pa nyid dang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_
[\[83a.6\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o/_/ser sna dang /_'chal ba'i tshul khrims dang /_khro ba dang /_le lo dang /_rnam par g.yeng ba'i sems dang /_'chal ba'i shes rab kyi sems rnams dngos 
[\[83a.7\]]po med par mthong bas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o/_/chos thams cad 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med ces bya bar mos nas mngon par shes pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]byed pa'o/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang /_'byung ba med ces bya bar mthong nas/_mig lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de yang mi dmigs 
[\[83b.2\]]pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o/_/chos thams cad mi gnas pa'o zhes bya bar mos nas mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 
[\[83b.3\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ji ltar na byang chub kyi lam du mchi zhing byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la yang 'jug la/_sus kyang thul bar rngo mi thogs pa 
[\[83b.4\]]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_gzugs kyi phung por rlom sems su mi byed cing /_de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/_
[\[83b.5\]]mig gi skye mched du rlom sems su mi byed cing /_de bzhin du yid kyi skye mched kyi bar du rlom sems su mi byed/_gzugs kyi skye mched du rlom sems su mi byed pa nas/_chos kyi skye mched kyi bar du rlom sems su mi byed/_de bzhin du mig gi khams su rlom sems su mi 
[\[83b.6\]]byed/_gzugs kyi khams su rlom sems su mi byed/_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams su rlom sems su mi byed pa nas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi khams su rlom sems su mi byed/_chos kyi khams kyi bar du rlom sems su mi byed/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 
[\[83b.7\]]rnams su rlom sems su mi byed pa nas/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par rlom sems su mi byed pa nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]bcur rlom sems su mi byed/_de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad du rlom sems su mi byed/_de bzhin du rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 
[\[84a.2\]]bar du rlom sems su mi byed pa nas dgra bcom pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/_de bzhin du rang byang chub tu rlo ma sems su mi byed/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[84a.3\]]po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par 'phel ba na/_byang chub kyi lam du 'gro zhing byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la yang 'jug la/_sus kyang thul bar mi nus pa yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[84a.4\]]tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_shes pa gang dang ldan nam yang ngan song rnams su rab tu mi ltung zhing mi rnams kyi nang du nyams par mi 'gyur la/_dbul por ma yin pa dang /_lus gang dang ldan na lha dang mi dang 
[\[84a.5\]]lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten gyis smad par 'gyur ba'i lus de lta bu yongs su 'dzin to/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[84a.6\]]shes pa gang dang ldan na/_nam yang ngan song rnams su mi ltung ba dang /_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten gyis smad par mi 'gyur bar shes pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes pa 
[\[84a.7\]]gang dang ldan na/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag mthong zhing de dag las chos kyang nyan la/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]dag gi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang mthong /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag kyang mthong ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes pa gang dang ldan na/_sangs rgyas su 'du shes mi 'jug_/_byang chub sems dpar 
[\[84b.2\]]'du shes mi 'jug_/nyan thos su 'du shes mi 'jug_/rang sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa ma yin/_bdag tu 'du shes pa ma yin/_bdag med par 'du shes pa ma yin/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'du shes pa ma yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes pa gang dang 
[\[84b.3\]]ldan na/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang spyod la/_sbyin pa de yang mi dmigs pa nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang spyod la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang mi dmigs pa dang /_shes pa gang dang ldan na/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi dmigs par dran pa nye 
[\[84b.4\]]bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs par sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la spyod pa ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes pa gang dang ldan na/_chos thams cad 
[\[84b.5\]]kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed la/_chos de dag tu yang rlom sems su mi byed pa'i shes pa yin te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa byang chub kyi lam rnam par spyod par 'dod pa/_byang chub sems 
[\[84b.6\]]dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug par 'dod pas lus kyi las dang /_ngag gi las dang /_yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dag gi skabs dbye bar mi bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la che dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 
[\[84b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang lags/_ngag gi las gang lags/_yid kyi las gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]bka' stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'di snyam du sems te/_lus gang gis bdag lus la dmigs par bya'o snyam pa'i lus de 'di yin no snyam pa dang /_de bzhin du ngag de 'di yin no snyam pa dang /_de bzhin du yid de 'di 
[\[85a.2\]]yin no snyam pa dang /_yid gang gis bdag yid la dmigs par bya'o snyam pa'i yid de 'di yin no snyam pa ste//sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni lus kyi las dang /_ngag gi las dang /_yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab 
[\[85a.3\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_lus kyang mi dmigs pa yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_lus dmigs la/_lus sam/_ngag gam/_yid gang gis ser sna'i sems skyed par byed cing /_
[\[85a.4\]]'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi sems sam/_'khrug pa'i sems sam/_le lo'i sems sam/_rnam par g.yengs pa'i sems sam/_'chal ba'i shes rab kyi sems skyed na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma yin par rig par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 
[\[85a.5\]]gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_lus kyi gnas ngan len sbyong bar byed/_ngag gi gnas ngan len sbyong bar byed/_yid kyi gnas ngan len sbyong bar byed na/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes 
[\[85a.6\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_byang chub kyi lam rnam par sbyong zhing /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la yang dag par 'jug pa yin no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom 
[\[85a.7\]]ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus kyi gnas ngan len sbyong ba lags/_de bzhin du ji ltar na ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len sbyong ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]dpa' chen po lus mi dmigs/_ngag dang yid mi dmigs shing /_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yang dag par blangs nas gnas la/_nam yang nyan thos kyi sems sam/_
[\[85b.2\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi sems mi skyed cing /_sems can thams cad la yang rtag pa kho nar snying rje chen po skyed par byed pa ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus kyi gnas ngan len yongs su dag par smra'o/_/de bzhin du ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan 
[\[85b.3\]]len yongs su dag par smra'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_byang chub kyi lam sbyong bar byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la yang 'jug pa yin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las skyon 
[\[85b.4\]]med pa'i le'u zhes bya ste brgyad pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la gnas na byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la 'jug 
[\[85b.5\]]cing /_nyi tshe ba'i theg pas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa de gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub 
[\[85b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_nyi tshe ba'i sems can rnams kyi ched du sbyin pa sbyin par mi byed/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na nyi tshe ba'i sems can rnams kyi ched du tshul khrims mi srung /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 
[\[85b.7\]]'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang de bzhin la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_nyi tshe ba'i sems can rnams kyi ched du shes rab mi sgom gyi/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_sems can thams cad kyi ched du sbyin pa sbyin 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]par byed pa nas/_de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la spyod pa na/_sems can thams cad kyi ched du shes rab sgom par byed de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di snyed cig ni phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das 
[\[86a.2\]]pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/_/sems can 'di snyed cig ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar mi bya'o/_/sems can 'di snyed cig ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la dgod par bya'o/_/sems can 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/_/snyam du sems can ris su chad 
[\[86a.3\]]pa rnams kyi don gyi phyir/_go cha chen po gyon par mi byed kyi/_sems can thams cad kyi ched du go cha chen po gyon par byed cing /_de 'di snyam du yang sems te/_bdag nyid kyis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha 
[\[86a.4\]]rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_bdag nyid kyis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/de bzhin du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bdag nyid 
[\[86a.5\]]kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la sbyar bar bya'o snyam pa ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de tsam gyis na go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i 
[\[86a.6\]]bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_sbyin pa gang sbyin pa de thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sbyin zhing /_de yang sems can thams cad dang lhan cig thun mong du byas nas/_mi
