[\[86a.7\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha 'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa na/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin zhing /_de dag nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis yid la mi byed par sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_yongs su sngo ba 'di ni byang chub 
[\[86b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa sbyin pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa na/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la 
[\[86b.3\]]bya bdag gis sbyin zhing /_sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byed la/_chos de dag la bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_yid ches pa 'di dag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha zhes bya'o/_/zhes bya ba'i bar du de bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de bzhin du sbyin pa sbyin pa'i bar gyi brtson 'grus 
[\[86b.4\]]kyi brtson pa mi gtong zhing mi 'dor la/_rab tu 'dzin pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/de bzhin du sbyin pa sbyin pa na/_sems can thams cad yid la byas nas/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyi go skabs mi 'byed par 'di lta ste/_thams 
[\[86b.5\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems rtse gcig pa nyid 'di ni/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa na/_sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing /_des sbyin par byed pa yang 
[\[86b.6\]]mi dmigs/_sbyin pa yang ma yin/_len par byed pa yang ma yin la/_sbyin pa yang sbyin par byed pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa sbyin pa sbyin pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub 
[\[86b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag la mtshan mar mi byed cing dmigs par yang mi byed pa de'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/_/sha ra 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin par byed cing /_de yang sems can thams 
[\[87a.2\]]cad dang thun mong du byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan 
[\[87a.3\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang 'dod pa med pa nyid yin na so so'i skye bo'i sa la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[87a.4\]]chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos de dag la/_bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_mngon par yid ches pa gang yin pa 'di 
[\[87a.5\]]ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos de dag la 
[\[87a.6\]]brtson pa mi gtong zhing mi 'dor ba dang /_rab tu 'dzin pa gang yin pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub 
[\[87a.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba'i sems dang ma bral bar nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems kyi go skabs 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]kyang mi 'byed na/_so so'i skye bo'i sems dag gis lta smos kyang ci dgos pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems 
[\[87b.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang chos thams cad la sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing /_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_tshul khrims de la yang rlom sems su mi byed cing mi dmigs pa 'di ni/_sha ra dwa 
[\[87b.3\]]ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_pha rol tu phyin 
[\[87b.4\]]pa drug gis yongs su zin pa'i go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin zhing /_de yang sems 
[\[87b.5\]]can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba ste/_snga ma ji lta ba de bzhin du sbyar ro/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang de 
[\[87b.6\]]bzhin du sbyar ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la yang snyoms par 
[\[87b.7\]]'jug la/_de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye zhing mi 'phrogs pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug cing dben 
[\[88a.2\]]par mthong ba dang /_stong pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med par mthong bas nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang 'jug la/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon pa 'di yang /_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub 
[\[88a.3\]]sems dpa' bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub 
[\[88a.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha chen po bgos pa la ni/_shar phyogs nas phyogs mtshams kyi bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang su dag bzhugs pa de dag thams cad 'jig 
[\[88a.5\]]rten gyi khams ga ge mo zhig na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di go cha chen po bgos te/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed/_rdzu 'phrul gyis kyang rnam par 'phrul lo zhes ched du 
[\[88a.6\]]brjod pa ched du brjod par mdzad cing /_snyan pa sgrogs la dbyangs brjod par mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po gang gis de 
[\[88a.7\]]theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhon pa zhes bgyi ba de gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa na/_'dod pa dag las dben pa/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te 
[\[88b.2\]]gnas pa dang /_de rtog pa dang /_dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/_sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/_dpyod pa med pa ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_de dga' 
[\[88b.3\]]ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de btang snyoms pa dran pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/zhes brjod pa dag ste/_dga' ba med pa bde ba la gnas pa bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_de bde ba yang spangs te/_snga nas yid bde ba 
[\[88b.4\]]dang /_yid mi bde ba yang nub pas sdug bsngal yang ma yin/_bde ba yang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa/_bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_de bzhin du byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa/_mi gnyis 
[\[88b.5\]]pa/_tshad med pa/_kho na med pa/_gnod pa med pa/_'gran zla med pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig khyab par byas te/_mos nas bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_de bzhin du gnyis pa dang /_de bzhin du gsum pa dang /_
[\[88b.6\]]de bzhin du phyogs bzhi pa dang /_de bzhin du 'og dang /_steng dang /_thad kar thams cad kyi thams cad du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten la byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis khyab par byas te/_mos nas bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_de bzhin du snying rje dang ldan 
[\[88b.7\]]pa dang /_dga' ba dang ldan pa dang /_btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems kyis thams cad kyi thams cad du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten la khyab par byas te/_mos pa'i bar du bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste/_tshad med pa bzhi bsam gtan dang ldan pa 'di dag ni byang chub 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po rab mchog yin no/_/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan de dag nyid tshad med pa'i rnam pa dang /_rtags dang mtshan ma dag gis snyoms par 'jug cing ldang ba de 
[\[89a.2\]]dag snyoms par 'jug cing ldang ba na/_sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di yang /_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/_/gang gi tshe 
[\[89a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gzhan dag la tshul 
[\[89a.4\]]bzhin du rjod cing ston te/_rab tu 'chad la rnam par 'byed de/_gsal bar byed cing /_de dag gi ro myong ba'i nyes dmigs dang /_nges par 'byung ba yang ston pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/
[\[89a.5\]]gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag gis bsam gtan dang po de dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du gnon cing sgom ste/_bsam gtan de dag la gnas shing sems bskyed pa gzhan 'di lta ste/_nyan thos dang 
[\[89a.6\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dag gi skabs mi 'byed pa 'di ni/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog med pa'o/_/yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[89a.7\]]nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa de dag dang ma bral bar 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir/_sems can thams cad la chos bstan par bya'o snyam nas/_de yid la byed pa de dag la bzod pa dang /_
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]'dod pa dang /_nye bar rtog pa dang /_nges par sems pa gang yin pa de ni/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan 
[\[89b.2\]]pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis rang gis byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/_rtag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo la/_de brtson pa mi gtong zhing mi 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub 
[\[89b.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_
[\[89b.4\]]rnam par thar pa dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang yang nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang rnam 
[\[89b.5\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par zhugs pa na/_bsam gtan gyi yan lag thams cad mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang /_stong 
[\[89b.6\]]pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i rnam par yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog kyang snying rje chen pos yongs su zin pas nyan thos kyi skyon med pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med pa la yang mi 'jug pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[89b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad du dran pa nye bar gzhag 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]bzhi yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sgom ste/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du yang de bzhin no/_/rnam pa thams cad du stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom 
[\[90a.2\]]pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du sgom ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang 
[\[90a.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la snyoms par 'jug cing /_bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab par bya'o zhes de dag la phan pa'i sems nyid du gtod par byed do/_/snying rje la yang snyoms par 'jug cing de dag la snying brtse ba'i sems 
[\[90a.4\]]nyid du gtod par byed do/_/dga' ba la yang snyoms par 'jug cing bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su 'grol bar bya'o/_/zhes de yang sems can thams cad la gtod par byed do/_/btang snyoms la yang snyoms par 'jug cing /_sems can thams 
[\[90a.5\]]cad zag pa zad par gyur cig ces sgom zhing de yang de dag la gtod par byed pa 'di ni/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bsam gtan dang /_
[\[90a.6\]]tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa de dag nyid kyi rnam pa dang /_rtags dang mtshan ma dag gis snyoms par 'jug cing ldang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[90a.7\]]dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa dag la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag dang ma 'dres par gnas te/_sa gnyis po de dag dang /_nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyis la 'dod pa mi skyed kyi/_de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bzod pa dang /_'dod pa 'di ni byang chub sems 
[\[90b.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa dag la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis mi dge ba'i 
[\[90b.3\]]chos spang ba dang /_dge ba'i chos bsgrub pa'i phyir brtson pa mi gtong bar gnas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa dag la gnas pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/yang byang chub 
[\[90b.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bsam gtan de dag nyid dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag nyid la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang yang bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis 
[\[90b.5\]]mi 'phrogs la/_de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la gnas pa'i thabs la mkhas pa las byung ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha 
[\[90b.6\]]rol tu phyin pa'o/_/yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bdag gis bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la snyoms par yang 'jug cing 
[\[90b.7\]]ldang yang de dag kyang mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang /_bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog kyang de dag gis nyan thos kyi skyon med 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med par yang mi 'jug pa 'di ni/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa 
[\[91a.2\]]las byung ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las byung ba'i thabs la mkhas pas yongs su 
[\[91a.3\]]zin pa'i theg pa chen po yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid shes pa'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong 
[\[91a.4\]]pa nyid kyi bar du shes pa yang de bzhin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni chos thams cad la rnam par g.yengs so snyam pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa'o snyam du shes pa mi 'jug pa gang yin pa'o/_/sha ra dwa 
[\[91a.5\]]ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rtag go snyam pa dang /_mi rtag go snyam du shes pa mi 'jug pa gang yin pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_bde'o snyam pa dang /_sdug bsngal lo snyam pa dang /_bdag yod do snyam pa 
[\[91a.6\]]dang /_bdag med do snyam du shes pa mi 'jug pa ste/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so//_//
